11060.title: Torsten Haß
11060.extract: Torsten Haß (amụrụ ya n’afọ 1970, Neumünster, Jémanị), pseudonym Kim Godal, bụ onye odee. Ịdụazị kacha ree nke ọma bụ Bibliotheken für Dummies: 60000 mbipụta.

14158.title: Joseph Muzondo
14158.extract:
Joseph Muzondo (a mụrụ n'afọ 1953) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe.
N'ịbụ onye nwanne nna ya kụziiri ya n'ọrụ , Muzondo mechara sonye na National Gallery B.A.T. Workshop na Harare, Zimbabwe. Ọ gụrụ maka imewe ákwà na Tanzania na eserese  nka na Austria, ma gosipụta ya n'ụwa niile. Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta nke National Gallery of Zimbabwe .

16216.title: Priscille Kreto
16216.extract:
databox}}
Priscille Kreto Lagoali (amụrụ na 8 Mee 1997), nke a maara dị ka Priscille kreto, bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na Ivorian nke na-agba ọsọ maka Africa Sports d'Abidjan na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ivory Coast.

16743.title: Feyrouz (actress)
16743.extract:
Perouz Artin Kalfayan, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Feyrouz ma ọ bụ Fayrouz, bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri ụmụaka.
A mụrụ Kalfayan na Cairo, Egypt, na 15 Maachị 1943, n'ezinụlọ ndị Armenia nke Ijipt, ndị nna nna ya gbapụrụ n'ihi mkpagbu Ottoman wee biri na Ijipt. Nwanne ya nwanyị, Nelly Kalfaian, batakwara na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ. Aha ọmụmụ ya, Perouz, bụ aha Armenia, ma eleghị anya ụdị Feyrouz. Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya mgbe ọ dị obere, na-eme nke mbụ ya mgbe ọ gbara afọ asaa na ihe nkiri Yasmine nke 1950. Onye nduzi Ijipt Anwar Wagdi nyeere ya aka n'ọrụ ya. O mechara laa ezumike nká n'ịme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, n'afọ 1959, ka ọ lụọ onye na-eme ihe ọchị Badreddine Gamgoum. Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ abụọ, Iman na Ayman.

19899.title: Kirikiri tanker explosion
19899.extract: Mgbawa tankị Kirikiri bụ mgbawa tankị nke mere na Kirikiri, Apapa, nnukwu ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke obodo Lagos State, Nigeria, nke dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Lagos Island.

24280.title: Fatima Jibrell
24280.extract: Fatima Jibrell (Somali: , Arabic; amụrụ na , mgbe  onwa Disemba, gbara nkpuru ụbọchị iri atọ n' afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri anọ na asaa ) bụ onye Somali-Amirikan na-ahụ maka gburugburu  ebe obibi. Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi nchịkwa nke Horn of Africa Relief and Development Organization (nke bụ Adeso ugbu a), onye nchoputara nke Sun Fire Cooking, ma nye aka n'ịmepụta Women's Coalition for Peace.

27037.title: Bakhresa Group
27037.extract:
Bakhresa Group bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe dabere na Tanzania, East Africa. Onye nwe ya bụ onye ọchụnta ego na ijeri ijeri Tanzania Said Salim Bakhresa, azụmahịa a bụ otu n'ime ndị kacha ibu na mpaghara ahụ.
Otu a na-arụ ọrụ ya gbasaa na Tanzania Mainland & Zanzibar, Kenya, Uganda, Malawi, Mozambique, Zambia, Rwanda, Burundi, Zimbabwe ya na South Africa. 
Enwere ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche n'okpuru nche anwụ yana itinye ego na ngalaba nri na ihe ọ drinkụ ,ụ, nkwakọ ngwaahịa, ngwa ngwa, ọrụ njem ụgbọ mmiri, mmanụ ala na ihe ntụrụndụ.
Ngwaahịa na ọrụ ndị otu a nyere bụ:

Ubi ọka wit, ọka wit
Ubi ọka, ọka Bran
Biski na Akụrụngwa Bakery
Ihe ọṅụṅụ ndị dị nro na ihe ndị na-esi ísì ụtọ
Mkpụrụ osisi na-esi ísì ụtọ
Ice Cream
Mmiri dị n'ime karama
akpa polypropylene gụnyere akpa laminated maka ụlọ ọrụ simenti
Ihe nkwakọba plastik gụnyere obibi akwụkwọ
Igbe Akwụkwọ
Ngwaahịa mmanụ
Ebe ndị njem ụgbọ mmiri na ụgbọelu na-arụ ọrụ
Ebe a na-edebe ihe n'ime ala
Ọrụ Njem Okporo ụzọ
Azam TV
Azam F.C.

27462.title: Christina McAnea
27462.extract: Christina McAnea (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) bụ onye isi otu ọrụ na Scotland.  bu onye ndu otu ndi ahia nke Scotland.  A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Unison n'ọnọdụ nke Dave Prentis. Wee weghara ọkwa ahụ na 22 Jenụwarị 2021.

30660.title: Gado Nasko
30660.extract: Muhammad Gado Nasko (amụrụ nfọ 1941) bụ gọvanọ ndị agha nke Sokoto Steeti, Naịjirịa netiti afọ 1978 na 1979.

31605.title: Adamu Sidi Ali
31605.extract: Adamu Muhammad Sidi-Ali (amụrụ 14 Mee 1952) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọrụ ugbo na Naịjirịa. Ọ na-agba ọsọ nke ọma maka ụlọ ọrụ onyeisi oche (Abaji Area Council) na maka Ụlọ Nnọchiteanya malite na mmalite 2000s. Na Disemba 2014, ọ pụtara ọzọ dị ka Senatorial Candidate of All Progressives Congress maka ntuli aka 2015. Ọ bụ nwa afọ Abaji Area Council na Federal Capital Territory.

31626.title: Ashimi nke Borno
31626.extract:
Templeeti:Infobox royalty
Ashimi ma ọ bụ Hashim bin Umar al-Kanemi (1840s-1893) bụ Shehu nke Borno site na ca.1885 ruo 1893.

35320.title: Catherine Gage
35320.extract: Catherine Gage (18 Mee 1815 - 16 Febụwarị 1892) bụ onye Irish botanist, botanical na ornithological illustrator.

37799.title: Ndepụta nke ndị gọvanọ nke Gombe Steeti
37799.extract: .Nke a bụ ndepụta ndepụta na ndị ndu nke Gombe State, Nigeria.  Ewubere steeti Gombe na 1 October 1996 site na ngalaba nke steeti Bauchi ochie site n'aka ndị agha Sani Abacha

38038.title: Abouna (ihe nkiri)
38038.extract: Abouna (Templeeti:Lang-ar, English: "Our Father") i Ihe nkiri 2002 sitere n'aka onye ntụzi Chad Mahamat Saleh Haroun na bụ akụkọ nke ụmụnne abụọ na-eto eto na-achọ nna ha. Esere ya na ebe dị na Gaoui na N'Djamena, Chad. Ọ bụ ya Nrubeisi nke Chadian maka onyinye agụmakwụkwọ Academy maka ihe nkiri asụsụ mba ofesi kacha mma na 75th Academy Awards mana ahọpụtaghị ya.

38698.title: Temitope Ajayi
38698.extract: Amina Temitope Ajayi (aka Mama Diaspora) bụ onye ndụmọdụ azụmaahịa Naijiria nke dị na US bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego site na ọzụzụ, onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na obodo. Temitope Ajayi bụ onye bụbu onye isi oche nke All Nigerian American Congress (ANAC).    na nkwado ọ na-aga n'ihu na nsogbu ndị Naijiria Diaspora emeela ka a kpọọ ya "Mama Diaspora" na mgbasa ozi.A maara Chief Ajayi nke ọma maka ịkwalite ike ụmụ nwanyị na mkpochapụ ịda ogbenye n'Afrika site na Agri-azụmahịa. Site  nnọkọ itinye ego Arkansas-Naijiria a na nnọkọ akụ na ụba abụọ ndị ọzọ na US, nkwụsi ike na ezi obi Chief Ajayi enyerela aka n'ime ka o kwenye ma dọta ọtụtụ ndị isi na-etinye ego na azụmahịa ugbo site na US ruo Naịjirịa.  bụ onye guzobere / onye isi nke Nigerian American Agricultural Empowerment Program (NAAEP), nke na-etinye aka n'inye ndị ọrụ ugbo, ụmụ nwanyị na ndị na-eto eto ike na Naịjirịa iji mụbaa nri zuru ezu na ọrụ na-adịgide adịgide maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ okorobịa na ngalaba ọrụ ugbo. [1]  abụwo òtù na-azụ ma na enye ndị ọrụ ugbo ike na usoro ọrụ ugbo, ka ọ na eme ka ego azụmaahịa dị mfe, ịnweta ngwa ọrụ ugbo na owuwe ihe ubi na ahịa nke ngwaahịa ha na mpaghara na mba ụwa. [1] [2] 'afọ 2010, Chief Ajayi kpọrọ gọọmentị etiti nke Naijiria ka ha belata ọnụego ọmụrụ nwa na mgbazinye ego nye ndị ọrụ ugbo iji bulie ngalaba ọrụ ugbo na ibelata ịda ogbenye na mba ahụ. Chief Temitope Ajayi bụ onye nnọchi anya Goodwill maka steeti Arkansas na Maryland, USA.  . Ajayi bụ onye nnọchiteanya pụrụ iche na 2014 gara aga nke Naịjirịa Nzukọ mba ebe ọ nọchitere anya National Council of Women Societies (NCWS) na Naịjirị ma jee ozi na Kọmitii Confab na Ọrụ Ugbo. Chief Temitope Ajayi  N'okwu ya na Nzukọ Kwa Afọ nke World Bank Group na International Monetary Fund, gwara ndị nnọchiteanya na "Ụmụ nwanyị bụ engine nke ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo, ụmụ nwanyị na-achịkwa akụ na ụba nke mba ọ bụla - n'ihi na ha na-azụ ahịa karịa ndị nwoke ibe ha, ike nke ego ọ bụla bụ n'ikike ha iji gboo mkpa na ọkọnọ".

41742.title: Pakistan Poverty Alleviation Fund
41742.extract: Pakistan Poverty Alleviation Fund (PPAF) bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ maka uru Pakistan dabere na ụdị ọha na eze na nkeonwe .  PPAF bu n'obi, ụzọ dị irẹ maka ibelata ego ogbenye n'ofe Pakistan.  Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-eduga n'ọtụtụ ụzọ, nke abụọ na nke mba ụwa dịka ụlọ ụwa [1] na-enye aka na-ebelata ego ogbenye PPAF site n'inye nkwado ego na ego iji kwalite ntọala.  'Fund' a na-enyekarị aka site n'ịnye ezina ndị na-akpata dara ogbenye mbinye ego obere ego iji nyere ha aka ihe ha na-enye ogbenye.

42626.title: Nkwekọrịta Nnyocha Ọrụ (Ọrụ), 1969
42626.extract:
Mgbakọ nyocha ọrụ (Agriculture), 1969 bụ Mgbakọ Òtù Ndị Ọrụ Mba Nile .
E hiwere ya na 1969, yana okwu mmalite na-ekwu:

42804.title: Ọrụ Mmepe Njem nke Jọdan
42804.extract:
Ihe mbụ USAID kwadoro ọrụ mmepe njem nlegharị anya Jordan gbara afọ atọ (2005–2008) na-enye enyemaka aka nka, ọzụzụ na ọrụ ndị ọzọ iji nyere Jordan aka mejuputa atụmatụ njem nlegharị anya mba nke e mere iji mee ka nnata njem nlegharị anya okpukpu abụọ site na 2010.  Ọ kwalitere asọmpi Jordan dị ka ebe njem nlegharị anya mba ụwa site n'ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ siri ike na usoro nhazi nke kwalitere itinye ego na ngalaba nkeonwe, na-akpali uto njem nlegharị anya ma chekwaa akụ njem nlegharị anya mba na gburugburu ebe obibi.
Ebumnuche nke oru ngo a bụkwa inyere ndị ọchụnta ego onwe ha aka ịmepụta ngwaahịa na ọrụ ọhụrụ na nke zuru oke n'ofe ọnụ ahịa njem nlegharị anya. Ọ na-amụbawanye mmata n'etiti ndị Jordan maka mkpa mpaghara njem nlegharị anya, yana ebumnuche idobe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka onye were ha n'ọrụ.
Ọrụ a gara n'ihu n'afọ 2008 gara aga site na ego maka ọrụ mmepe mmepe njem nlegharị anya nke abụọ nke akpọrọ Siyaha .  Ọrụ nke abụọ a bụ nde $28, afọ ise (2008–2013) na-arụ ọrụ iji kwalite asọmpi Jordan dị ka ebe njem nlegharị anya mba ụwa. Ọrụ a na-arụ ọrụ na mmekorita ya na Ministry of Tourism & Antiquities na atumatu ndị dị otú ahụ dị ka ịzụlite ọhụrụ mba hotel classification usoro, imezi njem nlegharị anya nnyocha na ebe ịre ahịa, na-akwalite ecotourism, ịzụlite mma aka na kwalite ọzụzụ aka ọrụ na njem. USAID /Jordan Tourism Development Project II na-akwado ministri na mmepe saịtị ndị njem site na ịkwalite njikwa saịtị ihe ochie, nkọwa na nkwalite itinye ego na saịtị ndị bụ isi, ọkachasị Petra na Amman Citadel .

47484.title: Harris Barron
47484.extract: Harris Barron (1926-2017) bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye nkuzi, onye ode akwụkwọ, onye na-anya ụgbọ elu na onye na-eme njem bụ onye egwuregwu ntọala ma otu egwuregwu ihe nkiri ZONE na Studio for Interrelated Media (SIM)  ) na Massachusetts College of Art and Design na 1970.

47901.title: Bianca Mikahn
47901.extract: Bianca Mikahn bụ onye na-ede uri America, onye na-ese okwu, onye na-agụ hip hop, na onye na-eme ihe ike dabere na Denver, Colorado . A mụrụ Mikahn ma zụlite na Westminster, wee malite ide abụ mgbe ọ dị obere.  Ọ malitere ịme uri slam na 2006, wee zụọ ndị otu Slam Nuba slam uri. Na 2016, a kpọrọ Mikahn otu n'ime Westword 's 100 Colorado Creatives, yana otu n'ime mmemme egwu hip hop ọzọ kachasị mma nke Denver.   Na 2019, Magazin 303 aha ya bụ Mikahn otu n'ime "Ndị egwu ojii isii na-akwaga Denver n'ihu."

8962.title: Njoku ji
8962.extract: Njoku JI bụ chi na edu ji na ala Igbo ndị mmadụ ndi nke bi na odida ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Nigeria . Na-ufodu obodo di na-ala Igbo, a ka na-eme emume kwa afọ iji sọpụrụ chi a nke a na akpo Ifejioku. N'akuku ufodu, umuaka ndi raara onwe ha nye ozi nke chi a ka ana akpo Njoku. Dika ndi okenye, a na ele anya na umuaka a ga abu Di Ji ndi n'eme ofuma na oru ugbo nke ga eme ka ha soro na ndi nwere ugwu na obodo.

11005.title: Omo Ghetto
11005.extract: Omo Ghetto (nsụgharị Bekee: Child of the Ghetto ) bụ ihe nkiri mpụ na-atọ ọchị nke Niajiria nke afọ 2010 nke Naijiria  nke Abiodun Olarenwaju duziri, nke Funke Akindele, Rachel Oniga, Taiwo Hassan, Yinka Quadri na Eniola Badmus sonyere.

18142.title: Bishop Blay
18142.extract: Bishop Blay (amụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Liberia.

20145.title: Age Discrimination Act 2004
20145.extract:
Age Discrimination Act 2004 bụ iwu nke nzuko omeiwu nke Australia na-amachibido ịkpa oke afọ n'ọtụtụ mpaghara gụnyere ọrụ, agụmakwụkwọ, ebe obibi na ịnye ngwaahịa na ọrụ. Enwere ike ịkpa ókè megide ndị afọ ọ bụla n'ime ihe omume ahụ pụtara.
A na-enyefe ụfọdụ ihe ewepu, gụnyere maka otu okpukperechi, otu ọrụ ebere na ịkpa oke dị mma.
A ga-ebu ụzọ mee mkpesa nke ịkpa ókè n'aka na Australian Human Rights Commission (AHRC), ebe enwere ike ịmalite usoro nkwekọ. Ịde akwụkwọ mkpesa bụ n'efu. Ọ bụrụ na edozighị mkpesa ahụ site na usoro nkwekọrịta, enwere ike ibuga ya na Ụlọikpe Federal ma ọ bụ Ụlọikpe Saịkị nke Federal.
N'ozuzu, ịkpa ókè afọ abụghị mpụ. Agbanyeghị, iwu ahụ na-emepụta mmebi iwu nke mgbasa ozi ịkpa oke, mmekpa ahụ na ọdịda ikpughe data ndekọ ọnụ ọgụgụ ma ọ bụ eziokwu mgbe Onye isi ala AHRC rịọrọ ya.

22753.title: Latifa Lakhdar
22753.extract: Latifa Lakhdar (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1956) bụ onye Tunisia na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ Minista nke Ọdịbendị site n'ọnwarị n"afọ 2015 ruo Jenụwarị n".

22807.title: Blignault
22807.extract: Aha nna Blignaut sitere Afrikaans, nke jupụtara na Ndịda Africa.

28816.title: Nleba anya oke ọhịa nke nọọrọ onwe ya
28816.extract:
Nlekọta ọhịa onwe ya (IFM) bụ ngwá ọrụ maka ịtụle na iwusi nkwenye iwu ike na ngalaba ọhịa n'ụwa niile. Site n'ịgbakwunye ọrụ mmanye iwu ọhịa na ebumnuche na ntụkwasị obi ọha na eze nke onye nke atọ nwere onwe ya, IFM nwere ike imeziwanye nghọta n'oge na adịghị anya ka ọ na enye aka na mmepe nke usoro iwu na nhazi maka nlekọta ọhịa.
E mesiri nghọta ike dị ka ihe dị mkpa na Mbelata Mgbukpọ site na Mgbukwu ọhịa na Mgbụgba Ọhịa (REDD) site na UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) na Conference of the Parties (COP-15) na Copenhagen na Disemba 2009 na mkpebi ya gbasara nduzi usoro maka usoro nlekota ọhịa.

30246.title: NTUC FairPrice
30246.extract:
NTU FairPrice bụ nnukwu nnukwu ụlọ na Singapore .  [1] Onye ọrụ ahụ bụ Nkwado nke National Trades Union Congress (NTUC).  Otu a nwere ihe ụlọ ụlọ 100 n'ofe ahụ, nwere ihe ọmụmụ 160 ụlọ Cheers dị mma n'agwaetiti niile.
NTUC FairPrice esorola ExxonMobil rụkọọ ọrụ iji jiri akara ngosi ngosi FairPrice ọtụtụ ọdụ ụgbọ elu na minimarts n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ha.  Nnukwu ụlọ akara ngosi isiokwu "Singapore nke ya".

32127.title: Christopher Adebayo Alao-Akala
32127.extract:
Christopher Adebayo Alao-Akala // ⓘ (3 June 1950 - 12 Jenuarị 2022) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye uwe ojii Naijiria.  Ọ jere ozi dịka Gọvanọ steeti Oyo n'afọ 2006, ma ọzọkwa site n'afọ 2007 ruo 2011. Ọ bụ onye ga-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị ADP na ntuliaka gọvanọ nke afọ 2019 na Oyo steeti.

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote gọvanọ nke Oyo State site na Mee 2003 ruo Jenụwarị 2006 na-anọchi Rashidi Ladoja mgbe a chụpụrụ ya, mana o mechara laghachi n'ọfịs mgbe e weghachiri Ladoja na Disemba 2006. Rashidi Ladoja A họpụtara ya dịka gọvanọ n'afọ 2007, Abiola Ajimobi nke Action Congress of Nigeria meriri ya n'afọ 2011. gọvanọ 2007 2011 Abiola Ajimobi Action Congress of Nigeria Ọ nwụrụ n'ụbọchị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2022.

32485.title: Ịgụ Ihe Ndị Dị Iche
32485.extract:
SMART Reading bụ mmemme nkuzi ụmụaka na-enweghị uru, nke ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo na-eduzi na Oregon maka ndị na-agụ K-3 nọ n'ihe ize ndụ. Ọ bụ Neil Goldschmidt na ụlọ ọrụ iwu Ater Wynne Hewitt Dodson & Skerritt, LLP mepụtara SMART na 1992. Ọ tolitere site n'ijere ụmụaka 585 ozi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ 8 na mbido ya iji jeere ụmụaka 7,244 ozi na saịtị 204 na 2009, na saịtị 223 na 2011. Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2011, mmefu ego kwa afọ nke nzukọ ahụ bụ $ 2.7 nde. 
Echiche mmemme ahụ na-agụnye nwa akwụkwọ ọ bụla na-enweta nlebara anya otu ugboro n'izu maka nkeji iri atọ ka ha na-agụrụ onye ọrụ afọ ofufo iji nyere aka mee ka obi sie ha ike na ikike ịgụ ihe ha. Tụkwasị na nke a, ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ewere akwụkwọ abụọ n'ụlọ kwa ọnwa n'ime ọnwa asaa mmemme ahụ na-agba kwa afọ (n'etiti Ọktoba ruo n'etiti Mee), iji mee ka ihe ọgụgụ dịkwuo n'ụlọ.
Ọganihu nke mmemme ahụ na-akwado site na nyocha afọ abụọ nke e mere na Eugene Research Institute nke na-egosi na ụmụ akwụkwọ SMART na-eme nke ọma karịa ụmụ akwụkwọ yiri ya na njirimara okwu na nghọta okwu site na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọkara ntụgharị ọkọlọtọ.
SMART na-ezube iso ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị nwere pasent dị elu nke ụmụaka si n'ezinụlọ na-enweta ego dị ala. Ajụjụ ọnụ ndị ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ, nkwado obodo, na ozi sitere na Ngalaba Mmụta nke Oregon na-emetụtakwa nhọrọ ụlọ akwụkwọ.
N'afọ 2010, SMART sonyere na Pepsi's Refresh Challenge ma na-agba ọsọ maka ihe nrite $ 250,000.

33178.title: Ibrahim M. Ida
33178.extract:
A họpụtara Ibrahim M. Ida (amụrụ na 15 Jenụwarị 1949) ka ọ bụrụ Senator maka mpaghara Katsina Central nke Katsina State, Nigeria, na-amalite ọrụ na 29 Mee 2007. Ọ bụ onye otu All Progressives Congress . 
Ida nwetara AIB, London (1977), MSc na Banking & Finance, Mahadum Ibadan (1983) na LLB, BL, Mahaduma Abuja (2003).Tupu a họpụta ya na Senate ọ bụ Kọmishọna nke Ego, Katsina State na odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, Federal Civil Service. nhọpụta gasịrị, a họpụtara ya na kọmitii na-ahụ maka Iwu & Azụmaahịa, Independent National Electoral Commission, Finance and Defence & Army.Onye isi oche Umaru Musa Yaradua Mahadum Katsina.

38677.title: Fatima Faloye
38677.extract: Fatima Faloye Listen  (amụrụ na Harlem, New York City), bụ onye Naijiria na Barbadian wee mụọ akwụkwọ na Dalton School na New York City yana Mahadum New York . Faloye nwetara ihe nrite onyonyo NAACP a na-achọsi ike maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-akwado pụtara ìhè na usoro ihe nkiri na 1996 maka ọrụ ya dị ka Chantel Tierney na New York Undercover .  Faloye nwekwara obere ọrụ na usoro ogologo na-agba ọsọ Iwu & Iwu . Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na fim dị mkpụmkpụ nke nọọrọ onwe ya dị ka onye nrụpụta ma na-agụ akwụkwọ ịkwaga n'oche onye isi. Nwa nwanne nna ya, Christian Faloye bụ onye na-edekọ ihe nkiri Hip Hop mara dị ka Ilacoin .

39756.title: Mmetụta nke eriri limf
39756.extract:
lymph node metastasis bụ mgbasa (metastasis) nke Mkpụrụ ndụ kansa n'ime limf node.
Mmetụta nke limf node dị iche na malignant lymphoma. Lymphoma bụ ọrịa kansa nke limf, kama ọrịa kansa n'eriri limf n'ihi na lymphoma sitere n'eriri limf n'onwe ya, kama ịmalite n'ebe ọzọ (dịka, ara ma ọ bụ eriri afọ) ma gbasaa n'eriri limf.

39789.title: Winifred Akpani
39789.extract: Dame Winifred Akpani OFR bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego nke Naijiria na onye ọchụnta ego mara maka ntinye aka ya na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na gas. Ọ bụ onye Akaụntụ Chartered, na onye nchoputa, na onye isi oche nke Northwest Petroleum & Gas Company Limited,  ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa ngwaahịa mmanụ ala sitere na Nigeria.

40126.title: Ripley Bogle
40126.extract: Ripley Bogle bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ izizi nke onye edemede Northern Irish Robert McLiam Wilson, nke e bipụtara na 1989 na UK n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụghị ruo 1998 na US.  Edere ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 26, a na-arụ ụka na ọ bụ onye a kacha mara amara,  na-emeri ihe nrite Rooney na ihe nrite Hughes na 1989, yana onyinye Betty Trask na onyinye akwụkwọ Irish n'afọ na-esote.  Ọtụtụ ihe ndị dị n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ bụ nke onwe; A mụrụ onye edemede n'onwe ya na Belfast, gara Mahadum Cambridge, kwụsịrị ma ghọọ onye na-enweghị ebe obibi.  A na-ewere ya dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ dị ịrịba ama, na-emepụta "ma nyochagharị nke Northern Irish edemede, na ụzọ ọzọ dị na nsogbu ndị ahụ ."

47713.title: LaVerne Nelson Black
47713.extract: LaVerne Nelson Black (1887-1939) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nke ọrụ ya kpatara ụmụ amaala America.   Amụrụ na Wisconsin, o biri na Taos, New Mexico na 1920s na Phoenix, Arizona na 1930s, [1] ebe o mere murals abụọ maka NRHP-edepụtara United States Post Office .   [2] Ụbọchị nke bụ na mkpokọta na-agwụ nke Denver Art Museum, Jones Jr. Museum of Art, na Smithsonian American Art Museum.

53846.title: Alexandra Myšková
53846.extract: Alexandra Myšková (amuru 4 Eprel 1922) bu onye omere na onye isi ala Norway nke na-aru oru na Czechoslovakia.

54182.title: Ndị isi Manawa
54182.extract:
Ndị Chiefs Manawa bụ otu ndị otu egwuregwu rugby nke ụmụ nwanyị New Zealand hiwere isi na Hamilton, New Zealand na-asọ mpi n'asọmpi Super Rugby Aupiki . 
Ndị isi Manawa meriri n'oge mmalite nke asọmpi Super Rugby Aupiki. Ha enweghị mmeri n'oge oge niile wee merie ụmụ nwanyị Blues 35-0 na agba ikpeazụ iji nweta aha.    
N'afọ 2023, ha gara n'ihu n'usoro mmeri ha n'oge oge niile, mana Matatu meriri ha na ngwụcha.
Ndị Chiefs Manawa bụ ndị ikpeazụ maka afọ nke atọ kwụ ọtọ n'afọ 2024 chere ụmụ nwanyị Blues ihu na Eden Park mana ha gụchara ọzọ. Agbanyeghị, na-eso nke ikpeazụ, ha jikọtara ọzọ ka ha tinye Chiefs Manawa Development XV ihu na USA n'ihu ule PAC4 ha megide Black Ferns.  Ndị Chiefs Manawa Development XV jikọtara ya na USA na egwuregwu ọzụzụ 29-29.

55451.title: Kwete
55451.extract:
A dị ka Kpete, Kwete bụ Ihe ize na-aba n'anya nke Ndị Lugbara nke Uganda, Abanyala ba Kakamega na Kenya na DR Congo na-mmiri.  Usoro na-agụnyekọta sorghum, millet ma ọ bụ ọka, malt, mmiri esi na yeast nke a na-akpọ Aku fi.
N'ahịa West Nile, a na-erekarị biya omenala a ma na- mmiri ya na calabash (nke a na-akpọ Icereke) mana egbochi ike ya na akpa ọ mgbasa.

5259.title: Mahadum Niccolò Cusano
5259.extract: Mahadum Niccolò Cusano (Università degli Studi Niccolò Cusano - UNICUSANO) bu mahadum Rome, Italy, Obodo Békè kere.

10907.title: Moms at War
10907.extract:
Ndị nne na -alụ agha bụ ihe nkiri ejije ihe ọchị nke afọ 2018 nke Omoni Oboli duziri.
Ọ na -akọ akụkọ nne abụọ na -asọrịta mpi megide onwe ha na ndị ọzọ iji hụ na ihe ịga nke ọma na ndụ ụmụ ha,  ọkachasị asọmpi agụmakwụkwọ.  Omoni Oboli na -ekwu na mmụọ ya kpaliri ya ime ihe nkiri maka ihe ọ gabigara oge ọ bu nwata.  Ọ gosiputara  Funke Akindele na Michelle Dede, ọ bụkwa mmekorita n'etiti Inkblot, Filmone na Dioni Visions. 
Emere ya na Ọgọstụ 2018  na sinima ihe nkiri dị na Lekki, Lagos .  E wepụtara ya na Ọgọst 17, 2018.

11822.title: Oyi (song)
11822.extract:
" Oyi " (Remix) bu abu onye Naijiria na-adi egwu Flavour N'abania . Ọ nwere abu sitere n'aka onye na-abụ abụ Naijiria Tiwa Savage . E wepụtakwara ụdị izizi nke egwu a na June 22, 2011 wekwa pụta nakwa album Studio nke abụọ nke Flavour Uplifted (2010).  
The remix of "Oyi" bụ Flavour N'abania na Tiwa Savage dere. Flavor kwalitere otu na akaụntụ Twitter ya tupu ewepụta vidiyo egwu ya.  Savage dekọtara ụdị egwu nke ya tupu o dekọọ ihe na ngosi ahụ nakwa Flavour.  
Ihe onyonyo egwu maka "Oyi" (Remix) ka agbagburu n'ụlọ eya studio dị na Nigeria. Agbapụkwara ụdịdị izizi ahụ n'ebe ndịa amabeghị na Naịjirịa.
A họpụatakwara"Oyi" (Remix) maka R&B Single na The Headies 2011 . Vidio egwu maka Abu ahụ meriri Best R&B Video na 2012 Channel O Music Video Awards .

11896.title: Ādaži Airfield
11896.extract:
Templeeti:Infobox airport
Ādaži Airfield ( Latvian   ( bụ ọdụ ụgbọ elu na Latvia . Ọ dị 30 km (19 mi) n'ugwu Riga .
Ọdụ ụgbọ elu izizi nkeonwe na Latvia, nke nwere ike ịnweta obere ụgbọ elu 60 nkeonwe. Ọrụ dị iche iche gụnyere ọzụzụ nke ndị na-anya ụgbọ elu ultra-light, ọrụ mmezi na ịrụzi ụgbọ elu, ịzụ ahịa na mgbazinye ụgbọ elu, yana ụgbọ elu mgbasa ozi.

14942.title: Jennifer Maestre
14942.extract:
Jennifer Maestre (a mụrụ n'afọ 1959 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Massachusetts.  A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe banyere ọkpụkpụ pensụl ya.
Maestre sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site n'ụdị na ọrụ nke urchin oké osimiri.  N'okwu onye na-ese ihe ya, ọ na-ede, sị: "Ọkpụkpụ nke urchin, nke dị ize ndụ ma mara mma, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ịdọ aka ná ntị doro anya megide ịkpọtụrụ. Ọdịdị na-adọrọ adọrọ nke spines na-adọta mmetụ n'agbanyeghị ihe ndị nwere ike ịpụta. Esemokwu ahụ kpughere, anyị na-enwe mmetụta nke ịmanye na ịdọrọ, ọchịchọ na mkpasu iwe. Akụkụ nke pensụl na-egosi akụkụ dị nkọ ma dị mma n'ihe banyere ahụmịhe abụọ dị iche iche na ọdịdị na nke mara mma...E nwere ezigbo adịghị ike na akụkụ obi ọjọọ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ ógè ụfọdụ, adịghị ike nke ọdịdị dị egwu na-agbagha. "
Maestre na-eji pensụl dị iche iche, ntu na akwa iji mee ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ. Ọ na-ewere ụfọdụ narị pensụl, na-ebipụ ha n'ime ntakịrị akụkụ 1-inch, na-egwu oghere na ngalaba nke ọ bụla, na-eme ka ha niile dị nkọ ma na-adụ ha ọnụ.
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke New Britain Museum of American Art. Krannert Art Museum, na DeCordova Museum na Sculpture Park.

20921.title: Yanda Dogon
20921.extract: Yanda Dogon bụ asụsụ Dogon a na-asụ na Mali.  A na-akọ na ọ dị ka Nanga n'ụzọ lex, nke a maara naanị site n'otu akụkọ sitere na 1953.

21752.title: Nizigama
21752.extract:
Nizigama o bụ aha nna. Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere:

Aloÿs Nizigama (amụrụ n'afọ 1966), onye na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge na Burundi
Gabriel Nizigama, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Burundi
Lucie Nizigama (1957-2010), onye Burundi na-amụ iwu na onye na-eme ngagharị iwe

23380.title: Dorothy Ufot
23380.extract:
Dorothy Udeme Ufot SAN bụ onye ọka iwu Naịjịria nwere ọkachamara na iwu azụmahịa. Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ si Akwa Ibom Steeti ka e buliri ya n'ọkwa onye isi ọka iwu nke Naịjirịa (SAN).
Dorothy bụ onye guzobere Dorothy Ufot & Co. ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọka iwu zuru oke na Naịjịria ebe ọ na-eduzi ngalaba ikpe na ikpe nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ. Dorothy bụ ọkachamara na ikpe mba ụwa, ikpe na ụdị ndị ọzọ nke ngwọta esemokwu, gụnyere ikpe nkwekọrịta itinye ego, itinye ego na nkwekọrịta ikpe mba ọzọ, ndụmọdụ itinye ego, iwu ụlọ ọrụ na azụmahịa.
Dorothy bụ onye otu Court of Arbitration nke Casablanca International Mediation and Arbitration Centre (CIMAC) Morocco, kemgbe 2016. A họpụtara Dorothy ka ọ rụọ ọrụ afọ isii na panel nkè ndị omebe iwu nke International Centre for the Settlement of Investment Disputes na Febụwarị 2017. Ọ bụbu osote onye isì oche ụwa nke ICC Commission on Arbitration na ADR, ma ugbu a ọ bụ onye otu kansụl nke ICC Institute of World Business Law na osote onye oche nke arbitration na ADD commission nke ICC Nigeria yana onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke ICC Nigeria National Committee.
Dorothy bụ onye otu ICC International Court of Arbitration na Paris ma bụrụ osote onye isí oche nke ICC Commission on Arbitration. N'afọ 2000, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Chartered Institute of Arbitrators London.

24632.title: Gerard C. Bond
24632.extract: Gerard Clark Bond (a mụrụ ka ọnwa Mee di na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na abụọ, biri ndụ ya bido n'afọ1940 wee ruo ka ọnwa juun dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchi iri abụọ na iteolu n'afọ 2005) bụ onye America na-amụ banyere ala.

32954.title: Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-enye Ọkụ Mambilla
32954.extract: Ebe a na-ahụ maka ọkụ eletrik Mambilla bụ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik 3,050MW na-arụ ọrụ na Naijiria.  Mgbe emechara ya, ọ ga-abụ nrụnye ọkụ kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ, yana otu n'ime ọdụ ọkụ eletrik kacha ukwuu na Africa.

34039.title: Romaric (onye na-agba bọọlụ)
34039.extract:
Koffi Christian Romaric N'Dri (amụrụ na 4 June 1983), nke a maara dị ka Romaric,   bụ onye Ivorian bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ. onye na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti, ọ nwere ike igwu egwu dị ka onye na-agbachitere ma ọ bụ onye na-eme bọọlụ etiti.
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na mba isii, ọkachasị France na Spain. Ọ pụtara na Ligue 1 ugboro 149 na nke mbụ maka Le Mans na Bastia, ma gbaa egwuregwu 121 La Liga na nke ikpeazụ maka Seville, Espanyol na Zaragoza.
N'ime afọ asatọ ọ rụrụ ọrụ mba ụwa maka Ivory Coast, Romaric gara asọmpi iko mba ụwa abụọ na asọmpi iko Afrịka atọ, na-agwụcha dị ka onye nke abụọ na Mbipụta 2008 nke ikpeazụ.

35300.title: Oge Nhazi nke Barycentric
35300.extract:
Oge nhazi oge Barycentric ( TCB, sitere na French Temps-coordonnée barycentrique ) bụ isi nhazi oge echere na a ga-eji dị ka oge ngbanwe nke onwe maka ngụkọ niile gbasara orbits nke mbara ala, asteroids, comets, na ụgbọ elu interplanetary na Sistemụ  ikpe .  Ọ dabara na oge kwesịrị nke elekere elekere na-ezu ike na-enwe n'ime usoro nhazi nke na-aga n'ihu na barycenter (center of mass) nke Sistemụ akwụkwọ.  </link> : ya bụ, elekere na-eme otu ahụ ahụ dịka Sistemụ ikike mana ọ nọ n'ahụ ike ndoda nke sistemu nke ọma .  Ya mere ọ naghị emetụta oge ndoda ndòda nke na usoro ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe.  TCB bụ oge nhazi oge maka Sistemụ ntụaka Celestial Barycentric (BCRS).
A kọwapụtara TCB na 1991 site n'aka International Astronomical Union, na Nkwanye III nke Mgbakọ Mgbakọ nke XXIst.  [1] Ezubere ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime akụkụ maka nsogbu nsogbu 1976 nke Barycentric Dynamical Time (TDB).  N'akpa ka ọtụ̀tụ̀ oge nke mbara igwe mbụ, akọwara TCB n'ihe gbasara echiche izugbe nke relativity .  Akọwapụtara dị n'etiti TCB na oge nlegharị anya ndị ọzọ site na metrik nlegharị anya zuru oke.  Mgbanwe n'etiti TCB na Geocentric Coordinate Time (TCG) nwere ike were ihe ejighi n'aka na-ebughị ụzọ.  5 × 10 − 18 {\ displaystyle 5\ times 10^{-18}} ￼ n'ọnụego dị ka:
ebee x E i {\displaystyle x_{E}^{i}} ￼ na v E i {\displaystyle v_{E}^{i}} ￼ bụ ọnọdụ nhazi barycentric na ọsọ nke geocenter, r E i = x i − x  E i {\displaystyle r_{E}^{i}=x^{i}-x_{E}^{i}} ￼ ya na x i {\displaystyle x^{i}} ￼ ọnọdụ barycentric nke onye na-ekiri  ya, t = T C B {\displaystyle t=TCB} ￼, t 0 {\displaystyle t_{0}} ￼ bụ okwu nke TCB na TCG nsogbu nke mere na 1977 January 1, 00:00:00 TAI bụ 1977 January 1,  00:00:32.184 TCG / TCB, w 0 e x t ( x E ) {\displaystyle w_{0ext}(\mathbf {x} _{E})} ￼ bụ nchikota ∑ A G M A r A {\ displaystyle \scriptstyle \ sum _  {A}{\frac {GM_{A}}{r_{A}}}} ￼ nke ike ndọda ike maka niile nke usoro mbara igwe dị iche na ụwa na-egosila na geocenter, na w e x t i ( x E ) {\displaystyle w_  {ext}^{i}(\mathbf {x} _{E})} ￼ bụ otú ahụ nchikota ∑ A G M A r A v A i {\displaystyle \scriptstyle \ sum _{A}{\frac {GM_{A}  {r_{A}}}v_{A}^{i}} ￼ .  Mkpebi ahụ na-atụfu dị ikike elu nke r E i {\displaystyle r_{E}^{i}} ￼ dị ka ihe na ha bụ ndị na- mkpa mkpa

39193.title: Erin Gallagher
39193.extract:
Erin Gallagher (amụrụ 18 Disemba 1998) bụ onye na-egwu mmiri South Africa. Ọ gbara asọmpi n'asọmpi 100 nke ụmụ nwanyị na asọmpi mmiri mmiri nke ụwa nke 2017 .   N'afọ 2019, ọ nọchitere anya South Africa na asọmpi Africa 2019 emere na Rabat, Morocco. 
Ọ gbara ọsọ n'asọmpị 100 nke ụmụ nwanyị, asọmpi nru ububa mita 100 nke ụmụ nwanyị, ịgba ọsọ agba ọsọ nke ụmụ nwanyị 4 x 200, na ịgba ọsọ agba ọsọ 4 x 100 nke ụmụ nwanyị na asọmpi Olimpik Summer 2020 . 
Maka asọmpi Aquatics ụwa nke 2022, a kpọrọ Gallagher aha na South Africa roster na 100 mita freestyle dabere na arụmọrụ ya na asọmpi igwu mmiri mba South Africa 2022 .  E mechara kpọọ ya aha onye otu South Africa maka asọmpi Commonwealth 2022 . 
N'ụbọchị otu egwuregwu igwu mmiri na 2022 Commonwealth Games, na Birmingham, England, Gallagher nọ n'ọkwa itoolu na mmalite nke nru ububa 100 mita, na-eru eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ na oge nke 59.29 sekọnd.  O tinyere oge nke itoolu na nkeji nkeji 59.02.  N'ụbọchị nke abụọ, ọ gụchara nke ise na okpomọkụ nke 50m freestyle preliminary ma tozuo maka ọkara ikpeazụ.  N'ịbụ onye gụchara n'ọkwa nke anọ na ọkara ikpeazụ, o ruru eru maka ọkwa ikpeazụ nke asaa.  Mgbe e mesịrị n'otu nnọkọ ahụ, ọ kwadoro 4 × 100 mita freestyle relay na 54.73 na nke ikpeazụ iji nyere aka ịnọ nke anọ.  N'ụbọchị atọ, ọ ruru eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ nke nru ububa mita 50, na-enye ọkwa nke iri na mbido mbụ na oge nke 26.96 sekọnd.  Na ọkara nke ikpeazụ, o debere ndekọ South Africa ọhụrụ na nkeji 26.17 wee ruo eru maka ọkwa nke abụọ ikpeazụ.   Maka ihe omume nke abụọ nke nnọkọ ahụ, nke ikpeazụ nke 50 mita freestyle, o debere nke asatọ na oge nke 25.39 sekọnd.  N'ime mmemme nke atọ na nke ikpeazụ nke ụbọchị ahụ, o nyere aka n'itinye nke anọ na mgbagharị 4 × 200 freestyle . 
N'ịbụ onye nọ n'ọkwa nke iri na atọ na mmalite nke 100 mita freestyle n'ụbọchị anọ nke egwuregwu Commonwealth 2022, ọ ruru eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ nke mmemme ahụ.  Mgbe ọ kwụsịrị na semifinal 100 freestyle, o wedara ndekọ South Africa ya na nru ububa mita 50 na ngwụcha nke mmemme ahụ, mechaa na 26.05 sekọnd iji kee Holly Barratt nke Australia maka nrite ọla ọcha.    Ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị, n'ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke asọmpi igwu mmiri, o nyeere aka ịtọ ndekọ ọhụrụ nke Africa na South Africa na njedebe nke 4 × 100 medley relay, na-ekewa 58.80 maka ụkwụ nru ububa iji nye aka na oge nke anọ nke oge. 3:59.63.

39987.title: Ihe Owuwe Ihe Echefuru echefu
39987.extract:
Owuwe ihe ubi echefuru bụ nnapụta nri nri elele nke na-anakọta nri ga-aga n'iyi na-ebuga ya n'efu n'aka ndị otu na-enye ndị agụụ na-agụ nri na Metro Detroit .  N'afọ 2015, ndị na-enye njikọ echere ihe ụmụaka nde pound iri anọ nri nye ndị na-eweta nri nri 260.
.Owuwe ihe ubi echefu echefu bụ otu n'ime nri America, anwụ United States maka ụlọ nri na ụlọ nnapụta nri.

40472.title: Ụlọ Ọgwụ Kepier
40472.extract: Hospitallọ ọgwụ Kepier (nke ọma ụlọ ọgwụ St Giles nke Kepier ) bụ ụlọ ọgwụ ochie na Kepier, Durham, England

41561.title: Ụlọ Ọgwụ Ashford
41561.extract: Ụlọ ọgwụ Ashford bụ ụlọ ọgwụ izugbe na Ashford, Surrey.  Ndị Ashford na St Peter's Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust na-elekọta ya.

45341.title: Tyree Guyton
45341.extract: Tyree Guyton (amuru August 24, 1955) bu onye omenka si Detroit, Michigan .  [1] Ọ ngosi Jenenne Whitfield [2] ma gaa n'ihu ibi na Detroit.  Tupu aghọọ onye na-ese ihe, Guyton dhibaato ọrụ dị ka onye mgbanyụ ọkụ na onye ọrụ ụgbọ ala wee jee ozi na ndị agha US .  Ọ nka nka na Marygrove College, Wayne State University, na Center for Creative Studies — ugbu a College for Creative Studies .  Guyton na-agụ nna nna ya, Sam Mackey, na onye na-ese ihe nkiri Detroit Charles McGee dị ka ọzụzụ ya.

48646.title: Tori Allen-Martin
48646.extract:
Victoria Allen-Martin bụ onye omere Britain, onye isi na onye nrụpụta. A maara ya maka usoro telivishọn dị ọcha (2019) ma werekwa ọrụ ndu na Unforgotten (2018) na London Kills (2019).  A makwaara ya maka ịkọwapụta ọrụ Robin na Oge (2019), nke a maara ugbu a dị ka ndị ọbịa abụọ na-ebu achịcha gafee New York . 
Na 2009 ọ tọrọ ntọala na isi Interval Productions dị ka onye isi ihe okike ya.   Mmepụta Interval ewepụtala egwu asatọ, gụnyere okporo ụzọ, nke ahọpụtara maka onyinye Offie na ngalaba egwu ọhụrụ kacha mma.  Allen-Martin na onye na-ede akwụkwọ bụ Sarah Henley ka ahọpụtakwara maka ndị na-ede egwuregwu ọhụrụ na-ekwe nkwa. 
Allen-Martin bụ ndị ahọpụtara n'okpuru ngalaba ndị edemede maka BBC New Talent Hotlist 2017.

49129.title: Frederick Gottwald
49129.extract: Frederick Carl Gottwald (August 15, 1858 - June 23, 1941) bụ onye omenkà ọdịnala America nke nwere mmetụta na mmepe nke Cleveland School of art, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ "dean nke Cleveland ndị na-ese ihe".[1]  Ọ kụziri na Western Reserve School of Design for Women (emesịa degharịa aha ya na Cleveland Institute of Art), e kwuwokwa na o "nyere aka karịa onye ọ bụla ọzọ na mmepe nka Cleveland.

49902.title: Fodder
49902.extract:
Fodder (/ ˈfɒdər/), nke a na-akpọkwa provender (/ ˈprɒvəndər/), bụ nri ugbo ọ bụla a na-eji achịkọta anụ ụlọ, dị ka ehi, oke bekee, atụrụ, ịnyịnya, ọkụkọ na ezi. "Fodder" na-ezo aka karịsịa nri a na-enye ụmụ anụmanụ (gụnyere osisi ndị a kpụrụ akpụ na-ebuga ha), karịa nke ha na-eri maka onwe ha (nke a na-akpọ nri nri). Nri nri na-agụnye ahihia, ahịhịa, silage, nri mpịakọta na pelleted, mmanụ na nri agwakọta, na ọka na mkpo ọka (dị ka agwa pulitere, malt ọhụrụ, ma ọ bụ mebere malt). Ọtụtụ nri anụmanụ sitere na osisi, mana ụfọdụ ndị na-emepụta ihe na-agbakwunye ihe oriri na nri ndị a haziri nke sitere na anụmanụ.
The worldwide animal feed trade produced 1.245 billion tons of compound feed in 2022 according to an estimate by the International Feed Industry Federation, with an annual growth rate of about 2%. The use of agricultural land to grow feed rather than human food can be controversial (see food vs. feed); some types of feed, such as corn (maize), can also serve as human food; those that cannot, such as grassland grass, may be grown on land that can be used for crops consumed by humans. In many cases the production of grass for cattle fodder is a valuable intercrop between crops for human consumption, because it builds the organic matter in the soil. When evaluating if this soil organic matter increase mitigates climate change, both permanency of the added organic matter as well as emissions produced during use of the fodder product have to be taken into account.Templeeti:Clarify Some agricultural byproducts fed to animals may be considered unsavory by humans.

6174.title: 1 Septemba
6174.extract: 1 Septemba bu ubochi nke 1st (nke mbụ) na onwa ana kpo Septemba. Na Gregorian calender, 1 Septemba bu ubochi nke 244th (245th na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 121 du mgbe afo na agwu.

14137.title: Lucky Office
14137.extract:
Lucky Office (amụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
Ọ bụ nwa amaala mpaghara Hurungwe, Office malitere ịkpụ ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu mgbe ọ zutere Moses Masaya.  Ndị ikom abụọ ahụ rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ ruo afọ abụọ tupu Office amalite n'onwe ya.  Ọtụtụ n'ime isiokwu ya sitere na ahụmịhe ezinụlọ, ọkachasị ọdachi na mmetụta uche ọ na-enwe n'oge ọnọdụ siri ike.
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya na ụlọ ngosi na Harare, kamakwa mba ụwa na mba ndị dị ka United States, UK, Netherlands, Belgium na Germany. Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ "Serious Thoughts", ihe ọkpụkpụ a kpụrụ akpụ nke nwere ihu dị sentimita iri ise site na sentimita itoolu.

15319.title: Charles Davidson Bell
15319.extract: Charles Davidson Bell FRSE (ubochí irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1813 rụọ úbọchị asaá n'ọnwa Eprel 1882) bụ ónyé na-enyocha ndị isi na Cape Colony, onye na-ese ihe, ónyé na'ihe ngosi, na ónyé na-emepụta ihe nrite na stampụ Cape.

15730.title: Sidiki Bakaba
15730.extract:
Sidiki Bakaba (a mụrụ na Abengourou, n'afọ 1949) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede ihe nkiri na onye nduzi si Côte d'Ivoire.
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ n'obodo Abidjan. Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na National School of Drama nke Abidjan, ọ zụrụ ọzụzụ na Living Theatre na Grotowski.
N'afọ 2000, ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi nke Obí Ọdịbendị nke Abidjan (Palais de la Culture d'Abidjan) nke dị na Treichville. O guzobekwara Actor's Studio (ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Palace of Culture).
Tinyere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri dị ịrịba ama, o mepụtara ihe nkiri akụkọ ifo, ihe ngosi dịka Les Guérisseurs (1988) nke meriri ihe nrite maka egwu kachasị mma na Francophone Film Festival, yana Voice of Hope na FESPACO Ouagadougou n'afọ 1989. O duziri ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi dịka Le Nord est tombé sur la tête (1985-1998) maka TV5, Le Parole (1992), L'Anniversaire de Daymios (November 1992) na ihe ngosi dị ka Cinq siècles de solitude na La victoire aux mains nues n'afọ 2002.
Onye na-akwado onye bụbu onye isi ala Laurent Gbagbo, Bakaba n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011 ọ nọ n'ụlọ Gbagbo na Abidjan n'oge nnọchibido nke mere ka e jide Gbagbo ma kọọrọ na e merụrụ ya ahụ n'oge ya.

19777.title: Lagos State Ferry Services Corporation
19777.extract:
Lagos State Ferry Services Corporation (LSFSC) ma ọ bụ Lagos Ferry Services Company (nke a makwara dị ka Lagferry) bụ onye na-enye ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na Lagos State. E guzobere ya na afọ 1983.
Lagferry na-arụkọ ọrụ na Steeti Lagos Waterways Authority (LASWA), National Inland Waterways Authority,NIWA na Nigeria Maritime Administration and Safety Agency (NIMASA). E wezụga Lagferry, ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri ndị ọzọ na-ejikwa ụgbọ mmiri nke oge a iji nye ọrụ njem azụmahịa n'etiti Ikorodu, Lagos Island, Apapa na Victoria Island.
Steeti Lagos Waterways Authority (LASWA) bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-achịkwa ọhụrụ iji lekọta mmezi nke ụzọ mmiri, nke nwere ọrụ nke gụnyere njem mmiri ka e guzobere na afọ 2008 ma bụrụ ọrụ maka nlekota na ịhụ na ndị ọrụ na-agbaso ụkpụrụ nke Gọvanọ Babatunde Raji Fashola, yana ije ozi dị ka ebe enyemaka maka ihe niile gbasara ụgbọ mmiri.

21170.title: Kwegu language
21170.extract: Kwegu (nke a na-akpọkwa Bacha, Koegu, Kwegi, Menja, Nidi) bụ asụsụ Surmic a na asụ na Southwest nke Ethiopia, n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Osimiri Omo .

24816.title: Suki Lee
24816.extract: Suki Lee bụ onye America na-emepụta egwuregwu vidio na onye na-eme mmemme kọmputa. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole na-emepe emepe na Atari, Inc. na mbido afọ 1980 ebe o dere egwuregwu agụmakwụkwọ Math Gran Prix maka Atari 2600 (1982) na Obelix (1983) maka otu usoro ahụ. Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ na Apple Computer.

25014.title: Gergina Skerlatova
25014.extract: Gergina Skerlatova (Bulgarian; amụrụ na 25 Machị 1954) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ basketball nke sonyere na 1976 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ .

29231.title: Ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri
29231.extract: Okporo osisi bụ usoro nke ibuga ogwe osisi ndị e gburu egbu site na ijikọta ha ọnụ iji mee rafts, nke a na-ebugharị ma ọ bụ dọrọ n'osimiri, ma ọ bụ gafee ọdọ mmiri ma ọ bụ mmiri ọzọ. O doro anya na, mgbe ịkwọ ụgbọala, bụ ụzọ nke abụọ kachasị ọnụ ala iji buru osisi a gbuturu. Enwere ike ịkpọ usoro abụọ ahụ osisi na-ese n'elu mmiri. Omenala nke ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri a na-akụ na Austria, Czech Republic, Germany, Latvia, Poland na Spain edepụtara na UNESCO Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity na 2022

32685.title: Tomás Blanco (onye edemede)
32685.extract: Tomás Blanco (December 9, 1896 - April 12, 1975) bụ onye edemede Puerto Rican, onye na-ede uri, onye na'akọ akụkọ, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, onye edemede na dọkịta. Blanco bụ onye edemede n'oge afọ 1930 bụ onye a maara maka edemede ya dị oke egwu nke nyochara ọdịbendị Puerto Rican. Dị ka ndị edemede ndị ọzọ nke ọgbọ ya ndị biri ndụ n'oge Oké Ndakpọ Akụ̀ na Ụba, ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya na nsogbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya. O dekwara akwụkwọ akụkọ, akụkọ mkpirikpi na uri.

34696.title: Mary Ann Armstrong
34696.extract: Mary Ann Armstrong (née Newey, 17 June 1838, Birmingham, England - 2 July 1910, Flemington, Australia), nke a makwaara dị ka Mrs. C.C. Armstrong, bụ onye na-ese ihe ọkụkụ nke Britain nke biri ma rụọ ọrụ na New Zealand na Australia.  chịkọtara ma hazie ụdị fern maka ọtụtụ albums ferns nke Australasia, gụnyere usoro akwụkwọ onyinye ọkachamara "The South Pacific Fern Album". Armstro sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa na nke intercolonial, ebe ferns ya natara otuto ma nye ya ndị isi.

35632.title: 1991 Nhọrọ gọvanọ nke steeti Borno
35632.extract:
.    Nhọpụta mmetụta Borno 1991 mere na Disemba 14, 1991. Onye SDP bụ Maina Maaji Lawan mbụaka ahụ ahụ
E ji usoro ntuli aka mepere emepe mere ntuliaka gọvanọ. Emere mmemme izizi maka otu abụọ ahụ ịhọpụta ndị bu ọkọlọtọ ha na Ọktoba 19, 1991.

41249.title: Obodo Mmiri Dị Nri, Arizona
41249.extract: Obodo nta mmiri obi ụtọ ( O'odham : S-iʼovĭ Shu:dagĭ ) </link> bụ ebe aha njirimara ọnụ ọgụgụ (CDP) na Pinal County, Arizona, United States, nke dị na Gila River Indian Community .  Ndị bi na ya bụ mmadụ 83 na ngụkọ 2010

43100.title: Armando Falcon
43100.extract:
Armando Falcon, Jr. (amuru June 4, 1960) bu onye isi ochichi nke Office of Federal Housing Enterprise Oversight (OFHEO), [1] onodu oma site na 1999 rue 2005. N'ime oge a, ọ na- eduputa ihe.  nke mmejọ ego na Fannie Mae na Freddie Mac, a akwụkwọ na ọ na-ebuli ihe eji ama eji aka ná ntii mbụ ihe ize ndụ ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ahụ nwere
Nsonaazụ ikpeazụ nke nsogbu nke Armando Falcon duziri nke Fannie Mae aza ihe - Ọ dịghị omume arụ Fannie Mae CFO J. Timothy Howard na amara iche site n'aka onye ọka ikpe n'okwu ikpe nke Mr. Howard na- onyewa aka ɔtọt.  na omume nke ọrụ ya.

43172.title: Sovereign Wealth Fund Institute
43172.extract:
The Sovereign Wealth Fund Institute (nakwa SWF Institute, ma ọ bụ nanị SWFI ) bụ ụlọ ọrụ America na-enyocha ndị nwe akụ ọha dịka ego akụ na ụba nke ọchịchị na ndị ọzọ na-etinye ego gọọmentị ogologo oge. Na mbido, ụlọ ọrụ Sovereign Wealth Fund lekwasịrị anya naanị na ego akụ na ụba ọchịchị. Ọ ewepụtala iji kpuchie ụdị niile nke ụlọ ọrụ ọha na-etinye ego. Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-ere ndenye aha ya na ọrụ API/datafeed dị ka onye na-ere data ego mana ọ na-enyekwa mgbasa ozi ozi.   
Ejikọtara ya na 2008, Michael Maduell hiwere ya na obere oge ọ wetara Carl Linaburg,  onye hapụrụ nzukọ a na 2017. N'ọgwụgwụ 2022, Lakshmi Narayanan nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Ezinụlọ Patel ka akpọrọ Onye isi oche nke SWFI. 
SWFI na-ere nyocha ya na data site na ndenye aha ndị njikwa akụ, ụlọ akụ, ndị nyocha, mahadum, gọọmentị, ndị na-etinye ego na ụlọ ọrụ, ndị nwe akụ, ụlọ ọrụ, ụlọ ọrụ iwu na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ. Ngwaahịa ndebanye aha SWFI dị na www.swfi.com .

48030.title: Wayne Chabre
48030.extract: Wayne Chabre ( mmalite 1947) bụ onye ọkpụ America si Walla Walla, Washington .  A kọwawo ọrụ dị ka "ihe na-atọ ụtọ".  Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na-arụ ọrụ, dị ka gargoyles na ebe mgbada;  okporo na ọnụ ụzọ ámá;  ọkụ, pavilions, isi iyi, na oche.

48627.title: Bruce Dorfman
48627.extract:
.Bruce Dorfman ( Prof. 1936) bụ onye omenkà mgbasa ozi agwakọta America na onye nkuzi ọrụ ya ahụmahụ na mkpokọta .  Dorfman e ikela nke ukwuu na United States na mba ofesi, ma kuziere na Art Students League of New York 1964
A egwuregwu Dorfman na New York City na 1936. [1] [2] Nna ya Robert, bụ onye na-ese ihe site na ihe oku na nne ya Ruth bụ onye na-akwado nka.  [3] Dorfman na-echeta ịse na gburugburu ebe nkwado site na afọ ise, [4] wee gaa na Art Student League of New York, ebe ọ akwụkwọ akwụkwọ na Yasuo Kuniyoshi, Arnold Blanch na Charles H. Alston, mgbe ọ  dị afụ 15 na 16. O kwuru, sị: “Ndị mkpọsa bụ́ isi nwere ike dị ukwuu, mụ na njikere nso.  " [5] Mgbe e hel, Dorfman gara Mahadum nke Iowa, ma soro ndị na-ese ihe Stuart Edie, Mauricio Lasansky na ọkọtọ ihe mere eme Roy Seiber ihe. Ihe ngosi solo mbụ bụ na Mahadum Iowa n'oge ahụ.  Akwụkwọ akwụkwọ na BA na Sociology social psychology na 1958. 
Dorfman enweela ihe ngosi ihe ngosi nke solo iri isii.  Ọ natara Fulbright Fellowship, yana onyunyo na onyonye sitere na Pollock-Krasner Foundation ;  Ngalaba US ;  Rockefeller Foundation;  New York State Council na Arts;  Akwụkwọ òkù enyo nke ụwa nke New York;  Ndị ọrụ Butler nke American Art ;  na National Academy of Design . 
Dorfman nwere ike were ihe ruru ọnwa abụọ iji rụchaa ihe osise, na-eji agba, akwaaji, akwa akwa, osisi, igwe na akwụkwọ. Ọ na-akọwa usoro ahụ dị ka mgbanwe n'etiti ọrụ na ntụgharị uche. "E nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ anụ ahụ na-abanye na ya, na-enwekwa ọtụtụ ịnọdụ ala na-ele ya anya na ịmara mgbe ị ga-aga ije ma ọ bụ nweta iko kọfị." 
Na mgbakwunye na egwuregwu Ndị Art, Dorfman ndabereworo na Mahadum Syracuse, Everson Museum na Akwụkwọ Ọhụrụ, ma bụrụ Artist-in-Residence na Norton Museum of Art na West Palm Beach, yana ụlọ ihe ochie mgbe na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na  ya.  France, Venezuela na Portugal.  [1] N'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ a ma ama nke Dorfman bụ Ai Weiwei [2] na Bob Dylan .  [3] N'afọ ndị 1960, Dylan na Dorfman bụ ndị agbata obi na Woodstock, New York, na Dylan na-agakarị Dorfman na studio ya maka nkuzi nkuzi.  Dorfman kwuru, "Ọ nọ na-ege ntĩ nke ukwuu, na-elekwa anya nke ọma ma na-etinye ya nke ọma."  Ha ji egwuregwu sere "nnukwu ihe nka na-efe efe nke nwere ike ime n'ime obodo, na- agbanwe na agba," ma pasta nke akwụkwọ na ngwa egwu..

49741.title: Donga River
49741.extract:
Osimiri Donga bụ osimiri dị na Nigeria na Cameroon .  Aha ahụ sitere na Mambilla Plateau dị n'ebe i mere Naijiria, bụ nke oke mba ụwa dị n'etiti Nigeria na Cameroon, ma na-ahọba na igwu egwuregwu egwuregwu ga-emecha iche na osimiri Benue na Nigeria .  [1] Mmiri Donga dị kilomita 20,000 (7,700 sq mi) na mpaghara.  N'ebe kacha elu, n'ụdị Benue osimiri na-ebuga 1,800 cubic meters (64,000 cu ft) mmiri mmiri kwa osimiri.. 
Na Steri Taraba, Naijiria, መካከለኛ oke ndị atọ, Baissa, Amboi na Jissaula, n'ime osimiri Donga.  Ha na-edina na mkpọda na n'ala ala Mambilla Plateau, ndị na-azụ nke Gashaka Gumti National Park

51435.title: Márcio Vieira
51435.extract: Márcio Vieira de Vasconcelos (amụrụ 10 Ọktoba 1984), nke a maara dị ka Vieira, bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Andorran na-egwu egwu dị ka onye ọkpọ egwuregwu bọọlụ Portuguese AD Marco 09.

53539.title: Agnes nke Landsberg
53539.extract: Agnes nke Landsberg [1] (1192 ma ọ bụ 1193 - 1266 na Wienhausen) bụ nwanyị ama ama German. Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ nke Conrad II (1159–1210), Margrave nke Lusatia, na nwunye ya, Elisabeth (c. 1153 – 1209), ada Mieszko III the Old (1126–1202), Duke nke Poland. Ọ bụ ọgọ nwa Henry the Lion.

13656.title: Gavin Relly
13656.extract: Gavin Relly (A mụrụ n'afọ 1926 na Cape Town, Cape Province, Union of South Africa - nwụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 10 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1999 na Hermanus, Western Cape, South Africa) bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Anglo American .

14777.title: Patricia Kihoro
14777.extract: Patricia Wangechi Kihoro (a mụrụ na 4 Jenụwarị 1986) bụ onye Kenya na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye redio na onye telivishọn. Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe o sonyere na oge nke atọ nke Tusker Project Fame, ebe ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị ikpeazụ. N'ime ihe nkiri, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri obodo dịka ihe nkiri afọ 2011, Miss Nobody, nke mere ka a họpụta ya n'afọ 2012 Kalasha Awards maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe nkiri. Na mmepụta telivishọn, a họpụtara ya dịka onye ndu na Groove Theory, ihe nkiri egwu na dịka onye na-ahụkarị na Demigods, Changes, Rush na Makutano Junction . Dịka onye na-egosi redio, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na One FM na Homeboyz FM. Patricia bụ onye okike ọdịnaya, onye na-emetụta na youtuber.

16114.title: Zoubeir Turki
16114.extract:
Zoubeir Turki (19 Nọvemba 1924 - 23 Ọktoba 2009) bụ onye Tunisia na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ nke sitere na Turkey. Ọ bụ nwanne nwoke nke Hedi Turki (1922 - 2019).
A mụrụ ya na Medina nke Tunis n'ezinụlọ sitere na Turkey, Turki gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọakwụkwọ Mahadum Ez-Zitouna na Institute for Advanced Studies, mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Tunis Institute of Fine Arts na Tunis. N'afọ 1946, o nwere ọkwá na nchịkwa tupu ụlọ akwụkwọ French akpọbata ya ka ọ kụzie Arabic. N'afọ 1952, a manyere ya ịgba ọsọ ndụ maka isonye na omume nke òtù mba Tunisia bụ Neo-Destour. Ọ biri na Sweden, site na 1953 ruo 1958, ebe ọ sonyeere Academy of Fine Arts na Stockholm.
Ọ laghachiri Tunisia n'afọ 1958, afọ abụọ mgbe mba ahụ nweere onwe ya ebe ọ maliteghachiri mmekọrịta ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ Tunis nke ọ bụ onye guzobere ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi ọrụ na Ministry of Culture. Njikọ nchịkwa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya nọgidere na-abawanye, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke ọtụtụ njikọ na òtù, nke gụnyere National Union of plastic and graphic arts, Cultural Commission of the city of Tunis, na Union of Plastic Artists Arab Maghreb. O guzobere ma duzie Ụlọọrụ Center for Living Art na Belvedere; Ọzọkwa, n'ihu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, a họpụtara ya na National Assembly na 1979 na onye kansụl obodo maka obodo Tunis.
Ihe osise ndị Turki sitere na mkpali n'ihe gbasara ọdịbendị Tunisia na ọdịnala ya, na-egosi ihe odide na ihe nkiri nke Tunis kwa ụbọchị. Ịmepụta ihe ncheta zuru oke nke Tunisia mere ka ọrụ ya bụrụ ụdị pụrụ iche nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama n'ụwa niile. Onye nkatọ Louati Ali kwuru n'akwụkwọ a raara nye nka nke oge a na Turki bụ onye omenkà kachasị ewu ewu na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nka na Tunisia. Turki bụkwa onye na-ese ihe; o mere ihe oyiyi ọla nchara nke Ibn Khaldun, nke e guzobere na Avenue Habib Bourguiba, ebe e guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ Tunis na 1949. O mekwara ihe osise ahụ n'ime ụlọ nke ụlọ redio Tunisia.
Turki nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na anọ.

22042.title: Rukiya Chekamondo
22042.extract: Rukiya Kulany Chekamondo (amụrụ na 7 Ọktoba na afo 1965), mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya Rukia Kulany Chenamondo, bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda. Ọ bụ Minista Steeti maka Privatization na Ministry of Finance, site na June na afo 2006 ruo May na afo 2011. Na ntuli aka nke 27 Mee 2011, e wepụrụ ya na kansụl ma jiri Aston Kajara dochie ya. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara (MP), maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Kapchorwa District, site na afo 2006 ruo na afo 2011. N'oge ntuli aka mba nke afọ 2011, onye omeiwu nọ ugbu a, Phyllis Chemutai, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere onwe ya meriri ya.

22097.title: Joy Atim
22097.extract: Atim Joy Ongom, (amụrụ na 15 Septemba, na afọ 1968) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan, onye jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Lira District Women Constituency na 10th Parliament (2016 ruo 2021).

22349.title: Albert Bourderon
22349.extract: Albert Henri Bourderon (26 Nọvemba 1858 - 2 Eprel 1930) bụ onye France na-eme cooper (barrel maker) na syndicalist onye ghọrọ onye isi socialist. N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ kwadoro ọnọdụ udo n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na ụkpụrụ mba ụwa.

27073.title: Wafabank
27073.extract: Wafabank bụ ụlọ akụ nkeonwe na Morocco, nke ezinụlọ Kettani.  N'afọ 2004, ndị Kettanis resịrị ndị ONA aka ha, nke butere njikọ nke ụlọ akụ na Banque Commerciale du Maroc iji guzobe Attijariwafa Bank.

27350.title: Fah-fah
27350.extract:
Fah-fah bụ ofe nke ndi Obodo Djiboutian, nke a na-erikarị n'akụkụ ndịda nke mba ahụ. A na-ejikarị ya eme nri abalị. Nri a na-ewu ewu n'ezie na nri ndị dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka. A na-ejikarị anụ ewu ya na akwụkwọ nri na chilies na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ eme Fah-fah ma jirikwa achịcha dị larịị a na-akpọ Aish maọbụ nke a makwaara dịka achịcha Lebanọn maọbụ a na-enye ya Injera, achịcha Etiopia a ma ama maọbụ Lahoh, achịcha Somalia yiri sponge.
E kwesịghị ịgbagwoju nke a anya na usoro nwa ọhụrụ kpọrọ nkụ a na-akpọSkiwa faffa na Agba ya Obi obodo Ethiopia.

27450.title: Jane Pilgrim
27450.extract:
Jane Pilgrim bụ onye nhazi otu ndị ọrụ oge niile nke Bekee na-arụ ọrụ na National Health Service maka UNISON. Ọ batara n'ihu ọha na 2011 ka ọ katọchara amụma ahụike gọọmentị.
Ndị ọrụ otu ndị ọrụ na-akwụ ụtụ isi oge niile bụ ndị amara aha ha dị ka "Ndị pilgrim", na-ewebata Motion Early Day na House of Commons na-akatọ omume ndị dị otú ahụ. David Morris MP welitere okwu ahụ na odeakwụkwọ ahụike, ebe Alok Sharma MP jụrụ ajụjụ Prime Minista.  David Cameron zara na "Ọ dị mma ọrụ ma ọ bụrụ na ị nwere ike nweta ya!"Sharma ezipụla arịrịọ maka nnwere onwe ozi na ndị kansụl ime obodo niile ka ha kpughee ole "ndị njem ala nsọ" na-arụ ọrụ na gọọmentị ime obodo, na nzaghachi na-egosi na ọ dịkarịa ala £ 35m na-emefu kwa afọ.

30610.title: Gareth Thomas (onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Britain)
30610.extract: Gareth Richard Thomas (amụrụ na 15 Julaị 1967) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị British Labour onye jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu (MP) maka Harrow West kemgbe 1997. Ọ bụ Minista Nchịkọta maka Azụmaahịa ugbu a n'ihu oche ndị mmegide. Thomas jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Mba maka Mmepe Mba Nile na Minista nke Steeti maka Azụmaahịa, Ntinye ego na Ihe Ndị Ahịa n'etiti afọ 2008 na 2010. Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Co-operative Party site na 2001 ruo 2019, ma na-azọ ọkwa dị ka onye ọrụ na onye na-arụ ọrụ.

32992.title: Okechukwu Amah
32992.extract:
Okechukwu Amah bụ Onye injinia mmanụ ala na onye nkuzi nke Nchịkwa azụmahịa na Naijiria.  bụ onye otu ngalaba ma na-akụzi Human Resources, Leadership, na Human Behavior in Organizations na Lagos Business School . [1]  na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye nduzi nyocha na Lagos Business School, Mahadum Pan Atlantic, Naịjirịa.  nwere ihe karịrị afọ  nke ahụmịhe na-arụ ọrụ na Chevron Nigeria Limited, ebe o nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa njikwa.
Okechukwu Amah Nationality Nigerian Alma mater University of Ibadan, University of Benin Occupation (s) Petroleum Engineer and Business Administration AcademicEmployerLagos Business School

34271.title: Ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Naịjirịa
34271.extract: nke ụmụ nwanyị  Ike bụ mmepe ụmụ nwanyị n'okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ike ọha na eze na akụ na ụba na mmepe mba. Ọ bụkwa ụzọ e si ebelata adịghị ike ụmụ nwanyị na ịdabere n'akụkụ niile nke ndụ. Enwere ike ịhụ na mkpokọta agụmakwụkwọ, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ahụike na ikike iwu bụ isi ihe na-eme ka ụmụ nwanyị nwee ike na Nigeria. ngụkọta nke agụmakwụkwọ, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ahụike na ikike iwu bụ isi ihe na eme ka ụmụ nwanyị nwee ike na Naịjirịa. Dị ka ọtụtụ Ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka, ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria nwere ọrụ dị ala karịa ụmụ nwoke ibe ha.  nwere okpukpu abụọ karịa ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'okpuru akara ịda ogbenye karịa ụmụ nwoke, na ihe ruru okpukpu iri na itoolu karịa ụmụ nwoke nọ n'ọkwa ndị isi karịa ụmụ nwanyị.

34845.title: Vincent Ado Tenebe
34845.extract: Vincent Ado Tenebe (amụrụ 17 Ọgọst,1958) bu onye Naijiria gụrụ mak oru ugbo. Ọ bụbu onye isi Mahadum Steeti Taraba, Jalingo ma bụrụkwa onye bụbu  onye isi mahadum National Open University of Nigeria.

36836.title: Stander (ihe nkiri)
36836.extract:
Templeeti:Infobox film
Stander  Ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ South Africa nke 2003 nke Bronwen Hughes duziri, banyere Captain André Stander, onye uwe ojii South Africa ghọrọ onye ohi ụlọ akụ, nke Thomas Jane, onye jụrụ ọrụ ahụ na mbụ.  -eme ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ike ịgwa Allan Heyl okwu, otu n'ime ndị mmekọ Stander nke ka nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ; Cor van Deventer, onye uwe ojii ya; na onye nlekọta ụlọ mkpọrọ ebe a tụrụ Andre mkpọrọ.

39391.title: Everlyne Makuto
39391.extract:
Everlyne Makuto (amụrụ (1990-08-25 )  ) bụ nwaanyi Kenya na-egwu volleyball . Ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu egwuregwu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị Kenya, mana akpọghị ya aha maka egwuregwu Africa na 2019. 
Ọ sonyere na asọmpi Volleyball ụmụ nwanyị 2010 FIVB .  na 2015 FIVB World Grand Prix . 
Ya na VBC Chamalières na-egwuri egwu.

39567.title: Nour Aboulmakarim
39567.extract: Nour Aboulmakarim (amuru 18 February 2003 na Cairo ) bu onye okachamara skwọsh onye Egypt. Dị ka ụdị 2022, nọmba nọmba 55 n'ụwa .

43693.title: Sisaye Feleke
43693.extract: Sisaye Feleke (amuru 15 Jenuarị 1947) bu onye sprinter Etiopia. Ọ gbara ọsọ na mgbagharị mita 4 × 100 nke nwoke na 1972 Summer Olympics .

47334.title: Rebecca Allen (onye na-ese ihe)
47334.extract: Rebecca Allen bụ onye omenkà na-ama ama nke mba ụwa sitere n'ike nsasị nke ike ahụ, echiche echiche na omume yana ikike dị elu.  Ihe osise ya, nke na-ewe ihe dị ka afụ iri anɔ ma na-ewere ụdị vidiyo, nnukwu ihe ngosi, ihe ngosi dị ndụ na nrụnye nrụnye n'eziokwu, na-ekwu okwu ụdị okike, na ihe na-eme ịbụ ịbụ abụ.  mmadụ ka mmetụta na-mpụta echiche echiche anyị nke eziokwu.

49156.title: Abbott Fuller Graves
49156.extract: Abbott Fuller Graves (1859-1936) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ese ihe na America bụ onye na ngwaahịa ikuku na-achọ mma na ndụ ngwaọrụ.  Ojiji oji brushstrokes siri ike, agba na-m calaamad, na ìhè eke na-egosi nke echiche ndị Europe

52320.title: David Matravers
52320.extract:
David Matravers (26 Septemba 1937 - 31 Mee 2022)  bụ onye Britain na-ahụ maka mgbakọ na mwepụ na ọkà mmụta mbara igwe na Prọfesọ nke mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Portsmouth. Mmasị nchọcha ya dị na Applied Mathematics na Theoretical Cosmology.
O guzobere Institute of Cosmology and Gravitation na Mahadum Portsmouth .

14306.title: Mose Se Sengo
14306.extract: Mose Se Sengo (“Fan Fan”) (16 Ọktoba 1945 - 3 Mee 2019) bụ onye na-egwu egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye isi otu egwu si Democratic Republic of Congo . Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke Congolese Soukous .

18182.title: Tina Williams Brewer
18182.extract: Tina Williams Brewer bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, nke a maara màkà akụkọ gbasara akụkọ ihe méré eme nke Africa America. A mụrụ Brewer na Huntington, West Virginia. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Columbus College of Art and Design . Brewer malitere na ime ime ụlọ na ite ite, mana ọ kwagara na akwa akwa na 1986, na-eche na ọ dakọtara na nne. Ọ nọ ugbu a na Pittsburgh, PA ma rụọ ọrụ na bọọdụ nke Associated Artists of Pittsburgh na Pittsburgh Filmmakers / Pittsburgh Center for the Arts.

21307.title: Tamimi
21307.extract: Banū Tamīm (Arabic: بَنُو تَمِيم) bụ ebo Arab malitere na Najd nke dị na ala Araba.[1]  Ọ bụ ọkachasị na Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait, Jordan, Iraq, [2] ọnụnọ siri ike na Algeria, [3] [4] Tunisia, [5] Morocco, [2] na Libya.  Ọ dịkwa n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke mba Arab dịka Egypt na Palestine, yana Khuzestan na Iran.[2]  Okwu Tamim n'asụsụ Arabic pụtara ike na nke siri ike.[6][7].  Ọ pụkwara ịpụta izu okè.[8]

22505.title: Rose Atima Ayaka
22505.extract: Rose Atima Ayaka (amụrụ na 17 Septemba na afo 1975) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti maka Maracha District, na 10th Ugandan Parliament (2016 - 2021).

23788.title: Odera Olivia Orji
23788.extract: Odera Olivia Orji // (na-ege ntị) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri.

26352.title: Onyema Ugochukwu
26352.extract:
Onyema Ugochukwu audio  // (na-ege ntị) CON (amụrụ na abali iteolu n'ime ọnwa iri na otu, n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri anọ n'anọ) (9/11/1944) bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba, onye nta akụkọ, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị. Ugochukwu jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche na nkwukọrịta nye onye isi ala Naijiria Olusegun Obasanjo na onye isi oche mbụ nke Niger Delta Development Commission (NDDC).
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa abụọ n'afọ puku abụọ n'asatọ (25/2/2008), ụlọ ikpe ntuli aka nke steeti Abia kwupụtara na Ugochukwu bụ onye mmeri nke ntuli aka gọvanọ nke steeti emere na afọ puku abụọ n'asaa (2007) na Gọvanọ a họpụtara nke steeti abia.
Otú ọ dị, na abali iri n'otu, n'ime ọnwa abụọ n'afọ puku abụọ n'iteolu  (11/2/2009) ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe na Port Harcourt kagburu mkpebi ahụ, ma kwupụta na Theodore Orji nke PPA meriri ntuli aka ahụ n'ezie.

26995.title: SNVI
26995.extract: SNVI (Société Nationale des Véhicules Industriels, National Company of Industrial Vehicles na Bekee, ma ọ bụ المؤسسة الوطنية Platربات الصناعية na Arabic), nke bụbu National Society of Mechanical Construction (SONACOME) bụ ụlọ ọrụ Algeria rụpụtara gwongworo na bọs kemgbe 1967.

27241.title: Ain Sokhna
27241.extract: Al-'Ain al-Sokhna (Arabic: , : al-ʿAyn as-Sukhna Egyptian Arabic pronunciation:  esˈsoxnæ], "the Hot Spring") bụ obodo dị na Suez Governorate, nke dị n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Oké Osimiri Uhie nke Suez. Ọ dị kilomita 55 (34 mi) n'ebe ndịda Suez na ihe dịka kilomita 120 (75 mi) n"ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Cairo.

29198.title: Ihe onwunwe nke anụmanụ maka nri na ọrụ ugbo
29198.extract:
Ihe onwunwe nke anụmanụ maka nri na ọrụ ugbo (AnGR), nke a makwaara dị ka ihe onwunwe anụmanụ ma ọ bụ ụdị anụmanụ dị iche iche, bụ ihe onwunwa nke anụmanụ (ya bụ, ihe onwunwoke nke uru ma ọ bụ uru nwere ike) nke ụdị nnụnụ na anụmanụ na-enye nwa ara, nke a na-eji maka nri na ebumnuche ọrụ ugbo. AnGR bụ akụkụ nke na otu akụkụ nke ụdị ọrụ ugbo dị iche iche.
Enwere ike itinye AnGR n'ime ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị dị ndụ ma ọ bụ n'ime mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa echekwara dị ka semen ma ọ bụ embrayo. Ụdị mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa anụmanụ dị iche iche gụnyere ụdị dị iche iche n'ụdị, ụdị na n'ime ọkwa. Amara ugbu a 8,800 ụdị nnụnụ na anụmanụ dị iche iche n'ime ụdị 38 ejiri maka nri na ọrụ ugbo. Ụdị anụmanụ ndị a na-ejikarị eme ihe oriri na ọrụ ugbo bụ ehi, atụrụ, ewu, ọkụkọ na ezì. N'ụwa anụ ụlọ, a na-akpọkarị ụdị ndị a "nnukwu ise". Ụfọdụ ụdị ndị a na-ejighị n'aka gụnyere dromedary, ịnyịnya ibu, kamel bactrian, buffalo, ezi pig, ịnyịnya, oke bekee, yak, ọgazị, ọbọgwụ, enyi nnụnụ, partridge, pheasant, kpalakwukwu na toki.

34084.title: Halima Ali Adan
34084.extract: Halima Ali Adan bụ onye Somalia na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru nwoke na nwanyị na ọkachamara na igbu akụkụ ahụ nwanyị (FGM). Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Gender Based Violence (GBV) na onye njikwa mmemme maka Save Somali Women and Children (SSWC), otu ọrụ ebere na-enweghị uru nke dị na Somalia.

34372.title: Margo (nri)
34372.extract: Margo bụ aha ahia ndi na emeputa Ncha na India. Ncha ahu nwere Margo ka ngwa Ihe kacha nu ejiri Mee Ncha ya.￼￼.  bụ ụlọ ọrụ Calcutta Chemical Company mepụtara ma mepụta ncha ahụ [1] n'okpuru nlekọta nke onye guzobere ya, K.C. Das, khogen Chandra Das ma malite ya na 1920.  'afọ 1988, ncha ahụ so n'ime ụdị ise kachasị ere na India, na òkè ahịa nke 8.9% . [1] Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2001, akara ahụ ruru ₹ 75 crores ma bụrụ nke Henkel-SPIC. Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2003, akara ahụ na-amaliteghachi ngwaahịa ọhụrụ lekwasịrị anya na ndị na-eto eto, ma nwee òkè ahịa nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 2% nke akụkụ ncha dị elu na India. 'afọ 2011, Jyothy Laboratories nwetara ikike nke akara ahụ mgbe ọ nwetasịrị òkè na-achịkwa na Henkel India. [1]

38376.title: Tako Taal
38376.extract: Tako Taal bụ onye na-ese ihe na Welsh-Gambia, onye na-ese ihe nkiri na onye mmemme dabere na Glasgow, Scotland .  Ọrụ ya na-eleba anya na ụmụaka ndị na ibe ya nke colonialism.  [1] Atụlela ọrụ ya na Art Monthly, Scotsman, na Studio International.

40005.title: Mmiri -egwe ọka
40005.extract: Mmiri-egwe ọka bụ usoro nke a na-etinye ihe oriri na mmiri, na ma ọ bụ na-enweghị sulfur dioxide, iji mee ka mkpụrụ osisi dị nro iji nyere aka kewaa ihe dị iche iche nke kernel. Dịka ọmụmaatụ, osisi na-egwe ọka mmiri nwere ike ikewapụ ọka ọka 56-paụnd n'ime ihe karịrị kilogram 31 nke ọka ọka (nke n'aka nke ya nwere ike gbanwee ghọọ syrup ọka ma ọ bụ ethanol ọka). 15 paụnd nke ọka gluten nri maka iji na nri anụmanụ, na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 2 pound nke mmanụ ọka.

40480.title: Ụgbọ Mmiri Maka Udo
40480.extract:
The Caravan for Peace tọrọ ntọala na 2017 site na French-Canadian Olympic medalist, Marlene Harnois na Monaco, na mmekorita ya na Peace and Sport, n'okpuru High Patronage nke Prince Albert II nke Monaco na onyeisi oche Joel Bouzou.  Onye egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụwa Didier Drogba na ndị Olympia 80 na-akwado mmemme a kwa afọ.
Nkwenye na egwuregwu nwere ike ịgbanwe ụwa, na-akpali ndị na-eto eto ma na-ejikọta ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ n'ụwa nile, Caravan maka Udo na-achọ ime ka ndị mmeri dị n'otu iji duzie ọnụ, ihe omume mmadụ iji kwalite egwuregwu dị ka ngwá ọrụ maka Development na Peace . 
N'ịbụ ndị ụkpụrụ egwuregwu zuru ụwa ọnụ nke egwuregwu, ọbụbụenyi na ịdị n'otu na-ebu, ndị mmeri maka Udo na-ezukọ iji kwado ndị bi na mpaghara adịghị ike na:

Kwalite egwuregwu 
Ọgụ megide HIV/AIDS 
Mee ka ịnweta mmiri dị mfe 
Kwalite ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ na nha anya nwoke na nwanyị

43536.title: Mogos Tuemay
43536.extract:
Mogos Tuemay Abraha (amụrụ 24 Mee 1997)  bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge . Ọ gbara asọmpi n'ọsọ ndị okenye na asọmpi mba ụwa nke 2019 IAAF nke emere na Aarhus, Denmark.  Ọ gụchara n'ọkwa iri na asatọ.  N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ zọkwara asọmpi nke nwoke 5000 mita na 2019 Diamond League Shanghai ebe ọ gụchara na ọnọdụ nke iri na atọ na 13:15.04 kacha mma. 
Ọ gbara asọmpi n'asọmpi mba mba Africa n'afọ 2016 na n'afọ 2018.
Na 2020, ọ meriri mbipụta 63 nke Campaccio emere na San Giorgio su Legnano, Italy.

45762.title: Across the Niger
45762.extract: N'ofe Niger bụ ihe nkiri Naijiria emepụtara na 2004, nke Izu Ojukwu duziri ma bụrụ nke Kabat Esosa Egbon dere.  Sequel to Battle Of Love.  Nkwuwa okwu nkwuwa okwu ma nwee ike n'ime nsogbu omume nke agha obodo Naijiria nke 1967–1970.  Ọ bụ ndị Naijiria, ndị Juu nke Africa: oge ​​gara aga, ugbu a na eserese ya.  Ọ bụ Chiwetalu Agu, onye ikera ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nkiri mma n'anya Nkwado maka ihe ya na ihe nkiri na 2008 4th kwa afọ Africa Movie Academy Awards.

47566.title: Hubert Massey
47566.extract: Hubert Massey (amụrụ 1958)   bụ onye na-ese ihe dị iche iche,  ma mara nke ọma maka nrụnye ya buru ibu na ụdị Buon Fresco .  Massey nwere ọrụ nka ọhaneze iri na ise na steeti Michigan niile,  na ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara dị iche iche nyere ya ọrụ gụnyere mahadum,  ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, ụlọ oriri na ọ hotelsụ hotelsụ na Michigan Department of Transportation .  Ya na nwunye ya Marquita bi ugbu a na Detroit, Michigan.

48634.title: Jocelyn Jee Esien
48634.extract: Jocelyn Jee Esien (amuru 7 Mee 1974) bu onye omekorita Britain, onye omere na onye ode akwukwo sitere na Naijiria .  Ọ na-eme egwuregwu na ihe ngosi igwefoto zoro ezo 3 Ndị na-abụghị Blondes, na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri ihe nkiri nke ya, Little Miss Jocelyn .

52649.title: Anna Nicole
52649.extract: Anna Nicole bụ opera Bekee na ihe omume 2 na ihe nkiri 16, na egwu nke Mark-Anthony Turnage na akwụkwọ Bekee nke Richard Thomas. Dabere na ndụ ihe nlereanya America Anna Nicole Smith, opera nwetara première ya na 17 February 2011 na Royal Opera House, Covent Garden, London, nke Richard Jones duziri.  Ekwusara ndekọ nke opera na BBC Four na BBC iPlayer na 25 Maachị 2011.[6]  Mgbasa ozi ahụ dọtara ndị na-ekiri 67,700.  Opera nwetara ntughari London nke mbụ na Covent Garden na Septemba 2014.

55172.title: Ememme Odambea
55172.extract: Ememme Odambea bụ mmemme kwa afọ nke ndị isi na ndị Nkusukum Traditional Area na-eme na Saltpond na Central Region nke Ghana .   A na-eme ya n'ọnwa Ọgọst.   Ndị Anomabo na-emekwa ya.  "Odambea" pụtara "njikọ gbasiri ike" n'asụsụ obodo.

5885.title: 7 Juun
5885.extract: 7 Juun bu ubochi nke 7th (nke asaa) na onwa ana kpo Juun. Na Gregorian calender, 7 Juun bu ubochi nke 158th (159th na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 207 du mgbe afo na agwu.

10678.title: Port of Port Harcourt
10678.extract:
Templeeti:Infobox port
Ọdụ Ụgbọ Mmiri nke Port Harcourt nke a na-akpọkwa PH Port, bụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dị na Port Harcourt, Rivers steeti, Naijiria. Ọdụ Ụgbọ Mmiri ahụ meghere na afo 1913 ma nwee ike igbo mkpa ihe fọrọ nke nụdị ibu niile.

15678.title: Gordon Leith
15678.extract: George Esslemont Gordon Leith (1885-1965) bụ ónyé South Africa na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ.

17519.title: A. B. Jackson
17519.extract:
A. B. Jackson nwèrè ike izo aka na:

A. B. Jackson (ónyé na-ede uri) (amụrụ n'afọ 1965), ónyé na-ede egwu Scotland
A. B. Jackson (ónyé na-ese ihe) (1925-1981), ónyé na-ese foto Africa-America
Brian Jackson (ónyé na-eme egwuregwu cricket) (A. B. Jackson, amụrụ n'afọ 1933), ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri cricket n'England

21923.title: Burger (surname)
21923.extract: Burger bụ aha nna sina West German. Burger bụ okwu Dutch na Afrikaans maka 'onye nweere onwe ya' ma ọ bụ 'nwa amaala' (German Bürger, Low German Börger) na aha nna ya bụ aha nna Bekee Burgess. Na mba ndị na-asụ Dutch na German ọ nwere ike ịbụ aha nna, na-egosi mmalite site na nke ọ bụla n'ime ọtụtụ obodo na-agwụ na -burg. Ndị ama ama naza aha nna gụnyere:

27162.title: Banco de Desenvolvimento de Angola
27162.extract:
Banco de Desenvolvimento de Angola (English: Development Bank of Angola) (BDA) is the public bank of Angola to finance investments in "strategic long-term economic development" of the country. E guzobere ya na July 2006 site na iwu gọọmentị No. 37/06. 
BDA na-elekọta Fundo Nacional de Desenvolvimento - FND (National Development Fund - NDF) nke a na-enye site na 5% nke nsonaazụ mmefu ego nke ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala nke Angola na 2% nke nsonaazụ mmefu ego nke ọrụ diamond nke Angola.. 
N'afọ 2008, ụlọ akụ ahụ kwadoro ọrụ ruru ijeri Kwanza 8.7, nke kwekọrọ na ihe dịka $ 116 nde US.

29186.title: Osimiri Tonalá
29186.extract:
Templeeti:Infobox river
Osimiri Tonalá bụ osimiri nke Mexico. Ọ malitere na mpaghara ugwu ndịda nke Nezahualcóyotl Reservoir, nso ebe ókèala Chiapas, Tabasco, na Veracruz zutere. Ọ na-asọba n'ebe ugwu-n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ iji banye na Gulf of Mexico. Ọ bụ ókèala dị n'etiti steeti Tabasco na Veracruz maka ihe ka ukwuu n'ogologo ya.
Njem Juan de Grijalva mere na 1518 kpọrọ ya Rio de San Antonio.: 34

30448.title: Fahro Alihodžić
30448.extract:
a

 
Fahro Alihodžić (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Bosnia na Briten na-agba bọọlụ maka Caledonia Gladiators nke British Basketball League. Ọ na-anọchite anya otu egwuregwu basketball nke mba Britain na mba ụwa.

31978.title: Gege Soriola
31978.extract: Oluwafemi Gege Soriola (amụrụ na 21 Nọvemba 1988) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke na-agba maka klọb Saudi Riffa SC dị ka onye na-agbachitere etiti. Oluwafemi Gege Soriola onye na-agba bọọlụ Riffa SC center back

33627.title: Jeff Unaegbu
33627.extract: Jephthah Elochukwu Unaegbu // i (amụrụ ya na October 1, 1979)// ⓘbu onye odee Naijiria, onye nyocha, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'ese ihe na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, Onye dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ.

33785.title: Barbara Craig
33785.extract: Barbara Denise Craig (née Chapman; 22 Ọktoba 1915 - 25 Jenụwarị 2005) bụ onye Britain na-amụ banyere ihe mgbe ochie, onye na-ede akwụkwọ, na agụmakwụkwọ, na-ahụ maka ite oge ochie. Site na 1967 ruo 1980, ọ bụ onye Isi nke Somerville College, Oxford.

34956.title: Michael M. Thackeray
34956.extract: Michael Makepeace Thackeray FRS (amụrụ na 1949) bụ onye na-eme nchọpụta na batrị na South Africa. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe ndị na-arụ ọrụ na electrochemically. 'etiti afọ 1980 ọ chọtara ezinụlọ Manganese oxide spinel nke cathodes maka Batrị lithium ion mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ nyocha nke John Goodenough na Mahadum Oxford. 'afọ 1998, mgbe ọ nọ na Argonne National Laboratory, ọ duziri otu ndị mbụ kọrọ banyere teknụzụ cathode NMC. E nyere nchebe patent gburugburu echiche na ihe ndị ahụ na 2005 na Argonne National Laboratory nye otu ndị otu Thackeray, Khalil Amine, Jaekook Kim, na Christopher Johnson.  na-eji ihe a a kọrọ ugbu a eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ngwá electronic na ụgbọala eletrik. [1] [2] [3]

35908.title: 2019 Nchịkọta ndị nnọchi anya Naijiria na Benue Steeti
35908.extract:
.Emere ụlọaka ụlọ omebe iwu Naijiria nke afọ 2019 na steeti Benue na February 23, 2019, iji họpụta ndị ụlọ omebe iwu ga-5 anya Benue State, Nigeria.
. Ngụkọta nke ndị isi aka 5 debanyere aha na Independent National Electoral Commission ka ha sonye na mbụ aka ahụ.  Onye ụzọndọrọ ndị PDP bụ Francis Agbo meri na ngosi ahụ, meri APC Michael Unogwu na mmadụ atọ ndị ọzọ ga-azọkwa ụzọ.  Agbo ike 57.65% nke vootu, ebe Unogwu 30.20%

39503.title: Zeina Ibrahim
39503.extract: Zeina Ibrahim Sharaf ( Arabic  </link> , amuru 20 June 2003)  bu onye egwuregwu nka nke Egypt. Ọ bụ ndị otu egwuregwu Afrịka nke afọ 2019 na onye mmeri ụlọ mmanya na-enweghị isi na onye mmeri gburugburu 2021 Africa . Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri nke otu egwuregwu Africa na 2022 . Ọ nọchitere anya Egypt n'egwuregwu Olympic nke ndị ntorobịa 2018 na egwuregwu Olympic nke 2020 .

39745.title: Naira Ali
39745.extract: Nabattu Naira Ali (amụrụ na 5 Disemba 1988) bụ onye egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Uganda.

46890.title: Brenda Chapman
46890.extract: Brenda Chapman ( banyere 1962 ma ọ bụ 1963 ) [1] bụ onye ihe nkiri America, onye na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-ese ozizi, na onye ntụzi.  Na 1998, ọ onyonyo mbụ na-eduzi ihe nkiri sitere na nnukwu studio, DreamWorks Animation 's The Prince of Egypt .  [2] Na 2012, ọ na-eduzi ihe nkiri Disney / Pixar Brave na Mark Andrews (na ngalaba-eduzi site na Steve Purcell ), na-aghọ ihe mbụ Award Academy Award for Best Animated Feature

50554.title: Uche, Kremenets Raion, Ternopil Oblast
50554.extract: Ustechko ( Ukrainian </link> ) bụ obodo dị na Vyshnivets akwụkwọ hromada nke Kremenets Raion nke Ternopil Oblast na Ukraine

52119.title: Fouad Abdelmoumni
52119.extract: Fouad Abdelmoumni bụ onye Moroccan na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na onye na-ahụ Maka akụ na ụba. Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Transparency Maroc kemgbe 13 Febụwarị 2016 .  Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke NGO Al Amana site na 1997 ruo 2010.

55377.title: Meskouta
55377.extract: Meskouta bụ achicha omenala Moroccan nke a na-ahụ eme ihe maka oge tii ma ọ bụ nri ụtụtụ.  E nwere ụdị dị iche nke ebe meskouta dabere na dị ka oroma, lemon na vanilla.  A na-eme ya n'oge oyi, mgbe oroma chara acha.  A na-ahụ tii mint ọkụ ma ọ bụ ọrụ enye Meskouta.

55705.title: Zahara Nampewo
55705.extract: Dr. Zahara Nampewo, bụ onye ọka iwu nwanyị Uganda, onye na-akwado ikike mmadụ, na agụmakwụkwọ. Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Human Rights and Peace Center (HURIPEC) na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu nke Mahadum Makerere, na Kampala, isi obodo Uganda na nnukwu obodo..

12526.title: Ummah College of Health Sciences and Technology
12526.extract:
Ummah College of Health Sciences and Technology (UCHSTG) bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu dị na Gombe State, Nigeria . E hiwere ya n'afọ 2016, wee malite ịrụ ọrụ n'afọ 2017. 

Ọ bụ otu n'ime kọleji nke sayensị ahụike na steeti Gombe, ndị ọzọ gụnyere College of Health Tech Kaltungo, na College of Health Sciences Medical na Tech, Gombe.

12935.title: Ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, ahụike na gburugburu ebe obibi
12935.extract: Ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, ahụike, na gburugburu ebe obibi (PHE) bụ ụzọ mmepe mmadụ nke jikọtara atụmatụ ezinụlọ na ahụike na mgbalị nchekwa iji chọọ ihe ịga nke ọma maka nchekwa na ọdịmma mmadụ karịa otu ngalaba. Enwere mmekọrịta miri emi n'etiti ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, ahụike na gburugburu ebe obibi. Isiokwu ndị ahụ abụghị naanị na ha nwere njikọ na ibe ha kamakwa akụkụ ndị ọzọ dị mkpa nke dị oke mkpa iji mee ka PHE nwee mmekọrịta chiri anya.

13273.title: Human trafficking in Morocco
13273.extract:
Morocco bụ isi iyi, ebe a na-aga, na mba njem maka ụmụnwoke, ụmụnwanyị, na ụmụaka ndị a na-atụ na mgbere ahịa mmadụ, ọkachasị ọrụ mmanye na ịgba akwụna mmanye. A na-azụ ụmụaka n'ime mba ahụ site n'ime ime obodo gaa n'obodo ukwu iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka ndị na-eje ozi ma ọ bụ ndị ọrụ, ma ọ bụ maka mmegbu mmekọahụ azụmahịa. A na-erigbu ụmụnwoke, ụmụnwanyị, na ụmụaka Morocco maka ọrụ mmanye na ịgba akwụna na mba Europe na Middle Eastern. A na-akpọ ụmụ agbọghọ Morocco na-eto eto si n'ime ime obodo ka ha rụọ ọrụ dị ka ụmụaka na-eje ozi n'obodo ukwu, mana ha na-enwekarị enweghị ụgwọ ọrụ, iyi egwu, na mmetọ anụ ahụ ma ọ bụ mmekọahụ, ma mgbe ụfọdụ na-eche mmachi na ije. Omume ndị a na-egosi na a na-agba ụmụagbọghọ ndị a ohu n'onwe ha. Ụmụnwoke Morocco na-enweta ọrụ mmanye dị ka ndị na-amụ ihe na ụlọ ọrụ nka na ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa ndị na-arụ ọrụ.  A na-adọta ụmụn
nwoke na akaụmụ nwomba ke Morocco ole na ole mba na Europe site na ọrụ aghụghọ, ma mesịa manyere ha ire ọgwụ ọjọọ. Na mgbakwunye, mụ nwoke na mụ nwanyị si na sub-Saharan Africa, South Asia, na Philippines na-abanye Morocco n'afọ ofufo mana n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị site n'enyemaka nke ndị na-ebubata mmadụ; otu ugboro mba na Morocco, a na-amanye ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ịgba akwụna ma ọ bụ, na-erughị ugboro ugboro, na-amanye ha ịrụ ọrụ ụlọ. Ndị omekome Naịjirịa, ndị na-eme mpụ dị iche iche dị ka mbubata mmadụ na ịzụ ahịa ọgwụ ọjọọ, na-asọmpi iji chịkwat ịmgbere zụ ahịa nke ndị Afrịka nọ n'okpuru Sahara na Morocco.
Gọọmentị Morocco anaghị agbaso ụkpụrụ kacha nta maka iwepụ ịzụ ahịa; Otú ọ dị, ọ na-eme mgbalị dị ukwuu ime nke ahụ. Gọọmentị mara otu onye ikpe nke mere ka nwatakịrị dị afọ iri na atọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ rụọ ọrụ mmanye, ọ bụ ezie na ọ nọgidere na-enweghị ọganihu n'ozuzu ya na mpaghara ndị a: ikpe na-ama ndị omekome na-azụ ahịa ntaramahụhụ kwekọrọ n'ụdị ọjọọ nke mmejọ ahụ; ịchọpụta ndị na-azụ ahịa n'etiti ndị na-adịghị ike; na ịhụ na ndị na ndị na-azụ ahịa si mba ọzọ anaghị ejide ma chụpụ ha. Gọọmentị na-aga n'ihu na-ejikọta mbubata ndị mbịarambịa na ịzụ ahịa mmadụ. Ụlọ ọrụ US State Department na-enyocha ma na-alụso ịzụ ahịa mmadụ ọgụ tinyere mba ahụ na "Tier 2" n'afọ 2017.

17373.title: Zebedee Armstrong
17373.extract: Zebedee B. Armstrong (n'ubochí irí na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1911), aka Z.B. Armstrong, bụ onye na-ese ihe n'èzí nke a maara màkà kalenda ụbọchị mbibi ya.

26449.title: Why Has Nobody Told Me This Before?
26449.extract: Why Has Nobody Told Me This Before? bụ akwụkwọ enyemaka onwe onye nke Julie Smith, onye Britain na-ahụ maka ahụike.

27156.title: Ecoair International
27156.extract: Ecoair International bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu dị na Algiers, n’ obodo Algeria, nke e guzobere na afo 1999. N'afọ 2002, e jikọtara ya na Khalifa Group, ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna nke Khalifa Airways. Na-arụ ọrụ site na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Houari Boumedienne, Ecoair International nyere ụgbọ elu na Europ, gụnyere Brussels-Charleroi ya na North Afrika, na n'ime obodo  Algeria.

27503.title: Adele Tucker
27503.extract:
.Adele Evelina Johnson Tucker MBE (8 Ọgọst 1868 - 4 Jenụwarị 1971) bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ Bermudia na onye otu azụmaahịa.  A maara ya nke ọma dị ka otu n'ime ndị guzobere Bermuda Union of Teachers, otu mbụ edebanyere aha n'agwaetiti ahụ.
. A mụrụ Tucker na Warwick Parish, otu n'ime ụmụaka asatọ amụrụ Catherine na Thomas Tucker.  O   too   nyere   Hezekaya Frit, b ´ u onye nwere onwe ya na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ.  Nna Tucker rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwa akwa.  Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ 13, otu afọ ka nne ya nwụsịrị, iji nye aka n'ọrụ ụlọ.  Mgbe ọ dị afọ 18, Tucker chọtara ọrụ na Hamilton dị ka onye inyeaka na ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Jairus Swan na-agba.N'afọ 1892, ọ malitere ịga Collegiate Institute, kọleji ndị nkuzi nke African Methodist Episcopal Church na-elekọta. O mechara bụrụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ Edmonson dị na Warwick site na 1896 ruo 1901, mgbe ahụ na 1902 weghaara Paget Glebe School dị na Hamilton. Ọ lụbeghị di, mana ya na ụmụnne ya nwanyị zụlitere ụmụ abụọ nke otu n'ime ụmụ nwanne ha mere ka ha bụrụ ụmụ mgbei.
N'afọ 1903, Tucker pụtara n'ihu kọmitii n'ime usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ, na-eme mkpesa dịgasị iche iche banyere ụgwọ ọnwa dị ala, enweghị ndị ọrụ, na enweghị ego. Mgbe ọnwụ nke ọtụtụ ndị nkuzi na-eto eto dara ogbenye, ya na mmadụ atọ ndị ọzọ - Rufus Stovell, Edith Crawford, na Matilda Crawford - guzobere Bermuda Union of Teachers na 1919 iji mee ka ọnọdụ ka mma. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba mbụ nke nzukọ ahụ, nke na 1947 ghọrọ òtù ọrụ aka mbụ na Bermuda iji nweta nkwado iwu (na-esote iwu ọhụrụ). Tucker lara ezumike nká n'ike n'ọrụ nkuzi mgbe ọ dị afọ 65, mana ọ nọgidere na-etinye aka n'ọtụtụ nzukọ obodo. Na 1951 Birthday Honours, e mere ya onye otu Order of the British Empire. Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'oge agadi, akwụkwọ akụkọ na-agba ya ajụjụ ọnụ ugboro ugboro n'ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya. Tucker nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 102, Henry Tucker, onye ndú gọọmentị, gara olili ozu ya.
