Ọ pụtara na stampụ post Bermudian dị ka akụkụ nke usoro "Pioneers of Progress".

29996.title: Megatrends nke America
29996.extract:
American Megatrends International, LLC, na-azụ dị ka AMI, bụ ụlọ ọrụ ngwaike na obi mba ụwa, ihe na PC ngwaike na ngwa ngwa .  [1] Emebere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na saịtị 1985 na Pat Sarma na Subramonian Shankar.  [2] Isi ụlọ ọrụ dị na Building 800 na 3095 Satellite Boulevard na Gwinnett County, Georgia, United States, na nso obodo Duluth na mpaghara Atlanta mepere emepe 
. Companylọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka onye ikike nne nne zuru oke, na-etinye onwe ya na ngalaba dị elu.  Onye eji mbụ ya bụ PC Limited, [1] mechara mara Dell Kọmputa
mbụ ihe mbụ dabere na Taiwan, [1] AMI gara n'ihu na-ahụ firmware BIOS maka ndị na-ahụ motherboard.  [2] Ndị ọrụ ahụ ụgbọ BIOS software maka nne na nna (1986), nne na nna nkesa (1992), ndị na-ahụ maka nchekwa (1995) na ọkọlọtọ njikwa anya (1998). 
 AMI isi na isi anya na OEM na ODM azụmahịa na ịzụ.  [1] Ahịrị ntụgharị ya AMIBIOS [2] ( BIOS ), Apio (onye ga - AMIBIOS8 dabere na ọkọlọtọ UEFI ), AMI EC ( firmware njikwa akara ), MG-Series SGPIO backplane controllers (maka SATA, SAS).  na NVMe).  ngwaọrụ nchekwa), arịa ụgbọ ala / firmware, yana MegaRAC ( BMC firmware).
Ụlọ ọrụ American Megatrends Inc. (AMI) tọrọ ntọala na 1985 site n'aka Subramonian Shankar na Pat Sarma site na ego sitere na ntinye ndụmọdụ gara aga, Access Methods Inc. (nakwa AMI).  Ụzọ nnweta bụ ụlọ ọrụ Pat Sarma na onye otu ya na-elekọta. Mgbe Access Methods kwalitere AMIBIOS nke ọma, enwere okwu gbasara iwu n'etiti ndị nwe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, nke mere na Sarma zụrụ ndị mmekọ ya. Ụzọ nnweta ka nwere ikike nke AMIBIOS. Sarma amalitelarị ụlọ ọrụ akpọrọ Quintessential Consultants Inc. (QCI), ma emesia guzobe mmekorita ya na Shankar.

31299.title: Dan Nwanyanwu
31299.extract: Dan Nwanyanwu mni, OFR (amụrụ na 23 Nọvemba 1959) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọka iwu bụ onye isi oche nke Labour Party (LP) site na 2004 ruo 2014.

32338.title: Iris glaucescens
32338.extract:
''.[./<i id=]Iris_(plant)" id="mwDA" rel="mw:WikiLink" title="Iris (plant)">Iris glaucescens bụ ụdị osisi dị na ụdị Iris, ọ dịkwa na subgenus Iris. Ọ bụ osisi rhizomatous perennial, nke a na-ahụ na Russia, Kazakhstan, Mongolia na China. Ọ nwere akwụkwọ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na-acha ntụ ntụ, ogwe osisi dị nro, na okooko osisi na-acha odo odo, violet na-acha ọcha, na-acha uhie uhie, na-achie uhie na-acha ọbara ọbara, na-apụta anụnụ anụcha, na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ụcha ọcha. A naghị akụ ya dị ka osisi ịchọ mma na mpaghara okpomọkụ. E jikọtara ya na iris ọzọ yiri ya na mpaghara ahụ, wee bụrụ otu okwu nke Iris scariosa, tupu e kewaa ya n'ụdị abụọ dị iche iche ọzọ. Ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ isi mmalite ka na-akpọ ya otu ihe na Iris scariosa.
Ọ nwere nnukwu rhizome, nke ruru 3 cm n'ịdị arọ na nodular.  Ọ nwere ihe ndị fọdụrụ n'oge gara aga, n'elu rhizome.
Ọ nwere falcate (dị ka ọrịa), na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, ma ọ bụ na-acha ntụ ntụ.
Ọ nwere ogwe osisi dị gịrịgịrị, nke nwere ike itolite ruo n'etiti 8–25 cm (3-10 in) ogologo.Ọ dị ka Iris scariosa n'ịdị elu, ma gafee ịdị elu nke akwụkwọ.
Ogwe osisi ahụ nwere (scarious) membranous, spathes (akwụkwọ nke okooko osisi), nke dị 5–15 cm (2-6 in) ogologo na ogologo keels.
Ogwe osisi ahụ nwere okooko osisi abụọ (n'elu ogwe osisi), na-ama ifuru n'etiti etiti ruo n'ọgwụgwụ oge opupu ihe ubi, n'etiti Eprel na Mee. Ọ na-ama ama maka nkezi ụbọchị 12.
Okooko osisi ndị ahụ dị 3.5–5.5  in) n'obosara, na-abịa na onyinyo nke na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, violet na-acha odo odo, na-acha uhie uhie, na-achọpụta na-acha ọcha.
Dị ka iris ndị ọzọ, ọ nwere abụọ abụọ nke petals, 3 nnukwu sepals (outre petals), nke a maara dị ka 'fall' na 3 n'ime, obere petals (ma ọ bụ tepals), nke akpọrọ 'ụkpụrụ'.O nwekwara afụ ọnụ ọcha na nsụda mmiri.: 17 
Mgbe iris gbasịrị, n'etiti oge okpomọkụ, ọ na-emepụta capsule mkpụrụ fusiform (nke yiri spindle). N'ime capsule ahụ, a na-enwe mkpụrụ na-acha nchara nchara, na globular. Ha dị 4-5.5 mm n'ogologo na 2-3 mm n'obosara.

32452.title: Ọnwa Akụkọ Mba
32452.extract:
National Share-a-Story Month (NSSM) ịgụ ihe omume a na-eme kwa afọ na United Kingdom nke a na-eji akwalite ịgụ ụmụaka.
Ndị na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ, ụlọ akwụkwọ, ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ, ndị na-ede blọgụ na ndị nne na nna na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka ụzọ isi lekwasị anya n'ịkọ akụkọ n'ụzọ sara mbara. Òtù mpaghara nke Federation of Children's Book Groups na-emekarị ihe omume pụrụ iche iji mee emume ọnwa ahụ, dị ka nleta ndị edemede, ịgụ akwụkwọ na ihe omume ndị ọzọ.

33135.title: Thomas Adesanya Ige Grillo
33135.extract: Thomas Adesanya Ige Grillo (January 29, 1927 na Lagos, Nigeria - October 21, 1998), bụ nwa J. Aina Osaoba na V. Adenike Omolara (Serrano) imi.  Ọ bụ onye prọfesọ izizi nke lere ime Aru na Nigeria.

34238.title: Mmiri ncha
34238.extract:
Ncha scum maobu ncha lime na esi Ike ma na-acha white bia nwekwara calcium stearate, magnesium stearate na oyiyi alkaline earth metals derivatives nke fatty acids. Ihe Ndia na ebute site na etinye ncha na anionic surfactants na mmiri Siri Ike. Mmiri Siri Ike gunyere calcium na magnesium ions nke na agbru ya na surfactant anion hi emeputa metallic maobu ncha lime.  

− C17+ + Ca2+ → (C17H35) 2Ca + 2 Na+
Na mmeghachi omume a, a na-eji calcium dochie sodium cation na ncha iji mepụta calcium stearate. 
Sọn Lime na-ewu ihe na eriri, igwe ịsa ahụ, na sinks. Ihe ndị e ji emepụta ihe anaghị enwe mmetụta nke mmiri siri ike. Ọtụtụ ncha nwere ihe na-egbochi mmepụta nke ncha lime.

36243.title: Argungu
36243.extract:
Argungu bụ obodo dị na steeti Kebbi nke Naijiria nke dị n'ụdị osimiri Sokoto .  N'afọ 2007, Argungu nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị 47,064.  [1] Obodo a bụ oche nke Emirate Argungu, steeti omenala .  Obodo a nnukwu ebe a na-akọ ugbo na mpaghara ahụ, nwere ihe kpatara ndị dị mkpa ụtaba, ahụekere, osikapa, millet, ọka wit na sorghum .  Obodo a na-anabata mmemme mmemme azụ mba ụwa kwa afụ [2] nke egwu awụ iri na otu.  Emere mmemme azụ azụ Argungu ụzo n'afọ 2020 site na Machị 11–14
.  mgbaàmà Gọọmenti Argungu na-enwe oge abụọ dị iche iche, ya bụ oge mmiri ozuzo na oge ọkọchị.  Ihe e ji mara oge ọkọchị bụ okpomoku na-ekpo ọkụ, na nkezi ebe na mpaghara ruru ihe dị ka ogo Celsius 34 .  Oriaka ahụ na-edobe nkezi iru mmiri dị ihe dị ka kpakpando 24. Odida obodo ya na- nke nwere ala nti nkụ na nke nkụ, nke ugwu ndị na-agbasa agbasa na ụdị ala ndị ọzọ dị elu gbara ya
. Ewubere ụlọ nke Kanta Museum, n'ụdị isi akara na 1831 wee guzo aha Muhammadu Kanta, onye ntọala Kebbi Kingdom na 1515. Ọ bụ Yakubu Nabame, onye bụbu Emir nke Kebbi, enweghị ya wee ọrụ dị ka obí Emir ruo 1942 mgbe ndị  Briten wuru ụlọ ọhụrụ n'oge ụdị Muhammed Sani .  Mgbe ụlọ ahụ ahụ, na July 1, 1958, ọ meghere dị ka ụlọ ngosi mgbe ochie, na-enye ọdịiche ihe ihe mere eme ọgba aghara nke Kebbi State .  A na-ekewa ụlọ ihe ngosi nka n'ime akara iri na otu ma nwee nchịkọta ngwa agha a ma ama, nke nwere mma, ube, mma agha, osisi, nkume, ụta na akụ, egbe mpaghara na ebe mkpọ na ngozi.  A makwa na ụlọ ihe ngosi nka bụ ebe a na-eli ndị isi isi obodo ọnwụ

41165.title: Royal na Venerable Confraternity of the Most Blessed Sacrament of Mafra
41165.extract:
The Royal and Venerable Confraternity of the Kasị Ngọzi Sacrament nke Mafra, again, the Royal and Venerable Brotherhood of the Kasị Ngọzi Sacrament nke Mafra (Portuguese </link>), bụ ọgbakọ ọha nke ndị kwesịrị ntụkwasị obi nke Ụka Katóló, nke edobere na Basilica. nke Nwanyị anyi na Saint Anthony nke Mafra, Portugal
Confraternity bỹ otu n'ime ồpọc bội kacha ochie na obodo Mafra .  Ọ na-ahazi ememme Corpus Christi ma hazie ememe ọdịnala anọ nke Lent na Ista:

Usoro nke Mmasị nke Onyenwe anyị ( Portuguese : Procissão do Senhor Jesus dos Passos );
Usoro nke Penance of the Third Order of Saint Francis ( Portuguese : Procissão de Penitência da Ordem Terceira de São Francisco ) ;
Usoro nke iru uju asaa nke nwanyị anyị ( Portuguese : Procissão das Sete Dores de Nossa Senhora ); na
Ndị njem nke olili Onyenwe anyị ( Portuguese : Procissão do Enterro do Senhor ).
Ka oge na-aga, the confraternity abezola onye na-ghessari kekei ihe relics.  Ndị ahụ gụnyere Louis XV, eze France, onye bụkwa ụlọ Katidral Reims. 
Njikọ ahụ nwere nchịkọta kachasị ukwuu nke ihe oyiyi mannequin (Portuguese: imagens de vestir ma ọ bụ imagens de roca).  A ka na-eji sakke n'ime ha eme ngaaat samaan.
Akụkụ nke mmemme metụtara ọrụ nke ụka na ụka na ụka.

41737.title: List of Philippine provinces and regions by Human Development Index
41737.extract: Nke a bụ ndepụta mpaghara na mpaghara Philippines site na Index Development Index (HDI) dị ka nke 2019. [1] HDI bụ ihe ndị na-eme ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị isi nke ogologo ndụ, ngwaọrụ (pụtara apụta osisi gwụchara na apụ a na-atụ anya ya mgbe).  ị na-abanye na usoro ), yana ihe nrịbama ego ọ blla nke onye ọ elala, nke a na-eji mee ka mba dị n'ọkwa anọ nke nwa .

42660.title: Nnyocha Ọgwụ nke Ndị Ntorobịa (Ọrụ Ndị Na-abụghị nke Ụlọ Ọrụ), 1946
42660.extract:
Nnyocha ahụike nke ndị na-eto eto (ọrụ ndị na-abụghị ụlọ ọrụ), 1946 bụ Mgbakọ Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ndị Ọrụ Mba Nile .
E hiwere ya na 1946 jiri okwu mmalite na-ekwu:

47989.title: Alexander Cañedo
47989.extract: Alexander Cañedo (December 26, 1902 [1] - Febụwarị 1, 1978 [1] ) bụ onye omenkà Meksiko-Amerika bụ nke nhụsianya na ike nka nke etiti n'afọ nke 20.

51630.title: Mamata Banerjee
51630.extract:
Templeeti:Collapsed infobox section end 
Mamata Banerjee (   ; amuru 5 Jenụwarị 1955) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị India nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nke asatọ na ugbu a onye isi ala steeti West Bengal nke India kemgbe 20 Mee 2011, nwanyị mbụ jichiri ọfịs. N'ịbụ onye jere ozi ọtụtụ oge dị ka Minista Minista Union, Mamata Banerjee ghọrọ onye isi nke West Bengal na nke mbụ na 2011. Ọ tọrọ ntọala All India Trinamool Congress (AITC ma ọ bụ TMC) na 1998 mgbe ọ kewapụrụ na National Congress na India, wee ghọọ. Onye isi oche ya nke abụọ mechara na 2001. A na-akpọkarị ya Didi (nke pụtara, nwanne nwanyị okenye na Bengali).).
Banerjee jerela ozi ugboro abụọ dị ka Minista nke okporo ụzọ ụgbọ oloko, nwanyị mbụ mere ya.[3] Ọ bụkwa nwanyị nke abụọ nke Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Coal, na Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mmepe akụrụngwa mmadụ, ihe ndị ntorobịa na egwuregwu, ụmụ nwanyị na mmepe ụmụaka n'ime ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị India.[4] Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe o megidere amụma inweta ala mbụ maka nrụpụta nke gọọmentị Kọmunist na-edu na West Bengal maka mpaghara akụ na ụba pụrụ iche n'ọnụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị ọrụ ugbo na Singur.[5] N'afọ 2011, Banerjee wepụrụ mmeri dị ukwuu maka njikọ aka AITC na West Bengal, na-emeri 34 Communist Party of India (Marxist) na-edu ọchịchị Left Front, ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị Kọmunist na-edu ogologo oge n'ụwa.
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onye otu West Bengal Legislative Assembly sitere na Bhabanipur site na 2011 ruo 2021. Ọ gbara oche ọgbakọ Nandigram wee tuo ya na BJP Suvendu Adhikari na ntuli aka 2021 West Bengal Assembly, [9] n'agbanyeghị na otu ya meriri ọtụtụ oche. [10] Ọ bụ onye isi ala West Bengal nke atọ meriri ntuli aka site na mpaghara nke ya, mgbe Prafulla Chandra Sen na 1967 na Buddhadeb Bhattacharjee na 2011. Mamata gbara aka na nsonaazụ Nandigram Constituency na Calcutta High Court na okwu ahụ bụ ikpe ikpe.[11] O duuru ndị otu ya gaa na mmeri dị ukwuu na ntuli aka ọgbakọ 2021 West Bengal.[12][13][14] A họpụtara ya ka onye otu omebe iwu West Bengal ọzọ site na mpaghara Bhabanipur na ntuli aka ahụ.[15] Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị onye isi ala na-achị ugbu a na India ugbu a.

54846.title: Marija Trandafil
54846.extract: Marija Trandafil ma ọ bụ Marija Popović (25 Disemba 1816 - 14 Ọktoba 1883) bụ Onye ọrụ ebere Serbian n'obodo Novi Sad . Ya na di ya nyeere obodo Novi Sad aka iwughachi ya mgbe a tụrụ ya bọmbụ na Mgbanwe Hungary nke 1848. O wughachiri akụ na ụba ya ma hapụ akụ na ụba iji nyere ụmụaka aka inweta agụmakwụkwọ, ụlọ ọgwụ iji kwado ego, ụgwọ ezumike nká a ga-akwụ, na ogige ụmụ mgbei ọhụrụ.

3043.title: Idaho
3043.extract: Idaho bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika.

14224.title: Jayana
14224.extract: Jemima Annor Yeboah, nke e ji aha Jayana mara bụ onye Ghana na-agụ egwu ozioma nke oge a, onye na-ede egwu ma bụrụkwa onye ọchụnta ego. A họpụtara ya dịka nwanyị na-eti egwu nke afọ n'afọ 2020 na Ghana Urban Gospel Music Awards .

16836.title: Christiana Boateng
16836.extract:
Christiana Boateng nwere ike ikpo ya:

Christiana Boateng (onye na-eme egwuregwu) (na afọ 1943)?), onye na-agba ọsọ na Ghana

20019.title: Usoro ọchịchị Lagos Steeti
20019.extract: Lagos Steeti na-eji usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke nwere pati dị iche iche. Ọchịchị Lagos Steeti bụ nke All Progressives Congress na-achịkwa kemgbe 1999 mgbe Bola Tinubu ghọrọ gọvanọ mbụ a họpụtara site na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke Lagos Steeti, nke People's Democratic Party sochiri.

21584.title: Mulder
21584.extract:
Mulder bụ aha nna nke nwere mmalite abụọ: Dutch na German.
Ọ nwere ike ịbụ aha ọrụ asụsụ nke obodo Dutch. Ọ bụ okwu Dutch ochie maka "miller" (Dutch nke oge a: molenaar). Na mmadụ 38,207 na Netherlands aha ya bụ Mulder, ọ bụ aha nke iri na abụọ a na-ahụkarị n'ebe ahụ na 2007. Na Belgium ụdị De Mulder ("onye na-egwe ihe") bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị.
Aha nna Mulder bụkwa aha ọrụ sitere na German, nke pụtara "onye na-eme efere osisi", site na Middle High German mulde "efere", "oghere", ma ọ bụ "tube" + onye nnọchi anya -er.
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere ndia:

23152.title: Faith Obazuaye
23152.extract: Faith Obazuaye (amụrụ na  uboch nke anọ  n' onwa Machị 1989) bụ onye Naijiria na-egwu egwu Tenis tebụl . O sonyere Naịjirịa na asọmpi tenis tebul nke obodo na nke mba ụwa. Obazuaye sonyere na asọmpi emere na afọ 2018 Egwuregwu Commonwealebee o anọchitere  anya Naijiria.

25017.title: Larisa Spasova
25017.extract: Larisa Spasova (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1960) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Bulgaria. O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ .

25201.title: Ọnụ ego e kenyere
25201.extract:
Otu ego e kenyere bụ "Kyoto unit" ma ọ bụ "carbon credit" nkè a na-ere ahịa nké na-anọchite ányà ikike iji wepụta gas na-ekpo ọkụ nke gụnyere "otu metric ton nkè carbon dioxide, gbakọrọ site na iji ikike okpomọkụ ụwa". A na-enye ego e kenyere ruo n'ókè nke "ego e kenyere" nke Ndepụta mbụ nke Kyoto Protocol.
"Ọnụ ọgụgụ e kenyere" bụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke Kyoto Protocol Annex B (ma ọ bụ "ihe mgbaru ọsọ na mbelata nkè mmepụta") gosipụtara dị ka ọkwa nké ikuku a kwadoro n'ime ógè nkwekọrịta n'afọ 2008  nakwa 2012 .

25970.title: Ịkụ mkpu eze
25970.extract:
Kingfisher (Todiramphus tutus) bụ ụdị nnụnụ n'ezinụlọ kingfisher Alcedinidae.
A na-ahụ ụdị ahụ na Cook Islands na Agwaetiti Society  na French Polynesia.

28352.title: Nsogbu iri nri abalị
28352.extract:
Templeeti:Infobox medical condition (new)
Nsogbu iri nri abalị (NES) bụ nsogbu iri nri, nke a na-akọwa site na usoro iri nri na-egbu oge. Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere ụfọdụ ọrịa na-emetụta nsogbu iri nri, ọ dị iche na iri nri na-abaghị nke dị ka onye na ímé ihe nọr ka ébé ihe mmefu zaa ndị siri ike ịbelata ọnụ ụzọ uru n'ihi na ọnụọgụ nri a na-eri n'abalị abụghị nnukwu ma ndi isi ulo nke ndi mádu ziri na ishi ọ bụ enweghị ike ịchịkwa ndị mmadụ n'ihe nri achọrọ. Ọ bụ Albert Stunkard kọwara ya na 1955 ma tinye ya ugbu a na ụdị nsogbu nri ma ọ bụ iri nri ọzọ akọwapụtara ndị mere n'oge nke DSM-5.  A tụwo aro usoro nyocha ma gụnye hyperphagia mgbede (nri nke 25% ma ọ bụ karịa nke ngụkọta nke calorie kwa ụbọchị mgbe nri mgbede gasịrị) na / ma ọ bụ ịmụrụ anya n'abalị na iri nri ugboro abụọ ma ọ bụ ọtụtụ kilomita iji osisi na bụ ugboro n'izu.  Onye ahụ ga-enwerịrị ihe ọmụma banyere iri nri abalị iji mee ka ọ dị iche na nsogbu iri nri metụtara ụra (SRED).  Atọ n'ime mgbaàmà ise metụtara ya ga-adịkwa na ímé ihe ha ga esi egosi ịhụnanya n'ebe nile: enweghị agụụ n'ụtụtụ, ịgba ume iri nri n'abalị, ikwere na mmadụ ga-eri nri iji laghachi n'ụra n'abalị.
NES na-emetụta ma ụmụ nwoke ma ụmụ nwanyị, n'etiti 1 na 2% nke ndị bi n'ozuzu, na ihe dịka 10% nke ndị buru oke ibu.  Afọ mmalite na-adịkarị na mbido okenye (site na afọ iri na ụma ruo afọ iri abụọ) ma na-adịte aka, na ụmụaka anaghị akọ akụkọ NES.  E gosipụtara na ndị nwere NES nwere akara dị elu maka ịda mbà n'obi na ùgwù onwe onye dị ala, a gosikwara na ọkwa abalị nke homonụ melatonin na leptin na-ebelata.  Mmekọrịta dị n'etiti NES na parasomnia SRED chọrọ nkọwa zuru oke.  Enwere arụmụka banyere ma a ga-ele ndị a anya dị ka ọrịa dị iche iche, ma ọ bụ akụkụ nke usoro. A tụwo aro iri nri nwere serotonin iji nyere aka na ọgwụgwọ nke NES, mana nyocha ndị ọzọ na-egosi na nri n'onwe ya enweghị ike ibuli ọkwa serotonin n'ime ụbụrụ. Nri ole na ole (dịka ọmụmaatụ, unere) nwere serotonin, mana ha anaghị emetụta ọkwa serotonin ụbụrụ, na nri dị iche iche nwere tryptophan, mana ókè ha na-emetụta ọkwa serotonin nke ụbụrụ ga-enyocha nke ọma na sayensị tupu e nwee ike ịdọrọ nkwubi okwu, na "echiche, nke a na-ahụkarị na omenala a ma ama, na nri protein dị elu dị ka turkey ga-azụlite tryptopham na serotonin bụ, ọ dị mwute, ụgha".

29446.title: Moldemarka
29446.extract:
Moldemarka bụ ugwu dị kilomita iri atọ (12  mi) ma bụrụkwa ebe ntụrụndụ osisi dị n'ebe ugwu Molde na Molde Municipality, Møre og Romsdal county, Norway. A maara mpaghara ahụ maka Molde panorama, nke nwere ihe karịrị 222 siri ike na akụkụ ụfọdụ snow kpuchiri, agwaetiti ugwu, ugwu ahịhịa ndụ, na North Atlantic Ocean n'ebe ugwu na ọdịda anyanwụ.  Moldemarka na Varden ghọrọ ndị a ma ama n'ụwa niile na mmalite nke narị afọ nke 20, na Kaiser Wilhelm nke Abụọ nke Germany na Prince of Wales dị ka ndị ọbịa oge niile.
Moldemarka, nke a na-echebe ala ọha na eze, bụ ebe ntụrụndụ afọ niile nwere netwọk nke ụzọ, ụzọ ije ije na ụzọ ịgba ọsọ. Okporo ụzọ ọhịa na-abanye n'ógbè ahụ site n'ọtụtụ ntụziaka, na bọọdụ ozi nwere map na ozi gbasara osisi na anụ ọhịa. Okporo ụzọ ndị a kara akara na-eduga n'ọtụtụ ugwu, na Frænavarden (588 mita ma ọ bụ 1,929 ụkwụ) dị ka ebe kachasị ewu ewu, yana ọtụtụ ọdọ mmiri na osimiri, gụnyere ọdọ mmiri Moldevatnet na osimiri Moldeelva. [citation needed] A chọrọ ikike ịkụ azụ mba. 
Akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Moldemarka nwere ike ịnweta site na mpaghara Nordbyen na obodo Molde, ebe ịnweta akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ, dị mfe site na Kvam, Kringstad, na Bjørset. N'oge oyi, e nwere ihe dịka kilomita 10 (6.2 mi) nke ụzọ ịgba ọsọ a kwadebere, na ihe dịka kilomita 7 (4.3 mi)  okporo ụzọ ọkụ.  Ụzọ "nke ochie" na-amalite na Romsdal Museum, na-aga site na Storlihytta, ma na-agwụ n'elu ugwu ahụ, na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị na Varden (407 mita ma ọ bụ 1,335 ụkwụ). Ịga ije na-ewe ihe dị ka otu awa.  Map ije maka Moldemarka dịkwa na ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ.

30328.title: Na-efe efe nke anụ ahụ agụụ perperal
30328.extract: Na-efe efe nke anụ ahụ agụụ perperal bụ edemede nke Oliver Wendell Holmes dere nke pụtara na ha sitere n'aka Onye na mbụ na The New England Quarterly Journal of Medicine na 1843. E mechara bipụtaghachi ya na "Medical Essays" n'afọ 1855.  A gụnyere ya dị ka Mpịakọta 38, Akụkụ nke 5 nke usoro Harvard Classics.

41780.title: Uru Ụmụaka Mba
41780.extract: Atumatu Canadian National Child Benefit (NCB) bu n'obi inyere nọ na ego ogbenye aka.  mkpa bụ n'etiti mpaghara etiti, mpaghara na mpaghara yana mba mbụ na Canada.  Gọọmenti etiti etiti na-enye ezina ahụ ndị nwere obere ego ugwo kwa ụnwayọ, ndị ọzọ na-ebe ma na-ebuga uru na ọrụ iji gboo mkpa Nwera na mpaghara ọ ALA .

43845.title: Gishu Mindaye
43845.extract:
Gishu Mindaye (amuru Ọgọst 18, 1986) bụ onye Etiopia ogologo ogologo egwu, na onye na -eme egwuregwu n'okporo ụzọ .
Gishu meriri 2006 Rotterdam Marathon na Eprel 9 na-eti Helena Javornik na Isabel Elizmendi mgbe 2:28:30 gasịrị, gbapụrụ Javornik na-agafe 35 km akara. Na Septemba afọ ahụ ọ laghachiri na Rotterdam na-ekere òkè na Marathon 1/2 . Gishu gụchara nke abụọ n'azụ Mara Yamauchi gụchara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nkeji abụọ tupu mgbe ahụ.

44475.title: Zaven Paré
44475.extract: Zaven Paré bụ onye France na-ese ihe ọhụrụ nke mgbasa ozi ọhụrụ na 1961.

45387.title: João Silva (onye na-ese foto)
45387.extract:
João Silva (amụrụ 9 Ọgọst 1966) bụ onye na-ese foto agha South Africa mụrụ na Portuguese. Ọ bụ onye ikpeazụ na-arụ ọrụ na Bang-Bang Club, otu ndị na-ese foto bụ ndị kpuchiri South Africa site n'oge a tọhapụrụ Nelson Mandela n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na 1990, na ntuli aka mbụ nke ọtụtụ agbụrụ na mba ahụ na 1994. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Africa, Balkans, Central Asia, Russia, na Middle East. 
N'October 2010, Silva gbagoro na ogbunigwe mgbe ya na ndị agha US nọ na Kandahar, Afghanistan ma tụfuo ụkwụ aka ekpe ya n'okpuru ikpere, na ụkwụ aka nri ya si n'elu ya.  Mgbe mgbake na natara prostheses abụọ, ọrụ mbụ ya na Walter Reed Army Medical Center maka The New York Times bụ na White House.  Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye na-ese foto nke New York Times na Africa.

49201.title: Martin Battersby
49201.extract: George Martin Battersby (12 Ọnwa Abụọ 1914 – 3 Eprel 1982)  bụ onye omenkà trompe-l'œil nke Britain na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke ghọrọ ọkachamara na Art Nouveau na ụdị 1920 na 1930s.

49678.title: Global Initiative for Food Security and Preservation
49678.extract:
Global Initiative for Food Security and Preservation (GIFSEP) bụ ihe mgbaàmà nke e hiwere na isi ike nke mgbanwe gburugburu ebe obibi, na-ekwu maka ihe ihu igwe site na ọnwụ na-ebelata, na-akwado maka iji isi oge ike.  mmeghari ohuru, na nkwado na-adigide.  nkọwa.  ihe GIFSEP bụ ihe nkwado Nkwado na echekwa udo, na ebumnobi elele nke ụwa ụbọchị mmetọ.  [1] Isi ụlọ ọrụ ha dị na Abuja, Nigeria 
Ebumnuche bụ isi bụ iwepụ mmetọ na ịkwalite udo nke gburugburu ebe obibi, na ebumnobi kachasị nke ịmepụta ọdịnihu dị mma na udo maka ọgbọ n'ọdịnihu.

51181.title: Òtù Nnwere Onwe Ụmụ nwanyị
51181.extract: E guzobere Women's Freedom Association (Persian)  na 1907 site na mkparịta ụka na atụmatụ nke ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ikom nwere ọgụgụ isi nke Constitutional Movement, nzukọ ya lekwasịrị anya na ọnọdụ dị ala nke ụmụ nwanyị na Iran.

52850.title: Ethel Lynn Beers
52850.extract:
Ñ 

Ethel Lynn Beers (amuru Ethelinda Eliot ; Jenụwarị 13, 1827 – Ọktoba 11, 1879) bụ onye na-ede uri America ama ama maka egwu obodo ya na mmetụta mmụọ agha obodo " All Quiet Along the Potomac Tonight ".

5953.title: 30 Juun
5953.extract: 30 Juun bu ubochi nke 30th (nke iri atọ na ) na onwa ana kpo Juun. Na Gregorian calender, 30 Juun bu ubochi nke 181st (182nd na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 184 du mgbe afo na agwu.

13498.title: Filsan Abdullahi
13498.extract: A mụrụ Filsan Abdullahi na 1991/1992 (afọ 30–31) na Dire Dawa. Nne na nna ya si Jigjiga, isi obodo Somali Region na Etiopia. Nne Filsan bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego na nna ya onye injinia petroleum bụ onye rụrụ ọrụ ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya na Saudi Arabia. Filsan gụrụ akwụkwọ ma biri na Addis Ababa ebe ọ nwetara nzere na nchịkwa na njikwa na mahadum Unity, na England ebe ọ nwetara nzere na sayensị nkwukọrịta na Mahadum Hertfordshire. O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka okwu na asụsụ na England ọtụtụ afọ.

18512.title: Cleopatra Koheirwe
18512.extract: Cleopatra Koheirwe bụ onye Uganda na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede, onye na-agụ egwu na onye mgbasa ozi. Ọ pụtara na mbụ na ihe nkiri dị ka Joy na eze ikpeazụ nke Scotland na afọ 2006. Kemgbe ahụ, ọ nwetara ọtụtụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na telivishọn dị iche iche na mpaghara na mba ụwa gụnyere ọrụ na Netflix's Sense8 dị ka Nne na oge 2.

24789.title: Soumia Hady
24789.extract: Soumia Hady (Arabic: ; amụrụ na 30 Junnu  1998) bụ onye Morocco na agba bọọlụ nke na agbachitere COD Meknès na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco.

25461.title: Ebe a na-eli ozu ụgbọ mmiri
25461.extract:
Ebe a na-eli ozu ụgbọ mmiri ma ọ bụ ebe a na-ili ozu ụgbọ elu bụ ebe a hapụrụ mkpokoro ụgbọ mmiri ndị a tụfuru ka ha ree ma gbasaa, ma ọ bụ hapụ ha na nchekwa. Omume dị otú ahụ adịchaghị adịkarị ugbu a n'ihi iwu mkpofu na ya mere ụfọdụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri akọrọ ebe ụgbọ mmiri na-agbaji (iji megharịa ígwè ha ma wepụ ihe ndị dị ize ndụ dị ka asbestos) ka a na-akpọkwa ili ụgbọ mmiri.
Site n'iji ya tụnyere, ahịrịokwu ahụ nwekwara ike izo aka n'ebe nwere ọtụtụ ụgbọ mmiri na-ekpuchighị nke ụlọ ọrụ mmadụ wepụrụ, kama a hapụrụ ya ka ọ gbasaa n'ụzọ okike. Ndị a nwere ike ịpụta n'ebe ụgbọ mmiri siri ike ma ọ bụ dị ize ndụ (dị ka nkume asaa, na Cornwall, ma ọ bụ Blackpool, na Oké Osimiri Irish); ma ọ bụ ebe a kpachapụrụ anya tụba ọtụtụ ụgbọ mmiri ọnụ (dị ka ndị German High Seas Fleet na Scapa Flow); ma ọ dị ka ọtụtụ ụgbọ mmiri tụbaala n'agha (dị ka Ironbottom Sound, na Pacific).
A na-arụ ọtụtụ ụgbọ mmiri ndị dị n'ụwa na mba ndị mepere emepe.  Ụgbọ mmiri na-adịru ihe dị ka afọ 25 ruo 30, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ha na-adị oke ọnụ iji nọgide na-enwe ma na-ere ya ka a kwatuo ya. A na-ere ọtụtụ n'ime ha kpọmkwem na ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na India, Bangladesh, Pakistan na mba ndị ọzọ na-emepe emepe, nke a makwaara dị ka mba ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ site na Immanuel Wallerstein Tian World System Theory. N'afọ 2014, pasent 54 nke ụgbọ mmiri gara n'ụsọ osimiri nke India na Bangladesh. 
Nke a kwekọrọ na oge 2012-2018. Site na ngụkọta nke ụgbọ mmiri 6,702 a tụfuru n'ụwa niile, ụgbọ mmiri 3,586 a tụfọrọ na India na Bangladesh, nke na-agbadata na pasent 53.5.
Ka ọ na-erule Jenụwarị 2020, na pasenti iri abuo òkè India nwere ego kachasị elu n'ụwa niile na òkè kachasị elu nke mmebi ụgbọ mmiri zuru ụwa ọnụ (ọnụ ọgụgụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ụgbọ mmiri mebiri).
A na-eme atụmatụ na ebe a na-emebi ụgbọ mmiri na-enye ndị mmadụ ihe karịrị puku kwuru puku  ọrụ n'ụwa niile nakwa na ha na-emepụta ọtụtụ nde tọn ígwè kwa afọ na obere ọkụ eletrik. E wezụga ígwè, ụlọ ọrụ a na-enwetakwa nnukwu ihe mkpofu siri ike n'ụdị osisi, plastik, ihe mkpuchi, ajị ugegbe, sponge, akwụkwọ mkpofu, eriri mmanụ na ihe mkpofu ogho.

27343.title: Banco Económico
27343.extract:
Banco Económico, nke a na-akpọbu Banco Espírito Santo Angola (BESA) n'afọ 2015, mgbe ụlọ nne ya na Portugal dara, Banco Espírito Santu (BES), bụ ulo akụ Angola nke dị na Luanda. N'oge gara aga, BESA nwere njikọ na Banco Espírito Santo, nke ugbu a bụ Novo Banco, ya mere ọ bụ enyemaka nke Espírito Santo Financial Group (ESFG).
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2014, a mara ọkwa na steeti Angola na-eweghara ihe ka ukwuu na Banco Espirito Angola, dịka ndị mmekọ Angola na-etinye ego ọhụrụ nke ihe dị ka ijeri US $ 3 n'ime ụlọ akụ Angola.
Na ngwụcha afọ 2014, ndị nwere òkè kachasị ukwuu bụ sonangol, nke nwere ihe dị ka 35% Novo Banco, nke nwere òkè 9.99; ụlọ ọrụ Angolan nke Portmill, nke nwere 24%, na otu Geni (nke Leopoldino Fragoso do Nascimento na-achịkwa), nke nwere 18.99% nke isi obodo, na mgbakwunye na Lektron Capital (ụlọ ọrụ onwe ya jikọtara ya na Manuel Vicente) na 30.98%.
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2014, ụlọ akụ mba Angola gwara ya na BESA ga-ewere aha Banco Económico SA.

27772.title: Nzukọ ndị gọvanọ Naijiria
27772.extract: Nzukọ ndị gọvanọ najira bụ ikpo okwu na-abụghị nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke e mepụtara iji bulie mmekorita n'etiti Ndi govonor najiri ị.

27889.title: Okoroire
27889.extract:
Okoroire (Maori: Ōkoroire) bụ obere obodo dị na South Waikato District na mpaghara Waikato nke North Island nke New Zealand, nke dị gburugburu Okoroire Hot Springs. Aha ebe ahụ pụtara 'ebe nke koroire / toroire, ụdị nkịta na-adịghịzi adị.
Isi iyi ndị ahụ na-ekpo ọkụ nwere ọdọ mmiri atọ na-ekwo ọkụ nke e gwupụtara na 1880, nke a rụgharịrị nke ọma na 2017 na 2018. Osisi na fern gbara ọdọ mmiri ahụ gburugburu. N'ime ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, ndị ọrịa na-eji ọdọ mmiri ahụ eme ihe maka ọgwụgwọ na ụmụ nwanyị Maori iji sachaa mgbe ha mụsịrị nwa.
Ihe na-adọrọ mmasị n'ógbè ahụ gụnyere rafting mmiri ọcha, ikiri nnụnụ na ịkụ azụ. Njem ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ gụnyere Three Kauri Track, Wairere Falls walkway na Te Waihou walkway.
Okoroire Hotel, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ obodo akụkọ ihe mere eme nke e ji osisi oge ochie wuo na 1889, dị nso n'akụkụ osimiri Waihou. Ọ bụ otu ezinụlọ nwe ya ruo ọgbọ atọ. E rere họtel ahụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị China n'afọ 2014. Ọ belatara ndị ọrụ na 2018, n'afọ sochirinụ, ụlọ ọrụ Overseas Investment Office manyere ya ire ya mgbe nkwa na ọ gaghị emezigharị ya.
N'afọ 2016, a na-ebo ndị otu egwuregwu rugby Chiefs ebubo na ha na-ekpughe onwe ha n'ihu onye na-eyi uwe n'oge ihe omume ngwụcha oge na isi iyi ọkụ.

29357.title: Tony P. Hall
29357.extract:
.Site na 2002 ruo 2006, Hall jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya United States na United Nations Agency for Food and Agriculture, yana onye isi nke United States Mission na UN Agency na Rome, nke gụnyere Food and Agriculture Organisation of the United Nations (FAO)  , Mmemme nri ụwa, na International Fund for Agricultural Development.  N'ikpeazụ, Hall rụrụ ọrụ na atụmatụ udo nke Middle East na mmekorita ya na Center for Study of Presidency.
Hall gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Fairmont High School na Kettering, Ohio, na 1960. Ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor na Mahadum Denison na 1964. Mgbe ọ nọ na kọleji, a kpọrọ Hall aha Little All-American football tailback na Ohio Conference's Most Valuable Player (1963).
Hall ghọrọ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-abanye na Democratic Party na mgbanwe site na njikọ nna ya.  A họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Houselọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya Ohio, na-eje ozi site na 1969 ruo 1973, yana dịka onye omebe iwu steeti Ohio site na 1973 ruo 1979.￼
A họpụtara Hall nke mbụ ka ọ bụrụ Ụlọ Nnọchiteanya U.S. na 1978, ka ọ nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n’afọ iri na abụọ Charles W. Whalen Jr., onye Republican na-agafe agafe.  O jiri pasentị 54 merie ntuli aka ahụ, mana ọ gaghị eche asọmpi ọzọ ihu ebe ọ bụla nso nso a.  A ga-ahọpụta ya ugboro 11 ọzọ, na-agbadaghị n'okpuru pasent 57 nke votu ahụ.  Dị ka ihe atụ nke etu o si ewu ewu na mpaghara Dayton, ọ nweghị onye na-emegide ya maka ntuli aka ọzọ na 1984 ọbụlagodi Ronald Reagan buru mpaghara ahụ na oke ala.  Ọ naghị emegide ya ọzọ na 1990, ọ nweghịkwa mmegide ọ bụla nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị chere ya ihu na 1982 na 2000.

33887.title: Abdul Mannan Chowdhury (onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị)
33887.extract: Abdul Mannan Chowdhury (Bengali_language" id="mwDQ" rel="mw:WikiLink" title="Bengali language" typeof="mw:Transclusion">Bengali: আব্দুল মান্নান চৌধুরী), nke a makwaara site na Daak naam  (Bengalii: ছানু মিয়া), bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nhazi Bangladesh n'oge Agha Nnwere Onwe Bangladesh . Ọ bụ onye omeiwu, na-anọchite anya Awami League site na mpaghara Sylhet-21 .

34937.title: Wilhelm Verwoerd
34937.extract: Wilhelm Johannes Verwoerd (amụrụ na Febụwarị 21, 1964)  bụ onye na-ahụ maka nhazi na onye nchọpụta na Mahadum Stellenbosch na onye na-eme ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya.  nwa Hendrik Verwoerd, nke a maara dị ka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, Verwoerd agọnahụla echiche ndị ezinụlọ ya na ha nwere njikọ zuru oke wee sonye na ANC.

35403.title: Paul Painlevé
35403.extract:
Paul Painlevé (   [pɔl pɛ̃ləve]; ụbọchị ịse n'onwa Disemba afọ 1863 ruo ubochi iri abụo na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1933) bụ ónyé France na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ na ónyé ọchịchị.  Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro abụọ dị ka Praịm Minista nke mba nke atọ: ụbọchị iri na abuo n'ọnwa Septemba ruo ụbọchị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 1917 na 17 Eprel - 22 Nọvember 1925. Ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ 1906 mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Sorbonne nke malitere n'afọ 1892.
Ógè mbụ ya dị ka praịm minista wéré naanị izu itoolu mànà o lekwasịrị anya na nsogbu ndị dị arọ, dị ka Russian Revolution, ịbanye America n'agha, ọdịda nke Nivelle Offensive, na-eme ka ndị agha French Mutinies na mmekọrịta ya na ndị Britain. N'afọ 1920 dị ka Minista nke Agha ọ bụ ónyé dị mkpa n'iwu Maginot Line.  'oge nke abụọ ya dị ka praịm minista, o lekwasịrị anya na ntiwapụ nke nnupụisi na Jabal Druze nke Siria n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1925 nke kpaliri nchegbu ọha na eze na ndị omeiwu banyere nsogbu nke alaeze ukwu France. [1]

40651.title: Ahịa Ụwa
40651.extract:
Mercado Global bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na-elekọta mmadụ dabere na Panajachel, Guatemala. Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ekwu na ebumnuche ha bụ "ijikọta ndị omenkà na-arụ ọrụ n'ime ime obodo Guatemalan na ohere ịre ahịa mba ụwa, na-enye ohere inweta ego na-adịgide adịgide, ịnweta ọzụzụ azụmahịa na mmemme mmụta nke obodo, na ịnweta microloans maka nkà na ụzụ dị ka igwe ịkwa akwa na ala na-agba ọsọ." A kọrọ na netwọk Mercado Global gụnyere ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ nka 300 n'ime ndị ọrụ aka ọrụ iri atọ na otu. Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ekwu na ndị òtù ha ahụla ego ha na-enweta kwa ụbọchị na-abawanye okpukpu atọ ma e jiri ya tụnyere nkezi ụgwọ ọrụ Guatemalan.
Mercado Global nwere ọfịs na Brooklyn, NY na Panajachel, Guatemala .

41438.title: Ịchụ Isi Ndị Na-enweghị Ebe Obibi
41438.extract:
Headhunting The ọdịdị ebe obibi [1] bụ usoro ihe nkiri Britain maka BBC [2] nke John Walsh nke Walsh Bros Ltd. Usoro adọ a sochiri mmadụ ise na-onye ebe obibi ihe otu awụ ka ha na-achọ ọrụ na-onye ọrụ.  ngwá ọrụ abụọ., ndị Marks & Spencer, Pret a Manger and Wates Construction, na-agba ọsọ ọrụ Eva Hamilton MBE's [3] Business Action on Homelessness project [4] dị ka nke Business na Community .  fim nke ọrụ a bụ egwuregwu ma mebie ụzọ nke okporo ebe obibi maka ezi ihe, [5] ịgbagha echiche nke ekiri ebe obibi, na ike nke ọrụ a nwere na n'ime usoro a na-ahụ ngwaọrụ na-achọsi ike n'ime ime.  ụwa ọrụ maka ndị na- መሪ ebe obibi.  .  Usoro a sochiri The Prince of Wales 'Ịhụ bụ ikwere asụsụ wee na-asụ ụzọ ọhụrụ multimillion pound Corporate Social Ọrụ ọrụ ngo, na-agwa na-adị ọhụrụ obibia na CSR n'ihe ize ebe obibi.
Maka Carol Thatcher ọ bụ ọrụ mbụ ya n'ime afọ 20: "Egosikwara m onwe m na m nwere ike ime ya… Anya mmiri nke ngwaọrụ gbakwara m n'ihu."  Carol nwere ikike na ọhụrụ a ga-enyere ya aka ka ya na ụmụ ya ndị e le igbochi n’afọ 12 gara aga na-akpa àgwà.  Akaụntụ David Haighbrown adabaghị n'echiche efu;  ọ na-ekwu okwu nke ọma, akwụkwọ akwụkwọ ma nwee ike mkpali.  N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ọ pụta onwe ya ka ọ dị ndụ siri ike, manyere ya ịfefe n'ihe mkpofu maka nri na ihi Ụra n'ọnụ ụzọ ụlọ.  "Echetara m na m na-eche, sị, 'eke ka m mere nke a kwesịrị ịdị?'  Ọ dị ike mgbe m ji ọgwụ ike eme ihe ma ọ bụ alụ na-aba n’anya ma ọ bụ nwee ike ime mpụ ọlụ, ma lee m.”
N'ịkọwa ihe nkiri nke ya, Walsh kwuru, sị: "Akụkọ ndị a na-akpali akpali banyere adịghị ike na mgbapụta mmadụ, nyere maka oge mbụ, olu dị ùgwù nye ndị a na-anụkarị na ndị na-adịghị akọwapụta dị ka ezigbo mmadụ."

46911.title: Na Cooper
46911.extract:
Em Cooper bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na Britain.[1]  A maara ya nke ọma maka ụdị animation mmanụ a na-ese mmanụ dị iche iche yana onye isi ihe nkiri vidiyo egwu mmanụ maka The Beatles song I'm Only Sleeping wepụtara na 1st November 2022 wee mepụta ihe karịrị 1300 nke eserese mmanụ Cooper.. 
Ntuziaka ya nke vidiyo maka naanị m na-ehi ikike ya Grammy Award for Best Music Video na 66th Grammy Awards .  Na 2023 ihe nkiri ahụ ikekwara onyunyo Jury maka ihe nkiri Commissioned na Annecy International Animation Film Festival ;  [1] Kachasị mma animation na Shark Music Video Awards;  [2] Gold na Creative Circle Awards (Egwu vidiyo kacha mma).  [3] N'afọ 2018 ka ọkụra Cooper maka Emmy maka usoro ihe nkiri ya maka ihe ngosi PBS Deej.

48840.title: Donald Byrd (onye na-ede egwu)
48840.extract: Donald Byrd (amụrụ 1949) bụ onye egwu egwu ọgbara ọhụrụ nke America, mara maka isiokwu metụtara ikpe ziri ezi na ọha, yana ọkachasị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ.

53010.title: Nwaanyị A Na-akpọ Jackie
53010.extract:
Templeeti:Infobox televisionOtu nwanyị aha ya bụ Jackie bụ ministri ihe onyonyo America nke 1991 na-akọ akụkọ ndụ Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis. Ọ dabere na akwụkwọ C. David Heymann nke 1989 nke otu aha ahụ. 
E kewara miniseries ahụ n'akụkụ atọ:

Nwaanyị A Na-akpọ Jackie, Akụkụ 1: Afọ Bouvier (Ọktoba 13, 1991)
A Woman Named Jackie, Akụkụ 2: The Kennedy Years (October 14, 1991)
Nwaanyị A Na-akpọ Jackie, Akụkụ nke 3: Afọ Onassis (Ọktoba 15, 1991)

53858.title: Alfred William Bennett
53858.extract: Alfred William Bennett (24 Juun 1833 – 23 Jenụarị 1902) bụ onye ọka mmụta ihe ọkụkụ na onye nkwusa Britain. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na osisi nke Switzerland Alps, cryptogams, na ezinụlọ Polygalaceae ma ọ bụ Milkwort, yana afọ ya na ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta.

54521.title: Ana Díez
54521.extract: Ana Diez (amuru 1957) bu onye ndu Spain na onye ode akwukwo, onye amuru na Tudela, Navarre. Ọ nọrọ oge na Mexico, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya na sinima. Otu n'ime ihe nkiri a ma ama bụ Ander eta Yul, nke dị n'asụsụ Basque. Akpọrọ ya aha "onye isi nwanyị mbụ na New Basque Cinema." [1] Ọ natara onyinye nturu ugo Goya maka onye isi ọhụụ kacha mma maka ihe nkiri ahụ..

3998.title: Àlà
3998.extract:
Àlà (ọdịmara: ) bu uwa ba anyi gbụrụ-gbúrụ. O bu na ala n'eligwe. Uwa di ukwu, Ala (nke a makwaara dị ka Ani, Ana, Ale, na Ali n'asụsụ Igbo dị iche iche) bụ nwanyị Alusi (chi) nke ụwa, omume ọma, ọmụmụ, na ihe okike n'Odinani. Na Odinani, Ala na-achị ụwa ma na-ejide ndị nna nna nwụrụ anwụ n'afọ ya. Aha ya pụtara n'ụzọ nkịtị ka ọ bụrụ "Land" n'asụsụ Igbo, na-egosi ike o nwere n'ụwa na ọnọdụ ya dị ka ala n'onwe ya. A na-ewere Ala dịka Alusi kachasị elu na éké (pantheon) . Di Ala bu Amadioha, chi igwe.
Dị ka chi ezi omume, Ala na-etinye aka n’ikpe omume mmadụ ma na-ahụ maka iwu na omenala Igbo nke a maara dị ka omenala. Mpụ na mpụ dị n'etiti obodo Igbo nke megidere ụkpụrụ Ala ka a na-akpọ nsasị Ala, ala niile ka a na-ewere dịka ala dị nsọ dịka Ala n'onwe ya. Site na ọmụmụ mmadụ, Ala na-akwụ ụgwọ maka mmepụta nke ala. Onye ozi Ala na onye dị ndụ n'ụwa bụ python (Igbo: éké), bụ nke a na-asọpụrụ karịsịa n'ọtụtụ obodo Igbo. Na nka, Ala na-anọchi anya ya dị ka onye na-achị eze nọ ọdụ n'ocheeze, ndị ezinụlọ ya gbara ya gburugburu. N'oge gara aga, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị dị otú ahụ na-ewere ụdị ihe oyiyi apịtị dị ka ndụ n'ụlọ arụsị pụrụ iche nke a raara nye chi na nke a maara dị ka mbari.
A na-ekwu na ọ bụrụ na mmadụ emee ihe ọjọọ n'obodo, na ha emerụla ma ọ bụ kparị Ala dịka ihe arụ (a na-akpọ ajọ njọ ma ọ bụ Aru Ala, Alu Ani) mere n'ụwa ya.Ala na-ahụ maka ọtụtụ akụkụ. Ọha Igbo na nlekọta ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka n'ozuzu.A na-egosikarị ya ka o ji nwatakịrị n'aka na akara ya bụ ọnwa na-agbapụta. ịsọpụrụ Ala dịka onye ọ bụla bi n'elu ala, ụwa. Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-eche na Ala nwere ike ilo mmadụ n'ime ala.A ka na-efe Ala nke ndị Igbo nke Nigeria na-asọpụrụ kwa afọ n'oge ememe ji.

6965.title: Okubo Toshimichi
6965.extract: Okubo Toshimichi  (Önwa ilo mmụọ 26, 1830 — Önwa anọ 14, 1878), bu onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.

13253.title: Equal Citizens
13253.extract:
Ụmụ amaala nhata bụ otu ndị America anaghị akwụ ụgwọ, ndị na-abụghị ndị otu nke "raara onwe ha nye mgbanwe ndị ga-eme ka ụmụ amaala nwee nha anya". Ọ bụ onye prọfesọ Iwu Harvard Lawrence Lessig hiwere ya na ngwụcha 2016 ka ọ gaa n'ihu na mbọ iji weta usoro mgbanwe ọ tụpụtara n'oge mkpọsa onye isi ala 2016 ya. N'ụzọ doro anya, dị ka mkpọsa mmalite ya, otu ahụ malitere "Electors Trust" ozugbo ntuli aka izugbe nke 2016 gasịrị. Ha mere nke a iji nye onye ọ bụla nhọpụta nke chọrọ ịtụ vootu akọnuche ha nkwado iwu n'efu na nzuzo. Na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, dị ka Hamilton Electors na celebrities, mgbasa ozi mere ka ọnụ ọgụgụ kasịnụ nke "na-ekwesị ntụkwasị obi" votu ntuli aka mgbe a tụrụ na otu president ntuli aka.
Ụmụ amaala nhata etinyela aka na ikpe ikpe ndị ọzọ dị elu dị elu n'ofe US na isiokwu sitere na ịgbanwe usoro ego mgbasa ozi na ịgba akwụkwọ iji kwụsị super PACs, na-emezi usoro nhoputa ndi ochichi na ikpe nke na-ama onye mmeri-weta-niile usoro nke Electoral. Kọleji, iji gbasaa ohere ịtụ vootu site na ozi nye ndị na-eto eto
Ka ọ na-erule 2021, Equal Citizens bụ onye mmekọ na Nkwupụta maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke America na-akwado maka ngafe nke For the People Act, John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act, na DC Statehood.
Ụmụ amaala nhata na-akwadokwa pọdkastị Ụzọ Ọzọ, nke Lawrence Lessig kwadoro. Pọdkastị ahụ bụ akụkụ nke otu onye kwuo uche ya, netwọk pọdkastị ahaziri yana kwado ya site na McCourtney Institute for Democracy na Penn State.

13445.title: National Museum of Poland
13445.extract: "National Museum of Poland" bụ aha a na-akpọkarị ọtụtụ n'ime ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie kachasị ukwuu na nke a ma ama na mba ahụ.  Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka nke Poland nwere ọtụtụ alaka nwere onwe ha, nke ọ bụla na-arụ ọrụ ọtụtụ obere ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie.  Isi alaka bụ National Museum na Kraków (Polish: ), nke e guzobere n'afọ 1879 na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke nwere ọtụtụ narị puku ihe - nke e debere na nnukwu akụkụ na Main Building (n'akụkụ 3 Maja St.), kamakwa na asatọ nke ngalaba ya gburugburu obodo ahụ.

13484.title: Deborah Owusu-Bonsu
13484.extract: Deborah Owusu-Bonsu (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1984) nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya dị ka Sister Derby bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn nke Ghana, onye egwu na onye nlereanya nke Akan na onye na-eme ihe ngosi na e.tv Ghana.[1]

16854.title: Meron Getnet
16854.extract: Meron Getnet bụ onye Etiopia na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye nta akụkọ na onye na-ede uri. A maara ya maka nkatọ ya megide nguzo gọọmentị n'oge ọchịchị Meles Zenawi. Onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ngosi na TV na Ethiopia, a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Meaza Ashenafi na ihe nkiri Difret.

20768.title: Hendo
20768.extract:
Okwu "Hendo" nwere ike ịrụ aka na ihe ndị a:

Aha njirimara nke ndị mmadụ dị iche iche, nwere aha nna "Henderson", gụnyere ndị a:
Dan Henderson (amụrụ n'afọ 1970), onye America na-eme egwuregwu ọgụ, na onye na-agba mgba Olympic
Dean Henderson (amụrụ n'afọ 1997), onye England na-edebe goolu bọọlụ
Jordan Henderson (amụrụ n'afọ 1990), onye bọọlụ bọọlụ England
Otu oriri bachelorette na UK, Irish, & Canadian vernacular, a.k.a. "Ndị Henry na-eme"
Asụsụ Hendo, asụsụ Bantu nke sitere na mpaghara Dekese na Democratic Republic of the Congo
Hendo Hover, ụlọ ọrụ hoverboard nke America

20970.title: Somrai language
20970.extract: Somrai (Sumrey), nkè á makwaara dị kà Sibine (Shibne), bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic nkè á na-asụ ná mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Chadian nkè Tandjilé ná Lai. Ndị na-asụ mà ọ bụ Somrai abụghị asụsụ abụọ; asụsụ ahụ anaghị aghọta ibé yá nà onye ọ bụla ọzọ, ébé ọ bụ ná ọdịdị ókwú yá kachasị élú ná asụsụ ọzọ bụ ná Ndam (42%). Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-ekwu ókwú, ndị na-akpọ onwé há Shibne mà ọ bụ Sibine, na-emekarị okpukpe ọdịnala, Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, mà ọ bụ Islam.

27692.title: Besnat Jere
27692.extract:
Besnat Hellen Mayase Jere (4 Mee 1952 - 7 June 2020) bụby onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Obodo Zambia. O jere ozi dịka onye otu National Assembly maka Luangeni site n’afo 2002 ruo 2006. 
Ọ bụ adaeze ya na onye otu Ngoni Royal Establishment ebe ọ bụ nwa nwa nwaanyi nke HRH Nkosi (King) Nzamane II. Nkosi Nzamane nke Abụọ bụ nwanne nwoke nke HRH Paramount Eze ndi Eze Mpezeni nke Abụọ nke ndị Ngoni nke mpaghara odida anyanwu.

30688.title: Abdullahi Bayero
30688.extract: Abdullahi Bayero CBE CMG dan Muhammad Abbas (1881–1953) bụ Sarki (Emir) nke Kano, nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ dị na Kano, Kano State, Nigeria site na 1926 ruo 1953. Dịka eze ọdịnala o nwere ikike dị ukwuu n'okpuru ọchịchị Briten.

37134.title: Detty December (Nigeria)
37134.extract:
.Detty December na-ezo aka n'oge mmemme na njedebe nke afọ na Nigeria, na-emekarị site na etiti December ruo n'afọ ọhụrụ.  [1] Ọ bụ oge emume dị egwu, n'ọnụ ọnwụ, nri oriri na mmeri, na mmemme ndị e ji ike dị elu, obi ụtọ na nchekwube mara.  [2] [1] [3] Ọ bụ oge ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria, ma ndị n'ime obodo ma ndị bi na mba ọzọ, na-alọta n'iche iji soro ndị enyi mee emume.
. Isi okwu a edoghị anya.  Ụfọdụ ndị kwuru na emume a pụtara mgbe emume Calabar nke afọ 2004 dị na ndị na ndị na-eme ntọala Naijiria, [1] nke a kokarin "Africa's big street party" site n'aka Ben Ayade, onye bụbu ikike Cross Rivers State .  Dị ka akwụkwọ Nigeria BellaNaija na The Guardian (Nigeria) si kwuo, okwu a bụ onye na-agụ akwụkwọ Naijiria bụ Mr. Eazi chepụtara ma na-ewu ewu, bụ onye ji ya dị ka hashtag maka egwu ya na Lagos na 2016  [1] [2] [3] Mazị Eazi gakwara n'ihu n'ichekwa okwu ahụ.
. Ọ bụ ebe na Detty December na-akpata ya na obodo ndị ahụ, ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-azụ nwud na-ichere a gaa n'ime ime obodo ha.  [1] Ndị Igbo na-akpọ nke a Nbịarute ma ọ bụ ịlota ụlọ (iche obibi/njem njem), mgbe ezi ndị enyi na ezina ndị na-esi mba ọzọ na obodo na-aga kpọmkwem n'ime ime obodo ha iji mee mmemme na  mmemme ndị ọzọ.  [2] Otú ọ dị, ọ dị mkpa iji pụta ìhè na Detty December bụ isi na-achọ anya na Agha obodo mepere emepe nke ndị Naijiria na-ahụ maka mmemme, dị iche na ọnọdụ dị na mpaghara ọmụmụ nke Nigeria, ebe ọtụtụ ugboro na Nigeria.  ndị Igbo na-emekarị na-ahapụ ọtụtụ obodo mepere emepe n'ime December.  .  Kama nke ahụ, ha na-enye n'ime ime obodo ha maka mmemme dị ka nzụkọ na mmemme ndị ọzọ n'ime ime obodo, na-eme ka ihe dị iche ama n'ọtụtụ obodo dị n'ebe ọmụmụ, n  'dị ka ndị obodo gbadoro anya nke a mara Detty December.  Lagos, obodo nwere ihe mere eme nke Owambe na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa na-emepe mmalite (ịbụ ebe obibi nke egwu egwu zuru ụwa ọnụ Afrobeats ) na-ewere ihu Detty December.
N'ime kalenda ọha na eze a dị mfe, ọtụtụ ihe omume dị iche na-ewere ọnọdụ, sitere na n'ọnụ oriri na-eme nke ụlọ, ihe oriri n'okporo ụzọ ámá, ebe àmà osimiri ruo ihe nkiri, akara, nrịanrịa ngosi.  oriri na mmeri, na ndị ọzọ.  [1] N'ime ndị a, ihe nkiri December ngosi dị ka otu n'ime ihe omume dị mkpa, na- amịnye ndị na-ese egwu na òtù dị iche iche kwado ihe ngosi n'oge a.  N'ụzọ dị mfe ama, egwu egvu na-agwụcha apụta ndị nne nanị maka ụlọ egwu ama;  Azụmahịa dị iche iche, mpaghara steeti na mpaghara ngalaba etiti na-echekwa egwu egwu.  [2] Omume a na-ebute nnukwu ego maka ndị na-ese ihe na Naijiria, dịka oke Super Bowl, dị ka ụdị Afrobeats Davido si kwuo.  [3] [2] Ọzọkwa, nbata nke ndị Nigeria si mba ọzọ na-alọta n'ibu n'ime December na-akpalite ime , n'usoro dabara adaba na ndị enyi na maka ememe Krismas.  [2] Agbam akwụkwọ ndị a na-ụbọchị dum, na-ejedebe na oriri oriri na-eme na-ekpo ọkụ

38713.title: Hannatu Musawa
38713.extract: Hannatu Musa Musawa (amuru na Nọvemba 1, 1974) bu onye okaiwu Naijiria, onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, na odee, ugbua onye minista nka, omenala na akụ na ụba okike na Nigeria .  O sitere na steeti Katsina nke dị na ugwu Naijiria wee si na agbụrụ Hausa-Fulani .

38726.title: Nkoyo Toyo
38726.extract: Nkoyo Esu Toyo (amuru Nọvemba 5, 1958) bu onye oka iwu, onye na-akwado na onye uzo esi.  [1] Ọ jere ozi dịka onye otu ụlọ omebe iwu Naijiria, [2] na onye isi anya Etiopia na Djibouti.  11 Tupu ịdọrọ ndịiche, ọ akara Gender and Development Action (GADA), otu iji kwalite ọhọrọ nhọrọ na ụzọ na-alụ ọgụ ọgụ maka ụmụ nwoke na Nigeria.  [3] Nkoyo Toyo bụ ihe n'ihe metụtara ma sonye n'otu dị iche iche na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụnwanyị zuru ụwa ọnụ, [4] ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị kpọbatara mmemme "Tousand Thousand Women's March" na Abuja  , nke òtù Women4Women (W4W) He4She na-hazi iji lebara okwu ndị isi ike ahụ anya.  ụmụ

38892.title: MiR-206
38892.extract:
MiR-206 bụ microRNA nwere usoro echekwara n'ọtụtụ ụdị anụmanụ na-enye nwa ara, na ụmụ mmadụ bụ onye otu ezinụlọ myo-miR nke miRNAs, nke gụnyere miR-1, miR-133, na miR-208a / b. Mir-206 guzobere nke ọma maka ịchịkwa usoro mkpụrụ ndụ nke metụtara mmepe nke ọkpụkpụ, yana ọrụ mitochondrial.  na-amụ miR-206 na mkpụrụ ndụ C2C12 myoblast n'ihi na nke a bụ ihe nlereanya a na-ejikarị eme ihe maka ọmụmụ nke Ọdịiche nke mkpụrụ ndụ nke uru ọkpụkpụ. Biogenesis nke miR- pụrụ iche n'ihi na a na-emepụta transcript mbụ tozuru etozu site na ogwe aka 3p nke microRNA hairpin karịa ogwe aka 5p. Ka ọ dị ugbu a, miR-206 nwere ihe dịka ndị otu ezinụlọ miRNA iri na abụọ (nke isii n'ime ha gosipụtara na Tebụl 1), a na-echekwa usoro mkpụrụ osisi (nucleotides 2-8) nke ezinụlọ miR-206.
bụ ezie na a na-achịkwa miR-206 nke ọma n'oge mmepe embryonic nke uru ọkpụkpụ, miR-206, na-achịkwakwa site na onye na-anabata homonụ steroid nuklia 17β-estradiol. Ihe akaebe ọzọ na-akwado ọrụ nke miR-206 na tumorigenesis sitere na ọmụmụ ihe na-egosi na miR-206, gosipụtara nke ọma na akpụ ara atọ na-adịghị mma nke na-etolite na-enweghị 17β-estradiol ma e jiri ya tụnyere estrogen-receptor positive (ERα +), 17β-estadiol sensitive breast cancer cells. miR-206 bụkwa ihe -egosi ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ala nke ndị na-adị ndụ n'ozuzu ha na ndị ọrịa kansa ara.Bụ ezie na miR-206 nwere ọrụ akọwapụtara nke ọma na etiology nke akpụ ara, e gosipụtara miR-206, n'oge na-adịbeghị anya iji chịkwaa ọganihu mesothelioma site na nhazi nke ụzọ mgbaàmà Ras. Nnyocha ndị a na-agbakwunye na akwụkwọ na-arịwanye elu na-egosi otú obere RNAs na-achịkwa na-ejigide usoro mkpụrụ ndụ nkịtị nke na-egbochi usoro tumorigenic. Ọtụtụ akara mkpụrụ ndụ eji akọwa ọrụ nke miR-206 na ọrịa kansa ara gụnyere MCF-7, MDA-MB-231, na akara mkpụrụ ndụ MDA- MB-468.
Enwere ike ịchọta Otu nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) na usoro mkpụrụ miRNA, ya mere amaara na ọ nwere nsonaazụ ọrụ. Otu 'ime mmetụta ndị dị otú ahụ bụ mgbanwe njikọ nke miRNA na mRNA jikọtara ya dabere na mgbanwe nke otu nucleotide nke mpaghara mkpụrụ miRNA. N'ezie, ọtụtụ ọmụmụ egosiwo na usoro mkpụrụ nke miRNA abụghị naanị ihe a kapịrị ọnụ na mmekọrịta miRNA:mRNA, dịka mgbanwe nke ihe ndị fọdụrụ na mpụga mpaghara mkpụrụ nwekwara ike ịgbanwe ịdị irè a. Nchịkwa miR-206 nke ERα site na njikọ kpọmkwem nke miR-202 na ERα 3' UTR, bụ ezigbo ihe atụ nke otu SNPs nwere ike isi metụta mmekọrịta miRNA:mRNA.
Chọpụtala ọtụtụ modulu nchịkwa miR-206 ndị ọzọ, dị ka lncRNA HOTAIR na-achịkwa Bcl-w site na sequestration nke miR-206, nke na-eme ka mmụba nke mkpụrụ ndụ na mkpụrụ ndụ kansa ara. Nnyocha a na-egosi na miR-206 nwere ike imekọrịta ihe na RNA ndị ọzọ na-abụghị koodu iji chịkwaa usoro dịgasị iche iche nke tumorigenic n'ọtụtụ usoro kansa. Iji kw nke a, SNHG14 nwekwara ike sponge miR-206 si otú a gbanwee ụbara nke YWHAZ na ọrịa kansa akpa nwa. N'ozuzu, ọmụmụ ihe ndị a na ọtụtụ ọmụmụ a na-edeghị ebe a n'ihi oke ohere, na-egosi n'ụzọ doro anya ikike ọgwụgwọ nke miRNA dịka miR-206 na ọnọdụ oncological.
N'èzí ngalaba nke ihe ndị dị ndụ, miR-206 nwere mmasị na ahụike n'ihi nchọpụta na-aga n'ihu nke miRNA a na nlele sitere na ndị nwere ụdị ọrịa shuga 2 (TIID) na ọrịa imeju na-abụghị mmanya (NAFLD). N'ime ọmụmụ ụfọdụ, nnyefe ọgwụgwọ nke miR-206 na ụdị òké buru ibu na-eri nri mere ka mmepụta abụba na glucose belata n'ime imeju. Ikike nke miR-206 iji mee  mgbaàmà insulin dị mfe na gbanwee lipogenesis na-egosi na miR-202 nwere ike ịbụ ọgwụgwọ ọhụrụ maka ndị nwere hyperglycemia. 'oge na-adịbeghị anya, a chọpụtakwala Mir-206 dị ka ihe na-egosi ọrịa ụfọdụ na-emetụta akụkụ ahụ, ebe ọkwa miR-206 na-agbasa na preeclampsia.

40614.title: Ụlọ Lady Anne
40614.extract:
Lady Anne House bụ ụlọ nkwari akụ mbụ, na York, na England
Ọ bụ Ann Middleton ntọala ntọala almshouse na 1659, na saịtị dị na Skeldergate, na mpaghara Bishophill nke York.  Amara dị ka ụlọ ọgwụ Middleton, ọ nwere ụlọ iri abụọ na abụọ n'iche mbara ala, ebe obibi ụmụ iri abụọ   
 N'afọ 1827, a kwaturu ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ, ma wughachi ya azụ site n'okporo ụzọ ámá, dị ka ihe owuwu brik nwere okpukpu abụọ.  Ọ bụ Peter Atkinson mere ya, ma dechaa ya na 1829. Mgbidi akwụkwọ ahụ nhakwara n'oge a.  N'etiti n'ihu bụ ihe oyiyi nke na uwe Puritan, nke a አካላዊ na ọ ga-adị ndụ site na ụlọ mbụ.

N'afọ 1939, e mere ka ụlọ ahụ dị ọhụrụ, ka e nwee ndị mmadụ iri na onye na-elekọta ụlọ;  [1] Otú ọ dị, ka ọ na-erule 1972, ụlọ ahụ n'aka nrụzi aka mma.  nwe ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ ụlọ ya na 56 Skeldergate, bụ ndị we Ndị LED ya, ma tinye ya na họtel ha, nke a na-akpọ Middletons Hotel ugbu a.  [2] n'afọ 1997, ọ llaa ɔkwa II * ezinụlọ ụlọ

41796.title: Ogige Mixed
41796.extract:
Mix Camp (nakwa: Berghoff akwụkwọ ) [1] bụ asụsụ oge na mpaghara Brakwater ka ukwuu na etiti Namibia .  Ọ dị kilomita 20 (12 mi) n'ebe ugwu nke isi obodo Windhoek na n'afọ 2007 bụ ihe ruru mmadụ 3,000.  [2] Site na 2021 ọ toro ruo 1,454.  [3] Ngwakọta nke bụ nke Windhoek Rural mbụ aka
Akpọrọ Mix aha German Heiner Mix onye kwere ka ndị mmadụ biri na ala 50 hectare (120 acres) ya na 1980s.  Mgbe Mix 'nwụsịrị na 1999 na akwụkwọ mushroomed n'ihi na ọ dịghị onye nwe ụlọ.  N'afọ 2006, ogologo oge agha na ndị soja-egosi mgbe otu ụlọ ọrụ nke ụlọ nke Namibia Cabinet Frans Kapofi nwere ndị rinra ala ahụ ma gosi ka ndị bi na ya mfe.  Ngwakọta ndị bi n'aka nke ha na-anụ ka ha kwapụ ala ahụ
Na Nọvemba 2010, izu abụọ tupu pre aka mpaghara, ike ala ma kwe nkwa mpaghara ahụ.  [1] Narị afọ 2020, e mere ka ọha na eze mara akwụkwọ ikike na izi ahụ.  Otu n'ime ihe ndị a na-eme nri imeziwanye ihe bụ inye mmiri na idebe ihe ọcha na iguzobe ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii.

44426.title: Usoro ọmụmụ nwanyị
44426.extract:
Usoro ahu nwa nwanyi nke gunyere internal na external sex organ nke eji amu nwa . Ahu omumu NWA nwaanyi anaghi aka n'omumu mana ona edoxi ofuma na puberty ka onwe Ike itu ime.. Akụkụ ọmụmụ nwanyị na-agụnye akụkụ ahụ nwanyị, akpa nwa, na tubes fallopian ma nwee ike ibute ọrịa. Mmekọahụ nwanyị na-enye ohere maka mmekọahụ na ịmụ nwa, ma jikọta ya na akpa nwa na cervix. Uterus ma ọ bụ akpa nwa na-anabata nwa e bu n'afọ, nke na-etolite n'ime nwa e bu. Uterus na-emepụta ihe ndị na-esi n'akpa nwa apụta, nke na-enyere aka na mbufe nke sperm gaa na tubes fallopian, ebe sperm na-eme ka àkwá (Mkpụrụ ndụ àkwá) nke ovaries mepụtara. A makwaara akụkụ ahụ nwoke na nwanyị ndị dị n'èzí dị ka akụkụ ahụ nwanyị na ndị a bụ akụkụ ahụ nwanyị nke akụkụ ahụ nwanyị gụnyere egbugbere ọnụ, clitoris, na oghere akụkụ ahụ nwanyị.
N'oge Oge ịhụ nsọ, ovaries na-ewepụta àkwá, nke na-agafe tube fallopian n'ime akpa nwa. Ọ bụrụ na mkpụrụ ndụ àkwá zutere sperm n'ụzọ ọ na-aga n'akpa nwa, otu mkpụrụ ndụ sperm nwere ike ịbanye ma jikọta ya, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ zygote.
Ime ka nwa na-eme na tubes fallopian ma na-egosi mmalite nke embryogenesis. Mgbe ahụ, zygote ga-nkewa n'ime ọgbọ zuru ezu nke mkpụrụ ndụ iji mepụta blastocyst, nke na-etinye onwe ya na mgbidi nke akpa nwa. Nke a na-amalite ime ime na embryo ga-anọgide na-etolite ruo mgbe ọ ga-eto. Mgbe nwa e bu n'afọ etolitela nke ọma iji dịrị ndụ n'èzí akpa nwa, cervix na-agbasa ma na-agbatị akpa nwa na-ebugharị nwa ọhụrụ site na ọwara ọmụmụ (ahụ nwanyị).
Akpụkpọ ahụ nwere akụkụ niile dị n'èzí na anụ ahụ ma gụnyere ihe ndị a: 

Clitoris: akụkụ dị n'elu akụkụ ahụ nwanyị. Ọ na-agụnye ahụ na glans ya dị ka pea nke clitoral hood na-echebe. corpora cavernosa bụ anụ ahụ nke clitoris nke na-enyere aka n'ịdị elu site na ijupụta ọbara n'oge mmekọahụ.
Labia: ụdị akpụkpọ ahụ abụọ kwụ ọtọ a na-akpọ labia majora (nnukwu na nnukwu mpụga mpụga nke na-echebe akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke vulva) na labia minora (obere na obere mpụga dị n'ime nke na-echekwa vestibule pụọ na akpọnwụ, ọrịa na iwe).
Mons pubis: nnukwu abụba ebe ntutu pubic na-eto.
Vulval vestibule: ebe dị ka almond n'etiti egbugbere ọnụ nke nwere oghere.
Urinary meatus: oghere nke urethra maka mamịrị ịgafe.
Oghere nke akụkụ ahụ nwanyị: ọnụ ụzọ mbata nke akụkụ ahụ nwoke.
Hymen: anụ ahụ na-ejikọta nke na-ekpuchi oghere nke akụkụ ahụ nwanyị.
Vestibular glands / feminin accessory glands: abụọ abụọ abụọ nke glands na vulval vestibule a maara dị ka Bartholin's glands, nke na-emepụta mmiri na-agba agba maka lubrication nke akụkụ ahụ nwanyị, na glands nke Skene maka ejaculation nke mmiri yana maka lubricating meatus.

46625.title: Nnyocha glucose mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
46625.extract:
Postprandial glucose (PPG) bu nnyocha glucose di no obara nke na achoputa glucose ole di na obara ma mmadu richaa nri. Ihe eji enyocha ya bu postprandial hyperglycemia n'ihi enweghi ezigbo Ihe eji ekwu na ya na nnochoputa nke diabetes bu otu.]
American Diabetes Association anaghị atụ aro nyocha PPG maka ịchọpụta ọrịa shuga,  mana ọ na-ekwu na hyperglycemia postprandial na-enye aka n'ịdị elu nke hemoglobin glycated (ihe bụ isi na-eme ka ọrịa shuga) ma na-atụ aro nnwale na njikwa nke ọkwa PPG maka ndị ọrịa na-echekwa ọkwa glucose kacha mma n'ọbara tupu nri ma nwee ọkwa A1C dị elu. 
Carbohydrates n'ụdị glucose bụ otu n'ime isi ihe ndị mejupụtara nri, na ịmịkọrọ na-amalite n'ime ihe dị ka nkeji iri. Ọnụ ọgụgụ na-esote nke ịmịkọrọ carbohydrates na njikọ ya na ọnụego nke Insulin na glucagon na-emetụta profaịlụ PPG.[1]
N'ime ndị na-abụghị ndị na-arịa ọrịa shuga, ọkwa na-arị elu n'ihe dị ka otu awa mgbe nri bidoro, ọ naghị agafe 140 mg / dl, ma laghachi na ọkwa preprandial n'ime awa 2-3.  A na-agbanwe oge ndị a nke ukwuu na ndị ọrịa shuga.[1]
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị, a na-atụle ọkwa PPG ihe dị ka awa 2 mgbe nri malitere, nke kwekọrọ na oge nke ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu dị, ma ọ bụrụ na ndị ọrịa shuga. 
N'afọ 2011, International Diabetes Federation kwuru na ọkwa PPG dị elu bụ ihe ize ndụ dị iche maka Ọrịa macrovascular; nke a enweela ihe ịma aka na ihe ndị gara aga nakwa na PPG nwere ike ịbụ naanị akara ma ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya usoro dị mgbagwoju anya nke ihe omume metabolic na-eme na oge postprandial, nke gosipụtara nke ọma site na parameters ndị ọzọ. Nnyocha zuru ezu nke 2001 nke American Diabetes Association kwuru na mbụ na njikọ nke ụkpụrụ PPG na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke ọrịa shuga na-abụkarị nke a na-amụchaghị nke ọma ma dịgasị iche iche, ebe a gosipụtara nsogbu ndị metụtara ọrịa shuga na ọtụtụ ụkpụrụ PPG, nke a ga-akọwa n'onwe ya; 2018 Standards of Medical Care in Diabetes na-agbaso otu isiokwu ahụ. Nnyocha 2019 na Obesity Reviews yiri ya ma kwuo data na-enweghị nkwubi okwu banyere mkpa PPG dị ka ihe dị iche na nchọpụta na njikwa ọrịa shuga; ọ gara n'ihu na-atụ aro hyperglycemia-diabetes-CVD na-aga n'ihu ma katọọ enweghị nhazi siri ike nke ule PPG. 
Ọrụ ntụaka atụwo aro ọkwa glucose kachasị elu nke 140 mg / dl maka onye ọ bụla toro eto na-erubeghị afọ 50, ka ọ na-ebuli ya ruo 150 mg / dl na 160 mg / dl sambu na ndị ọrịa dị n'agbata afọ 50 na 60 na ihe karịrị afọ iri isii, n'otu n'otu.

46715.title: Obi Ụtọ Labinjo
46715.extract:
Joy Labinjo bụ onye omenkà Britain-Nigeria nke dabere na London, England.  Amụrụ na 1994,  amaara ya maka nnukwu eserese ya mara mma nwere echiche gbawara agbawa nke na-enweta mmụọ nsọ site na nchịkọta foto ezinụlọ ochie ya, foto na ebe nchekwa akụkọ ihe mere eme.  Ihe osise ya na-enyochakarị isiokwu nke ọdịbendị, njirimara, agbụrụ na ihe ọ bụ site na ngosipụta ya nke ndị isi ojii na ezinaụlọ n'ọnọdụ kwa ụbọchị ma na-esite na ahụmịhe ya na-etolite dị ka nwanyị Britain-Nigeria na UK   
Labinjo nwetara BFA ya na Mahadum Newcastle na 2017 wee nata Woon Art Prize  otu afọ nke mere ka Tiwani Contemporary nọchitere ya.   Na 2020, ọ malitere MFA ya na Mahadum Oxford na ebe obibi na Breeder Gallery na Athens, Greece. 
N'afọ 2021, e nyere Labinjo ọrụ imepụta mpempe maka Art na ala ala . Site na Nọvemba nke otu afọ, Brixton Underground ọdụ gosipụtara ibe ya 5 nkeji ọzọ .

12214.title: Joan Hambidge
12214.extract: Joan Helene Hambidge (amụrụ ya na 11 Septemba 1956 na Aliwal North, South Afriika) (aha nna bekee n'agbanyeghị), bụ onye na-ede uri Afrikaans, onye na-agụ akwụkwọ na agụmakwụkwọ. Ọ bụ onye na-ede uri na Afrịka, na-arụrịta ụka dị ka onye ọha na eze na nkatọ na ama ama maka ụdị edemede ya na-apụ apụ . Enyemaka usoro mmụta ya na-emetụta Roland Barthes, mwepu, postmodernism, psychoanalysis na metaphysics .

13086.title: Outline of rights
13086.extract:
Enyere nkọwa na-esonụ dị ka nkọwa zuru ezu na mmeghe maka ikike:
- Ụkpụrụ ikike, nke a na-akọwa dị iche iche dị ka nnwere onwe iwu, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ma ọ bụ nnwere onwe omume ma ọ bụ ikike.

13773.title: Divine Ndhlukula
13773.extract: Dr Divine Ndhlukula bụ nwanyị Zimbabwe na-azụ ahịa, onye guzobere na onye isi nchịkwa nke DDNS Security Operations (Pvt) Ltd nke bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide SECURICO Security Services. Dr Ndhlukula bụkwa onye isi oche nke ZNCC Women's Desk.

15554.title: Rachid Ksentini
15554.extract:
'Mkpúrù èdè íke'
 
Rachid Ksentini (November 11, 1887 August 4, 1944) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị.

16239.title: Barikisu Tettey-Quao
16239.extract: Barikisu Tettey-Quao (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke gbara dịka onye na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na afọ 1999 FIFA Women's World Cup. Na klọb ọ na-egwuri egwu bụ La Ladies na Ghana.

20912.title: Somyev language
20912.extract: Somyev (Somyewe), nke a makwaara dị ka Kila ("onye na-agba oji" na Fulfulde), bụ asụsụ Mambiloid nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara ịla n'iyi nke obodo abụọ, otu na Nigeria na otu na Cameroon, nke otu ndị na-eji oji bi n'etiti Mambila na-asụ. Ọ bụ ezie na a ka na-eji asụsụ ahụ eme ihe maka nkwurịta okwu kwa ụbọchị, a mụrụ ọgbọ kasị nta nke ndị ọkà okwu n'afọ 1950. Mbufe nke asụsụ ahụ kwụsịrị mgbe ọrụ nke ndị na-agba oji tụfuru ọnọdụ ọha mmadụ, otu akụkụ n'ihi mbubata ngwá ọrụ mba ọzọ.

22468.title: Ghanaian smock
22468.extract:
Uwe Ghana bụ uwe elu dị larịị nke yiri dashiki, nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke na-eyi na Ghana. Ọ bụ ejiji ọdịnala kachasị ewu ewu na Ghana. A na-akpọ uwe ahụ Bingmaa n'asụsụ Dagbani, Bun-nwá ma ọ bụ Bana site na Mamprusis, fugu na Mosi, batakari na mpaghara ndịda, dansika na Frafra, na Banaa na Kusaal ma na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ. Ndị eze na ndị nkịtị na-eyi ya gafee Dagbon na mpaghara ndị ọzọ dị n'ebe ugwu, mana ọ na-ewu ewu na Ghana. Uwe ahụ malitere na mpaghara ugwu nke Ghana mana a na-ejikarị ya eme ihe na West Africa na ndị diasporans gafee ụwa. Uwe ahụ adịghị iche na uwe mba nke Burkina Faso nke a maara dị ka faso dan fadi.
Uwe uwe na akwa Kente bụ uwe mba Ghana. Kente akwa malitere na mpaghara ndịda Ghana.
Emere smock ahụ bụ ibe ndị nwere aka na-ewu ewu nke a na-akpọ Strip Cloths. A na-eji ngwakọta owu na-esiji na nke a na-esijighị eteji mee ha, ha sikwa n'ebe ugwu Ghana na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke West Africa. A na-eji aka ma ọ bụ igwe dụkọta ibe ndị ahụ ọnụ na-eme ka smock ahụ dị ka plaid. Ọtụtụ smocks nwere akwa akwa n'olu. A na-eji okpu kufi na-eyi smock. Agbanyeghị, ndị isi na Ghana na-eji okpu fez na-acha uhie uhie na-eyi smock.

22988.title: Yoliswa Yako
22988.extract: Yoliswa Nomampondomise Yako (amụrụ na 22 Machị 1983) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa si Eastern Cape onye na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly of South Africa . Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu na 3 Septemba 2018. Yako bụbu onye ndụmọdụ PR nke Nelson Mandela Bay Metropolitan Municipality na onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Akụkọ Ọha Obodo (MPAC). Yako bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters.

23431.title: Nigerian Women Football League
23431.extract: NWFL Premiership (nke bụbu Nigeria Women Premier League) bụ asọmpi kachasị elu maka egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na Naịjịria. Ọ bụ ihe yiri ụmụ nwanyị nke egwuregwu ụmụ nwoke, Nigeria Professional Football League (NPFL). Njikọ bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Nigeria (NWFL) na-ahazi Njikọ Premier nke ụmụ nwanyị nke Naịjirịa na Njikọ Pro-league. N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2017, a họpụtara Aisha Falode ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ league, a họpụtakwara ya na Jẹnụwarị 2017.

24744.title: Ghani Animofoshe
24744.extract: Ayotunde Ganiyu Anifowoshe (amụrụ ya na 3 Febụwarị 1985 na Niamey) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ndị otu Kwara United F.C.

33482.title: Sodium stearate
33482.extract: Sodium stearate (IUPAC: Sodium Octadecanoate) o bu sodium salt nke stearic acid. Ana ahu ya nu di obula nke solid deodorant, rubber, latex plants na inks. obukwa mpara nke ufodu nri additive na food flavor.

35209.title: Thomas Henderson (onye na-enyocha mbara igwe)
35209.extract: Thomas Henderson - cx-link" data-linkid="61" href="./Fellow_of_the_Royal_Society_of_Edinburgh" id="mwDg" rel="mw:WikiLink" title="Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh">FRS FRS FRAS (28 Disemba 1798 - 23 Nọvemba 1844) bụ onye na-enyocha mbara igwe na onye na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ nke a maara maka ịbụ onye mbụ na-atụle anya Alpha Centauri, akụkụ dị mkpa nke usoro kpakpando kacha nso n'ụwa, onye mbụ na'ịchọpụta parallax nke kpakpando kwụ ọtọ, yana ịbụ onye mbụ Royal Astronomer maka Scotland.

36720.title: Asụsụ Wãpha
36720.extract: Wãpha, ma ọ bụ Wase (Jukun Wase) site na mpaghara ebe a na-asụ ya, bụ Asụsụ Jukunoid nke Naịjirịa.

39461.title: KZ Okpala
39461.extract: Chikezie Jake "KZ" Okpala  (amuru Eprel 28, 1999) bu onye ama ama ndi Sacramento Kings nke National Basketball Association (NBA).  Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji maka Stanford Cardinal.

40473.title: Mmiri Dị Ndụ nke Mba Nile
40473.extract:
Living Water International (LWI) bụ ọgbakọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ nke okwukwe na-enyere obodo ndị nọ na mba ndị ka na-emepe emepe aka imepụta mmemme mmiri, idebe ihe ọcha na ịdị ọcha ( WASH ) na-adịgide adịgide na nzaghachi nsogbu mmiri zuru ụwa ọnụ.   Ọ dabere na Houston, Texas, United States. E hiwere ya na 1990 ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na mba iri na asaa. N'afọ 2013, nzukọ a arụchaala ihe karịrị ọrụ mmiri 14,100 nke gụnyere igwu olulu mmiri ọhụrụ, iwe ihe ubi, na ịrụzi olulu mmiri na-adịghị arụ ọrụ.  Mmiri dị ndụ bụ onye tọrọ ntọala nke Millennium Water Alliance,   ma bụrụ onye otu 58 Alliance, njikọ nke òtù Ndị Kraịst jikọtara ọnụ iji nyere aka wepụ oke ịda ogbenye .  
Na 2006, Mmiri dị ndụ ghọrọ onye isi na-emekọ ihe na Advent Conspiracy, mmegharị n'etiti ụka Ndị Kraịst nke na-akpọ ndị òtù ka ha nye onyinye dị mfe ma dị iche iche nke na-akwalite mmekọrịta, wee jiri ego ha gaara emefu na onyinye dị oke ọnụ iji nyere ndị nọ ná mkpa aka gburugburu. ụwa.

47888.title: Kedar Massenburg
47888.extract:
William “Kedar” Massenburg (amụrụ 1963) bụ onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ America na onye isi ndekọ aha, onye bụ onye isi oche Motown Records site na 1997 ruo 2004.  Massenburg kacha mara amara maka iweta Erykah Badu ka ama ama.  O mere akara aha aha ya bụ " neo soul ." 
Massenburg bụ onye nchoputa, onye isi ala na onye isi oche nke Kedar Entertainment.

50005.title: International Water Management Institute
50005.extract:
Ndị ọrụ International Water Management Institute ( IWMI ) bụ ụlọ ọrụ ngwaahịa nke ntanye mmiri na nke mba ụwa n'okpuru CGIAR na isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Colombo, Sri Lanka, na ụlọ ọrụ n'ofe Africa na Asia.  Ibu na Institutelọ Ọrụ na-ahụ anya anya n'ịkwalite otú e si mmiri mmiri na ihe mmetụta ala, n'ebumnuche nke nri nri na ibelata ogbenye ma na-echekwa gburugburu ebe obibi.
arọ ya na- anya na: nnweta mmiri na okpuru, ejedebe ihu igwe ;  otú e si eji mmiri mmiri eme ihe na otú e si eji ya eme ihe na-ama ihe mgbaàmà;  Ogo mmiri na ndị na-ekiri na gburugburu ebe obibi;  na ka ọha mmadụ na-achị akụ mmiri ha.  Na 2012, IWMI ihe nrite Stockholm Water Prize Laureate nke Stockholm International Water Institute maka ihe ndị ọsụ ụzọ ya, nke nyere aka kwalite nchekwa mmiri ugbo, kwalite nchekwa nri, chebe gburugburu ebe obibi yana ụmụaka ogbenye na mba ndị ka na-emepe.  egwu. 
IWMI bụ onye otu CGIAR, ihe ndị zuru ụwa ọnụ nke na-ahụ òtù iche na-eme ike dị iche na-adịgide adịgide, ma na-eduzi CGIAR Research Program on Water, Land and Ecosystems .  IWMI bụkwa onye mmekọ na mmemme egwuregwu CGIAR na: Aquatic Agricultural Systems (AAS);  Mgbanwe ihu igwe, ọrụ ugbo na nchekwa nri (CCAFS);  Sistemu nke Dryland;  yana sistemu eji ọnụ ọnụ maka oke mmiri mmiri.

51146.title: Acequia Madre (Las Vegas, New Mexico)
51146.extract:
Nke Acequia Madre, na Las Vegas, New Mexico, bụ ihe akụkọ ihe mere eme acequia nke e wuru n'oge nke Las Vegas 'mmezi na 1835–36.  Edepụtara ya na National Register of Historic Places na 1987. 
Ọ na-esi n'Osimiri Gallinas na-aga ruo nso nsochi nke S. Pacific na US Route 85 na Las Vegas. 
"Nkọwa: Ọwa mmiri nke ụrọ; 3-5 ụkwụ n'obosara; na 2-3 ụkwụ miri emi. Ịhapụ Osimiri Gallinas na ebe dị n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Taos Street; na-aga n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ site n'ala a na-adịghị edozi n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Block 3 nke Baca na Mgbakwunye Sandoval na-aga n'ebe ndịda n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Blocks 3-4 nke Baca na Sandoval Addition na Blocks E na F nke mbụ Town; n'ebe ndịda n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ngọngọ 50-53 nke Mgbakwunye na Obodo Las Vegas;
"Usoro na-amalite site na mmiri mmiri na-atụgharị nkume n'akụkụ Osimiri Gallinas nke dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Taos Street. Ụtọ mmiri n'onwe ya, site na atọ ruo ise n'obosara na abụọ ruo mita atọ n'ime ya, na-aga n'ebe ndịda yiri osimiri ahụ. N'ime obodo ụfọdụ., otu ọwa mmiri, ya na onye ndu ya a họpụtara ma ọ bụ Mayordomo jere ozi dị ka ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị nke oge ụfọdụ ghọrọ ebe mgbakwasị ụkwụ maka njikwa Anglo-American Na West Las Vegas, ebe ndị na-asụ Spanish jigidere nnukwu njikwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Njikọ nke ọwara mmiri ka bụ ụlọ ọrụ nke abụọ.
A kọwapụtara ndepụta ndebanye aha mba dị warara ka ọ gụnye naanị ụzọ mmiri na ihe mgbochi ya. 
Ụlọ Eugenio Gatignole bụ otu ụlọ akụkọ ihe mere eme dị nso na acequia (na foto ndekọ aha ya na-egosikwa acequia).

51324.title: Mattia Valoti
51324.extract: Mattia Valoti (amuru 6 Septemba 1993) bu onye okacha amara n’egwuregwu ndi Italy nke na-egwu egwu dika onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Serie A Monza .

55097.title: Ememme Adae
55097.extract: Adae Festival ( Twi : "ebe izu ike") bụ emume na Ashanti . N'ịtụle ụbọchị ezumike, ọ bụ omenala nna ochie nke ndị Ashanti .

5959.title: 2 Julaị
5959.extract: 2 Julaị bu ubochi nke 2nd (nke abụọ) na onwa ana kpo Julaị. Na Gregorian calender, 2 Julaị bu ubochi nke 183rd (184th na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 182 du mgbe afo na agwu.

8019.title: In-N-Out Burger
8019.extract: Na-N-Ọ Burgers, Inc. na yinye nri ngwa ngwa ahịa bụ bụ n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke United States.

9830.title: Adaobi Tricia Nwaubani
9830.extract: Adaobi Tricia Obinne Nwaubani Audio bụ nwafọ Naijiria bụ onye ode akwụkwọ, ode ihe ọchị, ode edemede na onye nta akụkọ . Akwụkwọ mbido ya, I Do Not Come to you by Chance,  meriri n'ihe nrite nke Commonwealth Writers ’Prize for Best First Book (Africa) nke afọ 2010,   ihe nrite nke Betty Trask First Book,  The Washington Post kpọkwzịrị ya otu n'ime akwukwo kacha nma nke afọ 2009.  Akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ Young Adult, Buried Beneath the Baobab Tree, dabere na ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ụmụ agbọghọ ndị Boko Haram tọọrọ, ka HarperCollins bipụtara n'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 2018. O meriri na Raven Award for Excellence in Arts and Entertainment nke afọ 2018, akpọkwazịrị ya otu n'ime akụkọ ifo maka ndị okenye nke kachasị mma nke ndị American Library Association Best Fiction for Young Adults, bụrụkwa nke a họọrọ maka Notable Social Studies Trade Books for Young People nke afọ 2019.

9845.title: Aisha Abubakar
9845.extract: Aisha Abubakar bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria.  Mgbe ntuli aka elu nke afọ 2015 mere, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Steeti nke Mmeputa, Azụmaahịa na itinye ego site na Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari na njedebe nke 2015.

10920.title: Polytechnic nke Ȯra Delta
10920.extract:
E nwere Polytechnics atọ dị na Ȯra Delta, Naijiria, ha niile hibere na 12 Nọvemba 2002, nke dị na Ogwashi-Uku (Mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Aniocha South), Ozoro (Mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Isoko North), na Otefe-Oghara, Oghara (Mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Ethiope West). Agbanyeghị, Polytechnic nke dị na Ozoro ka gọọmentị steeti gbanwere ka ọ bụrụ mahadum.  
Gọọmentị Delta Steeti nwetara nghọta na Mahadum Westminster, London iji nyere aka na njikwa na nkwado teknụzụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ. Institutionslọ ọrụ ndị a bụ ebe kachasị mma na Ọrụ Ugbo, Kọmputa na Teknụzụ Ozi, Ejiji Ejiji na Arts na Egwuregwu. Ewezuga mpaghara izizi ha, a na -azụ ụmụ akwụkwọ niile na Kọmputa na Teknụzụ Ozi yana azụmahịa na azụmaahịa.
Polytechnic nke Ȯra Delta Ogwashi-Uku nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ na-enye Diplomas National na Diplomas National dị elu na nka na imewe (Ejiji Ejiji na Teknụzụ Uwe, na General Art), Azụmaahịa (Akaụntụ, Njikwa Azụmaahịa, Mmadụ  Njikwa akụrụngwa, Azụmaahịa, Nkwukọrịta Mass, Njikwa Teknụzụ Ọfịs na Njikwa Mmepụta Mmepụta), Injinịa (Ọrụ Ugbo na Bio-Environment Engineering, Civil Engineering, Injinịa Kọmputa, Injinịa Eletrọniki, Injinịa Ntọala, Injinị Mechanical, Injinịa Metallurgical na Ịgbado ọkụ na Ụgha) ma tinye ya n'ọrụ  Sayensị (Sayensị Kọmputa, mgbakọ na mwepụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ na ile ọbịa na njikwa njegharị).
Polytechnic nke Ȯra Delta, Ozoro bụ nke mepere emepe n'etiti polytechnics, ọ nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ na-enye Diplomas National na Diplomas National dị elu na oru ugbo, Ọmụmụ ihe ọmụmụ, sayensị na teknụzụ, injinịa na ọmụmụ gburugburu.
Polytechnic Otefe-Oghara nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ na-enye Diplomas Mba na Mmụta Azụmaahịa (Akaụntụ, Banki na Ego na Nchịkwa Azụmaahịa), Kọmputa na IT (Kọmputa Science na Ọnụ ọgụgụ), na Injinịa (Injinịa Kọmputa, Injinịa Eletrọniki na Injinịa na Mechanical Engineering). Ọ nwekwara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ọmụmụ mbido nke na-ewebata ụmụ akwụkwọ niile na azụmaahịa azụmaahịa na teknụzụ sayensị.

14783.title: Muthoni Gathecha
14783.extract: Muthoni Gathecha (a mụrụ na Eprel 8, 1962) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri. O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Kenya.

15926.title: Papa Ibra Tall
15926.extract: Papa Ibra Tall (1935-2015) bụ onye na-akpa ákwà, onye na-ese ihe, na onye na-eme ihe osise nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na École de Dakar .

16307.title: Ollie Harrington
16307.extract: Oliver Wendell Harrington (ubochí irí na anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1912 ̊ rụo ụbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Novemba, 1995) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-akwado megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na maka ikike obodo na United States. N'ịbụ ónyé si n'agbụrụ dị iche iche, Langston Hughes kpọrọ ya "onye kacha eme ihe nkírí na-atọ ọchị n'Africa na America". Harrington rịọrọ màkà mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na East Germany na 1961; ọ biri na Berlin màkà afọ iri atọ ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya.

16916.title: Reem al-Baroudi
16916.extract: Reham Magdy Medhat Al Baroudi, onye a maara dị ka Reem al-Baroudi (amụrụ na 6 Ọktoba 1978) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri. Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na 1994.

18366.title: Bagudo
18366.extract:
Bagudo bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Kebbi Steeti nke Naijiria. Ya na Niger na Benin n'ekerita oke ala. Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Bagudo.
Ọ nwere mpaghara 7,782km² na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ ruru puku asatọ na narị iri isii na ise, narị asatọ na iri na asaa na ngụkọ  nke afọ 2006.
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị asatọ na irí asaa na otu. 
Bagudo bụ obodo siri ike nke nwere ọtụtụ igwe ndị Fulani na Zabarmawa bi ma ka kwudosie ike n'asụsụ Hausa a na- asụ dị ka asụsụ lingua franca nke ihe karịrị nde na okarana-asụ na mpaghara ahụ. Islam rutere n'obodo ahụ na narị afọ nke iri na isii ma ọ bụ na mbụ site na ahia trans-Saharan ma n'ihi ya ghọrọ ọgaranya na ebe azụmahịa nke mpaghara ahụ ma na-ejikọta ya dị ka " ebe etiti nke ọrụ ugbo, ndị na-azụ anụ na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.

22831.title: Asụsụ Ovambo
22831.extract:
Asụsụ Ovambo (ìnglish: /ɒˈvæmboʊ/) bụ ụyọkọ asụsụ nke ndị Ovambo na-asụ na ndịda Angola na ugwu Namibia, nke ụkpụrụ edere bụ Kwanyama na Ndonga.
Aha ala maka asụsụ ahụ bụ Oshiwambo (nke a na-edekwa Oshivambo), nke a na-ejikwa maka asụsụ Kwanyama na Ndonga. Ọ bụ asụsụ kachasị ukwuu a na-asụ na Namibia, ọkachasị site n'aka ndị Ovambo.
Asụsụ a nwere njikọ chiri anya na nke Herero na Himba, asụsụ Herero (Otjiherero). Ihe ịrịba ama doro anya nke ịdị nso bụ prefix eji eme ihe maka aha asụsụ na dialect, Proto-Bantu *ki- (klas 7, dị ka aha asụsụ Swahili, Kiswahili), nke na Herero gbanwere ka ọ bụrụ Otji- na Ovambo gaa n'ihu na Oshi-.

28786.title: Australian Wooden Boat Festival
28786.extract: Australian Wooden Boat Festival (AWBF) bụ ihe omume a na-eme ugboro abụọ na Hobart, Tasmania, na-eme emume ụgbọ mmiri osisi. A na-eme AWBF n'otu oge na Royal Hobart Regatta.  Emume a na-anabata ụgbọ mmiri osisi nke nha niile gụnyere ụgbọ mmiri osisi, kayak na dinghies yana yachts na ụgbọ mmiri dị elu.

29260.title: Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ihe ndị e ji akụrụngwa maka nri na ọrụ ugbo
29260.extract:
Commission on Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture nke Food and Agricultural Organization of the United Nations (FAO) bụ òtù na-ahụ maka gọọmentị na-ahụkarị okwu ndị metụtara njikwa ụdị dị iche iche nke metụtara nri na ọrụ ugbo. E guzobere ya na 1983 dị ka Commission on Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture. N'afọ 1995, a gbatịkwuru ikike nke Commission iji kpuchie ihe niile dị iche iche nke ihe ndị dị ndụ maka nri na ọrụ ugbo ma gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ nke ugbu a. Ndị otu ya nwere mba 179 na European Union.
Iwu nke Commission na-ebo ya ebubo na ọ na-arụ "ọrụ nhazi na ... na-emeso iwu, ngalaba na ihe gbasara ngalaba ndị metụtara nchekwa na iji ihe onwunwe mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa nke metụtara nri na ọrụ ugbo". Ebumnuche ya bụ "ịgbalị ịkwụsị mfu nke ihe onwunwe mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa maka nri na ọrụ ugbo, yana ijide n'aka na nchekwa nri ụwa na mmepe na-adịgide adịgide site n'ịkwalite nchekwa ha na ojiji na-adịgidere, gụnyere mgbanwe, ohere na ịkekọrịta uru ziri ezi na nke ziri ezi nke uru sitere na ojiji ha".
Ọrụ nke Commission na-agụnye ilekọta nyocha zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ụdị dị iche iche na ihe onwunwe mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa eji eme ihe na ngalaba dị iche iche nke nri na ọrụ ugbo na ịmepụta ngwá ọrụ iwu mba ụwa metụtara njikwa nke ihe onwunwa ndị a.

39897.title: Hadia Bentaleb
39897.extract: Hadia Bentaleb ( Arabic  </link> ; amuru 31 August 1980) bu onye ogbo épée nke Algeria.  Bentaleb nọchitere anya Algeria na asọmpi olimpik n'oge okpomọkụ nke afọ 2008 na Beijing, ebe ọ gbara asọmpi na mmemme épée nke ụmụ nwanyị . Ọ meriri agba agba nke mbụ nke iri atọ na abụọ n'aka Emese Szász nke Hungary, jiri ọkpụ 4–15.

40559.title: Ụlọ Almshouses nke Crewe, Nantwich
40559.extract:
.Crewe Almshouses ma ọ bụ Crewe's Almshouses bụ mbara ala nke ụlọ asaa mbụ almshouse na njedebe nke Beam Street ( SJ6548152562</link> ) na Nantwich, Cheshire, England.  Ewebere ụlọ ugbu a na 1767 site n'aka John Crewe, emesia Baron Crewe nke mbụ, ma depụtara ya na ọkwa II .  [1] Ọ nwere atumatu etiti nke pediment dobere, nke nwere ọnụ ụzọ okwute nwere ogidi Tuscan .  Onye ọrụ ebere ndị dị ugbu a guzoro na ụlọ nke ụlọ ezinụlọ awụ nke 16, mbụ bụ ụlọ ezina ụlọ Mainwaring na emesịa ndị mgbazi obodo na ụlọ ọrụ
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ ndị 1960, Crewe Almshouses nọ n' ike dara ogbenye, a na-eyikwa ụlọ ahụ egwu ọkụtu.  Echekwara ya site na ọbọ nke mkpuchiga Wright's Almshouses na London Road ka ọ guzoro n'ምሳሌ Crewe Almshouses, na- Crewe Almshouses ka ọ ọnụ ụlọ maka ndị agadi, na ịbụ ụlọ ọgbara ọhụrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ abụọ na-eke ịbụ.  Emechara ụlọ ahụ na 1975, Crewe Almshouses ka na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka ụlọ ebe nchekwa maka ndị agadi.

47555.title: Brian Alfred
47555.extract: Brian Alfred ( mmalite 2 Disemba 1974, na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania ) bụ onye na-ese ihe dabere na Brooklyn, New York .</link>

49965.title: Mahadum Mahajana, Tellippalai
49965.extract: Templeeti:Infobox schoolMahadum Mahajana ( Tamil </link> Makājaṉāk Kallūri ) bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ụkọ dị na Tellipalai, Sri Lanka

50858.title: Òtù Ndị Ọrụ Na-emepụta Nri nke Australia
50858.extract: Confectionery Workers'Union of Australia (CWUA) bụ otu ndị ahịa Australia nke dị n'etiti 1925 na 1992. Ruo 1986, a maara ya dị ka Federated Confectioners' Association of Australia (FCA). N'ime oge niile ọ dị adị, ọ nọchitere anya ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ confectionery, gụnyere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke ụmụ nwanyị. Ọ bụkwa ihe ama ama maka itinye aka ya na esemokwu Sweets Dollar ama ama.

53899.title: Bea Uusma
53899.extract: Mari Beatrice "Bea" Uusma, nke mbụ Uusma Schyffert (amụrụ 20 Maachị 1966 na Lidingö, Sweden ), bụ onye edemede Sweden, onye na-ese ihe na dọkịta.

54362.title: Hind al-Mutayri
54362.extract: Hind bint Abd al-Razzaq Huwayl al-Mutayri (Arabic: هند المطيري ) bụ onye Saudi na-ede uri, ode akwụkwọ na agụmakwụkwọ. A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Taif, ọ bụkwa ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ.  O nwetara akara ugo mmụta n'asụsụ Arabik na Mahadum King Saud (1995) na Ph.D. n'akwukwo Arabik na nkatọ sitere na ngalaba nke Asụsụ na Akwukwo Arabik.  O sonyela na mmemme, uri slams, na ịgụ ma na mpaghara na mba ụwa.  Ọ bụkwa onye otu Riyadh Literary Club ma nwee nchịkọta uri abụọ na ọtụtụ ọrụ dị egwu na akwụkwọ.

13217.title: Human trafficking in Georgia (country)
13217.extract:
Ịtụ mgbere ahịa mmadụ na mba Georgia bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị, ebe a na-amanye ndị mmadụ ịgba akwụna na ọrụ mmanye. N'afọ 2009, a manyere ụmụnwanyị na ụmụagbọghọ si Georgia ịgba akwụna na mba Georgia, Turkey, United Arab Emirates, na Gris, na n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, e dekwara ikpe nke ịgba akwụna nke ndị mba Georgia na Russia, Germany, na Austria. A manyere ụmụnwoke na ụmụnwanyị ịrụ ọrụ na Georgia, Libya na Turkey. A na-amanyekwa ụmụnwoke si Turkey ịrụ ọrụ na mpaghara Abkhazia, nke dị n'èzí nchịkwa gọọmentị Georgia.
Gọọmentị Georgia na-agbaso ụkpụrụ kacha nta maka iwepụ ịzụ ahịa. Gọọmentị gosipụtara mgbalị siri ike iji chọpụta ma nyere ndị na-azụ ahịa aka ma mụbaa ego enyemaka ya ọzọ ruo $ 312,000.
