Gọọmentị gosikwara ihe ịga nke ọma dị egwu nke ndị mmanye iwu, na-eme ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị a mara ikpe maka ịzụ ahịa, ma hụ ọzọ na ndị omekome niile a mara ikpe na-eje ozi oge ụfọdụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ. Gọọmentị mba Georgia gosikwara mgbalị mgbochi siri ike ma gaa n'ihu na mmekọrịta chiri anya ya na ndị NGO na-emegide ịzụ ahịa na enyemaka ndị metụtara na mgbalị mgbochi.
Ụlọ ọrụ US State Department na-enyocha ma na-alụso ịzụ ahịa mmadụ ọgụ tinyere mba ahụ na "Tier 1" n'afọ 2017.

14818.title: Dexter Vines
14818.extract: Dexter Vines bụ onye America na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị na inker, nke a maara maka mmekorita ya na ndị na-ede akwụkwọ dịka Steve McNiven na Ed McGuiness, onye nke ikpeazụ n'ime ha bụ ndị otu "eDex".

15110.title: Michael Meyersfeld
15110.extract: Michael Meyersfeld bụ onye na-ese foto mara mma bírí ma na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg, South Africa. Meyersfeld na-arụ ọrụ na ezigbo nka na foto mgbasa ozi.

16541.title: Mohamed Hamaki
16541.extract: Mohamed Ibrahim Mohamed El Hamaki (Arabic:  [mæˈħæm.mæd ebɾɑˈhiːm elˈħæˈmæːʔi]; a mụrụ na 4 Nọvemba 1975) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Egypt. N'afọ 2010, o nwetara ihe nrite "Best Arabia Act" site na MTV Europe Music Awards na Music Award n'afọ 2006, maka "Ahla Haga Fiki". Ọ bụ onye nkuzi na The Voice Ahla Sawt (oge 5) n'afọ 2019.

18748.title: Draw soup
18748.extract:
]]
Ofe na Alụlụ bụ aha ofe dị iche iche sitere na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa. A na-eji okra, ogbono ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ ewedu (jute) eme ha. Aha ahụ sitere na njirimara viscosity siri ike nke broth ka ọ na-apụta na efere mgbe a na-eri ya ma ọ bụ na spoon ma ọ bụ, karịa, site na itinye obere ihe siri ike (fufu) n'ime ya. Enwere ike inye ya na ọtụtụ nri fufu nke Naịjirịa , gụnyere eba (garri). Enwere ike iji Ewedu mee ofe Yoruba nke a na-ejikarị amala eme ihe.

22830.title: La'bi language
22830.extract:
La'bi bụ asụsụ omenala nke malite nwoke n'etiti Gbaya Kara, Mbum, na ụfọdụ Sara Laka, na mpaghara nke Touboro dị nso ebe CAR, Chad, na Cameroon zutere. O nweghị ndị na-asụ ya. Ọ nwere njikọ na Mbum, na nnukwu ego mgbazinye sitere na otu ma ọ bụ karịa asụsụ Sara.
E nyere ndepụta okwu na Periquet (1915).

23447.title: Michelle Alozie
23447.extract: Michelle Chinwendu Alozie (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprelụ n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Naijiria a mụrụ n'America nke na-agba bọọlụ nke na-eme egwuregwu dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ National Women's Soccer League Houston Dash na otu egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị nke Naijiria.

26609.title: Kimanaueze
26609.extract: Kimanaueze, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya Na Kumanauezi ma ọ bụ Na kimanauze Kia-Tumbī Ndala, bụ dike ọdịbendị na akụkọ ifo Ambundu maọbụ Mbundu nke ndị ya bi na Angola ugbu a. E nwere ike iji aha Kueimanaze na-arụtụaka dịka dike lụrụ nwa nwanyị nke Anyanwụ na Ọnwa, maọbụ kwa nna nke dike ahụ. Kimanaueze nke obere bụ nna onye dike ọdịbendị Ambundu ọzọ, Sudika-mbambi, na nwanne ya nwoke, Kabundungdulu.

28651.title: Ìgwè Balaton
28651.extract: Balaton Group (The International Network of Resource Information Centers) bụ netwọk zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ndị nchọpụta na ndị na-arụ ọrụ na ngalaba ndị metụtara usoro na nkwado. Aha "Balaton Group" na-ezo aka na mpaghara Lake Balaton nke Hungary, ebe e guzobere otu ahụ na mbụ, na ebe ọtụtụ nzukọ kwa afọ nke otu ahụ na-ewere ọnọdụ. Balaton Group na-ezube ime ka nghọta zuru ụwa ọnụ banyere usoro, echiche ogologo oge na mkpebi iji nweta mgbanwe dị mma. Òtù ahụ kwenyere na ihe ndị a bụ isi maka mmepe na-adịgide adịgide.

29262.title: International Institute of Agriculture
29262.extract: E hiwere International Institute of Agriculture (IIA) na Rome na 1905 site n'aka Eze Italy Victor Emmanuel nke Atọ na ebumnuche nke imepụta ụlọ mkpochapụ maka nchịkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ ọrụ ugbo. Emere ya bụ isi n'ihi mbọ David Lubin gbara. Na 1930, IIIA bipụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ mbụ nke ọrụ ugbo n'ụwa. Mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, e nyefere ma akụ ya na ikike ya n'aka Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Nri na Ọrụ Ugbo (FAO) nke United Nations.

29578.title: Ụlọ ọrụ ike nke Canada
29578.extract: Power Corporation of Canada (French: Power Corporation du Canada) bụ ụlọ ọrụ njikwa na njikwa nke na-elekwasị anya na ọrụ ego na North America, Europe na Eshia. Ihe onwunwe ya bụ mkpuchi, ezumike nká, njikwa akụ na ụba na njikwa itinye ego, gụnyere pọtụfoliyo nke usoro itinye ego ọzọ.

33790.title: Ursula Coope
33790.extract: Ursula Charlotte Macgillivray Coope FBA (amụrụ na 31 Julaị 1969) bụ onye ọkà mmụta oge ochie nke Britain, onye bụ ọkachamara na ọmụmụ nke physics, metaphysics, na ụkpụrụ omume nke onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Gris oge ochie Aristotle. Ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke nkà ihe ọmụma oge ochie na Mahadum Oxford.

35103.title: Sarah Fawcett
35103.extract: Sarah Fawcett bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara oké osimiri na ihu igwe na South Africa.  nkuzi  elu na Ngalaba nke Oceanography na Mahadum Cape Town, ọ nwere mmasị karịsịa na ọrụ nke oké osimiri na-achịkwa Okirikiri biogeochemical na otu dysregulation ha si enye aka na mgbanwe ihu igwe.  na-asọpụrụ ya na World Economic Forum Young Scientists Class of 2020, [1] na P-Rating site na National Research Foundation, nke na-ekweta na ọrụ onye ọkà mmụta sayensị ahụ ga-enwe mmetụta dị elu.

36932.title: Asụsụ Jola-Felupe
36932.extract:
Jola-Felupe (Feloup, Felup, Felupe, Floup, Flup, Fulup) ma ọ bụ Ejamat (Ediamat) bụ Asụsụ Jola nke mpaghara Casamance nke Senegal na Guinea-Bissau dị nso, gụnyere gburugburu Calequisse (Kaləkis), na nsọtụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke mpaghara Manjak n'ebe ndịda Osimiri Cacheu. Ndị na-asụ olumba a na-akpọ mmadụ ma ọ bụ ajamuʂay, a na-akpụkwa asụsụ ahụ ma ọ bụ: "Okpukpọ ma ọ bụ "Okpokpọ" (ma ọ bụ "Ejamatay" na Husuy). 
Kerak (Keerak, Keeraku; kwa Her) yiri ka ọ bụ olumba, ọ bụ ezie na Ethnologue nyere ya koodu ISO dị iche n'ihi ọrụ nyocha mbụ nke tụrụ aro na ọ dị iche.

39780.title: Myrlie Evers-Williams
39780.extract: Myrlie Louise Evers-Williams (née Beasley; amụrụ na Machị 17, 1933) bụ onye Amerika na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na onye nta akụkọ nke rụrụ ọrụ ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ ịchọ ikpe ziri ezi maka ogbugbu 1963 nke di ya Medgar Evers, onye ọzọ na-ahụ Maka ihe ndị ru ruuru mmadụ. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onyeisi oche nke NAACP, ma bipụta ọtụtụ akwụkwọ gbasara ihe ndị metụtara ikike obodo na ihe nketa di ya. Na Jenụwarị 21, 2013, o kwuru arịrịọ ahụ na nraranye nke abụọ nke Barack Obama.

43945.title: Rafael Molina Sánchez
43945.extract: Rafael Molina Sánchez (Nọvemba 27, 1841 – Ọgọst 1, 1900), nke a na-akpọ Lagartijo (ngwere), bụ onye na-agba ehi Spanish.

44924.title: Afrịka apụọla!
44924.extract:
Afrịka apụọ!  bụ nri ọrụ ebere dị na Brooklyn, New York, United States, nke onye omenkà na onye ọchịchọ Wangechi Mutu ntọala ntọala na 2014. [1] Africa's Out!  na-eji ndị na-ese ihe na obodo si n'ime Afrịka na ndị si mba ọzọ pụta ìhè, na-achọpụtapụta ihe nsogbu ọha na eze na-alụso site na ikpo okwu okike.
Afrịka apụọ!  ndị obibi ndị omenkà na-akwado ndị nka na-dị na ndị na-arụ ọrụ etiti site na mbata Africa nke ọrụ ha na-ekwu maka ọha ọha na eze na soja ndị na Africa.  Ndị na-ese ihe izara na-erite uru site na oghere na ike na-enyere ụka nka na-egosi nke Africa si pụta!  enye.  Nke a na-ebute onye na-ese ihe n'ịbụ ebe obibi na okpukpe ya na ndị nka, ndị na-ahụ maka ọrụ, na ndị na-anakọta ihe na obodo nka New York .  Na fim ya na Denniston Hill, onye na-ese ihe n'ebe ugwu New York, nke ndị omenkà egwu Julie Mehretu, Paul Pfeiffer, na Lawrence Chua, [1] Africa's Out!  enyela Michael Soi (2016) na Lerato Shadi (2017) egwu obibi obibi.
Afrịka apụọ!  [1] enyela ego mmemme na Brooklyn Museum, Afropunk Festival, Studio Museum na Harlem na NeueHouse .

48666.title: Dick Duerrstein
48666.extract: Dick Duerrstein bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri America nke Disney Fine Art, onye ọrụ dị ka onye isi ihe okike maka ngalaba nke ụlọ ọrụ Walt Disney ihe ọmụmụ afọ iri abụọ..

54132.title: Alma Bella
54132.extract: Alma Bella (13 Maachị 1910, Batangas City, Batangas, Philippines - 11 Mee 2012, New York City) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Philippines.

55346.title: Ọsụsọ Algeria
55346.extract: Algérienne sauce ma ọ bụ "Algerian sauce", bụ ihendori na-atọ ụtọ na ose na-acha odo odo-oroma.  Ọ na-adịkarị na azụmaahịa nri ngwa ngwa na-ejere French tacos ma ọ bụ kebabs, yana friteries na azụmaahịa ndị ọzọ yiri ngwa ngwa nri, na Algeria, Tunisia, Morocco, Belgium, France, na Switzerlan..

11819.title: Anaocha
11819.extract: Anaocha bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na steeti Anambra, ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria . Obodo ndi mejuputara ochichi obodo buAguluzigbo, Agulu, Neni, Ichida, Adazi-Ani, Adazi-Enu, Adazi-Nnukwu, Akwaeze, Nri, Obeledu.

13658.title: Ndi Okereke-Onyiuke
13658.extract: Ndi Okereke-Onyiuke (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1950) bụ onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Nigerian Stock Exchange na nwanyị mbụ na-ere ahịa na Nigeria.

13928.title: Clay Drayton
13928.extract: Clarence R. "Clay" Drayton (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'ubochí anọ aha = 'USPRI'> "U.S. Public Records Index Mpịakọta nke 1 [database on-line]". United States: The Generations Network. 1995. Eweghachiri on 2013-07-11. </ref> bụ onye America na-ede abụ, onye nhazi, onye mmepụta na sideman kacha mara amara maka ọrụ ya na Motown. Ọ bụ onye nhazi na ndekọ ọla edo nke Diana Ross, “Love Hangover.”

15233.title: Islam Zaher
15233.extract: Islam Zaher (amụrụ na 15 Maachị 1972) bụ onye Ijipt na-ese ihe n'oge a. A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Cairo, Ijipt, nka na eserese masịrị Zaher site na nwata. Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Fine Arts na Zamalek, Cairo, 1994,

16209.title: Adebisi Akanji
16209.extract: Adebisi Akanji (amụrụ n'afọ 1930) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe nakwa Olúwo (Ògbóni isi ụkọchukwu) nke Ilédì Lárọ̀ Ohùntótó - isi Ògbóni Ìbílẹ̀ lodge nke Òṣogbo, isi obodo Ọ̀ṣun State, Naijiria.

19262.title: Gert-Johan Coetzee
19262.extract: Gert-Johan Coetzee (amụrụ n'abalị asatọ nke onwa Nọvemba afọ 1987), bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na South Africa. Ụlọ ọrụ ejiji ya dị na Linden, Johannesburg na mpaghara Gauteng. Ọ bụ ọkachamara na uwe elu na-acha uhie uhie, ọ na-emepụta ụdị ejiji njikere dị iche iche. A maara Coetzee maka iyi dị ka ndị South Africa na ndị ama ama na mba ụwa na ihe omume red-carpet.

24961.title: Boubagar Soumana
24961.extract: Boubagar Soumana bụ onye Nijeiria na-akụ ọkpọ. O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwoke na Summer Olympics nke afọ 1984.

29162.title: Ụlọ ọrụ A-Z Map nke ndị na-akọ akụkọ ala
29162.extract: ,sGeographers' A–Z Map Company Ltd. bụ onye na-ebipụta map nọọrọ onwe ya na United Kingdom, na-enye ọrụ eserese eserese, [1] ngwaahịa data dijitalụ[2] na akwụkwọ nkewa akwụkwọ[3] (gụnyere Street Atlases, Ntuziaka ndị ọbịa, Great  Britain Road Atlases, na Adventure Atlas).

29457.title: Peterson (ụlọ ọrụ)
29457.extract: Peterson AS bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke dị na Moss, Norway. Ruo afọ 2006 a maara ya dị ka M. Peterson & Søn.

30257.title: Asma Khalifa
30257.extract:
Asma Khalifa bụ onye na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na udo na Libya.  Ọrụ ya agafeela ọtụtụ mba gụnyere Libya, Yemen na Syria. Ọ meriri Luxembourg  udo nrite na 2016 ma kpọọ ya otu n'ime out nari ndị entorobịa Afrịka kachasị nwee mmetụta na 2017 site na Afrika ntirobia the nrite.
A mụrụ Asma Khalifa na Zuwara ma bụrụkwa onye Amazigh (Berber).  Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ihe gbasara ikike ụmụ nwanyị kemgbe tupu afọ mgbe ọ malitere itinye aka na ọrụ ndị ntorobịa. Ka ọ na-etolite dị ka onye na-abụghị onye Arab, Amazigh Libyan n'okpuru ọchịchị nke onye agha Muammar Qaddafi, Khalifa hụrụ mmetụta ọjọọ nke ịkpa ókè na ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị. Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ya na-enye aka n'iwulite obodo Libya ma rụọ ọrụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na-ewu udo na mgbanwe esemokwu na mba ahụ. Kemgbe afọ 2014 ọ lekwasịrị anya na ime udo na Libya, Syria na Yemen.  Ọrụ ya na Libya gụnyere imeziwanye òkè ụmụ nwanyị na gọọmentị ime obodo na ịlụ ọgụ megide ime ihe ike metụtara nwoke na nwanyị.  Khalifa arụwokwa ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka otu nzukọ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na Libya na ọrụ iji lụso alụmdi na nwunye ụmụaka ọgụ ma bụrụ onye na-enye ọzụzụ maka ọrụ ndị na-ewu udo nke Tripoli Good na-achịkwa.  O dere ihe ike mmekọahụ na Siria ma na-agba ụmụ nwanyị gbara ọsọ ndụ ajụjụ ọnụ maka nyocha maka akwụkwọ gbasara akụkụ mmadụ nke nsogbu ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ. Na mgbakwunye, Khalifa arụwo ọrụ iji nyochaa ma nyochaa mwakpo ụgbọelu na Yemen.

Khalifa so guzobe Tamazight nwanyi ntughari otu ndị na-eche echiche na otu mkpọsa nke na-akwado ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị maka ụmụ nwanyị nke Ugwu Afrika. E nyere ya Luxembourg  udo ihe brite na Schengen Ntọala udo na 25 Mee 2016 maka ọrụ ya iji kwalite udo na ngwọta esemokwu.  A kpọrọ Khalifa aha site na Afrika ntirobia Ihe nrite dị ka otu n'ime otu nari ndị ntorobịa Afrịka kachasị nwee mmetụta na 2017. N'afọ 2016-17 ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ na Friedrich Ebert Foundation ma na-azụ ụlọ udo. Ka ọ na-erule 2019, Khalifa na-achọ PhD ya ugbu a na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nkà ihe ọmụma na Mahadum Hamburg.

34982.title: Charles James Stuart-Wortley
34982.extract:
Charles James Stuart-Wortley, (3 June 1802 - 22 May 1844) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Britain, nwa nwoke nke abụọ nke James Stuart-Vortley-Mackenzie, 1st Baron Wharncliffe.
Ọ bụ onye na-ekiri ihe na nnọchibido ndị France nke Antwerp na afọ 1832, ma dee akụkọ banyere ihe omume ahụ.
Na 17 Febụwarị n'afọ 1831, ọ lụrụ Lady Emmeline Manners (d. 1855), nwa nwanyị nke John Manners, Duke nke ise nke Rutland, onye o nwere ụmụ atọ:  

Archibald Henry Plantagenet Stuart-Wortley (26 Julaị 1832 - 30 Eprel 1890), lụrụ na 15 June 1879 Lavinia Rebecca Gibbins (nwụrụ na 1937)
Adelbert William John Stuart-Wortley (nwụrụ n'afọ 1847) 
Victoria Alexandrina Stuart-Wortley (nwụrụ na 29 Machị 1912), lụrụ na 4 Julaị 1863 Sir William Earle Welby-Gregory, 4th BaronetSir William Earle Welby-Gregory, Baronet nke anọ
  Ọ nwụrụ na afọ 1844 n'ihi mmetụta nke ihe mberede ịchụ nta ọ nwèrè na mbido ndụ ya.

37300.title: Ihe osise ahụ tọgbọ chakoo
37300.extract: The Empty Canvas (Italian La noia lit. ') bụ Ihe nkiri ihe nkiri nke 1963 nke Damiano Damiani duziri. ihe nkiri nke Damiani, Tonino Guerra na Ugo Liberatore dere dabeere na akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha ere nke Alberto Moravia. Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Horst Buchholz, Catherine Spaak, Isa Miranda na Bette Davis.

42996.title: MRT Line 5 (Dhaka Metro Rail)
42996.extract: The MRT Line 5 ( Bengali  romanised : Em-Ar-Ti Lain Pachh ) bụ ahịrị ụgbọ okporo ígwè nke Dhaka metro akwadoro. Ọ ga-abụ ahịrị nke atọ nke usoro ụgbọ okporo ígwè Dhaka Metro. Ahịrị a gụnyere Northern Route na Southern Route . Owuwu nke MRT Line 5's Northern Route malitere na 5 Nọvemba 2023 ma ahaziri ịmalite ọrụ site na 2028.

43381.title: Peter H. Rossi
43381.extract: Peter Henry Rossi (December 27, 1921 - Ọktoba 7, 2006) bụ ọkà-ahụ kpatara ọha na eze ama ama maka nsogbu ya gbasara ihe ebe obibi, na idekọ ọnwụ ọnwụ ebe obibi America na 1980s.  Ntụgharị Rossi maka ọrụ ya na-echepụta ụzọ iji akara ngosi ngosi na akwụkwọ, ọrụ, njikwa mpụ, na ụlọ.  O mara aka na nka n'ihe gbasara ndị mmadụ na ibe ya iji nwa ndị na-ahụ ihe na ụlọ ọrụ ego ya.  Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, ọ bụ Stuart A. Rice prọfesọ emeritus nke Sociology na onye nduzi emeritus nke Social and Demographic Research Institute (SADRI) na Mahadum Massachusetts Amherst

44836.title: Kuba na-aṅụ mpi
44836.extract: E gosipụtara na Art Institute of Chicago, na Art Africa na Art India nke America, bụ mpi ịṅụ mmanya nke narị afọ nke 19. Site na ala eze Kuba, mpi ihe ọṅụṅụ na-eji osisi, ígwè, na ọla kọpa mee. Opi ihe ọṅụṅụ na-abụkarị onyinye e nyere ndị enyi na ezinụlọ nke ndị eze ma ọ bụ nye onye agha.

47699.title: Brian Biggs
47699.extract: Brian Biggs (amuru March 9, 1968, na Little Rock, Arkansas ) bu onye ode akwukwo na onye nlere anya.  [1] HarperCollins na Random House guzola ya, [2] n'etiti ndị ọzọ, ma akwụkwọ abụọ nke obere ola edo..

48843.title: Dystin Johnson
48843.extract:
Dstin Johnson bụ onye omere na onye na-ede ihe nkiri Britain. 
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịkpọ Norma Starkey na usoro ihe nkiri ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Channel 4, enweghị ihere, na ọrụ na-emegharị ugboro ugboro maka usoro 1 na 3, wee bụrụ nkedo isi maka usoro 4–6. N'ịgbaso ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe omume 1993 nke Harry, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nkedo dị ka Rossetti Wordsworth na usoro 2-4 nke ihe nkiri TV ụmụaka nke CBeebies The Story Makers, site na 2002 ruo 2004. O nwekwara akụkụ na Prime Suspect: The Final Act, EastEnders, The Bill and Holby City . Ọ nọkwa na akwụkwọ akụkọ Paul Merton 's Silent Clown na BBC Four dị ka onwe ya, na 2006. Na August 2011, Johnson mere ka ọ pụta ìhè na Coronation Street . Site na 2012 ruo 2015, Johnson gbara Oriakụ Carter na 4 O'Clock Club na CBBC . Na 2022, Johnson pụtara dị ka agwa Vicki na Netflix mockumentary sitcom Hard Cell .
Johnson edeela maka akụkụ abụọ nke ihe nkiri ụmụaka CBBC Tracy Beaker Return wee dee usoro 5 nke usoro CBeebies Get Well soon yana onye bụbu onye Cbeebies Nicole Davis.
Dị ka nke 2022 Johnson na-aga n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na Mahadum maka Creative Arts . Mpempe ya na-agụnyekarị okwu Abstract na nka geometric .

52565.title: Eugénie Le Sommer
52565.extract:
Eugénie Anne Claudine Le Sommer-Dariel  (amụrụ 18 Mee 1989) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ France nke na-egwu egwuregwu n'ihu maka klọb French Lyon na otu mba France .  Ọ na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye ọkpọ ọkpọ ọkpọ ihe okike na ọkpọ aka ekpe, mana ọ gbakwara egwu dị ka onye ọkpọ nke abụọ maka obodo ya.
Le Sommer bụ otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu a kacha chọọ mma n'egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị ọgbara ọhụrụ wee nwetagoro ihe mgbaru ọsọ France karịa onye ọ bụla n'ime ndị nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị.  Ọ meriri otu egwuregwu bọọlụ French iri na atọ na ọ bụ otu n'ime naanị ndị egwuregwu atọ meriri ndị Lyon na asọmpi asatọ European Cup .

53153.title: Louise Seguin
53153.extract:
Louise Seguin (nke a makwaara dị ka Marie-Louise Seguin) bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ gara mpaghara Antarctic. Malite mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ 14-16 (akụkọ dịgasị iche),ọ gbanwere onwe ya dị ka nwa nwoke iji gaa njem na njem 1772–1773 nke Yves-Joseph de Kerguelen.[1][2]  Atụwo aro na ya na Kerguelen bụ ndị hụrụ ya n'anya, ma ọ bụ na ọ bụ nne ya ukwu.[2]  N'oge njem ahụ, a na-akpọkarị ya aha otutu Louison.[3]  Ya na ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri Roland gagharịa n'agwaetiti Kerguelen, ma emesịa jiri ọnụnọ ya weda Kerguele anya.

N'ikpeazụ, a chọpụtara na Louise bụ nwanyị, a na-ekwukwa na ọnọdụ ahụ nyere aka n'ụlọ ikpe agha ya na 1776.

7267.title: Mali
7267.extract: Mali bu otu obodo no na Afrịka.

10303.title: Iheanacho Obioma
10303.extract:
Iheanacho Obioma Audio  bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Nigeria  so na  National Assembly nke anọ ,na-anọchite anya ngalaba Ikwuano / Ụmụahịa North / Ụmụahịa South  nke Abia State n'okpuru  nke  People's Democratic Party n'agbata 1999 na 2003. 
O mechara gaa zoo ọkwa na Senate nke Naijiria ka ọ nọchite anya Abia Central Senatorial district n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ nke ndị All Progressive Congress megide gọvanọ na-achị mgbe ahụ bụ Theodore Orji .

12338.title: Dorcas Ajoke Adesokan
12338.extract: Dorcas Ajoke Adesokan (amụrụ na ụbọchị nke ise na ọnwa Julaị na afọ nari iri itoolu iri itoolu na asatọ) bụ onye Naijiria na-egwu badminton.

14981.title: Godfrey Kennedy
14981.extract:
Godfrey Kennedy (a mụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
Kennedy malitere ọrụ ịkpụ ihe na 1992, ya na onye agbata obi ya, John Type na-arụ ọrụ. Ọrụ ya nwekwara mmetụta site na nke Moses Masaya na Brighton Sango.  Kennedy na-ewere isiokwu ya site na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịbendị Afrịka.

16327.title: Hind Meddeb
16327.extract: Hind Meddeb bụ onye France-Tunisia n'aru ọrụ nta akụkọ na onye nduzi ihe nkiri. N'ịbụ onye bi na Paris, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Europe, North Africa na Middle East. N'ime ihe nkiri ya na edemede ya, o gosipụtara ngagharị iwe ọha na eze nke ndị na-eto eto na ọdịbendị ha na Morocco, Tunisia na Egypt. N'ịdepụta ọnọdụ mmekọrịta ha na ngosipụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ha n'ihe gbasara mgbanwe ndị Arab, ọ lekwasịrị anya na egwu rap ma ọ bụ ụdị ndị ọzọ na-emegide omenala na ngagharị iwe na mba ndị a.

16676.title: Misozi Zulu
16676.extract: Misozi Chisha Rachael Zulu (amụrụ n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti maka otu Turkish Women's Super League club Hakkarigücü Spor na otu ụmụ nwanyị Zambia.

17371.title: Ellsworth Augustus Ausby
17371.extract: Ellsworth Augustus Ausby (ubochí isé n'ọnwa Eprel, 1942 rụo ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa Maachị, 2011) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe nkírí na ónyé nkụzi amaara màkà ọrụ ya na nnwale ya na nkwado na elu.

29795.title: Ndị Waldwisse
29795.extract:
Waldwisse (French pronunciation: ; German: ; Lorraine Franconian: Waldwiss/Wiiss) bụ obodo dị na ngalaba Moselle na Grand Est na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ọbọdọ France.
Obodo nke obodo: Betting, Gongelfang, Henting (German: Bettingen, Gongelfangen, Hintingerhof).Templeeti:Historical populations

30588.title: Nicolette Peel
30588.extract:
Nicolette Peel MBE bụ onye Britain na-amụ nwa na onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na ezinụlọ ndị nwere ọrịa kansa n'oge ime na oge mgbe ha mụsịrị nwa. N'afọ 2007, a chọpụtara na Peel nwere ọrịa kansa ara. Mgbe ọ gwụchara ya, ọ hapụrụ ọrịa kansa. Otú ọ dị, na 2012, a chọpụtara na Peel nwere ọrịa kansa ọzọ, n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe amuchara otu n'ime ụmụ ya ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge ochie ọbá Akwụkwọ Anyị mụtara n'aka Jizọs banyere ụkpụrụ na ndị mmadụ n'ihe. Site na ahụmịhe a, o guzobere ọrụ ebere a na-akpọ Mummy's Star (2013) iji cheta enyi ya, Mair Wallroth.  Ọ bụ naanị ọrụ ebere na UK na Ireland raara nye ụmụ nwanyị na ezinụlọ ha chọpụtara na ha nwere ọrịa ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime ụmụ ndị ikom abụọ igbu onye ọ bụla kansa n'oge ime ma ọ bụ n'ime ọnwa 12 mgbe ha mụsịrị nwa. 
Ịrụ ọrụ na Mummy's Star kpaliri Peel ịgbanwe ọrụ ya. Mgbe ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, ọ zụrụ dị ka onye na-amụ nwa ka o wee nwee ike ịrụ ọrụ na National Health Service. Ọ gara Mahadum nke Salford, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2016. Mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum, ọ meriri Best Academic Achievement na Nursing & Midwifery maka ndị otu ya. Peel bụkwa onye isi oche nke Midwifery Society na Mahadum Salford, akụkụ nke kọmitii na-eduzi ndị na-achọ ebe mgbaba dị ime, ma raara onwe ya nye ịkwado na inye ụmụ nwanyị ike n'oge ime ime na ịmụ nwa 
Na June 2018, Peel ghọrọ naanị onye nke atọ na United Kingdom iji nweta ihe nrite ọla edo nke onye isi na-amụ nwa, nke a na-enye ndị na-amụmụ nwa na-agafe ọrụ ha na NHS. Ọ nwetakwara onyinye Kate Granger maka nlekọta ọmịiko.
Na ngwụcha afọ 2019, e nyere Peel MBE maka ọrụ ya na Mummy's Star na ọrụ ebere ndị ọzọ.

34000.title: Mkpụrụ ọka mà obu ọkà ọkà
34000.extract: A na-akụ mkpụrụ ọkà n'ụba mà Na-Enye ike nri n'ụwa niile karịa ụdị Ihe ọkụkụ ọ bụla ọzọ  yá méré há bụ ihe ọkụkụ.

34567.title: Godwin Obasi
34567.extract: Godwin Olu Patrick Obasi Templeeti:Post-nominals (24 Disemba 1933 – 3 Maachị 2007) bụ onye gụrụ meteorology si mba Naijiria na onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke World Meteorological Organisation (WMO) site n'afọ 1984 ruo afọ 2003. Ọ bụ onye ọrụ odeakwụkwọ mbụ a ga-akpọ onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu na onye Afrika mbụ na-eje ozi dịka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ UN.

34919.title: De-asphalter
34919.extract:
De-asphalter bụ otu n'ime ụlọ nrụpụta mmanụ crude ma ọ bụ ihe nkwalite bitumen nke na-ekewa asphalt na akụkụ mpụta nke mmanụ crude ma ọ bụ bitumen.  Ebumnuche bụ isi nke nkewa ahụ bụ iji wepụ ihe ndị na-emerụ emerụ (asphaltenes, metals) site na nri nke ga-eme ka nkwụsị ngwa ngwa nke ndị na-emepụta ihe na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara nhazi nke ala.  N'ime ime nke a, de-asphalter bụ nzọụkwụ mbụ n'ime usoro usoro na-eme ka nri dị ala dị ala na ngwaahịa ndị a nụchara anụcha dị elu..
A na-etinyekarị unit de-asphalter n'azụ ụlọ elu distillation ma nata nri site na ala (ihe fọdụrụ). Ọ na-abụkarị solvent de-asphalter unit, SDA. SDA na-ekewa asphalt na nri n'ihi na hydrocarbons dị mfe ga-agbaze aliphatic compounds mana ọ bụghị asphaltenes. Ihe a na-emepụta site na de-asphalt unit bụ mmanụ de-asfalted ("DAO") na asphalt. 
DAO sitere  propane de-asphalting nwere ogo kachasị elu ma ọ bụ nke kachasị ala, ebe iji pentane nwere ike okpukpu abụọ ma ọ bụ okpukpu atọ nke mmepụta sitere na nri dị arọ, mana na-efu mmetọ site na ọla na carbon fọdụrụ na-eme ka ndụ nke ihe na-emebi emebi. Ọ bụrụ na ihe na-agbanye mmiri bụ butane, a ga-akpọ ya butane de-asphalter ("BDA") ma ọ bụrụ na ihe ahụ na-agbasa mmiri bụ propane, a gaghị akpọ ya propane de-Asphalter ("PDA").

35742.title: 2003 Nhọrọ nke Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya Naijiria na Taraba Steeti
35742.extract:
Ntuli aka nhoputa ndi omebe iwu Naijiria nke afo 2003 na Taraba State n'April 12, 2003, iji hoputa ndi otu ulo nnochite anya Taraba State, Nigeria.

 Onye na-azọ ndị PDP bụ Dahiru Bako Gassol meriaka ahụ, meri ndị otu pati ndị ọzọ

36730.title: Asụsụ Sherbro
36730.extract:
Asụsụ Sherbro (nke a makwaara dị ka Southern Bullom, Shiba, Amampa, Mampa, na Mampwa) bụ asụsụ dị n'ihe ize ndụ nke Sierra Leone. Ọ bụ nke alaka Mel nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Niger-Congo. Ọ bụ ezie na Sherbro nwere ọtụtụ ndị na-asụ ya karịa asụsụ Bullom ndị ọzọ, ojiji ya na-ebelata n'etiti Ndị Sherbro, na-akwado Krio na Bekee. 
Akwụkwọ mbụ e dekọrọ na Sherbro bụ nhọrọ nke ilu asaa sitere na Matiu na Luk n’ime Testament Ọhụrụ.  James Schön nke Church Missionary Society (CMS) sụgharịrị nke a ma bipụta ya na 1839..

37842.title: Christiane Chabi-Kao
37842.extract: Christiane Chabi-Kao (amụrụ na 30 June 1963) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede Benin.

38915.title: Sade Baderinwa
38915.extract: Folasade Olayinka Baderinwa (amụrụ n'Eprel 14, 1969), nke a maara dịka Sade Baderinwa. Kemgbe afọ 2003, ọ bụ onye na-Akụkọ akụkọ na ABC-TV" id="mwEg" rel="mw:WikiLink" title="WABC-TV">WABC-TV, ụlọ ọrụ ABC flagship na New York, ma ugbu a ọ na-akọwa akụkọ n'ụbọchị izu 5 nke mgbede na 11 nke mgbede nke Akụkọ ihe mere anya na Bill Ritter.

41675.title: Iwu Nchebe Nri 1990
41675.extract:
Iwu nchekwa nri 1990  bụ iwu nke nzuko omeiwu nke United Kingdom .  Ọ bụ ọrụ dị n'iwu ka a na-emeso nri ezubere maka oriri mmadụ n'ụzọ a na-achịkwa ma jikwaa ya. 
Isi ihe a na-enwe n'iwu ahụ bụ na nri ga-agbarọrọra ihe nchekwa nri nri, ga-enwe "nke anụ, ihe na-achọ mma", ma ga-achọtara nke ọma (kpọnyere aha).

49232.title: David Brown (onye Britain na-ese ihe)
49232.extract:
David Brown (nke na-arụ ọrụ 1792 - 1797) bụ odida obodo Britain na ihe osise.
Dị ka Walter Gilbey si kwuo, Brown bụ ụlọ na onye na-ese ihe ịrịba ama nke "nwere mmasị n'ọchịchọ nkà dị elu ma tinye obi ya n'ịmụ ihe osise dị ka George Morland ," onye Britain na-ese ihe nke a ma ama maka ihe osise anụmanụ ya na ihe nkiri nke ndụ rụrụ arụ.  Mgbe o resịrị azụmahịa ya, Brown mụụrụ Morland ihe wee ghọọ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị na-eṅomi ya.  Ọ bụ ezie na eserese ya gosipụtara brushstroke ka ukwuu na iji impasto dị arọ karị, ọrụ ya na-agafekarị maka nke nna ya ukwu. Brown gosipụtara eserese iri na Royal Academy n'etiti 1792 na 1797, gụnyere pasticci nke Morland na echiche nke London, nke ụfọdụ ndị nkatọ kwuru na ọ bụ ọrụ ya kacha aga nke ọma.  O gbakwunyere ego ọ na-enweta n'ime afọ ndị a site n'ịre ihe osise Morland nwetara n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri.  Brown mechara ghọọ onye na-ese ihe.

50687.title: Nri na-eme ka a nụchaa ya
50687.extract: Fatịlaịza organic bụ fatịlaịza nke a na-emepụta na okike.[1] Fatịlaịza bụ ihe enwere ike ịgbakwunye na ala ma ọ bụ osisi, iji nye nri na ịkwado uto. Fatịlaịza organic a na-ahụkarị gụnyere ihe mkpofu anụmanụ niile gụnyere mkpofu nhazi anụ, nri, slurry, na guano; gbakwunyere fatịlaịza ihe ọkụkụ dị ka compost; na biosolids. Inorganic "fatịlaịza organic" gụnyere mineral na ash. Ọgba aghara a na-ezo aka na ụkpụrụ nke Organic Agriculture, nke na-ekpebi ma enwere ike iji fatịlaịza maka ọrụ ugbo organic azụmahịa, ọ bụghị ma fatịlaịza nwere ogige organic.

50737.title: Mkpụrụ na-adịghị mma
50737.extract: Mkpụrụ ndị na-atụgharị uche bụ mkpụrụ ndị na-adịghị adị ndụ ihicha na oyi n'oge nchekwa ebe obibi.[1] N'ozuzu, mkpụrụ ndị a enweghị ike iguzogide mmetụta nke ihicha ma ọ bụ okpomọkụ na-erughị 10 Celsius (50 ° F); ya mere, a pụghị ịchekwa ha ogologo oge dịka mkpụrụ osisi orthodox n'ihi na ha nwere ike ịkwụsị ike ha. Osisi ndị na-amị mkpụrụ ndị na-atụgharị uche gụnyere ube oyibo, mango, mangosteen, lychee, koko, osisi rọba, ụfọdụ osisi horticultural, [2] osisi mmiri dị ka Nymphaea caerulea[3], na ọtụtụ osisi ndị a na-eji na nkà mmụta ọgwụ ọdịnala, dị ka ụdị Virola na. Pentaclethra. N'ikwu okwu n'ozuzu, ọtụtụ ụdị ndị ọsụ ụzọ ebe okpomọkụ nwere mkpụrụ nke ọdịnala mana ọtụtụ ụdị njedebe nwere mkpụrụ osisi na-atụgharị ma ọ bụ nke etiti.

11879.title: Ughelli Saut
11879.extract:
Ughelli Saut bụ ọchịchị ime obodo ni steeti Delta, Naijiria. Ọ bụ alaeze isii nke Urhobo bụ: Ughievwen, Arhavwarien, Effurun Otor, Eghwu, Okparabe na Olomu. Otu-Jeremi bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ Ughelli Saut LGA. Ọ bụ ọchịchị ime obodo nke anọ kacha biri ni steeti Delta.
O nwere mpaghara 786 square kilometas (303 sq mi) na onu ogugu nke 213,576 dika ngụkọ 2006. Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 333.

14046.title: Kunlé Adeyemi
14046.extract: A mụrụ Kunlé Adeyemi na (1976-04-07)7 Eprel 1976 ma bụrụ onye Naijiria na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye na-ahụ maka obodo na onye na-eme nchọpụta. Adeyemi bụ onye guzobere ma bụrụ onye isi nke NLÉ, ụlọọrụ ihe owuwu, mmewe na ime obodo, nke dị na Amsterdam, na Netherlands. Adeyemi gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos na Nigeria na Mahadum Princeton na New Jersey, United States. Tupu ọ malite ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na Netherlands, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri na Office for Metropolitan Architecture (OMA).

16075.title: Lola Flash
16075.extract:
Lola Flash (amụrụ n'afọ 1959) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto nke ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, LGBT na nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị. Onye na-ekere òkè na ACT UP n'oge ọrịa AIDS na New York City, e gosipụtara Flash na posta "Kissing Doesn't Kill" poster n'afọ 1989.
Nkà Flash, nke gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na nkwado obodo, dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Museum of Modern Art, Brooklyn Museum na Victoria na Albert Museum.

18611.title: Fathia Absie
18611.extract:
Fathia Absie (Somali: , Arabic) bụ odee Somali-American, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri,onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe onyonyo. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe ngosi abụọ ahụ, yana akụkọ ifo, ma bipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ a kpọrọ, The Imperceptible Peace Maker . Fathia bụ onye guzobere Eat With Muslims, ọrụ e mere iji mee ka ndị Alakụba na ndị na-abụghị ndị Alakụb gakọta ọnụ n'oge nri abalị na akụkọ na-enwe olileanya iwu àkwà mmiri n'etiti ndị agbata obi na obodo nke okwukwe na ọdịbendị dị iche iche.
Absie kwagara Minnesota n'ihe dị ka n' afọ 2010 ma bụrụbu onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya. Ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ òtù oru nke gụnyere Ngalaba Ọrụ na Ọrụ Ezinụlọ nke Ohio na Columbus, Ohio, Mahadum Washington na Seattle, na Voice of America na Washington D.C. Absie na-eme ihe nkiri nke ya, The Lobby, banyere mmekọrịta dị n'etiti nwoke onye ọcha na nwaanyị Somali-American. N'afọ 2013, ọ sonyeere ECHO, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na Minnesota na-ejere obodo ndị mbịarambịa ozi.
N'afọ 2011, Absie wepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Broken Dreams, ihe nkiri nke na-enyocha mkpesa mkpesa megide iwebata ndị ntorobịa Somalia na Minnesota site n'aka ndị na-anụbigara okpukpe ọkụ n'obi ókè. Ikpe ahụ wetara nlebara anya a na-achọghị site na gọọmentị US na obodo Somalia na Minnesota na gburugburu mba ahụ. Mgbe ụmụ okorobịa Somalia ahụ furu, FBI malitere nnyocha kachasị ukwuu nke US megide iyi ọha egwu kemgbe ọdachi nke 9/11. N'afọ 2014, Absie bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ eserese, The Imperceptible Peacemaker, site na CreateSpace, ọrụ na-ebipụta onwe ya nke Amazon nwe. Ihe atụ nke ikpe ziri ezi, onye dike ya, na onye ọgaranya teknụzụ mepụtara uwe nke na-enye ya ikike ịghọ ike a na-adịghị ahụ anya maka ilu ogu megide ọchịchị nchigbu na ikpe na-ezighị ezi gburugburu ụwa. Ms. Absie rụkwara ọrụ na Twin Cities PBS ebe ọ kwadoro ọtụtụ mmemme na ihe ngosi, Giving Thanks! Na 2016 Fathia Absie bụ ihe nkiri Drama nke Musa Syeed duziri · Banyere nwa okorobịa onye Alakụba gbara ọsọ ndụ na Minneapolis na nkịta furu efu gafere ụzọ. Absie mere nne Barkhad Abdirahman. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt5447852/
N'afọ 2015, Absie wepụtara ihe nkiri nke abụọ ya, akụkọ ifo The Lobby, nke ọ pụtara na ya nakwa dee ma duzie. Emere ya na Minneapolis Saint Paul International Film Festival n'ọnwa Eprel nke afọ ahụ. Nke a bụ akụkọ ifo banyere mmekọrịta dị n'etiti nwoke ọcha na nwaanyị Somali-American. Nọvemba n'afo 2017, Absie zutere Barkhad Abdirahman, n'oge a na-eme ya na nne Faysal Ahmed na-eme ihe nkiri Eric Tretbaris, Onye Mbụ Plural A nke oge a Romeo na Juliet, nke Faysal Ahmed bụ onye na-eme na Broadway, Pearce Bunting na ndị ọzọ. Absie malitere mmepụta nke akụkọ a na-akpọ "Grapes Of Heaven" Nwaanyị Somali-American nwere obi mgbawa na odee jereobere obodo Berbera, Somaliland ebe onye Somalia a ma ama na-ede uri aha ya bụ Bodheri nwụrụ n'ihi obi mgbawa n'afọ ndị 1930.

20387.title: Asusu Ayere
20387.extract:
Ayere (Uwu) bụ asụsụ dị iche iche nke di Na Volta Níger nke Naijiria, nke nwere njikọ chiri anya naanị na Ahaan.
A na-akpọ ya aha obodo Ayere na Ijumu LGA, Kogi Steeti. Obodo nta Ayere nwere  dịka mmadụ 10,000, dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ si kwuo.

23428.title: Uchechukwu Nnam-Obi
23428.extract:
Uchechukwu Nnam-Obi bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, na onyẹ otu ndị nnọchi anya Nzukọ Mba Naijiria site na Rivers State na 9th National Assembly (Nigeria).
Nam-Obi na-anọchite anya Ahoada West/Ogba/Egbema/Ndoni Federal Constituency ugbu a na 9th National Assembly (Nigeria) na ikpo okwu nkẹ Peoples Democratic Party (Nigria).

32039.title: DJ Bally
32039.extract: Bobai Balat, onye a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Bally B., bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri diski na Naijiria, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, onye na'ihe nkiri olu, na onye na-ahụ maka ihe nkiri telivishọn. Ọ nwetara ewu ewu dị ka otu n'ime ndị enyi nke Big Brother Naija 2017 reality game show; a localised franchise nke Dutch game show. N'etiti ọrụ ndị ọzọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ na Lagos yana onye na-ahụ maka ọnụ ọgụgụ maka Gọọmentị etiti. Ọ bụ baritone, nke a maara dị ka Baritone Bally na ihe ngosi ahụ. N'afọ 2015, Balat mepụtara Afro na-etinye electronic bootleg remix na egwu Rihanna bụ FourFiveSeconds, nke wetara ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe ma mee ka akụkụ mash-up na ụlọ ọrụ redio Lagos; The Beat 99.9 FM.

34609.title: Christian Nwachukwu Okeke
34609.extract: Christian Nwachukwu Okeke bụ prọfesọ nke International Law, Jurisprudence na Comparative Law na Golden Gate University School of Law, San Francisco California. Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Sompong Sucharitkul Center for Advanced International Legal Studies na onye nduzi LL.M. na S.J.D. Ihe omume na ọmụmụ iwu mba ụwa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ. Ọ bụbu Emeritus Pioneer Dean nke Faculty Law na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, Awka, Nigeria, na onye natara Pro Ecclesia et Pontifice (Cross of Honour). Ugbu , ọ bụ Pro Chancellor nke Mahadum Godfrey Okoye.

34912.title: Net radiometer
34912.extract: Net radiometer bụ ụdị actinometer eji tụọ ụzarị ụgbụ (NR) n'elu ụwa maka ngwa meteorological.  Aha net radiometer na-egosipụta eziokwu na ọ na-atụle ọdịiche dị n'etiti radieshon ala/na-abata na elu/ pụta site na Ụwa.  A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe na ngalaba nke ecophysiology.

36716.title: Wazobia
36716.extract: Wazobia (  Nkọwa okwu Yoruba: [wàzɔ́bíà]) bụ okwu nke pụtara "bịaru" n'asụsụ atọ dị mkpa nke Naijiria: Yoruba (wa), Hausa (zo), na Igbo (Biya).    na-ejikarị ya eme ihe dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke ịdị n'otu, ịdị iche iche, na itinye aka na Naịjirịa, mba nwere ihe karịrị agbụrụ na asụsụ 250. A na-ejikwa okwu ahụ dị ka aha maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị iche iche, ihe omume ọdịbendị, na mmegharị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Naịjirịa.

38695.title: Ngozi Opara
38695.extract: Ngozi Opara (amuru 11 Novemba 1971) bu onye egwuregwu aka Naijiria.  Ɔ gbara na ekiri na ekiri na 1992 Summer Olympics

39331.title: Vilma Nenganga
39331.extract:
Vilma Pegado Nenganga (Ụkọ 2 Nọvemba 1996) onye bụ onye ike aka Angolan maka Petro de Luanda . Nengang mere mpụta mbụ ya na otu mba Angola na egwuregwu 2015 nke Africa .
egwuregwu onye egwuregwu, ọ bụ onye otu ndị Angolan na esemokwu ndị eze 2014 .

40948.title: Russian Medical Fund
40948.extract:
Russian Medical Fund bụ ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka mmadụ tọrọ ntọala na Vienna, Virginia,  iji kwado nlekọta ahụike maka ụmụaka na Saint Petersburg, Russia, n'oge oge Soviet gasịrị.  
Ego ahụike Russia nyere akụrụngwa, akụrụngwa, na ọzụzụ dibịa  na ngalaba obi ụmụaka nke ụlọ ọgwụ ụmụaka #1   nke Saint Petersburg. Ego ahụ ewepụtara maka ngalaba nlekọta ahụike ụmụaka nwere akwa akwa ọhụrụ,  zụtara igwe na-eku ume obi,  wee degharịa nrụzigharị zuru oke nke ụlọ ọrụ ịwa ahụ.  Na mgbakwunye, RMF kwadoro ka ọ gaa n'ihu na ego US maka mmemme obodo n'ebe ahụ  na nkwado ọrụ enyemaka mmadụ na ahụike nke òtù metụtara ya na-arụ, Global Healing. 
Emebere nzukọ a dị ka ntọala nzuzo na 1996  wee na-arụ ọrụ ruo 2008.  Ego a jikọtara ya na American International Health Alliance .

41549.title: Enweghị nhata ego na Malaysia
41549.extract:
Templeeti:Image frameDị ka UNDP 1997 Human Development Report,  na 2004 United Nations Development Human Development (UNHDP) si kwuo,  Malaysia nwere oke ego na-akpata ego n'etiti ndị ọgaranya na ndị ogbenye na Ndịda Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia, karịa nke Philippines, Thailand . Singapore, Vietnam na Indonesia . >
Nkwupụta UNHDP na-egosi na 10% kasị baa ọgaranya na Malaysia na-achịkwa 38.4% nke ego akụ na ụba ma e jiri ya tụnyere 10% kasị daa ogbenye na-achịkwa naanị 1.7%. Agbanyeghị, dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ gọọmentị sitere na Ngalaba Prime Minister si kwuo, ahaghị nhata na-agbadata nke ukwuu kemgbe 1970, yana ọnụ ọgụgụ Gini na-agbadata na obere oge niile nke 0.40 na 2014.

46886.title: Christiane Cegavske
46886.extract:
Christiane Cegavske bụ onye omenkà America na - eze ihe nkiri .
A mara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri animated Blood Tea na Red String [1] na maka ime ọkụ ndị a na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ahụ Obi dị njikere ihe niile .  O mekwara obere ihe nkiri Blood na Sunflowers ma mee animation maka usoro TV X-Chromosome .  ụdị nke abụọ, dị na Sand, na-dị ogbu a ka nke 2023.

48378.title: Maazị William Bray
48378.extract: Michael William Bray (September 25, 1889 -.J-.January 17, 1961)  o bu onye Oka ikpe na onye ndoro ndoro Ọchịchị nke America. O bu lieutenant governor nke New York bido na 1933 ruo na 1938.

51350.title: Carmine Giorgione
51350.extract: Carmine Giorgione (amuru 17 June 1991) bu onye okacha amara nke ndi Italy nke na-agba egwu maka klọb Serie C  Giugliano . Ọ nọrọ ihe karịrị 7 oge na Serie C.

51833.title: Humayun Kabir (onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Debra)
51833.extract: Humayun Kabir (amụrụ 3 Eprel 1961) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị India na onye bụbu onye uwe ojii si West Bengal, onye na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu West Bengal Legislative Assembly sitere na mpaghara Debra kemgbe 2021. Onye otu Trinamool Congress, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka minista minista steeti n'okpuru ozi Banerjee nke atọ, site na 2021 ruo 2022.

52070.title: Bivas Sardar
52070.extract: A na-akpọ Bivas Sardar dị ka Vobo. Ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị India nke All India Trinamool Congress.[1][2] Ọ bụ onye omebe iwu, [3] ahọpụtara na mpaghara Baruipur Purba na ntuli aka ọgbakọ omebe iwu 2021 West Bengal.

52658.title: 2009 Ikpe ndina n'ike na igbu ọchụ
52658.extract: Ikpe ndina n'ike na igbu ọchụ nke ụlọ ahịa, nke a makwaara dị ka Asiya, ikpe Neelofar, [1] [2] bụ njide, ndina n'ike na igbu ọchụ nke ụmụ agbọghọ abụọ nke CRPF boro.[3] N'ọnọdụ dị omimi n'etiti 29 na 30 Mee 2009 na Bongam, Shopian district na steeti India nke Jammu na Kashmir. Ụmụnwaanyị abụọ, bụ ndị nwunye nwanne, tụfuru n'ubi mkpụrụ osisi ha na-ala na 29 May 2009. N'ụtụtụ echi ya, a hụrụ ozu ha ma otu kilomita dịpụrụ adịpụ. Ndị uwe ojii obodo jụrụ ebubo a na-ekwu na ọ dị ka mmiri riri ụmụnwaanyị ahụ n'ime mmiri.

6083.title: 8 Ọgọọst
6083.extract: 8 Ọgọọst  bu ubochi nke 8th (nke asatọ) na onwa ana kpo Ọgọọst. Na Gregorian calender, 8 Ọgọọst  bu ubochi nke 220th (221st na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo. Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 145 du mgbe afo na agwu.

17789.title: David Driskell
17789.extract: David C. Driskell (June 7, 1931 eprel 1, 2020) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ọkà mmụta na ónyé nlekọta; a maara ya maka ọrụ ya n'ịmepụta nka Africa-America dị ka mpaghara ọmụmụ dị iche. N'oge ndụ ya, a kpọtụrụ Driskell aha dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi ụwa na-ahụ maka nka Africa na America. Driskell nwèrè utu aha nke Distinguished University Professor of Art, Emeritus, na Mahadum Maryland, College Park.

17875.title: Erlena Chisolm Bland
17875.extract:
Erlena Chisolm Bland (Jenụwarị 18, 1923 na Febụwarị 16, 2009) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese ọkpụkpụ.
A mụrụ ya na Washington, D.C., Bland gàrà Dunbar High School ma nweta nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts na Mahadum Howard; ọ nwetara nzèrè masta na sayensị ọbá akwụkwọ na Mahadụ Maryland, College Park . Ọ nọrọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri abụọ dị ka ónyé na-ahụ màkà ọbá akwụkwọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụmụ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ pụrụ iche na Goding Elementary School na Washington. O mepụtara nka n'oge ezumike ya, ma mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ gàrà klas na Maryland Institute College of Art, Corcoran School of Art, na Art League na Alexandria, Virginia tupu ọ nweta ụlọ ọrụ. O gosipụtara n'ógbè Washington DC na ebe ndị ọzọ n'oge ọrụ ya, na-egosi ọrụ ya ma n'onwe ya ma n"ihe ngosi otu. Ya na di ya, Dr. Charles N. Bland, nwèrè ụmụ abụọ, nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị; di na nwunye ahụ chepụtara ma wuo ụlọ nke ha na Kalmia Road na Washington. Bland nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa n'ụlọ ndị agadi na Washington. E liri ya na Fort Lincoln Cemetery mgbè emesịrị ememe olili ozu na Dumbarton Chapel na ogige Mahadum Howard.

17932.title: TM88
17932.extract: Bryan Lamar Simmons (amụrụ n'April 4, 1987), nke a maara dị ka TM88 (nke a makwaara dị ka TrackMan 88), bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na DJ si Atlanta, Georgia. Ọ bụ ónyé otu Atlanta na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na ndị na-ede egwu 808 Mafia, dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi na-esote Southside. Simmons mepụtara egwu zuru ụwa ọnụ XO Tour Llif3. Egwú ahụ ga-aga n'ihu ịghọ ónyé a họpụtara na Grammy na otu n'ime egwu kachasị egwu na Spotify na ihe dị ka ijeri 1.5 na-asọ asọ ka ọ na-erule Julaị 2021.

21495.title: Addo
21495.extract:
Addo (aha nna)
Ogige Ntụrụndụ Addo Addo Elephant National Park na Eastern Cape, South Africa
Addo, Eastern Cape, obodo dị na mpaghara Eastern Cape, South Africa
AB Addo, onye Sweden bụbu onye na-emepụta igwe ọfịs
Asụsụ Edo, nke a makwaara dị ka "Addo"

24906.title: Yasmina Laaroussi
24906.extract: Yasmina Laaroussi (Arabic; amụrụ na 15 Febụwarị 1994) bụ onye Morocco na agba bọọlụ nke na agba dịka onye na agba ọsọ n'etiti maka ụlọ ọrụ Serie C nke Ịtali Venezia Calcio na otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco.

29349.title: Lea Salonga
29349.extract:
.Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Salonga gbagoro na mba ụwa mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ ndu Kim na Miss Saigon na West End wee nweta onyinye Laurence Olivier maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na egwu.  Ọ kwuziri ọrụ ahụ na Broadway, [1] na-emeri ihe nrite Drama Desk Award, Outer Critics Circle Award, na Theater World Awards tupu ya eme akụkọ ihe mere eme dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri Eshia mbụ meriri Tony Award na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke abụọ meriri maka arụmọrụ kacha mma.  Site n'aka onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'ihe egwu.[2]
Salonga bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri izizi sitere na Eshia ka ọ rụọ ọrụ Éponine na Fantine na egwu Les Misérables na Broadway.[1] [2]  Ọ kọwakwara Éponine na Fantine n'ime egwu egwu nke iri na iri abụọ na ise, n'otu n'otu, na London.  O nyere olu abụ nke eze ukwu Disney abụọ: Princess Jasmine na Aladdin (1992) na Fa Mulan na Mulan (1998) na Mulan II (2004).  Akpọrọ ya aha Disney Legend na 2011 maka ọrụ ya na The Walt Disney Company.[3]  Salonga gbara egwu dị ka Wu Mei-Li na 2002 Broadway revival nke Flower Drum Song.  Site na 2015 ruo 2016, ọ laghachiri na Broadway iji gosi Kei Kimura na nkwado, na site na 2017 ruo 2019, ọ pụtara dị ka Erzulie na revival Broadway nke Ozugbo na Island a.  N'afọ 2023, ọ sonyeere ndị otu na-emepụta ihe wee wepụta mmepụta Broadway mbụ nke Here Lies Love, na-eme dị ka Aurora Aquino.
Salonga was the first Filipino artist to sign with an international record label (Atlantic Records in 1993). In her career, she has performed for six Philippine presidents (Ferdinand Marcos, Corazon Aquino, Fidel V. Ramos, Joseph Estrada, Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, and Benigno S. Aquino III), four American presidents (George H. W. Bush, Bill Clinton, George W. Bush, and Joe Biden), South Korean president Yoon Suk Yeol, and for Diana, Princess of Wales and Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II. She has toured widely as a concert artist and has played numerous theatre, film, and television roles in North America, Europe, and Asia.
Maria Lea Carmen Imutan Salonga was born on February 22, 1971, in the Ermita district of Manila, Philippines to Feliciano Genuino Salonga, a naval rear admiral and shipping company owner, and María Ligaya Alcántara Imutan of Pulupandan, Negros Occidental. She spent the first six years of her childhood in Angeles City before returning to Manila. As a child, Salonga sang at family parties before being encouraged by her cousin to audition for an upcoming production of The King and I, where she made her professional debut.

35682.title: 1999 Nhọrọ gọvanọ Kebbi Steeti
35682.extract:
.      Nhọpụta mmetụta steeti Kebbi n'afọ 1999 mere na Jenụwarị 9, 1999. Onye ndọrọndọrọ APP bụ Adamu Aliero meriaka ahụ, meri Mohammed Kaliel onye aghandọrọ PDP      
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị e debanyere aha na steeti ahụ bụ 1,167,171, ngụkọta ndị e mere bụ 500,938, votu ziri ezi bụ 472,062 na votu jụrụ bụ 28,876.

39166.title: Susan Roberts
39166.extract:
Templeeti:MedalTop
Templeeti:MedalSport
Templeeti:MedalCountry
Templeeti:MedalBronze
Templeeti:MedalBottomSusan Roberts ( amuru 21 1939 na Johannesburg ) bu onye South Africa onye nwuru anwu nke gbara n'ahọmpi Olimpik Summer 1956.

40051.title: National Council for the Evaluation of Social Development Policy (CONEVAL)
40051.extract:
National Council for the Evaluation of Social Development Policy ( Spanish : Consejo Nacional de Evaluación de la Política de Desarrollo Social ) bụ ọgbakọ Mexico na-ahazi site na Secretariat of Welfare . CONEVAL bụ ọgbakọ n'usoro iwu kwadoro nke nwere ụdị iwu, ikike nke aka ya, ikike nka na njikwa.
Ihe okike nke CONEVAL sitere na okike nke General Law of Social Development (LGDS). Iwu ahụ na-amanye ụlọ ọrụ a ịchịkọta omume ezubere iche maka mmezu ebumnuche, atụmatụ na ihe ndị ka mkpa nke National Social Development Policy.  CONEVAL bụ onye isi nke Secretariat of Welfare, ndị nchọpụta agụmakwụkwọ isii nke National Social Development Commission họpụtara, na odeakwụkwọ ukwu na-ahụ maka Council. Ọ na-ewepụta ntuziaka nleba anya nke Iwu mmefu mmefu ego nyere ka ndị dabere na ụlọ ọrụ hazie mmemme mmekọrịta ha na-arụ ọrụ.
Kansụl ahụ na-eji ụzọ dị iche iche kọwaa, chọpụta na tụọ ịda ogbenye site na iji ozi sitere na National Institute of Statistics and Geography (INEGI).  Ntụle ịda ogbenye multidimensional gụnyere ihe ngosi ndị a:

Ego ndị mmadụ na-enweta ugbu a maka onye ọ bụla
Oghere agụmakwụkwọ
Ịnweta ọrụ ahụike
Ịnweta nchekwa ọha
Ogo na oghere nke ebe obibi
Ịnweta ọrụ ndị bụ isi na ebe obibi
Ịnweta nri
Ọkwa nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya .

40880.title: Nne Nkwado Cocaine
40880.extract: Cocaine Godnne bụ ihe nkiri 2017 American biographical mpụ ihe nkiri nke Guillermo Navarro duziri nke David McKenna dere.  Ihe nkiri ahụ bụ Catherine Zeta-Jones dị ka Griselda Blanco, bụ onye maara dị ka Cocaine Nne Chineke.  [1] [2] Ọ ngosi na 2017 Camerimage na Poland wee gosi na ọwa Lifetime na January 20, 2018.

43719.title: Mulugeta Wami
43719.extract:
Mulugeta Wami (amụrụ 17 Julaị 1982) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge bụ ọkachamara na marathon . O nwere ihe kacha mma nke 2:07:11 maka anya. Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke Marathon Ljubljana na 2013.
Amụrụ na Addis Ababa,  ọ bụ nwanne Gete Wami, onye mmeri ụwa 1999 na onye gbara ọsọ Olympic 2000 na mita 10,000 .  Ọpụpụ mbụ ya n'ebe dị anya marathon bịara na 2006 Amsterdam Marathon, ebe ọ gụchara nke itoolu na oge nke 2:13:19 awa.  Ọ gara n'ihu ruo elekere 2:11:47 na Marathon Eindhoven nke afọ na-esote, na-ewere ọnọdụ ise  Na 2008 ọ meriri Egmond Half Marathon, mana o jisiri naanị nkeji iri na anọ na Marathon Beijing . 
Mulugeta gara n'ihu na-emewanye nke ọma na marathon na 2009, na-agba ọsọ 2:10:49 na Marathon Los Angeles (nke anọ n'ozuzu) wee buru aha Chuncheon Marathon na oge nke 2:09:50 awa.  Ọ laghachiri iji gbachitere aha Egmond Half ya, mana ọ jisiri naanị n'ọkwa nke ise.  Abụọ ndị ọzọ kacha mma bịara na mmalite nke 2008 ka ọ na-etinye oge 59:55 nkeji nke ise na 20 van Alphen ụzọ agbụrụ na 2:08:32 na Paris Marathon, na-agwụcha isii n'ozuzu.  Ọ kwụsịkwara idowe aha ya na Chuncheon, na-achịkwa awa 2:13:07 enweghị ụkọ.  Ọ na-agba ọsọ naanị ntakịrị (2:12:55) na Marathon JoongAng Seoul - naanị agbụrụ ya na 2011. 
N'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ nke isii na 2012 Amsterdam Marathon, o nwetara ihe kasị mma nke 2:07:11 awa.  A na-agba ọsọ nke 2:10:40 bụ nanị maka nke iri na 2013 Seoul International Marathon, ma mbụ mmeri ya na anya sochiri na ala profaịlụ Ljubljana Marathon na October.

44756.title: Ọrịa Eisenmenger
44756.extract:
Eisenmenget syndrome maobu Eisenmenger's syndrome bu usoro nke do na long-standing left-to-right cardiac shunt butere  nke si na congenital heart defect nke na ebute pulmonary hypertension nakwa ntughari shunt na cyanotic right-to-left shunt. Maka mputa nke nnucha n'iji echocardiography N'oge na ndu mmadu mere Ka nsogbu obi nke na eto ruo Eisenmenger syndrome belata..
Ọrịa Eisenmenger n'ime nne dị ime nwere ike ịkpata nnukwu nsogbu,  ọ bụ ezie na a kọọrọ ọmụmụ nke ọma.  Ọnwụ nne na-adị site na 30% ruo 60%, ma enwere ike ịkọwa ya na mgbaasị, ọbara na-akpụ akpụ na akwara na-aga ebe ndị dị anya, hypovolemia, ụkwara ọbara ma ọ bụ preeclampsia. Ọtụtụ ọnwụ na-ewere ọnọdụ ma ọ bụ n'ime izu mbụ mgbe amuchara. A ga-edina ụmụ nwanyị dị ime na-arịa ọrịa Eisenmenger n'ụlọ ọgwụ mgbe izu nke 20 nke ime gasịrị, ma ọ bụ n'oge ma ọ bụrụ na nsogbu ahụike emee.

45786.title: Richardt Strydom
45786.extract:
Richardt Strydom (amụrụ 24 Septemba 1971) bụ onye nka, okike na onye nkuzi dabere na Johannesburg. Ọ bụ onye isi nkuzi na eserese eserese na Mahadum North-West  na Potchefstroom.
Strydom anatala ọtụtụ onyinye gụnyere ABSA l'Atelier Merit Award (1997), SASOL New Signatures Merit Award (1997),  N'ozuzu onye mmeri nke SASOL New Signatures Competition na 2008,   na Ihe nturu ugo nke Artist Visual, Stellenbosch Woordfees 2010.  maka akwụkwọ nka, Ad Hominem,  na mmekorita ya na Jaco Burger.

46113.title: Suzan Mutesi
46113.extract: Suzan Mutesi (amuru Suzan Faith Mutesi Mufumbiro ) bu onye omere nke Ugandan-Australia, ihe nlere na onye mmebe ejiji .

49157.title: John Auld (onye na-ese ihe)
49157.extract: John Auld (21 Jenụwarị 1914 – 1996) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Britain. Ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nke ihe osise eserese na asọmpi nka na 1948 Summer Olympics .

52207.title: Hage Appa
52207.extract: Hage Appa bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị India si Arunachal Pradesh nke Bharatiya Janata Party. Ọ bụ onye otu nzuko omebe iwu na ọgbakọ omebe iwu nke Arunachal Pradesh nke iri na otu. O meriri ntuli aka ahụ n'enweghị mgbagha.

52880.title: Were Nlaghachi n'abalị (nhazi)
52880.extract: Take Back the Night bụ mmemme mba ụwa na ọgbakọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ nwere ebumnuche ịkwụsị mmekọahụ, mmekọrịta, na ime ihe ike n'ụlọ n'ụdị niile.  A na-eme ọtụtụ narị ihe omume na mba 30 kwa afọ.  Ihe omume na-agụnyekarị ngagharị iwe, ngagharị iwe na vigils ezubere dị ka ngagharị iwe na ime ihe ozugbo megide mmeko nwoke na nwanyị na ụdị mmekọahụ, mmekọrịta na ime ihe ike ndị ọzọ.  Na 2001, otu ụmụ nwanyị ndị sonyere na njem mbụ Take Back the Night, gbakọtara iji guzobe .

54168.title: Alpha Pi Delta
54168.extract: Alfa Pi Delta Sorority, Inc (ΑΠΔ) bụ onye America sorority maka ndị inyom America America.

55527.title: Catherine Ouedraogo
55527.extract: Catherine Ouedraogo (amụrụ 1 February 1962, na Réo) bụ onye na-agbachitere ikike ụmụ nwanyị na onye ọrụ ugbo si obodo Koho Gnabiro dị na Burkina Faso. Ọ na-agba ọsọ Fondation Cardinale Emile Biyenda (FOCEB) ndo na Ouagadougou kemgbe 2005. Ebe nchekwa ahụ na-ewere ụmụ agbọghọ ndị dị afọ 12 ruo 18 bụ ndị lanarịrị mmeko nwoke, mmalite na ịlụ di na nwunye na ime ime achọghị. N'agbata afọ 2001 na 2009, ebe nchekwa ahụ nwere opekata mpe ụmụ agbọghọ 209 na ụmụ ha 168, ndị a mụrụ ebe ahụ ma ọ bụ kpọọrọ nne ha.

8607.title: Oluranti Adebule
8607.extract: Dr Oluranti Adebule, onye amụrụ na Novemba 27, 1970 na Lagos state bụ onye na-esote onye isiala nke iri na ise nke Lagos state.

13519.title: Vuyelwa Booi
13519.extract:
{{ Infobox person | name= Vuyelwa Booi | image= | alt= | birth_date= {{ birth date and age | df= yes | 1981 | 4 | 6 } } | birth_place= Soweto, South Africa  | nationality= South African  n | years_active= 1994–present | known_for= | spouse= | children= } }
Vuyelwa Booi (amụrụ na 6 Eprel 1981), bụ onye South Afrika na-eme ihe nkiri, onye n’eti egwu na onye na-egosi televishọn. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Chappie, Swartwater ya na Sink .
A mụrụ Booi na 6 Eprel 1981 na Soweto, Johannesburg, South Africa. Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Dominican Convent na Belgravia, Johannesburg . Mgbe ahụ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Potchefstroom High School maka umunwaanyi ma gụọ akwụkwọ na 1998. N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ịbụ abụ na ukwe ma mee ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ. O mechara nzere na Theatre Arts na Midrand University, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Midrand Graduate Institute .
N'afọ 2015, o kwupụtara na ọ dara mbà n'obi ruo ọtụtụ afọ.
N'afọ 1997, a họpụtara ya na North West Youth Choir ma mee njem na Europe na July. N'oge njem a, o nwere ike ime ihe nkiri na mba ise, sonye na asọmpi yana ememme ukwe. N'afọ 2000, o nwetara ohere ịrụ ọrụ ndu na egwuregwu ụlọ ọrụ na Ahia Theatre. N'afọ 2001, ọ sonyeere ndị otu SABC2 soap opera 7de Laan . Na soapie, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka "Alyce Morapedi" ruo n'afọ 2004. N'afọ 2005, ọ kwagara New York ma mụtakwuo ihe nkiri mgbe ọ debanyere aha na New York Film Academy. Otú ọ dị, ọ pụghị imecha usoro ahụ.
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa na Disemba 2005, Vuyelwa sonyeere egwu egwu Drumstruck rụrụ na Broadway. Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2006, o mere nkwado olu maka onye egwu Wyclef Jean maka remix nke 2006 FIFA World Cup theme song tinyere Shakira . Mgbe afọ abụọ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere ọzọ na soapie 7de Laan na Nọvemba 2006. Ka ọ na aga, ọ nwetara ọrụ ndu nke "Pabi" nke ihe nkiri ndị ntorobịa SABC1 Soul Buddyz oge atọ. Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara dịka onye ọbịa na ihe ngosi egwuregwu egwu SABC2 Noot vir Noot . N'oge ahụ, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ na-akwado usoro magazin ndụ SABC2 Pasella .
N'afọ 2010, ọ nọchiri Dosto Noge dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi ikike ndị ahịa SABC2 "Speak Out" maka oge nke anọ ya. N'afọ 2015, ọ nọchiri Anele Mdoda dị ka onye na-elekọta usoro ihe nkiri Dream School SA . N'otu afọ ahụ, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ na Hollywood blockbuster Chappie ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ "Maria" na ihe nkiri Sink . N'afọ 2017, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Swartwater ma rụọ ọrụ "Portia Malefe".

13572.title: Adora Oleh
13572.extract: Adora Oleh, bụ onye Britain amụrụ na Naijiria na-eme ihe ngosi TV na onye mbụ na-akwado MTN Project Fame, nke ọ kwadoro ruo afọ ise. Na Sọnde 8 Disemba na afo 2013, Adora Oleh ritere ihe nrite nwanyị kachasị ewu ewu na TV na Nigerian Broadcasters Awards nke weere ọnọdụ na Legoos. Ọ na-eme ihe ngosi okwu ya - "The Adora Oleh Show" na Vox Afrika, mmemme ntụrụndụ nke na-elekwasị anya na ndị nlereanya dị mma na ndị ọchụnta ego na-eme ebili mmiri (karịsịa ntụrụndụ, ejiji, na azụmahịa).

14223.title: Del B
14223.extract: Ayodele Basil, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Del B, bụ onye Naijiria (onye na-edepụta) onye injinia ụda, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ. A maara ya nke ọma maka imepụta egwu Kcee "Limpopo", nke gara n'ihu ka a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Abụ nke Afọ na mbipụta 2013 nke The Headies . N'afọ 2012, o mepụtara egwu "Shake" nke Flavour N'abania, nke nwetara otuto dị egwu n'etiti ndị nkatọ egwu.

17209.title: Dean Mitchell
17209.extract:
Dean Mitchell (amụrụ n'afọ 1957) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe osise nke na-arụ ọrụ na mmiri na mmanụ. A kpọtụrụ ndị ọ na-ekwu màkà ha, ndị sitere n'ọdịbendị ndị Africa America, màkà omimi mmetụta uche ha, izere mmetụta dị mfe, na mmetụta zuru oke nkè imewe.
A mụrụ Mitchell na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania na 1957, ma zụlite ya na Quincy, Florida. Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Columbus College of Art and Design na 1980, Mitchell kwagara Kansas City, Missouri wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na Hallmark Cards. Ọ nọgidere na Hallmark màkà afọ atọ sochirinụ wee malite ịbanye na asọmpi nka mbà na nke mbà ụwa. Mgbè Hallmark kwụsịrị ọrụ ya na 1983, o kpebiri ịchụso ise ihe dị ka ọrụ ógè niile.
Ihe osise Mitchell abụwo isiokwu nke ọtụtụ isiokwu, a na-anọchite ányá ya na ebe ngosi nka na ụlọ ọrụ nchịkọta, gụnyere Kemper Museum of Contemporary Art, Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art, na Saint Louis Art Museum. Ndụ ya bụ isiokwu nke akwụkwọ ihe osise màkà ụmụaka, Against All Odds: Artist Dean Mitchell's Story .
Mitchell gosikwara stampụ US, dị ka stampụ Louis Armstrong nke 1995 na usoro Jazz Musician.

17790.title: John E. Dowell Jr.
17790.extract: John Edward Dowell Jr. (amụrụ na Machị 25, 1941 na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania) bụ onye America na-ebi akwụkwọ, etcher, lithographer, painter, na prọfesọ nké óbìbì akwụkwọ na Tyler School of Art na Mahadum Temple.

18407.title: Youlou Mabiala
18407.extract: Gilbert Youlou Mabiala (amụrụ  ya na 3 Machị 1947), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Prince Youlou, bụ onye na-edekọ egwu egwu Congo, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-agụ egwú, na Republic of the Congo (Congo-Brazzaville). Ọ bụbụ onye otu egwu egwu Congo TPOK Jazz nke na-achịkwa egwu egwu Congolese site na 1960s ruo 1980s.

28548.title: Anloga District
28548.extract: Anloga District bụ otu n'ime mpaghara iri na asatọ dị na mpaghara Volta, Ghana. Na mbụ, ọ bụbu akụkụ nke Keta District buru ibu n'oge ahụ na 10 Machị 1989, nke e kere site na Anlo District Council. Otú ọ dị na 19 Febụwarị 2019, e kewara akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke distrikti ahụ iji mepụta Anloga District dị ka otu n'ime distrikti isii nke Gọọmentị Akufo-Addo meghere, ya mere akụkụ fọdụrụnụ ka ọ bụrụ Keta Municipal District. Nzukọ distrikti ahụ dị n'akụkụ ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke mpaghara Volta ma nwee Anloga dị ka isi obodo ya.

31606.title: Adamu Muhammad Bulkachuwa
31606.extract: Adamu Muhammad Bulkachuwa (amuru Eprel 16, 1940) bu onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na onye omebe iwu nọ ugbu a na-anọchite anya Bauchi north senatorial district, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu n'oge ntuliaka izugbe Naijiria 2019 n'okpuru All Progressive Congress (APC). Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello.

32532.title: Ebe obibi ndị a gụrụ akwụkwọ
32532.extract:
Ebe a na-agụ akwụkwọ nwere ike ịgụnye ihe edere ede (akwụkwọ akụkọ, akwụkwọ na posters), mgbasa ozi eletrọniki na mgbasa ozi (radio na TV) na teknụzụ ozi na nkwukọrịta (ekwentị, kọmputa na ohere Ịntanetị), nke na-agba ume inweta agụ na ide, ọdịbendị ịgụ ihe, njigide ịgụ na ide ka mma na ịnweta ozi.
Enwere ike ịchọta ebe ndị a gụrụ akwụkwọ na mpaghara ọha na eze na nke onwe, gụnyere ụlọ, ụlọ akwụkwọ, ebe ọrụ, obodo, na mba ahụ dum. N'ihi ya, ịzụlite ebe ndị bara ọgaranya na-agụnye Iwu asụsụ, mbipụta akwụkwọ, mgbasa ozi, na ịnweta ozi na ihe ọgụgụ.
Ebe obibi bara ọgaranya na-agụ akwụkwọ dị mkpa maka ịgba ndị mmadụ ume ka ha bụrụ ndị na-agụ egwú ma na-akwado ma na-ejikọta nkà ọhụrụ ha nwetara na ndụ ha kwa ụbọchị. Enwere ike ịkọwa gburugburu ebe obibi na ọdịbendị ebe ndị mmadụ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ndị na-akwado nnweta na omume nke ịgụ na ide. N'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ nke mba na-emepe emepe, enweghị ihe edere ede n'ụdị ọ bụla bụ nnukwu ihe mgbochi na omume nke ịgụ na ide.

33491.title: Ike ọgwụgwụ AIDS
33491.extract: Ike ogwugwu oria obirinajaocha bu onodu nke ndi mmadu maobu ndi obodo  na ano gnasara ihe oria mmenwo Mee horo na ndu ha maobu otu obi ji aju ndi mmadu oyi n'enabata Ozi gnasara oriaa Mata ohom nke ogologo oge ona ano.

35021.title: Nkà mmụta kpakpando nke ọdịda anyanwụ
35021.extract:
Ịgụ kpakpando nke ọdịda anyanwụ bụ usoro ịgụ kpakpando kacha ewu ewu na mba ndị dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ. Ịgụ kpakpando ndị dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ sitere na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Ptolemy's Tetrabiblos (narị afọ nke abụọ OA), nke n'aka nke ya bụ ihe na aga n'ihu nke ndị Gris na n'ikpeazụ omenala ndị Babilọn.
Ịgụ kpakpando n’Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ na abụkarị horoscopic, ya bụ, ọ bụ ụdị ịgba afa na adabere n’owuwu nke horoscope ruo otu oge, dị ka ọmụmụ mmadụ yana ebe (ebe ọ bụ na mpaghara oge nwere ike imetụta eserese ọmụmụ mmadụ ma ọ bụ ọ gaghị emetụta) , nke a na ekwu na ahụ dị iche iche nke mbara igwe na enwe mmetụta. A na ebelata ịgụ kpakpando n'ọdịbendị a ma ama nke ọdịda anyanwụ ka ọ bụrụ ịgụ kpakpando akara anyanwụ, nke na atụle naanị ụbọchị ọmụmụ nke onye ahụ (ya bụ "ọnọdụ Sun" n'ụbọchị ahụ).
Ịgụ ịgụ kpakpando bụ pseudoscience na ọ na adarịrị nnwale na nkwenye usoro.
A na ewere ịgụ kpakpando n'ọtụtụ ebe dị ka ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ na sayensị a na akwanyere ùgwù tupu amụ ihe, mana nyocha ọgbara ọhụrụ ahụbeghị ihe ndabere na agbanwe agbanwe na ya.

35111.title: Nigel Hemming
35111.extract:
Nigel Hemming, bụ onye Britain na-ese ihe, ọkachamara na foto anụmanụ na ihe osise. A mụrụ ya na afọ 1957 na Staffordshire.   ọ bụ kwa onye na-ese nnụnụ, ọ bụ ihe osise nkịta ya ghọrọ ihe a ma ama.
A kọwara  ya dị ka "otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nkịta a ma ama na UK"  na otu n'ime ihe ịga nke ọma.

35126.title: Okpomọkụ dị irè
35126.extract:
Okpomọkụ dị irè nke ahụ dị ka kpakpando ma ọ bụ mbara ala bụ okpomọkụ nke ahụ ojii nke ga ebunye otu ngụkọta nke radieshon electromagnetic. A na ejikarị ọnọdụ okpomọkụ dị mma eme ihe dị ka atụmatụ nke okpomọkụ dị n'elu anụ ahụ mgbe a na amataghị mgbatị ahụ na emepụta ihe (dị ka ọrụ nke wavelength).
Mgbe net nke kpakpando ma ọ bụ mbara ala n'ikuku dị na mkpa wavelength band bụ ihe na erughị ịdị n'otu (ihe na.erughị nke a nwa ahụ), n'ezie okpomọkụ nke ahụ ga adị elu karịa irè okpomọkụ. Mgbapụta ụgbụ ahụ nwere ike ịdị ala n'ihi ihe dị n'elu ma ọ bụ nke ikuku, dị ka mmetụta griin haus.

Okpomọkụ dị irè nke kpakpando bụ okpomọkụ nke ahụ ojii nwere otu ìhè n'otu ebe (FBol) dị ka kpakpando ma kọwaa dịka Stefan-Boltzmann iwu FBol = σTeff4. Rịba ama na mkpokọta (bolometric) ìhè kpakpando bụ L = 4πR2σTeff4, ebe R bụ radius kpakpando. Nkọwa nke radius kpakpando doro anya abụghị nke kwụ ọtọ. Karịa siri ike na okpomọkụ dị irè dabara na okpomọkụ dị na radius nke akọwapụtara site na ụfọdụ uru nke omimi anya Rosseland (na emekarị 1) n'ime ikuku kpakpando. Okpomọkụ dị irè na ìhè bolometric bụ akụkụ abụọ dị mkpa a chọrọ iji tinye kpakpando na eserese Hertzsprung-Russell. Ma okpomọkụ dị irè na ìhè bolometric na adabere na ngwakọta kemịkalụ nke kpakpando.
Okpomọkụ dị irè nke anyanwụ dị gburugburu 5,778 K. Uru aha nke International Astronomical Union kọwara maka ojiji dị ka nkeji nke okpomọkụ bụ 5,772±0.8 K. Kpakpando nwere mbelata okpomọkụ gradient, na.aga site na etiti isi ha ruo na ikuku. “Okpomọkụ isi” nke anyanwụ—okpomọkụ dị n'etiti anyanwụ ebe mmeghachi omume nuklia na e
ewere ọnọdụ—a na-eche na ọ bụ 15,000,000 K.
Ndekọ ụcha nke kpakpando na-egosi okpomọkụ ya site na ezigbo oyi—site n'ụkpụrụ kpakpando—kpakpando M na-acha uhie uhie nke na egbukepụ nke ukwuu na infrared na kpakpando O na acha anụnụ anụnụ nke na egbukepụ nke ukwuu na ultraviolet. Mmekọrịta okpomọkụ dị iche iche na eme ka agba dị na akwụkwọ. Mmekọrịta ahụ nwekwara ihe ndabere dị nta na parampat ndị ọzọ stellar, dị ka stellar metallicity na elu ike ndọda. Okpomọkụ dị irè nke kpakpando na egosi oke okpomọkụ nke kpakpando ahụ na amụba n'otu akụkụ nke mpaghara elu. Site na elu kachasị mma ruo na nke kacha mma bụ usoro nke nhazi ọkwa kpakpando mara dị ka O, B, A, F, G, K, M.
Kpakpando na acha uhie uhie nwere ike ịbụ obere dwarf na acha uhie uhie, kpakpando nke na emepụta ike na esighị ike na obere elu ma ọ bụ nnukwu kpakpando ma ọ bụ ọbụna nnukwu kpakpando dị ka Antares ma ọ bụ Betelgeuse, nke ọ bụla n'ime ha na emepụta ike dị ukwuu ma na agafe n'elu elu nke na eme ka ọ dịkwuo elu. Kpakpando ahụ na egbukepụ ntakịrị n'otu akụkụ nke mpaghara elu. Kpakpando dị nso n'etiti ụdịdị dị iche iche, dị ka Sun dị obi umeala ma ọ bụ nnukwu Capella na eme ka ike dị elu karịa otu kpakpando dwarf na adịghị ike ma ọ bụ ndị na-agba agba, mana ọ dị obere karịa kpakpando na acha ọcha ma ọ bụ na acha anụnụ anụnụ dị ka Vega ma ọ bụ Rigel.

38388.title: Sophia O'Hara
38388.extract: Sophia O'Hara (13 Nọvemba 1882 - 26 Eprel 1954) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Amerika nke jere ozi dị ka nwanyị odeakwụkwọ mbụ nke Commonwealth nke Pennsylvania dị ka onye Òtù Republican site na 17 Jenụwarị 1939 ruo 19 Jenụwarụwarị 1943.

39047.title: Eliane Umuhire
39047.extract: Eliane Umuhire  bụ onye Rwanda na-eme ihe nkiri nke amụrụ na Kigali bi na France .

39888.title: Halla Bouksani
39888.extract:
Templeeti:Infobox badminton player
Halla Bouksani ( Arabic  ; amuru 30 Julaị 2000) bu onye egwu badminton nke Algeria nke mere mpụta izizi ya na mba ụwa na 2013 ma bụrụ onye otu mba 2009.

40511.title: Ụlọ Ndị Ọgaranya nke St Nicholas
40511.extract:
St Nicholas Almshouses ( grid reference ST587727</link> ) bụ ụlọ ihe mere eme na King Street, Bristol, England.
. Ewubere ya na 1652 ruo 1656, ihe na apụ nke 19 wee weghachi ya 1961 site n'aka Donald Insall .  E merere ntọala nke bastion nke Mgbidi Obodo n'oge mweghachi.  [1] Edebere ya site na English Heritage dị ka ọkwa II* ezinụlọ ụlọ .
Ụlọ alms bụ otu n'ime ụlọ mbụ dị na King Street, mmepe ọhụrụ na mpụga mgbidi obodo yana n'akụkụ "Back Street Gate". 
E mebiri ụlọ ahụ n'oge Bristol Blitz ma ugbu a na-enye ikike facade n'okporo ụzọ.  Ọ dịghịejere ndị na-anya ebe obibi ozi dị ka o mere na ike awụ ndị gara aga.  Ugbu a ọ bụ ebe obibi ụmụ akwụkwọ.

Ọkwa II* depụtara ụlọ dị na Bristol
Ndepụta ụlọ alms nke Britain

42946.title: DAC Network on Development Evaluation
42946.extract:
DAC Network on Development Evaluation bụ otu enyemaka nke Kọmitii Enyemaka Mmepe (DAC). Ebumnuche ya bụ ịbawanye arụmọrụ nke mmemme mmepe mba ụwa site n'ịkwado nyocha siri ike, ama ama na nke onwe.
Netwọk ahụ na-akpọkọta ndị njikwa nyocha na ndị ọkachamara sitere na ụlọ ọrụ mmepe mmepe OECD na ụlọ ọrụ mmepe multilateral. Ndị otu gụnyere ngalaba nyocha na ụlọ ọrụ nkwado mmepe nke ndị otu 29 DAC niile, yana ngalaba nyocha nke ụlọ akụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepe mba asatọ.

55565.title: Kayinga Muddu Yisito
55565.extract: Kayinga Muddu Yisito bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-elekọta mmadụ nke Uganda, onye na-akwado ikike obodo na onye na-akwado ikike mmadụ.[1] Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa ugbu a nke COTFONE (Community Transformation Foundation Network), Onye Nhazi Obodo NAYD (Network of African Youth for Development) na Onye Nchịkọba maka Africa ABC4All (A Better Community For All, Founder & Coordinator YR (Youngsters Revolution).[2] A họpụtara Kayinga wee depụta aha ya n'okpuru onyinye 2022 EU Human Rights Defenders Award maka ịbụ onye nyere aka n'ịkwalite olu ezinụlọ na mpaghara Masaka ka ukwuu. ga-emetụta mmepe nke East African Crude Oil Pipeline-EACOP

10913.title: Polytechnic, Ibadan
10913.extract: Ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ (nke a na-akpọkarị "Poly Ibadan") bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ka elu na Ibadan na Ȯra Ọyọ, Naijiria. Ntọala ya na 1970, Poly Ibadan yiri nke teknụzụ ndị ọzọ na Nigeria. E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ a iji nye mahadum dị iche iche agụmakwụkwọ ka elu, ọkachasị n'ị nweta Mmụta ọrụ aka. Ntọala ya na 1970, Poly Ibadan yiri nke teknụzụ ndị ọzọ na Nigeria.  E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ a iji nye mahadum dị iche iche agụmakwụkwọ ka elu, ọkachasị n'ị nweta Mmụta ọrụ aka

11161.title: Kọmputa injinia
11161.extract:
Injinia Kọmputa (CoE ma ọ bụ CpE) bụ ngalaba injinia na-ejikọta ọtụtụ ngalaba sayensị kọmputa na injinịa eletrọnịkị chọrọ iji wulite ngwaike kọmputa na ngwanrọ. Ndị injinia kọmpụta na-enwekarị ọzụzụ na injinịa eletrọnịkị (ma ọ bụ injinịa eletrọnịkị), imewe sọftụwia, na njikọta ngwaike-software kama ịbụ naanị injinịa ngwanrọ ma ọ bụ injinịa eletrọnịkị. Ndị injinia kọmpụta na-etinye aka n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ngwaike na sọftụwia nke kọmpụta, site na nhazi nke microcontrollers n'otu n'otu, microprocessors, kọmpụta nkeonwe na supercomputers, ruo na imepụta sekit. Ngalaba injinia abụghị naanị na-elekwasị anya n'otú sistemụ kọmputa n'onwe ha si arụ ọrụ kamakwa ka ha si abanye na foto ka ukwuu.
Ọrụ ndị a na-emekarị gụnyere ndị injinia kọmpụta gụnyere ide sọftụwia na ngwa ngwa maka microcontrollers agbakwunyere, imepụta ibe VLSI, imepụta sensọ analog, imepụta bọọdụ sekit mgbama agwakọtara, na imepụta sistemu arụ ọrụ. Ndị injinia kọmpụta dabarakwara maka nyocha robotics, nke dabere na iji sistemu dijitalụ jikwaa na nyochaa sistemu eletriki dị ka moto, nkwukọrịta, na sensọ.
N'ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mmụta dị elu, a na-ahapụ ụmụ akwụkwọ injinia kọmpụta ka ha họrọ ebe ọmụmụ ihe omimi n'oge obere na afọ ndị agadi n'ihi na njupụta nke ihe ọmụma ejiri mee ihe na nhazi na ntinye nke kọmputa karịrị ogo ogo mmụta mahadum. Ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ nwere ike ịchọ ka ụmụ akwụkwọ injinịa mechaa otu afọ ma ọ bụ abụọ nke injinịa izugbe tupu ha ekwupụta injinịa kọmputa dị ka isi ihe ha na-elekwasị anya.

11766.title: Oluwatomi Somefun
11766.extract: Oluwatomi Somefun (amụrụ Ọktoba 2) bụ nwanyị na azu ahia na Naijiria nakwa onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ. Ọ na -aru oru ugbu a dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi oche nke Unity Bank plc .

16844.title: Diana Yankey
16844.extract: Diana Yankey (n'ihe ụfọdụ "Dinah"; amụrụ na 2 Febụwarị na afọ 1967) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Ghana lara ezumike nká nke bụ ọkachamara na 100 mita hurdles. Ọ nọchitere anya mba ya na afo 1987 World Championships in Athletics na 1988 Summer Olympics. Ọ bụ onye mmeri ugboro abụọ na African Championships in Athletics ma were ọlaọcha na afọ 1987 All-Africa Games na afo 1988 African Championships na Athletics.

21384.title: Sisaala language
21384.extract:
Sissala (Sissala) bụ ụsụụ asụsụ Gur na Northern Ghana dị nso na ebe a na-eti ya ebe dị nso na Republic nke Burkina Faso. Western Saịladia na-etiti n'etiti Burkina na Tuluwng Sasala. 
Pasgal yiri nke ahụ ma kpọọ ya (ndịda) Sisaala.

21496.title: Daniel Adomako
21496.extract: Daniel Adomako (amuru 24 Disemba 1979) bu onye oso oso Ghana. Ọ gbara ọsọ na mgbagharị mita 4 × 400 nke ụmụ nwoke na 2000 Summer Olympics.

21831.title: Lumbala
21831.extract:
Lumbala nwere ike izo aka na ndia:

Lumbala (aha nna)
Lumbala-Kakengue
Lumbala N'guimbo

24388.title: Yemi Tella
24388.extract:
Yemi Tella (ihe dị ka n'afọ 1951 n'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2007) bụ onye nkuzi nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria nke meriri 2007 FIFA U-17 World Cup . E nyere ya aha onye nkuzi Afrịka nke afọ 2007.
Tella, onye bụbu onye nkuzi na National Institute for Sports na Lagos, chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa kansa akpa ume mgbe ọ duuru ndị otu ya gaa asọm mpi mba asatọ tupu asọm mpi World Cup na South Korea na Juun 2007.
Otu ọnwa tupu ọnwụ ya, onye isi ala Naijiria Umaru Yar'Adua nyere ya ihe nrite nke Member of the Order of the Federal Republic - ihe dị mkpa - maka ihe ọ rụzuru.
Tella nọrọ izu abụọ ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya na Legos Steeti Teaching Hospital. Ọ nwụrụ na 20 Ọktoba 2007, mgbe ọ dị afọ 56.

26580.title: Usiququmadevu
26580.extract:
Usiququmadevu ma ọ bụ Isiququradeju bụ ihe e kere eke sitere na akụkọ ifo Zulu. Ọ bụ anụ ọhịa nwere afụ ọnụ, bụrụ ibu nke na-eri ihe ọ bụla dị ndụ ọ hụrụ. 
A na-ekwu na Usiququmadevu nwere di nke nwere áhà dika ya.

28605.title: WWF-Canada
28605.extract: World Wildlife Fund Canada (WWF-Canada) bụ otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa nke Canada ma bụrụ onye otu netwọk WWF zuru ụwa ọnụ, na-enye aka na nchedo, njikwa, na mweghachi nke gburugburu ebe obibi. Aha WWF ka bụ World Wildlife Fund na Canada na United States, mana a maara ya dị ka World Wide Fund for Nature gburugburu ụwa.  Nzukọ a na-arụ ọrụ ichekwa ụdị Canada dị n'ihe ize ndụ, kwalite oke osimiri na njikwa mmiri dị ọhụrụ, na ịmepụta atụmatụ maka mmepe ume ọhụrụ.e.

29486.title: Guibourtia coleosperma
29486.extract:
Guibourtia coleosperma, Afrikan rosewood (amaghị ama), nnukwu mopane ụgha, Rhodesian copalwood maọbụ machibi, bụ ụdị Guibourtia n'ezinaụlọ nkeFabaceae. Ọ bụ nnukwu osisi na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ (ruo mita iri abuo n'ogologo) nke a na-ahụ n'ọhịa mepere emepe na oké ọhịa kpọrọ nkụ, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị na Kalahari Sand ya na Angola, ndịda Democratic Republic of Congo, Namibia, Botswana, Zambia, ya nakwazi Zimbabwe.
Enwere ike ịchọta proguibourtinidins na G. coleosperma. Osisi G. coleosperma nwezikwara ísì menthol.

34688.title: Azụ̀ Austrinus
34688.extract:
Piscis Austrinus bụ ọrụ na ndị mmadụ mbara igwe .  Aha bụ Latin maka "azụ nrịda", n'ụzọ dị iche na nnukwu m ike Pisces, nke na-amị anya azụ.  Tupu tupu afọ nke 20, a ndọ ya dị ka Piscis Notius .  Piscis Austrinus bụ n'ime m ike 48 nke onye na-egosi mbara igwe nke mbụ afụ nke abụọ Ptolemy depụtara, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ike 88 nke oge a.  Kpakpando nke mkpọ nke oge a Grus kpụrụ "ọdụ" nke Piscis Austrinus.  Na 1597 (ma ọ bụ 1598), Petrus Plancius weputara ike dị iche iche iche iche ya aha crane.
Ọ bụ ikike ikike na-esighị ike, ndị mmadụ otu ndị na-eso ndị ọzọ ogo nke anọ: Fomalhaut, nke bụ 1st magnitude na ihe nke 18 na-emekarị na mbara igwe .  Fomalhaut bụ diski mkpuchi gbara ya gburugburu, ma ọnọdụ anya na-akwado mbara ala.  Ihe ndị ọzọ dị n'ime mgbaka nke mkpọ mkpọ Lacaille 9352, mkpegharị dwarf na-acha uhie na- ọdịdị na mbara igwe igwe (n'agbanyeghị na ọ ka na-agwụ ike iji anya gbapụta);  na PKS 2155-304, ihe BL Lacertae bụ otu n'ime ihe na-akpa na mbara igwe.

. Pisces Austrinus sitere na ike ike nke a mara nke ọma dị ka Azụ (MUL.KU).  [1] [2] Prọfesọ na-ahụ maka mbara igwe Bradley Schaefer atụwo aro na ọ ga- መሪ na ndị na-ekiri n'oge ochie ga-ahụhụ na ndịda Mu Piscis Austrini iji ọbụdị yiri azụ.  [3] Tinyere ugo Aquila na crow Corvus na ụgbọ mmiri Hydra, Piscis Austrinus bụ ndị e webatara na ndị Gris oge ochie gburugburu 500 TOA;  mmụta na-akara oge mmụta na oge oyi, n'otu n'otu.
Na ቀለሞች ifo ndị Gris, a na-akpọ mkpọ a dị ka nnukwu azụ̀ na-egosi na ọ na-eloda mmiri nke Aquarius na-awụpụ, mkpị na-ebu mmiri.  A na-ekwu na azụ̀ nke abụọ mkpọ Pisces bụ ụmụ nke nnukwu azụ̀.  Na pasto ifo ndị Ijipt, azụ atụra ndụ chi Ijipt Isis, ya mere o na-azụ a na ụmụ ya n'imereeb dị ka ndị ማለፍ.  [1] Na apụ nke ise BC, onye Gris na-akọ ihe mere eme Ctesias dere na a Jer na azụ̀ ahụ bi n'otu ọdo mmiri dị nso na Bambyce dị na Siria ma anọ Derceto, ada Aphrodite, na n'  ihi na e debere omume a n'obi.  N’ihi nke a, azụ̀ dị ns ma ọtụtụ ndị Siria erighị ya.
Piscis Austrinus is a constellation bordered by Capricornus to the northwest, Microscopium to the southwest, Grus to the south, Sculptor to the east, and Aquarius to the north. Its recommended three-letter abbreviation, as adopted by the International Astronomical Union in 1922, is "PsA". Ptolemy called the constellation Ichthus Notios "Southern Fish" in his Almagest; this was Latinised to Piscis Notius and used by German celestial cartographers Johann Bayer and Johann Elert Bode. Bayer also called it Piscis Meridanus and Piscis Austrinus, while French astronomer Nicolas-Louis de Lacaille called it Piscis Australis. English Astronomer Royal John Flamsteed went with Piscis Austrinus, which was followed by most subsequently. The official constellation boundaries, as set by Belgian astronomer Eugène Delporte in 1930, are defined by a polygon of four segments (illustrated in infobox). In the equatorial coordinate system, the right ascension coordinates of these borders lie between Templeeti:RA and Templeeti:RA, while the declination coordinates are between −24.83° and −36.46°. The whole constellation is visible to observers south of latitude 53°N.Templeeti:Efn

34922.title: Oge Ikpeazụ
34922.extract:
Doomsday Clock  akara na-anọchite anya ohere nke Ọdachi zuru ụwa ọnụ nke mmadụ mere, n'echiche nke ndị otu Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists. A na-echekwa ya kemgbe 1947, elekere ahụ bụ ihe atụ maka iyi egwu nye ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ site na ọganihu sayensị na teknụzụ a na-akparaghị ókè. ' na-anọchite anya ọdachi zuru ụwa ọnụ site na etiti abalị na elekere, na echiche Bulletin banyere etu ụwa si dị nso na otu nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ụfọdụ nke nkeji ma ọ bụ sekọnd na-anọchi anya etiti abalị, nke a na-enyocha na Jenụwarị nke afọ ọ bụla. Isi ihe -emetụta elekere ahụ bụ Ihe ize ndụ nuklia na Mgbanwe ihu igwe.  ọrụ Sayensị ' Nchebe nke Bulletin na-enyocha ọganihu ọhụrụ na sayensị na teknụzụ nke ndụ nke nwere ike imerụ ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ ahụ.
Ntọala mbụ nke elekere na 1947 bụ nkeji asaa ruo etiti abalị. Kemgbe ahụ, a na-etinye ya azụ ugboro asatọ na n'ihu ugboro iri na asaa maka ngụkọta nke iri abụọ na ise. Oge kachasị anya site na etiti abalị bụ nkeji iri na asaa na 1991, nke kacha nso bụ sekọnd iri itoolu, nke e debere na Jenụwarị 24, 2023.
A kwagara elekere ahụ na nkeji abụọ na ọkara na 2017, wee gaa n'ihu na nkeji abụọ ruo etiti abalị na Jenụwarị 2018, wee hapụ ya n'enweghị mgbanwe na 2019.     Jenụwarị 2020, a kwagara ya n'ihu na 100 sekọnd (1 nkeji, 40 sekọnd) tupu etiti abalị.   A hapụrụ ọnọdụ elekere ahụ n'agbanweghị na 2021 na 2022.  Jenụwarị 2023, a kwagara ya n'ihu na 90 sekọnd (1 nkeji, 30 sekọnd) tupu etiti abalị.    Kemgbe afọ 2010, a na-ebugharị elekere ahụ na nkeji anọ na sekọnd iri atọ, ma gbanwee ya na nkeji ise na sekọvemba iri atọ kemgbe afọ 1947.

39869.title: Lady Ada Chukwudozie
39869.extract: Lady Ada Chukwudozie  (amụrụ June 7, 1972) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye isi oche otu ndị nrụpụta nke Nigeria -southeast region.     Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Dozzy Oil and Gas Limited na onye guzobere Association of Professional Women on Rural Development.

42792.title: Ụlọ akụ MicroFinance nke Mbụ (Afghanistan)
42792.extract: First MicroFinance Bank-Afghanistan (FMFB-A) bụ ụlọ akụ na mbinye ego nke Aga Khan Agency maka Microfinance nke na-enye ndị ogbenye na ndị na-adịghị ike, karịsịa ụmụ nwanyị. E hiwere ụlọ akụ ahụ na 2004.

44896.title: Ineni
44896.extract:
Ineni (nke a na-a akara mgbe ụfọdụ ka Anena ) bụ onye Egypt oge ochie na onye ọrụ nke usoro eze nke iri na, onye na-ahụ maka nnukwu ọrụ owuwu n'okpuru Fero Amenhotep I, Thutmose I, Thutmose II na  Ụdị Hatshepsut na Thutmose III .  O nwere aha, onye Superintendent of Granaries, Superintendent of the Royal Buildings, Superintendent of the Workmen in the Karnak Treasuries, wdg.  
Ineni sitere n'ezina ihe ndị a ma ma ma Key anya ọ bụrụ ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ụlọ ụlọ n'okpuru Amenhotep I. Amenhotep nke Mbụ nyere Ineni iwu ịgbasa Ndị Nsọ Karnak .  Mgbasawanye ahụ ụlọ ụlọ arụsị nke Amun na ebe nchekwa nchekwa.  Ma Maka anya, Ineni na-elekọtakwa owuwu nke ili Amenhotep I na ụlọ nsso ozu .  nss a na-edebe ozu bụ nke mbụ e wepụrụ n'ili ahụ n'ezie, ma ndị ọchịchị anya ka ọ ghara isi echiche gaa n'ebe olili ozu.  Amenhotep I die tupu e wuchaa ụlọ akụ ahụ, mana Ineni bụ onye nọchiri anya ya, Thutmose I.
Thutmose nke Mbụ bụ onye na-ewu ụlọ, nyere ọtụtụ ọrụ owuwu n'oge ndị ya, ili mbụ e gwupụtara na Ndagwurugwu Ndị Eze .  Ọtụtụ ọrụ dị na Temple nke Karnak ma nọ n'okpuru ndabere nke Ineni.  Ụbọchị ndị a egwu pylon nke a na nke ise, ọtụtụ ụlọ ikpe na ihe oyiyi, mmecha nke Mgbasa Akụ egwu site Amenhotep I, na ụlọ hypostyle nke osisi cedar wuru na Karnak iji cheta mmeri Thutmose I meri Hyksos
Mgbe Thutmose nke Mbụ nwụsịrị, ihe eze jidekwara Ineni ọzọ.  N'oge iche nke Hatshepsut, onye na-ese ụlọ ụlọ ọhụrụ, Senemut, ga-enweta nnukwu ọrụ;  Ọ ikọ nke owuwu nke ụlọ ns ya na Deir el-Bahri .  Otú ọ dị, Ineni gara n'ihu na-elekọta ọtụtụ ụlọ ndị Hatshepsut nyere ọrụ ma anụ anya a na-egosi ya na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.  Ndị ha na yakọrọ ndụ lere ya anya dị ka otu n’ime ndị ọ na-amasịkarị n’obí ya.  Ọ nwụrụ n'oge ndị Hatshepsut tupu Thutmose nke Atọ weghara ocheeze n'afọ nke iche iri abụọ na abụọ nke Hatshepsut.  Udi ya bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ole na ole ebe a na- lahaghị aha Hatshepsut ma ọ bụ ike aha ya, ọrụ n'ihi enyemaka maka ya

45440.title: Ibrahim El-Salahi
45440.extract: Ibrahim El-Salahi ( Arabic , amuru 5 Septemba 1930) bu onye Sudanese ihe osise, onye bubu onye oru oha na eze na onye nnọchi anya mba. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nkiri nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Khartoum,  a na-ewere dị ka akụkụ nke African Modernism  na pan-Arabic Hurufiyya art movement, jikọtara ụdị ọdịnala nke calligraphy islam na ihe osise nke oge a .
