Na emume nke Tate Modern gallery nke mbụ retrospective ngosi nke onye omenkà nke si Africa na 2013, El-Salahi ọrụ e ji mara dị ka "a ọhụrụ Sudanese visual okwu, nke sitere na ya onwe ya ịsụ ụzọ mwekota nke Islam, African, Arab na Western nka. omenala."

48720.title: Adrienne Warren
48720.extract: Adrienne Warren (amuru May 6, 1987) bu onye omere America, onye ọbụ abụ na onye na-agba egwu.  O mere ya Broadway mpụta mbụ na 2012 musical Bring It On, na na 2016 natara Tony Award maka Best Featured Actress na a Musical nomination maka arụmọrụ ya na Shuffle Along, ma ọ bụ, Ime nke Musical Sensation nke 1921 na ihe niile sochirinụ . A na-etokwa ya maka ọrụ ya dị ka Tina Turner na mmepụta West End nke Tina na 2018, yana maka otu ọrụ ahụ na mmepụta Broadway, nke ọ nwetara Tony Award maka Best Actress na Musical na 2020.

49567.title: Ondo State Wealth Creation Agency
49567.extract: Ndị Mimiko hibere ụlọ ọrụ Ondo State Wealth Creation Agency (WECA) n'afọ 2009 iji kwalite akụ na ịrịba na ọrụ na mpaghara ọrụ ọrụ na nchekwa nri.  Emepụtara site na ụlọ ọrụ Accelerated Poverty Alleviation Agency, [1] mebere ya iji wepụta atumatu na mmemme na-abụ ikenye ndị isi n'ịzụ ọrụ ugbo na steeti Ondo .  N'afọ 2016, mmemme mmekọ ndị obodo nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ otuto nke African Development Bank .

51968.title: Shashi Panja
51968.extract: Shashi Panja bụ onye na-ahụ maka ahụike na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Minista Minista maka Industries, Azụmaahịa & ụlọ ọrụ na ngalaba nke ụmụ nwanyị na mmepe ụmụaka na ọdịmma ọha nke gọọmentị West Bengal.

14221.title: Nonso Amadi
14221.extract:
Nonso Amadi (amụrụ na Septemba 1, na afọ 1995) bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu na Naijiria. Ọ bụ onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu nke malitere ọrụ egwu ya na 2012, mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Ọgbụgba ndụ, ebe ọ gụrụ injinia kemịkal.
A mụrụ Nonso Amadi na Septemba 1, na afọ 1995, nne na nna ya bụ ndị Naijiria. Ọ bụ onye nke atọ n'ime ezinụlọ nke mmadụ asaa ma too na Naịjirịa tupu ọ kwaga United Kingdom. 
Ọ gara Chrisland College Idimu, Lagos ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 2009. Ọ gụrụ injinia kemịkal na Mahadum Covenant, na na afọ 2014 ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na Mahadim Swansea United Kingdom. O nwere nzere masta na Mahadum McMaster, Canada.

15363.title: Mohamed Boumerdassi
15363.extract: Mohamed Boumerdassi (Arabic: محمد بومرداسي ), (March 18, 1936, na Ouled Boumerdès December 7, 2010, na Thénia) dị ka nnukwu onye isi nke egwu Bedouin, Malhun na egwu Algeria.

19564.title: Ikosi
19564.extract:
Ikosi bụ nnukwu obodo dị na Kosofe Local Government Area nke Steeti Lagos.
Ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ zigara ụtụ isi ha n'aka Ikeja, Mazị E.J.Gibbond site na Chief Yesufu Taiwo, onye Onikosi n'oge ahụ na afọ 1939. Naịjirịa Obas nke alaeze Ikosi bụ ndị ọchịchị kachasị elu nke ala Kosofe.
Ikosi, isi ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa nke obodo asaa mejupụtara Kosofe, tọrọ ntọala na narị afọ nke iri na ise, site n'aka Aina Ejo, nwa nwoke nke asaa nke Akanbiogun, nwa eze Ile-Ife na onye agha nke bibu na Iwaye Quarters na Ota (Ogun State). O mechara hapụ Ota ka ọ gaa biri n'ala na-amaghị nwoke.
Ụmụ amaala Ikosi sitere na Awori stock nke agbụrụ Yoruba ma bụrụ ndị na-ele ọbịa na ndị udo. Akụkọ ọdịnala na-ekwu na aha 'Ikosi' bụ ụdị dị mkpirikpi nke okwu 'Kosi Kosi' nke na-ezo aka n'okwu ndị bi na mbụ na ndị ọbịa na ha anaghị echekwa ihe ha n'aka ndị ọbịa. Ha bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo omenala.
Aina Ejo onye guzobere alaeze Ikosi mụrụ Taiwo na Kehinde na 1795, Kehinde mụrụ Bakare Onikosi, Rufai Oloyede na ndị ọzọ Taiwo-Olowo mụrụ Yesufu Oke Taiwo, Joseph Ogunlana Taiwo, Funmilayo Taiwo na nwa ikpeazụ ghọrọ Eze mbụ nke Ikosi nke oge a - Oba Adegboyega Taiwo (Akeja Oniyanru I) onye amụrụ na 1901 ma chịa n'etiti 1996 na 2006. Ọ bụ onye isi oche iwu na Oba Bashua nke Somolu bụ osote onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Chieftaincy nke Gọọmentị ime obodo Somolu ruo 1996. Mgbe e guzobere Gọmentị Obodo Kosofe, ọ nọgidere na-abụ onye isi oche tupu e chie Oba Bashiru Olountoyin Saliu, Oba nke Oworonshoki onye nọchitere ya n'afọ 1998.  Oba Adegboyega Taiwo (Akeja Oniyanru I) nọchiri Oba Samuel Alamu Kehinde Onikosi (Edun-Arobadi 1) na Tuesday, na onwa Julaị,
anafọ 

Julaị 24, 2007.
Ndị bi na uru akụ na ụba nke Ikosi bụ ihe kachasị mkpa mgbe e kere Ikosi / Isheri LCDA.
Ikosi bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Ikosi-Isheri Development Council na ebe ahịa mkpụrụ osisi na akwụkwọ nri kachasị ukwuu na Lagos, nke e guzobere na afọ 1979.
Ikosi nwere nnukwu okporo ụzọ abụọ dị na Lagos Steeti. Okporo ụzọ Lagos-Ibadan na-eje ozi dị ka akwara na-ejikọ Lagos na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke mba ahụ. Okporo ụzọ Lagos-Ikorodu na-esikwa Jibowu gafere Ikosi gaa Ikorodu. Post Code maka Ikosi bụ 100246
All Saints' Anglican Parish Church, isi ụlọ ọrụ Ikosi Archdeaconry nke Diocese nke Lagos West nke Church of Nigeria (Anglican Communion) guzo n'akụkụ Lagos-Ibadan Expressway.
Ikosi bụ saịtị nke TV Continental (nke bụbu GOTEL UHF 65), ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn na Radio Continental 103.3FM (nke bụzi LINK FM), ụlọ ọrụ redio. 
Ogige nke Lagos State Polytechnic dịbu na Ikosi. The Centre for Management Development (CMD) dịkwa na Ikosi.
Ndị ama ama nke Ikosi n'afọ ndị ahụ gụnyere Prince Olaolu Taiwo (Councilor na Republic nke Abụọ), Prince Atanda Jimoh (ọ bụkwa onye kansụl n'oge ahụ), Prince Alamu Taiwo onye nyere aka n'ịtọlite All Saints' Parish Anglican Church, Major Kayode Taiwo (Rtd), Arc (Prince) Ademola Taiwo, onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide (PPUD) na Gọọmenti Steeti Lagos.
Hon Prince Owolabi Taiwo bụkwa onye kansụl ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi oche nke Ikosi Local Govt., Steeti Lagos. Ihe ndekọ na-egosi na nwa eze Ikosi na-eto eto jụrụ imebi mmepe nke Ikosi / Isheri maka uru onwe onye mgbe ọ nọ n'ọchịchị si otú a mee ka ọ bụrụ onye ndu kansụl kachasị ewu ewu na otu n'ime ndị kansụl kacha nwee ike na ndị ziri ezi na Lagos. Ọchịchị.

22274.title: Kaaps
22274.extract:
Kaaps (UK: /kɑːps/, nke pụtara 'Cape'), nkè á makwaara dị kà Afrikaaps, bụ asụsụ West German Africa nket malitere nat mpaghara Western Cape nkè South Africa. Ọnọdụ yá dị kà asụsụ nwanne nwanyị nkè Afrikaans ma ọ bụ olumba nkè Afrikaans edoghị anya. Kemgbe mmalite afọ 2020 enwere mmụba dị ịrịba àmà n'ọnụ ọgụgụ akwụkwọ ndị e bipụtara ná Kaaps. Ọtụtụ ọrụ ná Kaaps sitere n'aka ndị edemede nọ ná mpaghara Cape Flats nkè Cape Town, South Africa ebe á na-asụkarị yá.
Á malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ iji mepụta akwụkwọ ọkọwa ókwú asụsụ Kaaps mbụ ná 2021.

22904.title: Manketsi Tlhape
22904.extract: Manketsi Mamoabi Emily Tlhape bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye otu African National Congress (ANC) nke National Assembly of South Africa kemgbe 2019.

23785.title: Araiji
23785.extract:
Aha nna Araiji sitere Arabic. Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere:

Gebran Araiji (amụrụ na afọ nari iri itoolu iri ise na otu rue afọ puku abụọ iri na itoolu) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Lebanọn
Raymond Araiji (amụrụ n'afọ nari iri itoolu iri isii na ise), onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Lebanọn, onye ọka iwu, na minista gọọmentị

27204.title: Isaac Sesi
27204.extract: Isaac Sesi bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana, injinia, na onye guzobere Sesi Technologies, ụlọ ọrụ Ghana nke na-edozi nsogbu ọrụ ugbo na nri. A maara ya maka mmepe nke mita mmiri iji nyere ndị ọrụ ugbo Afrịka na-achị ndịda Sahara aka belata mfu mgbe owuwe ihe ubi gasịrị

27285.title: African Charter on Human and Peoples' Rights
27285.extract:
African Charter on Human and Peoples' Rights (nke a makwaara dị ka Banjul Charter) bụ ngwá ọrụ ikike mmadụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke e bu n'obi kwalite na chekwa ikike mmadụ na nnwere onwe ndị bụ isi na mpaghara Afrika..
Ọ pụtara n'okpuru ngalaba nke Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ịdị n'Otu Africa (ebe ọ bụ na African Union nọchiri anya ya) bụ nke, na 1979 Mgbakọ nke ndị isi obodo na ndị ọchịchị, nakweere mkpebi nke na-akpọ maka ịmepụta kọmitii nke ndị ọkachamara na-edepụta kọntinent gburugburu.  ngwá ọrụ ndị ruuru mmadụ, dị ka ndị dịbu adị na Europe (European Convention on Human Rights) na America (American Convention on Human Rights).  E hiwere kọmitii a n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị, o wepụtakwara akwụkwọ nke e ji otu olu kwadoo ná Mgbakọ nke 18 nke OAU nwere na June 1981, na Nairobi, Kenya.. Dabere na Nkeji edemede 63 ya (nke ọ ga-abanye n'ọrụ ọnwa atọ mgbe odeakwụkwọ ukwu nabatara ngwá ọrụ nke nkwenye ma ọ bụ ịgbaso ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu" nke mba ndị otu OAU), Charter Africa on Human and Peoples' Rights malitere na 21 Ọktoba 1986 - iji kwanyere ya ùgwù 21 Ọkọba "African Human Rights Day".
.Nleba anya na nkọwa nke Charter bụ ọrụ nke African Commission on Human and People's 'Commission on November 2, 1987 na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia ma bụrụ isi ugbu a na Banjul, Gambia.[3]  Emechara nakweere ụkpụrụ nke Charter na 1998 ebe a ga-esi mepụta Ụlọikpe Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ na Ndị mmadụ.  Usoro a malitere na 25 Jenụwarị 2004..
Na Julaị 2004, Mgbakọ AU kpebiri na a ga-etinye ACHP n'Ụlọikpe Ikpe nke Africa.  Na Julaị 2005, Mgbakọ AU kpebiri na ACHP kwesịrị ịrụ ọrụ n'agbanyeghị na usoro iwu guzobere Ụlọikpe Ikpe Ikpe nke Africa amalitebeghị.  N'ihi nke a, nnọkọ nkịtị nke asatọ nke Council Executive Council of African Union na Khartoum, Sudan, na 22 Jenụarị 2006, họpụtara ndị ọka ikpe mbụ nke Ụlọikpe Afrịka na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ na ndị mmadụ.  Mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Ụlọikpe ahụ emepụtara ọhụrụ na kọmitii ka a ka ga-ekpebi.
Dịka nke afọ 2019, steeti iri ise na atọ akwadola Charter.

27295.title: Shephaerd's Hotel
27295.extract:
Shepheard's Hotel bụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ kachasị na Cairo na otu n'ime ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ kachasị ewu ewu na ụwa site na etiti narị afọ nke 19 ruo mgbe mbibi ya na 1952 n'oge ọkụ Cairo.  Afọ ise ka e bibichara ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ mbụ, e wuru nke ọhụrụ dị nso ma kpọọ ya Shepheard Hotel.

Samuel Shepheard hibere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na 1841 n'okpuru aha "Hotel des Anglais" (Bekee Hotel), [1] [2] ma emesịa degharịa aha ya "Shepheard's Hotel".[3]  Shepheard, onye Bekee a kọwara n'otu oge dị ka "onye nkuzi achịcha achịcha na-enweghị isi",[4] sitere na Preston Capes, Northamptonshire.  Ya na Mr. Hill, onye isi nchịkwa Mohammed Ali Pasha, nwere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ahụ, ma gosi na ọ bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-eme nke ọma na onye ọchụnta ego.  N'otu oge, mgbe ndị agha nọ n'ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ kwagara na Crimea na mberede, na-ahapụ ụgwọ ndị a na-akwụghị ụgwọ, Shepheard gara n'onwe ya na Sevastopol iji nweta ụgwọ...
N'afọ 1845, Hill hapụrụ mmasị ya na họtel ahụ, Shepheard ghọkwara naanị onye nwe ya. Shepheard rere họtel ahụ na 1861 maka £ 10,000 nye onye na-elekọta họtel Bavaria Philip Zech (ma ọ bụ Zeck) wee laa ezumike nká na Eathorpe Hall, Eathorbe, Warwickshire, England. Richard Burton, ezigbo enyi Shepheard, hapụrụ nkọwa zuru ezu banyere àgwà mmesapụ aka ya na ọrụ na-aga nke ọma, na-akọwa ya dị ka "nwoke dị ịrịba ama n'ọtụtụ ihe, na ihe niile ihe nlereanya John Bull".
A rụzigharịrị họtel ahụ na 1869 mgbe ọkụ gbara n'akụkụ ndịda nke ụlọ ahụ. Ka ọ na-erule afọ iri ikpeazụ nke narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, o doro anya na ụlọ mbụ ahụ bụ nke e dere; ka ọ bụrụ nke na-asọmpi, a ga-ewu ihe owuwu ọhụrụ ex novo. Zech were ọrụ nke onye na-eto eto na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Nuremberg, Johann Adam Rennebaum, iji chepụta họtel n'otu ogige ahụ nke ga-akarị ndị bu ya ụzọ n'ibu na okomoko. Ihe owuwu ikpeazụ a, nke e wuchara na 1891, bụ ihe a ma ama na nke edere nke ọma nke họtel ahụ. N'afọ 1898, a gbakwunyere Arab Hall (nke Rennebaum mekwara) n'ogige etiti nke ụlọ ahụ, na mmụba ndị ọzọ mere na 1904, 1909 na 1927. Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ aha Rennebaum na akwụkwọ nke họtel ahụ nwere ike imetụta mgbalị ndị ọchịchị Britain na-eme mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ gasịrị iji kpochapụ ihe ọ bụla metụtara mmetụta Germany na Ijipt. Onye nwe họtel ahụ gafere n'aka nwa nwanyị Zech na di ya, Maazị na Oriakụ. Kemmerich N'afọ 1896, ndị Kemmerichs rere họtel ahụ na Egyptian Hotels Ltd., ụlọ ọrụ Britain nke mechara nye ya Compagnie Internationaldes Grands Hôtels. Onye isi ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke Switzerland bụ Karl (Charles) Baehler zụrụ ụlọ ọrụ a. Shepheard's Hotel bụ nke a ma ama maka ịdị ukwuu ya, maka ndị ọbịa ya, na dị ka isi ụlọ ọrụ maka ndị agha. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọgaranya ya, ya na ugegbe na-acha odo odo, kapet ndị Peshia, ogige, ala, na nnukwu ogidi granite yiri nke ụlọ nsọ ndị Ijipt oge ochie. Ọ bụghị naanị ndị America na ndị isi French na ndị Britain na-agakarị American Bar ya. E nwere ịgba egwú abalị ebe ndị ikom na-eyi uwe agha na ndị inyom na-eyi akwa mgbede. 
"Okporo ogologo" ahụ na-ewu ewu n'etiti ndị kansụl nke gọọmentị Gris na-agba ọsọ, Harold Macmillan dere n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na 21 Ọgọst 1944 na gọọmentị Greece na-agbapụ kwesịrị ịkwaga Ịtali iji gbanahụ "ọnọdụ na-egbu egbu nke aghụghọ nke na-achị na Cairo. Gọọmentị niile gara aga na-agba ọsọ agbaala n'ụlọ mmanya nke Shepheard.
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1952, e bibiri họtel ahụ n'oge ọkụ ọkụ nke Cairo, oge ọgba aghara megide ndị Britain na ọgba agha obodo dị egwu nke dugara na Mgbanwe Ijipt nke afọ 1952.
Họtel ahụ enweela ọtụtụ ndị ọbịa a ma ama. E gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri Britain nke 1934 The Camels are Coming . Ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ bụ ebe ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị na ihe nkiri 1996 The English Patient mana ihe nkiri nke ihe nkiri ahụ mere na The Grand Hotel des Bains na Venice Lido, Ịtali. A na-eji họtel ahụ eme ihe dị ka isi ọrụ na usoro The Race Colonization nke Harry Turtledove, dị ka ebe dị na Agatha Christie's Crooked House, a kpọtụrụ ya aha na Death on the Nile na akụkọ mkpirikpi nke Anthony Trollope, An Unprotected Female at the Pyramids (1861). Ọ na-egosipụtakwa mgbe niile na akwụkwọ akụkọ Amelia Peabody nke Elizabeth Peters.

28221.title: Ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu Spring
28221.extract:
Ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu Spring ụlọ ọrụ matarasị nke dị na United States. E hiwere ya na Chicago na 1926 mgbe Francis Karr mepụtara ihe eji eme matarasị nke nwere coils na-enweghị isi. N'ihi ịdị arọ, ọnụ ahịa njem dị elu, na ọnụ ahịa dị ala maka ịdị arọ nke matarasị, a na-arụkarị ha na kpo ámá nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ ndị ogbi ozi esighi zuru ihe nọr ka ébé ihe mmefu ego maka nsogbụ ụra n'ógbè. N'ihi ya, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ òtù na-enye ikikere, ebe ndị nwere ikikere na-emepụta matarasị n'okpuru aha a na-ahụkarị maka ahịa mba. Dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ, ndị nwere ikike nwere aha Spring Air. Spring Air nwere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe n'ụwa niile.
As of 2006, it is the fourth largest US brand of matarasị (n'azụ Sealy, Serta, naSimmons).ọ dabere n'ime Elk Grove Village, Illinois.

29681.title: James Macdonald (onye ọrụ obodo)
29681.extract:
James Macdonald, CBE, FRSE (3 August 1898 - 28 April 1963) bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị Britain na onye na-elekọta ọhịa.
A mụrụ ya na 3 Ọgọstụ 1898, Macdonald gara Blairgowrie High School site na 1903 ruo 1915, wee jee ozi na Royal Flying Corps n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ. Mgbe ọ hapụrụ ọrụ, ọ gụrụ maka BSc na ọhịa na Mahadum nke Edinburgh, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1923.
Macdonald banyere na Forestry Commission na 1924 wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchọpụta. A họpụtara ya dị ka onye nyocha, England na Wales, na 1932 ma n'afọ ahụ ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi na Imperial Forestry Institute. N'afọ 1936, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba na Forestry Commission mana e debere ya na Ministry of Supply n'oge agha site na 1939 ruo 1945; ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ọrụ mbubata osisi maka East Anglia, mgbe ahụ Nottinghamshire na mgbe e mesịrị n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Scotland.
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Forestry Commission, na 1946 a họpụtara Macdonald dị ka Conservator ma rụọ ọrụ na Director of Forestry maka ụlọ ọrụ Scotland. N'afọ 1948, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchọpụta na agụmakwụkwọ nke kọmitii ahụ. A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) maka ọrụ ya na 1953 New Year Honours ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke International Union of Forest Research Organizations site na 1956 ruo 1961, n'akụkụ ọrụ ya na Forestry Commission. A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Fellow nke Royal Society of Edinburgh na 1957. Site na 1960 ruo 1962, ọ bụ osote onye isi nchịkwa nke kọmitii ahụ n'oge Sir Henry Beresford-Peirse na-aga na UN Food and Agriculture Organization. [1] N'afọ 1962, mgbe Beresford na-Peirre laghachiri wee ghọọ onye isi nchịkịta, a kwalitere Macdonald ka ọ bụrụ osote onye nduzi. Ọ nọgidere na-ahụ maka nyocha na ọrụ a. Ọ lara ezumike nká na 31 Jenụwarị 1963 wee nwụọ na 28 Eprel 1963. Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, a haziri nyocha nke kọmitii ahụ; e wepụrụ ọkwa Chief Research Officer ma nye ọrụ maka nyocha na ọkwa Director of Research (nke Andrew Watt nọ na ya), ebe a na-ebufe ngalaba njikwa na isi ụlọ ọrụ kọmitii.

33305.title: Harold Hanbury
33305.extract: Harold Greville Hanbury (19 June 1898 na Compton Verney House, Warwickshire - 12 March 1993 na Pinetown, Natal, South Africa) bụ Vinerian Prọfesọ nke Iwu Bekee na Mahadum Oxford site na 1949 ruo 1964.

33559.title: Ebon C. Ingersoll
33559.extract:
Ebon Clark Ingersoll (December 12, 1831 - May 31, 1879) bụ Onye nnọchi anya US si Illinois na nwanne nwoke nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọkà okwu Robert G. Ingersoll.
A mụrụ ya na Dresden, New York, Ingersoll kwagara Wisconsin Territory na 1843 ma mesịa gaa Illinois. Ọ gara akwụkwọ ọdịnala na Peoria, Illinois, na Paducah, Kentucky. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu. a nabatara ya n'ụlọikpe n'afọ 1854 wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na Peoria, Illinois. O jere ozi dị ka onye otu Illinois House of Representatives na 1856.
A họpụtara Ingersoll dị ka Onye Republican na Nzukọ Nke iri atọ na asatọ iji mejupụta oghere nke ọnwụ Owen Lovejoy kpatara. A họpụtara ya ọzọ na Nzukọ Nke Iri Abụọ na itoolu, nke iri anọ, na Nke iri anọ na otu ma jee ozi site na Mee 20, 1864, ruo Machị 3, 1871. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii na District of Columbia (Mgbakọ nke iri atọ na itoolu na nke iri anọ), Kọmitii nke okporo ụzọ na ọwa mmiri (Mgbakọ iri anọ na otu), Kọmiti nke okporo ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè na ọwa (Mgbakọ Iri anọ na otu). Ọ bụ onye na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma maka nhọpụta ọzọ na 1870 na Congress Nke iri anọ na abụọ. Ọ gara biri na Washington, D.C., ma tinye aka n'ọrụ iwu ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ na Mee 31, 1879. E mechara tinye okwu otuto nke nwanne ya nwoke Robert nyere n'ememe olili ozu ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Clarence Darrow na Wallace Rice chịkọtara. E liri ya na Oak Hill Cemetery.
Ingersoll nwere nwa nwoke, John Carter Ingersoll, onye jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya America na Cartagena, Colombia. Ọ nwụrụ na Colon, Colombia, na 1903.

33630.title: Banu 'Akk
33630.extract:
Banu 'Akk (Templeeti:Lang-ar  Templeeti:IPA-ar, Ancient South Arabian:𐩲𐩫𐩣
lit. ʿkm, ʿAkkum; Greek:’Αχχιται) or simply 'Akk, was one of the main pre-Islamic Arab tribes. The tribe inhabited Yemen in the Jahiliyyah.

42024.title: National Poverty Eradication Programme
42024.extract: ihe mkpochapụ ndị ogbenye mba (NAPEP) bụ mmemme 2001 nke na-abụ Naijiria na-ekwu maka ndị ogbenye na-eji ihe ndị na-egosi ya.  E mere ya iji mmemme Mbelata ego ogbenye.

43240.title: Nkọwa Ntụkwasị Obi nke Ndị Ahịa Vietnam
43240.extract: Vietnam Consumer Confidence Index (Vietnam CCI) bụ ihe ngosi e mere iji nhọrọ obi nke ndị ọrụ nke Vietnam, nke akọwara dị ka ogo nke nchekwube na ọrụ nke nchekwa ego na mpi.

46508.title: Savina Nongebatu
46508.extract: Savina Nongebatu ( amuru ya na 1969) o bu onye Solomon Islands disability rights advocate onye duru ndi nwere nkwaru na Solomon's Islands bido na 2004 na 2011 biakwa gba odibo dika deputy CEO nke Pacific Disability Forum bido na 2018 na 2019.

48289.title: Sam Turpin
48289.extract:
Samuel Thomas Turpin (amụrụ 2 Septemba 1995) bụ onye South Africa rapper, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na-ese egwu.
Ọ bụ nwa onye South Africa na-ese foto na onye na-akwado Gisèle Wulfsohn .

49652.title: Ụbọ akwara
49652.extract: Mgbịrịgba ehi (ma ọ bụ mgbịrịgba ehi) bụ mgbịrịgba nke a na-eyi n'olu anụ ụlọ na-eme njem n'efu ka ndị na-azụrụ anụ nwere ike na-eji ụda mgbịrịgba hụ anụmanụ mgbe anụmanụ ahụ na-ata nri n'ebe ugwu ma ọ bụ mbara ala buru ibu. Ọ bụ ezie na a na-akpọkarị ha "mgbịrịgba ehi" n'ihi na ha na-eji ọtụtụ ehi eme ihe, a na-eji mgbịrịgba ahụ mee ihe n'ụdị anụmanụ dịgasị iche iche.

51601.title: Thongam Biswajit Singh
51601.extract:
Thongam Biswajit Singh bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị India na onye otu Bharatiya Janata Party. Ọ bụ onye otu ọgbakọ omebe iwu Manipur kemgbe 2012 site na mpaghara Thongju na mpaghara Imphal East.[1] [2] Ugbu a Singh bụ onye minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, oke ọhịa na mgbanwe ihu igwe na ike, ọrụ ugbo, sayensị na teknụzụ.
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Trinamool Congress na 2012 mana ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 2015. O sonyeere Bharatiya Janata Party mgbe ọ gbasịrị arụkwaghịm wee zọọ ọkwa site na ntuli aka dịka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Bharatiya Janata Party wee merie ntuli aka ahụ.

10059.title: Taiwo Rafiu
10059.extract: Taiwo Rafiu (onye amụrụ na 18 June 1972 na Lagos Steetị bụ nwaanyị n'agba basketbọọlụ Nwaanyị n'agba basketbọọlụ. Ọ gara Mahadum Oklahoma City na mba Amerika  ma sonye na otu egwuregwu bọl ụmụ nwaanyi Naijiria  nọchitere na asọmpi olympik mere na afọ 2004.

10902.title: Lilian Afegbai
10902.extract: Lilian Afegbai bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri na onye na -emeputa ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa. Ọ bụbu onye ụlọ Big Brother Africa.  Na 2018 o meriri Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards (AMVCA)  maka Ụmụ Amaala nkiri nke afọ ọ mmepụta mpụta mbụ Bound na 2018.

11767.title: Adamawa
11767.extract:
Plateau Adamawa, nke bilitere na Naijiria, gafere Cameroon, wee kwụsị na Central Afrikan Republic
Adamawa Region, Cameroon
Adamawa State, Naijiria
Akụkọ ihe mere eme
Adamawa Emirate, tọrọ ntọala ma kpọọ aha Modibo Adama
Ebe bụbu Prefecture Apostolic Catholic nke Adamaua
Asụsụ Adamawa, ezinụlọ nke asụsụ ndị a na-asụ na mpaghara dị n'elu
Adamawa (ehi), ụdị ehi nke Africa

12395.title: Salam Atilola
12395.extract: Salam Atilola (amụrụ n'ubochi 2 n'ọnwa Febrụwarị n'afọ 1996 na Saki, dị na Naijiria onye ya na Crown ,  Shooting Stars FC, MFM FC nwere obere oge egwuregwu nke ha niile nọ na Otu Mba Naijiria ma e wezụga Abia Warriors FC nọ na Nkewa nke Mbụ nke Naijiria bụ ndị mechara chuo ya n'ọrụ maka arụmọrụ na adịghị mma. Atilola Abdulsalam Tunde onye banyere Abia Warriors n'oge Premier League Naijiria nke ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2019 na ngafe n'etiti oge debara nani goolu 3 site na egwuregwu 8  na oge 2018/19. A chụrụ ya n'oge 2019/20 site na Abia Warriors FC n'ọnwa Jenụwarị maka arụmọrụ na adịghị mma ka ọ gbara egwuregwur 15 na-enweghị goolu o nyere dị ka Striker.

15506.title: Nicole Amarteifio
15506.extract: Nicole Amarteifio (amụrụ n'afọ 1982) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye na-ede ihe nkiri na Ghana.

19406.title: Onikan Stadium
19406.extract:
Mobolaji Johnson Arena bụ ámá egwuregwu ana egosi  ọtụtụ ebumnuche na Lagos.  Eji ya  ugbu a agba egwuregwu bọọlụ ,ma ọ bụ ámá egwuregwu nke otu Lagos dị iche iche, ọkachasị otu egwuregwu Ikorodu United , otu egwuregwu Stationery Stores,First Bank na otu egwuregwu Julius Berger .  Ámá egwuregwu ahụ nwere ike ibata  mmadụ puku iri ma bụrụ nke kachasị ochie na Naịjirịa. N'ịbụ nke dị n'akụkụ ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ọgbọ mmiri Lagos  dị nso na ọgbakọTafewa Balewa , e wuru ámá egwuregwu mbụ ahụ na afọ 1930 ma mgbe afọ isii gachara, a gụhariri ya aha Eze George V. N'etiti afọ 1963 na 1973, a maara ya dị ka ama egwuregwu Lagos City . A rụzigharịrị ámá egwuregwu Onikan  ugbu a ma meghee ya maka egwuregwu bọọlụ na ihe gbasara omenala n'afọ ndị 1980.
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2008, Njikọ bọọlụ Naịjirịa machibidoro ámá egwuregwu ahụ iji ya mee ihe n'oge ndị ọzọ n'oge egwuregwu ahụ mgbe mwakpo nke ogige merụrụ ọtụtụ ndị òtù egwuregwu Warri Wolves ahụ mgbe ha na ndị òtù egwuregwu First Bank nwesịrị mmeri na-enweghị akara.

22763.title: Hayet Omri
22763.extract: Hayet Omri (amụrụ na Disemba 13, 1981, na Regueb) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-emepụta ihe na Tunisia. Onye bụbu onye otu Ennahda, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ndị mmadụ na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Tunisia nke afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ maka Gọọmenti Sidi Bouzid.

23451.title: Rachael Aladi Ayegba
23451.extract: Rachael Aladi Ayegba (amụrụ na 25 June 1986) bụ onye bụbu onye Naijirịa na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba dịka onye na-edebe goolu. Na klọb, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka ọtụtụ klọb ndị Finland n'etiti afọ 2005 na 2016. Ayegba bụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọala bọs ugbu a na London.

26736.title: Grootslang
26736.extract: Grootslang ma ọ bụ Grote Slang (na Afrikaans na Dutch bu "nnukwu agwọ") bụ ekere eke a ma ama nke a na-ekwu na ọ bi n'ọgba miri emi di na Richtersveld, nke South Africa.

27118.title: Lake Chad Basin Commission
27118.extract:
Lake Chad Basin Commission (LCBC ma ọ bụ CBLT na French) bụ nzukọ gọọmentị na-ahụ maka iji mmiri na ihe ndị ọzọ sitere n'okike eme ihe na ọdọ mmiri ahụ. E nwere gọọmentị asatọ - ya bụ, Cameroon, Chad, Niger, Nigeria, Algeria, Central African Republic, Libya, na Sudan - ahọpụtara maka ịdị nso ha na Ọdọ Mmiri Chad.
Odeakwụkwọ nke nzukọ a dị na N'Djamena, Chad.  LCBC bụ osimiri kacha ochie ma ọ bụ nzukọ ọdọ mmiri.  N'akwụkwọ ntọala ya (Nkwekọrịta na ụkpụrụ gbasara mmepe nke Chad Basin) ndị otu ahụ na-etinye onwe ha n'iji òkè nke akụ sitere n'okike nke efere ahụ.  Ọ bụ onye otu International Network of Basin Organisation (INBO).

27706.title: Onye Ọrụ Ọfịs Afrịka
27706.extract: African Office Worker (アフリカのサラリーマン, Africa no Sararīman), otherwise known as Africa Salaryman, is a Japanese comedy manga series by Gamu, serialized online via pixiv Comic website since December 2014. It has been collected in four tankōbon volumes by Media Factory. An original net animation adaptation streamed on Production I.G's Tate Anime (now Anime Beans) app between June 5 and June 30, 2017, and an anime television series adaptation by Hotzipang aired from October 6 to December 22, 2019.

32326.title: Ebe Nchekwa Anụ Ọhịa nke Banyang-Mbo
32326.extract: Banyang-Mbo Wildlife Sanctuary bụ ebe nchekwa anụ ọhịa dị na Cameroon. E guzobere ya na 1996. Ebe a dị kilomita 691.45. 2

33068.title: Oji Umozurike
33068.extract: Oji Umozurike bụ ọkà mmụta Naijiria, onye na-akwado ọrụ na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke African Commission on Human and Peoples' Rights, otu òtù na-adịghị arụ ọrụ nke African Unity. Ọ bụ ugbu a a

33773.title: Penelope Davies
33773.extract: Penelope Davies bụ onye Rom na-amụ banyere ihe ochie na akụkọ ihe mere eme. Ọ bụ ọkachamara n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Rom oge ochie. Ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, nka Rom na ihe owuwu na Mahadum Texas na Austin .

35545.title: Orogwe
35545.extract:
Orogwe bu onye Umuoha Ofo Ise autonomous community;  otu n'ime ụmụ ise nke okpukpe Oha n'ala Igbo n'ọwụwa nwa Naijiria mgbe ahụ
Ụzọ awara awara Onitcha-Owerri na-agafe obodo 7 km tupu ama control-post roundabout na Owerri Municipal .  Ókèala obodo ahụ bụ obodo ndịagbata obi ndị a;  Ndegwu n'ọdịda, Ohii n'ọwụwa inwe, Ogbaku na ugwu na Irette na ndịda.
Ama ama institutional akara bụ Prisima hotel, Eke Orogwe ahaha, obodo primary and secondary school, [1] Protocol IT Academy, [2] St. Mark's Anglican church Orogwe, Chelsea lodge hotel, Orogwe Community primary health center and customary court, [3]  ] na ụdọ isiokwu Okpokija wdg
Orogwe bụ ndi-isi obodo ndia; Umueze, Ubah, Umuafom, Umunjanwoke, Amato na Umunnomo. N'ọdịnala, a na-ahụ ha maka egwu Uri Opi na Okorosha masquerade. Oghere dị ugbu a maka otu egwu egwu Okorosha nke Amato a na-akpọ Ama Mbutu bụ ebe a na-eme emume ụlọ ụka a na-emebu maka ụka St Marks tupu ọ gafere n'akụkụ Eke Orogwe taa.
Orogwe bụ obodo ndị egwu.  Iso ụzọ na Orogwe ntọala site n'aka ohu a tọhapụrụ lọta, aha ya bụ Ojure bụ onye ozi ala ọzọ CMS nke Bonny Island nke ndị ụka ya zipụrụ na ngwaọrụ na Onitsha mana ọ obodo ya bụ nke e ezi ziga ya ka  onye ọrụ ndị n'ebe ahụ bụ nke St Marks Anglican Church.  e mechara kụọ ya.  St Marks Anglican Church became the mother church for other Anglican churches in Ndegwu,Amakohia-Ubi,Agwa,Akabo,Ejemekwuru,Ogbaku and Oguta.  N'oge ụka ndị Anglịkan ndị a niile bụ ndị nke parish Orogwe a na- ike nke Dayosis Anglican nke Owerri.  Orogwe Archdeaconry bụ Archdeaconry eguzo elu ugbu a na Dayọsis Anglican nke Owerri.  Diocese dị ugbu a dị n'Ọdọ Mmiri Ọguta bụ ihe e nwere site na parish Orogwe mbụ ma ọ bụ mgbe e ịhụ Orogwe Achdeaconry.

40202.title: Joe Carcione
40202.extract: Joseph Carcione ( / kɑːr ˈtʃ oʊ n i / kar-CHOH -nee ; Ọktoba 31, 1914 – Ọgọst 2, 1988) bụ onye na-akwado ndị nke a maara dị ka "The Green Grocer."

44424.title: Yoriyas
44424.extract:
Yassine Alaoui Ismaili, onye a maara dị ka Yoria, bụ Onye na-ese foto n'okporo ámá na onye na-agba egwu imebimume nke dị na Casablanca, Morocco.

Ọ malitere na foto na 2007, mgbe a kpọrọ ndị na-agba égwu ahiri na ya, Lhiba Kingzoo,  ka ha rụọ ọrụ na Salzburg, Austria. Ọ zụrụ igwefoto dị mfe n'ahịa ụfụfụ iji soro ezinụlọ ya kerịta foto nke njem ahụ.
Site n'okporo ámá ruo n'egwuregwu Olimpik na-akọ akụkọ  imebimume na Senegal, Morocco, Algeria, France, Netherlands, na Germany.
Casablanca Not The Movie na-egosi ihe oyiyi nke ndụ na Casablanca, Morocco. Ihe oyiyi ndị a na-emegide ihe oyiyi ndị Ọwụwa Anyanwụ nkiri Miami na egosi nke obodo ahụ dabere na ihe nkiri America nke 1942 bụ Casablanca . 
N'afọ 2020, Yoriyas haziri Sourtna, ihe ngosi izizi omere na na Moroccan National Photography Museum na Rabat.

47035.title: Mary Abbott (onye na-ese ihe)
47035.extract: Mary Lee Abbott (Julaị 27, 1921 – Ọgọst 23, 2019) [1] bụ onye omenkà America, nke a maara dị ka onye otu New York School of abstract expression na njedebe 1940s na 1950s.  [2] Ọrụ ya na ihe atụ kwara oge ya na Saint Croix na Haiti, ebe o biri na 1950 niile.

49848.title: Fjellsjøkampen
49848.extract: Fjellsjøkampen bụ nke kacha elu na Hurdal, Akershus, Norway . Ọ bụ ebe kachasị elu na Akershus .

52255.title: Nabam Rebia
52255.extract:
Nabam Rebia bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị India nke Bharatiya Janata Party. Ọ bụ onye otu nzuko omeiwu nke India na-anọchite anya Arunachal Pradesh na Rajya Sabha, ụlọ elu nke nzuko omeiwu India. Ọ bụ ọkà okwu nke Arunachal Pradesh Legislative Assembly.
Ọ bụbu onye otu nzuko omeiwu nke India na-anọchite anya Arunachal Pradesh na Rajya Sabha, dịka onye otu pati Congress. Ọ bụ EX-MLA sitere na mpaghara Arunachal nke Doimukh na onye minista mmepe obodo, atụmatụ obodo, ụlọ, ndị obodo obodo na iwu na ikpe ziri ezi na gọọmentị Pema Khandu nke BJP na Arunachal Pradesh. .

10280.title: Osita Iheme
10280.extract: Osita Iheme, MFR  (amuru ya na izu iri-abuo n'onwa abụọ n’afọ 1982) bu onye amara aha ya  na- eme ihe nkiri na Naijiri rụrụ  Pawpaw na ihe nkiri Aki na Ukwa   Chinedu Ikedieze sonyere n'ịrụ ihe nkiri a. Ọ bụ onye chọpụtara 'Inspired Movement Africa' nke ọ chọpụtara iji kpalie, na-akpali ma na-akpali uche nke ndị na-eto eto Naijiria na Africa. N’afọ 2007, Iheme natara akara ugo mmụta ihe eji enyere ndụ aka na  African Movie Academy Awards. E were ya dịka otu n’ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ama ama n’obodo Naijiria.  N’afọ 2011, Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan kwanyere ya ugwu dịka onye otu Order of the Federal Republic (MFR)

12079.title: Faldela Williams
12079.extract: Faldela Williams (1952 – 25 Mee 2014) bụ onye South Afriika onye ode akwụkwọ osi nri na ode akwụkwọ esi nri nke akwụkwọ ya kpaliri ọgbọ ndị na-esi nri sochiri ya ichekwa ihe nketa nri nke ndị Cape Malay South Africa .

14528.title: Steven Bankole Rhodes
14528.extract:
Ọkaikpe S.B. Rhodes C.B.E. (1890–1951) bụ otu n'ime ndị nna guzobere ma ụlọ ikpe Naijiria yana ndị isi gọọmentị. N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1945, ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe nke abụọ a họpụtara na ụlọ ikpe Naịjirịa, ọnye nke mbụ bụ Justice Jibowu na onye nke atọ bụ Justice Adetokunbo Ademola . Dịka onye ọka ikpe ndi mbụ, O nyere aka nke ukwuu na mmepe nke iwu ikpe Naijiria, site n'ịgbanwe ụkpụrụ nke iwu Bekee, na ọdịnaya ha bara uru, na gburugburu ebe obibi Naịjirịa.
N'afọ 1943, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kansụl ndị isi nke Gọvanọ Sir Bernard H. Bourdillon; Tupu nke a, ọ dịghị onye Afrịka sonyere kpọmkwem na nhazi iwu na ọkwa ndị isi na Naịjirịa. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na kansụl omebe iwu na-anọchite anya ngalaba Rivers tupu a họpụta ya na kansụl ndị isi.

Tupu ịbanye na kansụl omebe iwu, a kpọrọ S.B Rhodes ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu na-arụ ọrụ.
N'abalị 21 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1942, a họpụtara Rhodes dịka onye na-akwadoghị nke kansụl omebe iwu nke Naịjirịa, . Ọ nọchitere anya ọdịmma dị iche iche na kansụl omebe iwu n'etiti afọ 1933 - 1943 na-anọchite anya ngalaba Rivers. Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-akọwa ya dịka onye Nationalist. Na kansụl, ọ gbara mbọ ka ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa niile bụrụ mba. Ọ gbakwara mbọ ka ụlọ ikpe obodo nwekwuo nnwere onwe n'ihe gbasara njide siri ike nke ndị isi, site n'aka ndị ọrụ nchịkwa, iji chịkwaa ụlọ ikpe obodo. O kwusiri ike na ụlọ ikpe obodo bụ akụkụ na-enweghị afọ ojuju nke mgbanwe ikpe nke afọ 1933, ma kpọọ oku ka a tụleghachi Iwu Ụlọikpe Obodo na Nọvemba 1937.

15751.title: Amélie Wabehi
15751.extract: Amélie Wabehi Zadjé bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-akpa  ọchị na Ivorian.

17264.title: Edwin A. Gibson
17264.extract: Edwin Arthur Gibson (Jụn 2, 1926 ruo Nọvemba 20, 2011) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na-arụ ọrụ na Indianapolis, Indiana site na 1946 ruo 2002.  Ọrụ ya bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ihe mbụ. Gibson bụ onye mbụ Afrịka-Amerịka architect debanyere aha na steeti Indiana, onye mbụ African-American architect a họpụtara dị ka Indiana's State Architect, na onye mbụ  Afrịka-Amerịka Architect na Indiana iji nwee ụlọ ọrụ nke ya. Ọrụ ogologo oge ya gụnyere ọrụ na ngalaba ọha na eze na nke onwe. Gibson meriri ọtụtụ ihe mgbochi iji nwee ihe ịga nke ọma ma nwee mmesapụ aka n'inye ndụmọdụ na inyere ndị na-eto eto na-ewu ụlọ aka inweta ihe ịga nke ahụ.

22523.title: Sylvia Masebo
22523.extract:
Infobox officeholder|name=Sylvia Masebo|caption=Masebo in 2022|image=Sylvia Masebo close up.png|birth_date= (1963-03-07) 7 Maachị 1963}}
Sylvia Masebo (amụrụ na Machị 7, na afọ 1963) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Zambia, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nnọchi anya National Assembly of Zambia maka mpaghara Chongwe na United Party for National Development (UPND).
Sylvia Masebo nwere akara ugo mmụta na Banking na Finance ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya National Assembly of Zambia maka mpaghara Chongwe kemgbe afọ 2001; nke mbụ guzo na tiketi nke Zambia Republican Party (ZRP) na mgbe e mesịrị, MMD Movement for Multi-Party Democracy na afọ 2003.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Ahụike site n'Ogost, na afọ 2005 ruo Ọktoba 2006 mgbe ọ nọchiri Brian Chituwo.

24179.title: Bertha von Suttner
24179.extract:
Bertha Sophie Felicitas Freifrau von Suttner (nke a na-akpọ ; nke a na-amụ   und Tettau; 9 June 1843 n'ụbọchị 21 June 1914) bụ onye Austria-Bohemian na-eme udo na onye edemede. N'afọ 1905, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị nke abụọ nwetara ihe nrite Nobel (mgbe Marie Curie gasịrị n'afọ 1903), nwanyị mbụ e nyere ihe nrite udo Nobel, na onye Austria mbụ nwetara ihe nritu Nobel.
A mụrụ Bertha Kinský n'ụbọchị 9 June 1843 na Kinský Palace na Obecní dvůr (cz) district nke Prague. Nne na nna ya bụ Austrian Lieutenant general (German: Feldmarschall-Leutnant) Franz Michael de Paula Josef Graf Kinsky von Wchinitz und Tettau (1769 ruo afọ 1843), onye nwụrụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya mgbe ọ dị afọ 75, na nwunye ya na-eto eto Sophie Wilhelmine von Körner (1815 ruo afọ 1884),  fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri ise karịa ya.
Ọ bụ ezie na mmekọrịta onwe onye ya na Alfred Nobel dị mkpirikpi, ya na ya na-ederịta akwụkwọ ozi ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1896, a kwenyere na Von Suttner nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na mkpebi ya itinye ihe nrite udo n'etiti ihe nrite ndị ahụ enyere na testament ya. E nyere Bertha von Suttner Nobel Peace Price na nke ise na 10 Disemba 1905, ya na onye ibe ya, onye ọkà mmụta iwu Tobias Asser (1838-1913) maka enyemaka ha n'ịmepụta usoro mba ụwa dabere na udo karịa agha. Ihe ngosi ahụ mere na 18 Eprel 1906 na Kristiania.

Ịkwụsị Udo
Ndepụta nke ndị na-eme udo
Ndepụta nke ndị Austria
Ndepụta nke ndị edemede Austria
Ndepụta nke ụmụ nwanyị nwetara nrite Nobel

28177.title: Ọrịa na-egbochi ọbara ogbugba
28177.extract:
Ihe na-egbochi ọbara ọgbụgba (antihæmorrhagic) bụ ihe na-akwalite ọbara ọgbụrụgba (ịkwụsị ọbara ọgburu). A pụkwara ịmara ya dị ka ihe na-ahụ maka hemostatic (nke a na-akpokwa ihe nlereanya ọbara).
Ihe ndị na-egbochi ọbara ọgbụgba a na-eji eme ọgwụ nwere usoro dị iche iche nke esi eziputa ha :

Ọgwụ sistemụ na-arụ ọrụ site na igbochi fibrinolysis maobu ikwalite Mgbako
Ndị na-eme ka ọbara na-arụ ọrụ n'ógbè na-arụpụta site na ịkpata vasoconstriction maọbu ịkwalite mkpokọta platelet.

32246.title: Bonzun
32246.extract:
Bonzun bụ ụlọ ọrụ dị na Sweden, nke nwere nkwado site na Otu ahụike ụwa nile na UNICEF. Bonzun na-enyere ụmụ nwanyị dị ime aka ịnweta ozi ndị a na-adịghị n'ịntanetị na mbụ. Isi ihe ha na-elekwasị anya bụ ozi ime nye Ndị China.
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke ebe nrụọrụ weebụ na ngwa na Chayna emeela ka onye guzobere ya nweta ọtụtụ onyinye maka ihe ọhụrụ ya.

36970.title: Torso (ihe nkiri 1973)
36970.extract: Torso (Obi  lit.  Bodies Bear Traces of Carnal Violence', nke a tọhapụrụ dị ka Carnal Violance) bụ ihe nkiri giallo nke 1973 nke Sergio Martino duziri, nke Carlo Ponti mepụtara, na Suzy Kendall, Tina Aumont, Luc Merenda, na John Richardson. Gialli nke ise nke Martino, ihe nkiri ahụ na-elekwasị anya na igbu ọchụ obi ọjọọ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ nwanyị na Perugia" id="mwJQ" rel="mw:WikiLink" title="Università per Stranieri di Perugia">kọleji mba ụwa na Perugia. Ọtụtụ ndị nkatọ kọwara ya dị ka otu n'ime ihe atụ mbụ nke Ihe nkiri slasher.

38119.title: Ụlọ ọrụ Salah Zulfikar Films
38119.extract: Salah Zulfikar Films Company (Templeeti:Lang-ar, aka: Salah Zulfikar Films) bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri hibere na 1962 na Cairo, Egypt. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Middle East na North Africa kemgbe 1962 ruo 1978.

42981.title: Enabel
42981.extract:
Enabel bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepe gọọmentị etiti Belgium (nke bụbu Coopération technique belge, CTB ).
Enyemaka mmepe gọọmentị Belgium ruru ijeri US $ 2.7 na 2022 ma ọ bụ 0.45% nke nnukwu ego mba (GNI). Mba ndị kacha enweta ego bụ mba Belgium na-achịbu, Democratic Republic of the Congo . 
Enabel na-anọdụ n'ime usoro enyemaka mmepe nke Belgium:

Directorate-General for Development Cooperation and Humanitarian Aid (DGD) n'ime Federal Public Service Foreign Affairs, Foreign Trade, and Development Co-operation na-ahụ maka nkwado mmepe. Federal Public Service Foreign Affairs, Foreign Trade, and Development Co-operation na-ewe ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ 150, yana 24% guzoro na ụlọ ọrụ ndị nnọchi anya mba ofesi.
Ntụnye aka na otu dị iche iche na-adaba n'okpuru nlekọta nke ọrụ ọha gọọmentị etiti ndị ọzọ, dị ka ego FPS .
DGD na-enye ntụzịaka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka ntinye aka akọwapụtara, gụnyere ndị na European Commission.
Enabel na-emezu ma na-ahazi amụma mmepe mba ụwa nke Belgium. O nwere ihe dị ka ndị ọrụ 1,500, yana 88% dabere na ụlọ ọrụ mba ofesi.
Ụlọ ọrụ ntinye ego nke Belgium maka mba ndị na-emepe emepe, ụlọ ọrụ ego mmepe nke Belgium, na-etinye ego ozugbo na ọrụ nkeonwe na mmepe akụ na ụba na-apụta. 
A na-akpọbu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ Agence belge de développement CTB( Coopération Technique Belge ) wee nyegharịa Enabel aha na 2018. 
Aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-egwuri egwu na ngwaa bekee 'iji nwee ike', na-egosipụta ihe ndị ọ na-ebute ụzọ:

na-abawanye ike nke ndị mmadụ,
na-enyere aka mmepe,
na-achịkọta ndị mmekọ ya.
Onye isi oche ndị isi oche bụ Delphine Moralis na Jean Van Wetter bụ onye isi oche. 
Na February 2024, obere oge ka gọọmentị Belgium kpebiri ịnọgide na-akwado UNRWA, ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka nke United Nations maka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Palestine, ụlọ ọrụ Enabel dị na Gaza City bụ ndị agha Israel tụrụ bọmbụ ma bibie ya.

43500.title: Milton-Montford, Baltimore
43500.extract: Milton-Montford bụ agbata obi dị na East Baltimore, Maryland .  Milton-Montford dị n'ebe ugwu nke Patterson Park na ndịda nke Amtrak's Northeast Corridor .  Ókèala mpaghara ahụ bụ mpaghara McElderry Park dị na ndịda, Madison-Eastend n'amụma mmalite, Biddle Street n'ebe ugwu, yana Middle East n'ikiri isiokwu.  Ala dị n'etiti ụlọ ọgwụ Johns Hopkins na Frank C Bocek Park, nke akpọ Milton-Montford, bụ ndị bi n'ime obodo na-akpọ mpaghara "Down the Hill".

43546.title: Venus
43546.extract: Venus bụ mbara ala nke abụọ site Anwu.  Ọ bụ mbara ala terrestrial na bụrụ nke kasị dị nsó nye ni nyi na ibu nye obitalu agbataobi ya bụ Àlà.

46891.title: Mohammed Hussein Heikal
46891.extract: Mohammed Hussein Heikal[lower-alpha 1] (Arabic: محمد حسين هيكل    ; Ọgọst 20, 1888 - Disemba 8, 1956) bụ onye ode akwụkwọ Egypt, odeakụkọ, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.  Ọ nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere minista mmụta.

46905.title: Aaron Rose Philip
46905.extract: Aaron Rose Philip (akpọ A-ron, amuru Maachị 15, 2001) bu ihe nlere Antiguan-American.         N'afọ 2018, ọ ghọrọ onye ojii mbụ, transgender, na ụdị nwere nkwarụ anụ ahụ nke ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na-anọchi anya ya ma nweela ụdịrị n'ọtụtụ nnukwu foto foto ejiji na mkpọsa.    Na 2021, Philip rụrụ arụ dị ka ihe pụrụ iche maka ihe ngosi ejiji nke mmiri/okpomọkụ 2022 nke Moschino - na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe nlereanya mbụ na-eji oche nkwagharị na-eje ije maka ụdị ejiji okomoko.

49707.title: Ugwu Isto
49707.extract: Ugwu Isto bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị elu na Brooks Range, Alaska, USA.  Dị na ọwụwa anyanwụ Brooks Range, n'ebe a maara dị ka ugwu Romanzof, Ugwu Isto dị 5 miles (8.0 km) ndịda nke Ugwu Hubley, ọnụ ọnụ nke abụọ kachasị ogologo na Oke Brooks. Ugwu Isto dị n'ime ebe mgbaba anụ ọhịa nke Arctic na aha ya na 1966 maka Reynold E. (Pete) Isto, onye injinia obodo maka US Geological Survey .   N'afọ 2014, teknụzụ nha ọhụrụ gosipụtara na Ugwu Isto bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu na Oke Brooks. Na mbụ, e kwenyere na Ugwu Chamberlin bụ nke kacha ogologo, ma ugbu a ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke atọ.

51934.title: Nirmal Chandra Roy
51934.extract: Dr. Nirmal Chandra Roy bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị India si Trinamool Congress. Na ntuli aka nke Septemba 2023, a họpụtara ya ka onye otu ọgbakọ omebe iwu West Bengal sitere na Dhupguri.

53284.title: Tse Ling-ling
53284.extract: Hsieh Ling-ling ( Chinese , amụrụ na 20 Septemba 1956) bụ nwa kpakpando amuru Taiwanese na nwunye mbụ nke onye ijeri Hong Kong Peter Lam .

13069.title: GuarantCo
13069.extract: GuarantCo bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-etinye ego na akụrụngwa ma na-akwado mmepe nke ahịa ego na mba ndị nwere obere ego na Asia na Africa.

14553.title: Ituen Basi
14553.extract: Ituen Bassey na-azụ ahịa dị ka Ituen Basi bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na Naijiria. O meela atụmatụ ejiji maka ihe nkiri egwu yana ịmepụta ihe ngosi catwalk. Ọ rụọla ọrụ na UK na Nigeria.

22020.title: Jessica Eriyo
22020.extract: Jessica Eriyo (26 August 1969 ̊ ruo 12 August 2022) bụ onye nkuzi Uganda, onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke East African Community, (EAC), nke na-ahụ maka ngalaba mmepụta na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya. A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 30 Eprel na afo 2012.

22816.title: Buu language (Cameroon)
22816.extract: Asụsụ Buu sitere Ndịda Bantoid nke Cameroon. Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Mundabli.

28104.title: Isiokwu
28104.extract:
Edigas ma ọ bụ Idigas bụ obodo Hindu toddy tapper di na Karnataka, Telangana, Andhra Pradesh na Tamil Nadu . 
Ọrụ ọdịnala nke ndị Idiga bụ nke toddy tapping. Ha tinye karịrị uche na mpaghara Malenadu na Shivamogga. Obodo ndị yiri ya ma dị iche n'ime ala toddy tapping , nke a na-akpọ Billava na Deevaru, dị na Dakshina Kannada na ndịda Karnataka, n'otu n'otu. E nweela mgbalị ime ka obodo ndị a dị iche iche jikọọ aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mana ndị a emebiela n'afọ ndị otu puku na iri asatọ .
A na-ahazi ndị Idiga dị ka ndị otu laghachiri azụ (OBC) n'afọ ndị 1980s, mgbe ha mejupụtara ihe dị ka pasent abụọ na nkeji ise nke ndị bi na Karnataka. N'agbanyeghị ọnụ ọgụgụ ha dị ala, a họpụtara ndị Idiga iri na otu dị ka ndị otu Nzukọ Ndị Ome Iwu na ntuli aka nke afọ otu puku narị iteghete iri asatọ na ise na-eme ka ha bụrụ otu OBC kachasị ukwuu na Nzukọ Ndị Ọme Iwu nke Karnataka. Ha nwere mmadụ isii na afọ otu puku narị iteghete iri asaa na asatọ nweekwa mmadụ asatọ na afọ otu puku narị iteghete iri asatọ na atọ  Ha ka bụ ikike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị mkpa ma kọwaa ha dị ka akụkụ nke AHINDA nke nyeere ndị otu Indian National Congress aka nke ukwuu na ntuli aka nke afọ puku abụọ iri na ato.
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke Idigas aghọwo ndị bara ọgaranya ma dị ike site n'ịgbatị itinye aka ha na nkwekọrịta ego, distiling na brewing na nkwekọta na nnukwu azụmaahịa, mana ntọala akụ na ụba nke obodo ahụ ka na-ejedebe na nke mmanya. Idigas nke Neeravari Pradesh nke Karnataka nwere ọtụtụ ala na-eme nri na-eme ka ha nweta nnukwu ego. Ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka Sarekoppa Bangarappa, ndị nke obodo toddy-tapping, enweela ike iji nkwado nke ndị a bara ọgaranya.
Idiga na-agba Ọkpụkpụ ma, ya na ụfọdụ ndị otu Vokkaliga, na-achịkwa ofụma na ya bụ ọrụ 
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Prajavani nke asụsụ Kannada bụ nke onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụgbọ mmanya idiga nke "kpara ego  n'oge agha" guzobere ma, ka ọ na-erule afọ otu puku narị iteghete ụmụ ya ka na-achịkwa ya.

29689.title: Henry Marshall Steven
29689.extract: Henry Marshall Steven CBE FRSE (June 24, 1893 - February 19, 1969) bụ onye Scotland na-ahụ maka ọhịa na agụmakwụkwọ na narị afọ nke 20. Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin "Forestry" site na 1926 ruo 1946.

30376.title: Nchanga Ebe a na-egwupụta ọla kọpa
30376.extract:
Ebe a na-egwu ọwara kọpa Nchanga, bụbu ogbunigwe Chingola Copper, bụ ebe a na-egwupụta ọla kọpa dị n'okpuru ala na nke mepere emepe na Chingola, na mpaghara Copperbelt nke Zambia.  Ọ bụ ebe a na-egwupụta ọla kọpa kacha kacha n'Africa.  Ọ bụ nke Konkola Copper Mines nwere ya, njikọ aka n'etiti Vedanta Resources na ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta akụ nke Zambia ( ZCCM Investments Holdings ).
Mmetọ sitere na ogbunigwe ahụ mebiri isi mmiri nke ọtụtụ puku ndị obodo dị nso na-enweghị isi mmiri ọzọ, butere nsogbu ahụike.  Ndị obodo ahụ kọkwara na mmetọ ahụ mebiri ala ubi ma belata ihe ọkụkụ.  Otu puku mmadụ na narị asatọ ndị obodo gbara akwụkwọ ikpe klas-action (Lungowe v Vedanta Resources plc) megide Vedanta Resources na London na 2015. Okwu ahụ gara n'Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Britain ma nwee mmetụta sara mbara maka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe onwunwe mba dị iche iche nke Britain na-azụ ahịa ná mba ọzọ.

31517.title: Saliu Mustapha
31517.extract:
Saliu Mustapha bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na onye otu All Progressives Congress . Saliu Mustapha All Progressives Congress Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Congress for Progressive Change, otu n'ime òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị na-adịghịzi adị nke jikọtara iji guzobe All Progressives Congress. Nzukọ maka Mgbanwe Ọganihu All Progressives Congress
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Saliu Mustapha Foundation.

31529.title: Saburi Adesanya
31529.extract: Saburi Adesanya Addjimi bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ Naijiria, onye edemede na onye isi oche nke asaa nke Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo Ọ bụbu onye isi oche tupu a kwado ya na 2015. Saburi Adesanya Addjimi Nigerian Olabisi Onabanjo University Ọ hapụrụ ọfịs ahụ na 2017 mgbe afọ ise nke ije ozi gasịrị.

37590.title: Asụsụ Duri
37590.extract:
Duri bụ Asụsụ Austronesian nke Sulawesi, Indonesia .  Ọ bụ ụdị dị iche iche nke asụsụ Massenrempulu.
N'afọ 2010, mmadụ 123,000 na-asụ asụsụ a. Ethnologue depụtara  dị ka asụsụ 'na-eyi egwu'.

38203.title: Superno
38203.extract: Templeeti:Infobox filmSuperno bụ ihe nkiri akụkọ ifo sayensị nke Etiopia-Chilean nke 2021 nke Abel Mekasha dere, duzie ya, meziri ma dezie ya na mpụta mbụ ya.[1][2]  Esubalew Nasir na-eme ya.[3]  Akpọrọ ihe nkiri a na ndepụta nhọrọ maka ntinye Chile maka ihe nkiri Academy Award for Best International Feature Film na 94th Academy Awards, [4] mana ahọpụtaghị ya.[5]

39962.title: Ebe nchekwa nri Chicago ka ukwuu
39962.extract:
The Greater Chicago Food Depository ( GCFD ) bụ nchekwa nchekwa na-alụ ogụ agụụ na Cook County, Illinois .  GCFD na-ekesa nri nri na-azụra site na ihe nke ebe nri nri 700, kichin ofe, ebe nchekwa na mmemme obodo, na-ejere ndị okenye na-ebu ụzọ 800,000 ozi kwa afọ.  N'afọ ፉfu ego nke 2016, GCFD kesara ihe nde 70 nke nri,Kekere,mmiri mmiri ara ehi, na anụ - nke ihe nri nri 160,000 kwa ụbọchị.  [1] N'ime $96,883,955 e mere na 2016, ihe ụmụ 90% gara na-eduzi mmemme nkesa nri.
. GCFD bụ onye ọrụ nkwado nke Nri America, akụ akụ nri nke mba

43532.title: Brookmont, Maryland
43532.extract: Brookmont bụ ebe ahapụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ na mpaghara njikọ na Montgomery County, Maryland, United States.  nkeji ngụkọ 2020, o nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 3,751.  A na-ewere Brookmont dị nso nke Bethesda agbataobi n'ihi na ọ dabara na koodu zip 20816 nke Bethesda.

45867.title: Rupert Kinnard
45867.extract: Rupert Kinnard (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) nke a makwaara dị ka Prọfesọ I.B. Gittendowne,  bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri nke mepụtara ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke mbụ na-aga n'ihu: Brown Bomber (onye dike dị afọ iri na ụma) na Diva Touché Flambé (onye mmekọ nwanyị na-enweghị afọ ndụ).  Kinnard bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya na onye Africa America.

52126.title: Peter Takirambudde
52126.extract:
Peter Takirambudde bụ Onye isi ochichi nke Human Rights Watch maka Sub-Saharan Africa amuru na Uganda.

Tupu osonyere Human Rights Watch na 1995, ọ bụ prọfesọ na Mahadum Botswana.   Ọ bụ ọkàiwu site na ọzụzụ, na onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere na Uganda.  Takirambudde nwetara PhD na iwu azụmahịa mba ụwa na Mahadum Yale, ma kọwapụta maka mmebi iwu mmadụ n'ebe dị ka Liberia na Cabinda N'okwu gbasara esemokwu Darfur, o kwuruN'agbanyeghi ma e nwere mgbukpọ agbụrụ, oke na oke nke arụrụala na-aga n'ihu na Darfur chọrọ nzaghachi ngwa ngwa nke mba ụwa. N'iburu n'uche ọdịda na-aga n'ihu nke Sudan n'ịkụ ndị na-eme ya ikpe, Kansụl Nchebe kwesịrị ilekwasị ọnọdụ Darfur na Ụlọikpe Mpụ Mba Nile.Banyere ime ihe ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Zambia, Takirambudde kwuruỌ bụrụ na ndị uwe ojii Zambia amaliteghị nyocha zuru oke ozugbo banyere ogbugbu nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ime ihe ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Zambia ga-aga n'ihu. A ghaghị ikpe ziri ezi maka ndị mwakpo a metụtara ozugbo, yana maka ndị niile bi na Zambia.

53349.title: Chung Hsin-yu
53349.extract: Chung Hsin-yu ( Chinese ; Amụrụ na Julaị 9, 1983),  makwaara dị ka Sasa ma ọ bụ Sha Sha, bụ onye ọbịa telivishọn Taiwanese, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ọchụnta ego. Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ihe nlere anya ma mara ya nke ọma maka ịnabata ihe ngosi njem nri Super Taste na ihe ngosi eziokwu Hi, Bata .

54102.title: Luka Connor
54102.extract: Luka Connor (amụrụ 24 Septemba 1996) bụ onye ọkpọ egwuregwu rugby New Zealand . Ọ bụ akụkụ nke Black Ferns 2021 Rugby World Cup ndị meriri aha nke isii ha. Ọ na-egwuri maka Chiefs Manawa na asọmpi Super Rugby Aupiki ; ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Bay of Plenty Volcanix na Farah Palmer Cup na rugby klọb maka Rangataua.

55129.title: Ememme Fieve Kpor Legba
55129.extract: Ememme Fievie Kpor Legba bụ emume a na-eme kwa afọ nke ndị isi na ndị Fievie-Dugame na mpaghara North Tongu na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana na-eme. A na-eme ya n'ọnwa Maachị.

55190.title: Ememme Mara Mma nke Ndagwurugwu ahụ
55190.extract:
Ememme Mara Mma nke Ndagwurugwu (Ijipt: hb nfr n jnt;  ) bụ emume ndị Ijipt oge ochie, nke a na-eme kwa afọ na Thebes (nke bụ Luxor), n'oge ọchịchị etiti na mgbe e mesịrị.
mmiri dị nsasị nke chi ifufe Amun-Re, n'ebe ya Mut na nwa ya nwoke Khensu ụlọ ụlọ nsasị ahụ dị na Karnak iji gaa n'enye nsso olili ozu nke ndị eze ọnwụ na West Bank na ebe nsõ ha na Theban Necropolis.

55421.title: Ọrịa ara ehi
55421.extract:
Ngụgụ ehi bụ ụdị offal nke a na-eji na nri dị iche iche nakwa dị ka isi iyi nke surfactants akpa ume . Na Peru ka a na-akpọ ya bofe, na Nigeria ka a na-akpọ Fùkù . Na Indonesia, Paru goreng (eghe ehi eghe eghe) bụ ụdị nri Padang na-ewu ewu, na Nasi kuning nwere ike iji ngụgụ ehi mee ya.

N'ihe gbasara ahụike, ihe ndị na-ahụ maka anụmanụ enwetara gụnyere Beractants Alveofact nke ewepụtara na mmiri ngụgụ ehi na Survanta ewepụtara n'akpa ume ehi nwere DPPC, palmitic acid na tripalmitin.
Defibrotide bụ deoxyribonucleic acid ewepụtara (otu eriri) sitere na ngụgụ ehi.

12549.title: Ayila Yussuf
12549.extract: Atanda Ayila Yussuf (a mụrụ ya 4 Nọvemba 1984). Ọ bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ bụ onye gbara bọọlụ dịka onye mgbachitere etiti ma ọ bụ onye na-agbachitere etiti . Onye bụbu onye egwuregwu mba ụwa na ndị ntorobịa Naijiria, Yussuf kwagara Ukrainian Premier League Dynamo Kyiv site n'akụkụ Naijiria Union Bank na 2003. N'agbanyeghị mmerụ ahụ, Yussuf ghọrọ onye egwuregwu Dynamo Kyiv na ndị otu mba Nigeria . Ọ sonyeere Metalist Kharkiv na mbinye ego na 2014.

13408.title: Michelle Claire Edwards
13408.extract: Michelle Claire Edwards (ka amụrụ na 11 Julaị 1974) bụ onye egwuregwu badminton nke South Africa.

21113.title: Engsh
21113.extract:
Engsh bụ cant nke malitere na Nairobi, Kenya na 1980s. Mgbe Sheng mepụtara n'akụkụ ndị dara ogbenye nke Nairobi, Engsh mepụtara n"etiti ndị ntorobịa nke ndị bara ọgaranya, ndị bara ọganihu. Engsh dabeere na Bekee, mana ọ na-agwakọta Swahili, na asụsụ agbụrụ ndị ọzọ dị ka Kikuyu na Luo. Otú ọ dị, dịka Sheng, ọ bụ koodu, ya mere enweghị ike ịghọta ya, n'akụkụ ka ukwuu, site n'aka ndị na-asụ Bekee. Ma Engsh ma Sheng malitere dị ka koodu nzuzo megide ndị okenye, iji mee ka ndị ntorobịa Nairobi na-ekwurịta okwu n'asụsụ ndị okenye na-enweghị ike ịghọta. Ndị na-ekwu okwu mbụ abụrụla ndị okenye, na ndị nne na nna. Ma Engsh ma Sheng na-agbanwe ngwa ngwa, na ikike ịgbaso okwu "n'ime" nke oge ahụ na-esiwanye ike ka mmadụ na-etolite, ya mere a ka na-ewere ha dị ka asụsụ ndị ntorobịa.
N'oge gara aga, ọ nweghị ihe dị iche n'etiti Sheng na Engsh, mana ndị ntorobịa na-asụ asụsụ abụọ ahụ chọpụtara na ha enweghị ike ịghọta ibe ha nke ọma, n'ihi na asụsụ ndị ahụ malitere n'ụzọ dị iche iche bụ isi n'ihi ọnọdụ akụ na ụba dị iche iche. Ka o sina dị, a ka nwere ọtụtụ myirịta dị n'etiti Sheng na Engsh, mana Engsh pụrụ iche iji guzoro dị ka onye nwe ya.

21224.title: Nlekọta ahụike ma ọ
21224.extract: Nlekọta ahụike ma ọ bụ nlekọta ahụike bụ nkwalite ahụike site na mgbochi, nyocha, ọgwụgwọ, nkwalite, ma ọ bụ ọgwụgwọ ọrịa, ọrịa, mmerụ ahụ, na nkwarụ anụ ahụ na nke uche ndị ọzọ na ndị mmadụ.  Ndị ọkachamara ahụike na ngalaba ahụike jikọrọ aka na-enye nlekọta ahụike.  Ọgwụ, dentistry, ụlọ ọgwụ, midwifery, nọọsụ, optometry, audiology, akparamaagwa, ọgwụgwọ ọrụ, ọgwụgwọ anụ ahụ, ọzụzụ egwuregwu, na ọrụ ahụike ndị ọzọ bụ akụkụ nke nlekọta ahụike.  Ọ na-agụnye ọrụ a rụrụ n'inye nlekọta mbụ, nlekọta nke abụọ, na nlekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, yana ahụike ọha.

22209.title: Marcelle Capy
22209.extract: Marcelle Capy bụ aha njirimara nke Marcelle Marquès (1891 Xi 1962), onye France na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye nta akụkọ, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị na onye na-eme udo. O bipụtara ọtụtụ akwụkwọ site n'afọ 1916 ruo afọ 1950, ha niile raara onwe ha nye mmasị ya na pacifism. A na-echeta ya karịsịa maka ihe nrite ya Des hommes passèrent (Ndị Nwoke Gafere), nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1930. Dị ka onye nta akụkọ, o nyere aka n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, ọkachasị La Vague nke o guzobere n'afọ 1918. Na mbido afọ 1930, ọ bụ onye otu Ligue internationale des combattants de la paix (International League of Fighters for Peace).

22713.title: Mgeni Jadi Kadika
22713.extract:
Mgeni Jadi Kadika (Amụrụ n'afọ 1957) bụ onye omeiwu Tanzania maka Civic United Front .
Mgeni Kadika gụrụ akwụkwọ na Pandani, Pemba North, na-ahapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'afọ 1976. Site n'afọ 1977 ruo afọ 1980 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Zanzibar Ministry of Trade, ma site n'afọ 1980 ruo afọ 1988 ọ bụ onye njikwa na ụlọ ahịa na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ.
Ọ banyere na National Assembly na 2005 dị ka onye Special Seats MP, ma nwee oche ya na ntuli aka 2010 na 2015.
N'ọnwa Mee 2016, Kadika jụrụ ma gọọmentị ga-enye agụmakwụkwọ ọha na eze na nyocha gbasara ọrịa fibroid uterine. N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, o gosipụtara nchegbu banyere ọrịa akụrụ na-arịwanye elu na Tanzania, ma rịọ Minista Ahụike, Ummy Mwalimu, ka ọ wepụta ọnụ ọgụgụ mpaghara. N'ọnwa Mee 2020, ọ jụrụ Minista Ahụike, Ummy Mwalimu, ihe gọọmentị Tanzania na-eme, karịa nyocha ókèala, iji chebe ụmụ amaala Tanzania na COVID-19.
Mgeni Kadika bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu iri abụọ na otu hapụrụ CUF iji sonye na ACT-Wazalendo n'ọnwa June 2020.

24693.title: Mmiri n'Africa
24693.extract:
Mmiri na mba Africa bụ isi okwu dị oke mkpa na-agụnye isi iyi, nkesa na ojiji akụ na ụba na uru mmiri baru na he onwunwe mmiri na kọntinent ahụ. N'ozuzu,  mba Africa nwere ihe dị ka pecenti itolu  nke mmiri dị ọcha n'ụwa na pecenti iri na isii nke ndị bi n'ụwa. N'etiti osimiri ya bụ Congo, Naịl, Zambezi, Niger na Ọdọ Mmiri Victoria, nke a na-ewere dị ka ọdọ mmiri nke abụọ kachasị nnukwu n'ụwa nile. Na agbanyeghị nke a, kọntinent ahụ bụ nke abụọ kachasị  nwe ala akọrọ n'ụwa, ọtụtụ nde ndị Afrịka ka na-ata ahụhụ site na ụkọ mmiri n'afọ niile.

A na-ekwu na ụkọ ndị a bụ nsogbu sitere nkesa na-adịghị mma, mmụba nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na  ajọ nlekọta  nke ihe ndị enyeburu enye. Mgbe ụfọdụ, ana enwe obere ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ bi ebe e nwere nnukwu mmiri. Iji nwee  maatụ, pasent iri atọ nke mmiri nke kọntinent ahụ dị na ndagwurugwu Congo nke naanị pasent iri nke ndị Afrịka bi na ya. Enwere nnukwu ọdịiche na usoro mmiri ozuzo a hụrụ n'ebe dị iche iche na oge dị iche iche. Enwekwara ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu etu anwụ si amị mmiri n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke mpaghara ahụ na-akpata pasentị dị ala nke mmiri ozuzo n'ebe ndị dị otú ahụ. Na agbanyeghi , enwere nnukwu mgbanwe n'etiti na n'ime afọ nke ọnọdụ ihu igwe na ihe onwunwe mmiri niile, yabụ ọ bụ ezie na mpaghara ụfọdụ nwere mmiri zuru ezu, mpaghara Sahara Africa na-enwe  ọtụtụ ihe ịma aka metụtara mmiri ihu nke na-egbochi uto akụ na ụba ma na-eyi ndụ nke ndị ya egwu. Ọrụ ugbo Africa na-adaberekari na ọrụ ugbo mmiri ozuzo, na ihe na-erughị pecenti iri nke ala a na-akọ ugbo na kọntinent ahụ na-agba mmiri. Mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na mgbanwe dị oke egwu. Isi iyi nke ọkụ eletrik bụ hydropower, nke na-enye aka nke ukwuu na ikike arụnyere ugbu a maka ike. Kainji Dam bụ ihe na-emepụta ọkụ eletrik maka nnukwu obodo niile dị na Naịjirịa yana mba ya na ha gbara agbata obi, Niger. N'ihi ya, itinye ego na-aga n'ihu n'ime afọ iri gara aga, nke mụbara oke ọkụ eletrik a na-emepụta.
Ụzọ aga esi merie ihe ịma aka nke mmiri maka ike na nchekwa nri na enwe -mgbochi site na adịghị ike na akụrụngwa mmiri, mmepe, na ikike njikwa iji gboo mkpa nke ọnụ ọgụgụ na-eto ngwa ngwa. Nke a na-agbakwunye n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na Africa bu mba nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ  obodo kachasị  emepe ọsọ ọsọ n'ụwa. Mmepe na njikwa mmiri dị mgbagwoju anya karịa n'ihi ọtụtụ ihe onwunwe mmiri na-agafe ókèala (osimiri, ọdọ mmiri na aquifers). Ihe dị ka pasent iri asaa na ise nke Afrịka ndịda Sahara dabara n'ime étíti iri ise na atọ nke mba ụwa nke na-agafe ọtụtụ ókèala. A pụkwara ịgbanwe ihe mgbochi a ka ọ bụrụ ohere ma ọ bụrụ na a na-eji ikike maka imekọ ihe ọnụ gafere ókèala eme ihe na mmepe nke ihe onwunwe mmiri nke mpaghara ahụ. Nnyocha ọtụtụ ngalaba nke Osimiri Zambezi, dịka ọmụmaatụ, na-egosi na imekọ ihe ọnụ nke osimiri nwere ike iduga na mmụba pecenti iri abụo na atọ na mmepụta ike ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị itinye ego ọ bụla ọzọ. E nwere ọtụtụ usoro ụlọ ọrụ na nke iwu maka imekọ ihe ọnụ gafere ókèala, dị ka Zambezi River Authority, Southern African Development Community (SADC) Protocol, Volta River Authority na Nile Basin Commission. Otú ọ dị, a chọrọ mgbalị ndị ọzọ iji zụlite ọchịchọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, yana ikike ego na usoro ụlọ ọrụ dị mkpa maka mmeri mmeri na mmeri ọtụtụ ọrụ na ngwọta kachasị mma maka ndị niile bi n'akụkụ ikpere mmiri ma ọbu ndị nwere oke ala n'ikpere mmiri  .

Mmiri dị n'okpuru ala na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịkwado mmiri na ihe ndị dị ndụ na mpaghara Sahara Africa karịsịa n'ihi na ọ dị mfe nnweta , izu oke ya, n'ozuzu ya dị elu, na ikike dị mkpa iji gbochie oge ụkọ mmiri na ịbawanye mgbanwe ihu igwe.
N'ihe ndị a niile, enweghị ọtụtụ isi iyi na enye  mmiri ọṅụṅụ dị ọcha na mba Africa, otu n'ime nyocha ndị e mere na 2007 gosiri na ihe karịrị pecenti iri anọ nke ndị Afrịka na-eji mmiri dị n'okpuru ala dị ka isi iyi mmiri ọṅụṅụ ha, ọkachasị na mba ndị dị n'ebe Ugwu na Ndịda Afrịka.
Ọ bụ ezie na ihe ndị metụtara mmiri na ihu igwe nke mpaghara ọ bụla e nyere na-ekpebi nnweta na mmejuputa nke mmiri dị n'okpuru ala, ubara mmiri na ịdị mma nke mmiri dị na ala n'ọdịnihu na-adabere n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na ojiji ala na omume nchịkwa nke obodo viii n'ime mpaghara mmiri dị n"okpuru ala.
Mmiri ọkpọkọ ka bụ ụzọ kachasị mkpa esi enweta mmiri ọṅụṅụ (pecenti iri atọ na itoolu) n'obodo ndị mepere emepe, mana mmiri nke eji aka ma ọbu njin gwuputa na ala na-aghọwanye ihe dị mkpa (pecenti iri abụo na anọ). WHO , ndị ọkachamara na ihe gbasara ahụ ike (2006) kwuru na, na 2004, naanị pecenti iri isii nke ndị mmadụ nọ na mpaghara Sahara Africa nwere ike ịnweta mmiri ọṅụṅụ site na njikọ ụlọ (pọmpụ me ụlọ ma ọ bụ pọmpụ dị n'ogige ebe ndị mmadụ bikọtarụ ọnụ). Ọbụna mgbe enwere  mmiri  n'ebe ndị a, ọ naghị adị mfe ndị mmadụ inweta ezigbo mmiri ọṅụṅụ dị ọcha  n'ihi na enwere ihe ize ndụ nke mmetọ n'ihi ọtụtụ ihe. Ihe ndị dị ka mmezi na-adịghị mma n'ihi obere ego, mmetọ na adịghị ọcha mgbe ụfọdụ n'ihi ụkọ ego. Mgbe a na-ewu olulu mmiri ma mepụta ụlọ ọrụ nhicha mmiri, mgbe ụfọdụ, a naghị eme nnwale mmiri mgbe niile dị ka ọ dị mkpa, na ejeghị akwụkwọ n'etiti ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe isi iyi mmiri.

Òtù Ahụ Ike Ụwa (WHO) na 2015 kọrọ na ihe dị ka nde mmadụ naarị na iri ise na itoolu nwetara mmiri nke ana emezighị ọfuma site na ọdọ mmiri dị n'elu ala, ọdọ mmiri, osimiri na iyi n'ụwa niile. Isi iyi mmiri dị n'elu  ala n'Africa na-emetọkarị mgbe ụfọdụ. Ihe ndị dị ka nsị, mmetọ mmanụ, ihe ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe wụpụtaru. Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Niger Delta nke bụ ebe ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ  na emepụta mmanụ Naịjirịa dị nke a na-ewepụta ihe dị ka nde barel mmanụ abụo n'ógbè ahụ kwa ụbọchị, emetọla mmiri n'ihi mmanụ na gbanye na mmiri.

26968.title: Dobara (nri ndi Algeria)
26968.extract: Dobara bụ ofe nke ndi obodo Algeria na-eri akwụkwọ nri na-atọ ụtọ, nke e ji chickpeas ya na agwa sara mbara mee ma jiri mmanụ oliv mee ka ọ dị mmiri. O sitere n'obodo Biskra di na Algeria, a na-eri ya n'oge oyi n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke mba ahụ, ọkachasị na El Oued, Batna, Khenchela, Aïn M'lila, Constantine na Djelfa.

27045.title: Ardis
27045.extract: Ardis bụ nnukwu ụlọ ahịa dị na Algiers, isi obodo Algeria. E meghere nnukwu ụlọ ahịa mbụ n'afọ 2012 na Mohammedia, nke abụọ meghere na Bir El Djir, Oran n'afọ 2016. Ọ bụ otu Arcofina nwe ya.

27067.title: African central bank
27067.extract:
Ụlọ akụ Central Africa (ACB) bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ego ise mbụ na ụlọ ọrụ pụrụ iche nke African Union. Ka oge na-aga, ọ ga-eweghara ibu ọrụ nke Fund Monetary Africa.
Mgbe emechara ya nke ọma, ACB ga-abụ naanị onye na-enye otu ego Africa ("Afro" ma ọ bụ "Ariq") na/ma ọ bụ na-arụ ọrụ n'akụkụ ụlọ akụ nchekwa mpaghara Africa, ọ ga-abụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ akụ nke Gọọmenti Africa na/ma ọ bụ mpaghara otu, ọ ga-abụ onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ nkeonwe na nke ọha na eze n'akụkụ ụlọ akụ etiti mpaghara Africa, ọ ga-ahazi, nyocha na ilekọta ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ nke Africa na mmekọrịta ya na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ na mpaghara, ọ ga-edozi mmasị na mgbanwe gọọmentị. ọnụego nke nwere ike ma ọ bụ ghara ịdị na ya na ụlọ akụ etiti mpaghara; ha niile jikọtara ya na nchịkwa gọọmentị Afrịka
Otu ego Afrịka ga-agụnye ego nke mpaghara mpaghara etiti nke gụnyere ego mba (The Arab Maghreb Union (AMU) - Northern Afriq, Southern African Development Community (SADC) - Southern Afriq, Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) - Western Afriq ma ọ bụ ECO, East African Community (EAC), Eastern Afriq - Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA) - Central Afriq wdg.Ọpụpụ ọzọ

27786.title: Naglaa Mahmoud
27786.extract: Naglaa Ali Mahmoud (Arabic: , IPA:  ˈ Tianæli mæħˈmuːd] ma ọ bụ ; amụrụ na 4 Julaị 1962) bụ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ na nwa nwanne nna nke Onye isi ala nke ise nke Ijipt, Mohamed Morsi ma bụrụkwa nwanyị mbụ site na 2012 ruo 2013. Naglaa jụrụ aha nke First Lady, na-ahọrọ ka a kpọọ ya "Ohu mbụ," "nwunye onye isi ala," ma ọ bụ "Umm Ahmed," aha ọdịnala (kunya) nke pụtara nne Ahmed, ya.  ọkpara.

29373.title: John Boyd Orr
29373.extract:
John Boyd Orr.  physiologist, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọrụ ugbo bụ onye e nyere Nobel Peace Prize maka nyocha sayensị ya banyere ihe oriri na-edozi ahụ na ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa mbụ nke United Nations Food and Agriculture Organisation (FAO).
.[10]Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, Boyd Orr meriri akwụkwọ ego na Kilmarnock Academy, nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma n'ihi na akwụkwọ ego ndị dị otú ahụ dị ụkọ mgbe ahụ.  Ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ a dị ihe dị ka kilomita 32 site n'ụlọ ya dị na West Kilbride, mana nna ya nwere ebe a na-egwupụta ihe dị ka kilomita 3 site na ụlọ akwụkwọ mmuta ahụ, e nyere John ebe obibi dị nso.  Ezinụlọ ya belatara agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ n'ihi na, n'ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ ọ na-anọ, ya na ndị na-arụ ọrụ ebe a na-agbawa nkume na-anọkọ, bụ́ ndị na-ahapụ ya ka ọ rụọ ígwè ọrụ, ndị o sikwa na ya nweta “okwu ndị dị ebube nke ịkpọ iyi”.  [10]  Mgbe ọnwa anọ gachara ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obodo dị na West Kilbride ebe ọ gara n'ihu agụmakwụkwọ ya n'okpuru nkuzi mkpali nke onye isi ụlọ ọrụ John G. Lyons.[10]  N'ebe ahụ ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi nwa akwụkwọ na-akwụ £ 10 maka afọ mbụ, yana £ 20 maka nke abụọ.  Nke a bụ oge na-achọsi ike maka nwata Boyd Orr, n'ihi na na mgbakwunye na ọrụ nkuzi ya, na ịgụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ maka ntinye akwụkwọ mahadum na ọzụzụ nkuzi, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ kwa ụbọchị na azụmahịa nna ya.[10].
After four years as a pupil-teacher, at the age of 19, he won a Queen's Scholarship to study at a teacher training college in Glasgow, plus a bursary which paid for his lodgings there. The course required attending classes at the college, in addition to following the three-year Arts course – based on classics – at the university. As Boyd Orr had passed his university entrance examinations, the fees for the university were also covered. The university education was considered the more important part of the course.[11]

31153.title: Muhammed S. Audu
31153.extract: Muhammed Salihu Audu nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Muhammed S. Audu bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ Naijiria. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi nke isii nke Federal University of Technology, Minna site na 2007 ruo 2012. Ọ bụ ugbu a osote onye isi oche nke Mahadum Federal, Lokoja.

41866.title: Bud Osborn
41866.extract: Bud Osborn (4 Ọgọst 1947 - 6 Mee 2014) [1] bụ onye na-ede uri, onye nhazi obodo, na onye na-akwado ọrụ na Vancouver's Downtown Eastside .  N'ịgbaso mgba oge ogologo ya na Mgbochi ike heroin na ọrịa na-aba n'anya, [2] Osborn bụ isi nke Vancouver Area Network of Drug Users ma akwụkwọ maka ngwaọrụ m ịgba ọgwụ na-ahụ maka iwu .  [3] Egwu ya kwuru ihe ogbenye na ihe ebe obibi na Vancouver .

45241.title: John Rushmere
45241.extract: John Weir Rushmere (amụrụ 1 Eprel 1939) bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ South Africa na onye bụbu onye egwuregwu rugby na cricketer .

45598.title: Kwame Governs Agbodza
45598.extract: Kwame Governs Agbodza bụ onye ike ike Ghana na onye otu nzuko omeiwu nke asaa nke Republic of Ghana na-Ịnya anya mpaghara Adaklu na mpaghara Volta na tiketi National Democratic Congress.  [1] Ugbu a ọ bụ Oga ndị omeiwu Ghana

47669.title: Eddie Green
47669.extract: Eddie Green (August 16, 1896 - Septemba 19, 1950) bụ onye omere America, onye ntụzi ihe nkiri, onye na-ede ihe, na agwa redio kacha mara maka ọrụ olu ya na mmemme redio Amos 'n' Andy na Duffy's Tavern .

47779.title: Lincoln Borglum
47779.extract: James Lincoln de la Mothe Borglum (Eprel 9, 1912 – Jenụarị 27, 1986) bụ onye ọkpụkpụ America, onye na-ese foto, ode akwụkwọ na injinia ;  a mara ya nke ọma maka ilekọta mmecha nke Ugwu Rushmore mgbe onye ndu ọrụ ahụ nwụsịrị, nna ya, Gutzon Borglum, na 1941. Otu n'ime ọrụ ya kacha mara amara, bust nke nna ya, na- na-enye na ndụ Lincoln Borglum Visitors.  Center na Ugwu Rushmore.

48215.title: Nasreddine Dinet
48215.extract: Nasreddine Dinet (amụrụ dị ka Alphonse-Étienne Dinet na 28 Maachị 1861 – 24 Disemba 1929, Paris) bụ onye na-ese ihe orientist nke France bụrụkwa otu n'ime ndị malitere Société des Peintres Orientalistes [Society for French Oriental Painters]. Ọ bịara nwee mmasị na Algeria na omenala ya, nke mere na ọ ghọrọ Islam, ma mara nke ọma n'asụsụ Arabic. Na mgbakwunye na eserese ya, ọ sụgharịrị akwụkwọ Arabic gaa na French.

52741.title: Unnao rape case
52741.extract:
Ikpe idina n'ike nke Unnao na-ezo aka na ndina otu nwa agbọghọ dị afọ 17 na 4 June 2017 na Unnao, Uttar Pradesh, India.[1] Na 16 Disemba 2019, onye bụbu onye omebe iwu BJP Kuldeep Singh Sengar mara ikpe maka idina n'ike na Disemba 20 2019 wee maa ya mkpọrọ ndụ.[2][3] Ọzọkwa, a mara Sengar ikpe ọnwụ nke nna nwa agbọghọ ahụ n'ụlọnga ikpe.
Edela akwụkwọ ebubo abụọ n'okwu ahụ. Nke mbụ mgbe otu afọ gachara n'ike n'ike, n'ihi nrụgide ọha na eze ka onye e dinara n'ike nwara igbu onwe ya n'ụlọ ọrụ UP CM Yogis, ebubo mbụ, nke Central Bureau of Investigation gbara na 11 July 2018, boro Sengar, onye bụbu onye òtù nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ. Nzukọ omebe iwu (MLA) sitere na Uttar Pradesh, nke ndina n'ike. A gbara akwụkwọ nke abụọ ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị na-ebo Sengar, nwanne ya nwoke, ndị uwe ojii atọ na mmadụ ise ndị ọzọ ebubo ịkọwa nna onye lanarịrị n'ike dị ka onye mere mpụ.
N'ịkọwapụta enweghị ọrụ ndị uwe ojii na ikpe ndina n'ike na nna ya ejidere na ebubo ụgha, Onye lanarịrị n'ike n'ike nwara igbu onwe ya n'ụlọ Yogi Adityanath, Chief Minister nke Uttar Pradesh, na 8 Eprel 2018. Nna ya nwụrụ n'ụlọnga ikpe obere oge ka nke ahụ gasịrị. Ihe omume ndị a wetara ọha mmadụ n'okwu ahụ, a na-akọkwa ihe merenụ na mgbasa ozi mba na Eprel 2018.[1][2][3] Ikpe ndina n'ike ọzọ, na Jammu na Kashmir, enwetakwara nlebara anya mba n'otu oge ahụ, na-eduga na ngagharị iwe ọnụ na-achọ ikpe ziri ezi maka ndị ahụ metụtara..   
Mgbe ụgbọ ala kụrụ na 28 Julaị 2019, nke kpatara mmerụ ahụ siri ike nke onye ahụ nwụrụ na ọnwụ nke ndị ikwu abụọ, a kpughere na a na-eyi ezinụlọ ahụ egwu ma dee akwụkwọ ozi maka enyemaka. Na 31 Julaị 2019, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu na Chief Justice kwetara ikpe ahụ.
